engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: I wouldn't have made it out of there if not for you... I can't thank you enough.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't have made it out of there if not for you...
I can't thank you enough.
jpnChrName: 昨日は本当にありがとうね…… お陰で命拾いしたわ……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は本当にありがとうね……
お陰で命拾いしたわ……

engChrName: I was really surprised to see how strong Quatre's gotten. He's really grown up, hasn't he?
engSearchText:
I was really surprised to see how strong
Quatre's gotten. He's really grown up, hasn't he?
jpnChrName: あなた達も頼もしかったけど…… カトル君もいつの間にかあんなに逞しくなって。
jpnSearchText:
あなた達も頼もしかったけど……
カトル君もいつの間にかあんなに逞しくなって。

engChrName: I'm sure Professor Hamilton will be happy to see that, if and when she returns.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Professor Hamilton will be happy to see that,
if and when she returns.
jpnChrName: きっと、ハミルトン博士も一層 成長を喜んでくれるはずだわ……
jpnSearchText:
きっと、ハミルトン博士も一層
成長を喜んでくれるはずだわ……

engChrName: Yesterday was just awful... They even went after old Stinson, from what I heard. Those machines nearly killed him...
engSearchText:
Yesterday was just awful... They even went after old
Stinson, from what I heard. Those machines nearly
killed him...
jpnChrName: 昨日は本当に大変だったわ、スティンソンさんも あの機械の怪物に襲われかけたって……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は本当に大変だったわ、スティンソンさんも
あの機械の怪物に襲われかけたって……

engChrName: We made it out in the nick of time, but...I just can't help worry about the future now. I don't feel safe anymore...
engSearchText:
We made it out in the nick of time, but...I just can't
help worry about the future now. I don't feel
safe anymore...
jpnChrName: 幸い彼も助かって、復旧も始まったようだけど これから大丈夫なのかしらね……
jpnSearchText:
幸い彼も助かって、復旧も始まったようだけど
これから大丈夫なのかしらね……

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's undeniably smart, but all the same, he has a bad habit of panicking and rushing into bad decisions.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan's undeniably smart, but all the
same, he has a bad habit of panicking and rushing
into bad decisions.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授……あの人も頭は良いのだけど、 若い頃から色々と焦りやすいところもあってねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授……あの人も頭は良いのだけど、
若い頃から色々と焦りやすいところもあってねぇ……

engChrName: That's always been his weak point, really: he has trouble stepping back and clearing his head.
engSearchText:
That's always been his weak point, really: he has
trouble stepping back and clearing his head.
jpnChrName: 真面目なのは良いのだけど……どうにも、 冷静に自分を見るのが苦手だったみたいなの。
jpnSearchText:
真面目なのは良いのだけど……どうにも、
冷静に自分を見るのが苦手だったみたいなの。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton is an inspiration to us all, but...it's kind of strange. She doesn't feel distant or unapproachable at all.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton is an inspiration to us all, but...it's
kind of strange. She doesn't feel distant or
unapproachable at all.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士……有名で立派な人だけど、 あたしにとっては同年代の親しめる人でねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士……有名で立派な人だけど、
あたしにとっては同年代の親しめる人でねぇ。

engChrName: She's kind and cheerful, despite her stature. Even the more crotchety artisans can't help but respect her.
engSearchText:
She's kind and cheerful, despite her stature. Even the
more crotchety artisans can't help but respect her.
jpnChrName: 朗らかで、皆にも優しくて、若い頃から 頑固な職人たちにもとても尊敬されていたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
朗らかで、皆にも優しくて、若い頃から
頑固な職人たちにもとても尊敬されていたのよ。

engChrName: I just worry about her sometimes. She's very determined, very headstrong, and that does sometimes put her at odds with others.
engSearchText:
I just worry about her sometimes. She's very
determined, very headstrong, and that does
sometimes put her at odds with others.
jpnChrName: でも、使命感も強いものだから、 無理をしないか心配な事もあってね……
jpnSearchText:
でも、使命感も強いものだから、
無理をしないか心配な事もあってね……

engChrName: Young Quatre looks up to her an awful lot. He may very well grow up to be just like her.
engSearchText:
Young Quatre looks up to her an awful lot. He may
very well grow up to be just like her.
jpnChrName: カトルも、博士を尊敬して模範にしているけど その分無理をしていないか不安だわ……
jpnSearchText:
カトルも、博士を尊敬して模範にしているけど
その分無理をしていないか不安だわ……

engChrName: Quatre's been awfully busy these days, hasn't he? I do hope he's keeping well.
engSearchText:
Quatre's been awfully busy these days, hasn't he? I do
hope he's keeping well.
jpnChrName: カトル、ここのところ忙しそうだけど 大丈夫かしらねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
カトル、ここのところ忙しそうだけど
大丈夫かしらねぇ……

engChrName: I know the professor isn't around anymore, but Giscard and plenty of others are still around to help him out.
engSearchText:
I know the professor isn't around anymore, but
Giscard and plenty of others are still around to help
him out.
jpnChrName: 街にはジスカールさんもいるし、 上手くやって行けるとは思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
街にはジスカールさんもいるし、
上手くやって行けるとは思うけど……

engChrName: But he's still feeling uneasy about things, regardless...
engSearchText: But he's still feeling uneasy about things, regardless...
jpnChrName: やっぱり、博士との連絡が無くなって、 あの子も不安だろうしねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、博士との連絡が無くなって、
あの子も不安だろうしねぇ……

engChrName: Ah, are you showing those good people around the city, too?
engSearchText:
Ah, are you showing those good people around the
city, too?
jpnChrName: カトル、その人達を案内しているのかい？
jpnSearchText: カトル、その人達を案内しているのかい？

engChrName: I thought I saw you with a different group of students earlier.
engSearchText:
I thought I saw you with a different group of
students earlier.
jpnChrName: さっきは、見学に来た学生さんを 案内しているところも見かけたけど……
jpnSearchText:
さっきは、見学に来た学生さんを
案内しているところも見かけたけど……

engChrName: That's right. These guys have some business at the institute themselves.
engSearchText:
That's right. These guys have some business at the
institute themselves.
jpnChrName: ええ、この方たちも大学に用事があるようで。
jpnSearchText: ええ、この方たちも大学に用事があるようで。

engChrName: They lent me a hand when I ran into some trouble earlier, so I figured I'd thank them.
engSearchText:
They lent me a hand when I ran into some trouble
earlier, so I figured I'd thank them.
jpnChrName: まあ、先ほどちょっとした事故で助けていただき ましたしお礼も兼ねて案内しようかと。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、先ほどちょっとした事故で助けていただき
ましたしお礼も兼ねて案内しようかと。

engChrName: I see, I see. Well, that sounds good. You just look so busy lately, it's hard not to worry about you.
engSearchText:
I see, I see. Well, that sounds good. You just look so
busy lately, it's hard not to worry about you.
jpnChrName: そうなの……なら良いけどねぇ。 ほら、最近カトル忙しそうじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
そうなの……なら良いけどねぇ。
ほら、最近カトル忙しそうじゃないの。

engChrName: I hear the whole institute is busier than ever. Everyone's been gray under the eyes as of late.
engSearchText:
I hear the whole institute is busier than ever.
Everyone's been gray under the eyes as of late.
jpnChrName: 大学内でも色々と心配事も あるみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
大学内でも色々と心配事も
あるみたいだし……

engChrName: I appreciate your concern, but I'm fine, really. I know my limits, and I'm making sure not to overstep them.
engSearchText:
I appreciate your concern, but I'm fine, really. I know
my limits, and I'm making sure not to overstep them.
jpnChrName: いえ、ハイジさんの心配する事ではないですよ。 僕も、自分の体調は一応把握しているし……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、ハイジさんの心配する事ではないですよ。
僕も、自分の体調は一応把握しているし……

engChrName: Well, if you're sure... Just take care of yourself, all right?
engSearchText:
Well, if you're sure... Just take care of yourself,
all right?
jpnChrName: それなら良いけど…… カトル、くれぐれも無理のないようにね。
jpnSearchText:
それなら良いけど……
カトル、くれぐれも無理のないようにね。

engChrName: You wouldn't want to burn yourself out, especially at your age. Professor Hamilton would hate to hear that.
engSearchText:
You wouldn't want to burn yourself out, especially at
your age. Professor Hamilton would hate to hear that.
jpnChrName: 身体を壊したら、博士も悲しむだろうし……
jpnSearchText: 身体を壊したら、博士も悲しむだろうし……

engChrName: (Huh. Quatre's really hot shit.)
engSearchText: (Huh. Quatre's really hot shit.)
jpnChrName: （カトル・サリシオン………結構街に   馴染んで気にかけられているようだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（カトル・サリシオン………結構街に
馴染んで気にかけられているようだな。）

engChrName: (Makes me wonder all the more why the CEO's actin' like he is. And the institute's rubbin' me the wrong way, too.)
engSearchText:
(Makes me wonder all the more why the CEO's
actin' like he is. And the institute's rubbin' me the
wrong way, too.)
jpnChrName: （その分大学内での事や、あのＣＥＯの   態度は一層気になるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（その分大学内での事や、あのＣＥＯの
態度は一層気になるが……）

engChrName: How time flies. You've really come into your own, Quatre.
engSearchText:
How time flies. You've really come into your
own, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトルも、最近は立派になったわよね……
jpnSearchText: カトルも、最近は立派になったわよね……

engChrName: I think the Professor will be quite shocked to see how much you've grown!
engSearchText:
I think the Professor will be quite shocked to see how
much you've grown!
jpnChrName: もう二年以上も会っていないけど、 博士も帰って来たらきっと成長を喜ぶわ。
jpnSearchText:
もう二年以上も会っていないけど、
博士も帰って来たらきっと成長を喜ぶわ。

engChrName: Well, I'll be damned... Guess my son really did care about the workshop.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be damned... Guess my son really did care
about the workshop.
jpnChrName: こいつも……こいつなりに工房の事は 心配していたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
こいつも……こいつなりに工房の事は
心配していたみたいだな。

engChrName: I just never could figure out what he was thinking— he's got trouble opening up like that. He gets that from me...
engSearchText:
I just never could figure out what he was thinking—
he's got trouble opening up like that. He gets that
from me...
jpnChrName: まあ、口下手で不器用なのは俺似ってところか…… そこに気づいてやれなかったのは申し訳ねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、口下手で不器用なのは俺似ってところか……
そこに気づいてやれなかったのは申し訳ねぇな。

engChrName: Man. I sat down with my son last night, but we still couldn't really see eye to eye on things. I can't figure out kids worth a damn.
engSearchText:
Man. I sat down with my son last night, but we still
couldn't really see eye to eye on things. I can't figure
out kids worth a damn.
jpnChrName: ううむ、昨晩も少し話したが…… やっぱり若い子は難しいもんだな……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、昨晩も少し話したが……
やっぱり若い子は難しいもんだな……

engChrName: I just wanna help him figure out what path he wants to take in life. The workshop will let him find what works for him.
engSearchText:
I just wanna help him figure out what path he wants
to take in life. The workshop will let him find what
works for him.
jpnChrName: 俺はただ、物を作る価値ってものを工房で 学んでから、自分の道を探して欲しいだけだが……
jpnSearchText:
俺はただ、物を作る価値ってものを工房で
学んでから、自分の道を探して欲しいだけだが……

engChrName: But I can never get that through to him... Maybe I'm just not good at explaining it.
engSearchText:
But I can never get that through to him... Maybe I'm
just not good at explaining it.
jpnChrName: どうにもうまく伝わらねぇ…… いや、この場合は不器用なのは俺の方か……
jpnSearchText:
どうにもうまく伝わらねぇ……
いや、この場合は不器用なのは俺の方か……

engChrName: Long day... I've had my son on my mind. I wanna talk to him when I get home, but what do I even say?
engSearchText:
Long day... I've had my son on my mind. I wanna
talk to him when I get home, but what do I even say?
jpnChrName: さて……仕事が終わったのは良いとして、 今日は息子とどう話したものか……
jpnSearchText:
さて……仕事が終わったのは良いとして、
今日は息子とどう話したものか……

engChrName: He's studying over at the Institute of Science these days, but we couldn't disagree more on engineering.
engSearchText:
He's studying over at the Institute of Science these
days, but we couldn't disagree more on engineering.
jpnChrName: 息子は理科大学に行っているんだが…… どうにも俺らの職人観が合わないみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
息子は理科大学に行っているんだが……
どうにも俺らの職人観が合わないみたいでね。

engChrName: He's big on innovating—finding the new big thing. But me, I'm a more traditional guy. I take pride in the family art I've inherited.
engSearchText:
He's big on innovating—finding the new big thing.
But me, I'm a more traditional guy. I take pride in the
family art I've inherited.
jpnChrName: 古い職人魂よりイノベーションだなんだって 言い張ってて……難しいモンよ。
jpnSearchText:
古い職人魂よりイノベーションだなんだって
言い張ってて……難しいモンよ。

engChrName: I'm not trying to pressure him into taking over the shop, but I think he's hearing me that way. It's a puzzle, I tell ya...
engSearchText:
I'm not trying to pressure him into taking over the
shop, but I think he's hearing me that way. It's a
puzzle, I tell ya...
jpnChrName: 俺も別に、必ずしも工房を継げなんて 言っている訳じゃねぇんだがなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
俺も別に、必ずしも工房を継げなんて
言っている訳じゃねぇんだがなぁ……

engChrName: I do remember hearing there was some falling-out between two professors over at the institute.
engSearchText:
I do remember hearing there was some falling-out
between two professors over at the institute.
jpnChrName: 近頃は教授同士でも 火花を散らしてるとか聞いたな……
jpnSearchText:
近頃は教授同士でも
火花を散らしてるとか聞いたな……

engChrName: One of them was a disciple of Hamilton's, they were saying.
engSearchText:
One of them was a disciple of Hamilton's, they
were saying.
jpnChrName: それも、確かハミルトン門下が どうのこうの……って聞いた気がするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それも、確かハミルトン門下が
どうのこうの……って聞いた気がするぜ。

engChrName: Wish I could tell you more, but that's all I remember. Sorry.
engSearchText:
Wish I could tell you more, but that's all I remember.
Sorry.
jpnChrName: はっきりした事が言えなくて悪いな。
jpnSearchText: はっきりした事が言えなくて悪いな。

engChrName: Word on the street is, Giscard landed another big project.
engSearchText:
Word on the street is, Giscard landed another
big project.
jpnChrName: しかしジスカール工房……またとんでもねぇ 代物の制作を任せられたって話だな。
jpnSearchText:
しかしジスカール工房……またとんでもねぇ
代物の制作を任せられたって話だな。

engChrName: Ol' Giscard heads up the Artisans' Guild. As a fellow member, I'm proud to have him as our ambassador.
engSearchText:
Ol' Giscard heads up the Artisans' Guild. As a fellow
member, I'm proud to have him as our ambassador.
jpnChrName: あそこは俺ら職人組合のお頭さ。 職人の一人として俺も鼻が高いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あそこは俺ら職人組合のお頭さ。
職人の一人として俺も鼻が高いぜ。

engChrName: I'm happy to be where I am, but Giscard didn't get where he is by settling. I gotta keep moving up in the world, just like him.
engSearchText:
I'm happy to be where I am, but Giscard didn't get
where he is by settling. I gotta keep moving up in the
world, just like him.
jpnChrName: 俺も最近は大学の先生から依頼はあったが…… 俺も技術長を見習って精進せんとな。
jpnSearchText:
俺も最近は大学の先生から依頼はあったが……
俺も技術長を見習って精進せんとな。

engChrName: I specialize in pressure equipment, and that's a big niche nowadays. Only gonna get bigger, my gut says.
engSearchText:
I specialize in pressure equipment, and that's a big
niche nowadays. Only gonna get bigger, my gut says.
jpnChrName: オレの専門は圧力機器だが、 これも今後は需要が増えてくるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
オレの専門は圧力機器だが、
これも今後は需要が増えてくるはずだ。

engChrName: My son got into the institute, he's studying there now. I'm really proud of him for that... I just wish we could get along a little better.
engSearchText:
My son got into the institute, he's studying
there now. I'm really proud of him for that... I just
wish we could get along a little better.
jpnChrName: 俺の息子は理科大学に通っているが、 どうにも俺とはそりが合わなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
俺の息子は理科大学に通っているが、
どうにも俺とはそりが合わなくてな。

engChrName: He's really into the cutting-edge tech, like the stuff they're researching over there. And y'know, that's all well and good...
engSearchText:
He's really into the cutting-edge tech, like the stuff
they're researching over there. And y'know, that's all
well and good...
jpnChrName: 最新のイノベーションを勉強するって 意気込んでいるが……
jpnSearchText:
最新のイノベーションを勉強するって
意気込んでいるが……

engChrName: ...but theoretical's tougher than applied, you get me? Funding is super cutthroat. He's gotta be careful, or he'll just be spinning his wheels.
engSearchText:
...but theoretical's tougher than applied, you get me?
Funding is super cutthroat. He's gotta be careful, or
he'll just be spinning his wheels.
jpnChrName: 大学でも予算の取り合いやらもあって 単純じゃないし、空回りしないか心配だ。
jpnSearchText:
大学でも予算の取り合いやらもあって
単純じゃないし、空回りしないか心配だ。

engChrName: (He mentioned that he's a member of the Artisans' Guild—he might have some dealings with the institute himself.)
engSearchText:
(He mentioned that he's a member of the Artisans'
Guild—he might have some dealings with the
institute himself.)
jpnChrName: （バーゼルの職人組合の方ともなれば、   大学とも繋がりがありそうですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（バーゼルの職人組合の方ともなれば、
大学とも繋がりがありそうですね。）

engChrName: (Yeah. Guessin' it'll be easier to get info out of him than somebody higher up the food chain.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. Guessin' it'll be easier to get info out of him
than somebody higher up the food chain.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、それに技術長よりは   こっちの親方の方が話を引き出しやすそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、それに技術長よりは
こっちの親方の方が話を引き出しやすそうだ。）

engChrName: I really am glad the workshop's okay, but I'm happier to see you safe. We can replace parts, but...I can't replace my dad.
engSearchText:
I really am glad the workshop's okay, but I'm happier
to see you safe. We can replace parts, but...I can't
replace my dad.
jpnChrName: しかし……本当にうちの工房が無事で 良かったよな……何より、親父も……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……本当にうちの工房が無事で
良かったよな……何より、親父も……

engChrName: You, too. We got each other, and that's what's important. Didn't expect you to care that much about the shop, though!
engSearchText:
You, too. We got each other, and that's
what's important. Didn't expect you to care that
much about the shop, though!
jpnChrName: ああ、不幸中の幸いだったぜ。 しかし……お前が心配してくれてるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、不幸中の幸いだったぜ。
しかし……お前が心配してくれてるとはな。

engChrName: Honestly thought you were gonna come by and say, 'Now's the perfect chance to revamp the shop floor!' Heh.
engSearchText:
Honestly thought you were gonna come by and say,
'Now's the perfect chance to revamp the shop floor!'
Heh.
jpnChrName: てっきり、これを機に今風にしろとでも 言ってくるかと思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
てっきり、これを機に今風にしろとでも
言ってくるかと思ったぜ。

engChrName: I... Seriously, would I do that...?
engSearchText: I... Seriously, would I do that...?
jpnChrName: べ、別にそんな事は……
jpnSearchText: べ、別にそんな事は……

engChrName: I don't hate you like that, c'mon. You're my dad.
engSearchText: I don't hate you like that, c'mon. You're my dad.
jpnChrName: 俺だって別に、親父の事が嫌いなんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: 俺だって別に、親父の事が嫌いなんじゃ……

engChrName: Haha. Yeah, sorry, that was a bit mean of me. I know you're not like that.
engSearchText:
Haha. Yeah, sorry, that was a bit mean of me. I know
you're not like that.
jpnChrName: はは、ちょいと意地悪だったか？
jpnSearchText: はは、ちょいと意地悪だったか？

engChrName: I'm really happy that you're all right—especially since I hear the institute got all torn up.
engSearchText:
I'm really happy that you're all right—especially since
I hear the institute got all torn up.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよお前が無事でよかったよ。 大学も被害は酷かったと聞くしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよお前が無事でよかったよ。
大学も被害は酷かったと聞くしな。

engChrName: I... Admittedly, I didn't think you would care much for the institute yourself.
engSearchText:
I... Admittedly, I didn't think you would care much
for the institute yourself.
jpnChrName: 意外と素直に心配してくれんだな、 親父もさ……
jpnSearchText:
意外と素直に心配してくれんだな、
親父もさ……

engChrName: Of course I do, bud. You've got every right to choose your path in life—doesn't matter if I agree with it or not.
engSearchText:
Of course I do, bud. You've got every right to choose
your path in life—doesn't matter if I agree with it
or not.
jpnChrName: まあ、お前にもお前の道があるしな、 それが壊れるのは見ちゃいられねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お前にもお前の道があるしな、
それが壊れるのは見ちゃいられねぇ。

engChrName: If you're gonna be out of class for a while, though, it might be worth it to stop by and shadow us at the shop for a bit.
engSearchText:
If you're gonna be out of class for a while, though, it
might be worth it to stop by and shadow us at the
shop for a bit.
jpnChrName: ただまあ、休学したら短い間くらいは 工房仕事を経験しても良いとは思うがな。
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ、休学したら短い間くらいは
工房仕事を経験しても良いとは思うがな。

engChrName: Gotta learn algebra before you do calculus—gotta learn the old stuff before you do the new, right?
engSearchText:
Gotta learn algebra before you do calculus—gotta learn
the old stuff before you do the new, right?
jpnChrName: 最新の技術を学ぶにしたって、 その基礎にはなる訳だしよ。
jpnSearchText:
最新の技術を学ぶにしたって、
その基礎にはなる訳だしよ。

engChrName: I mean, I guess I could... Wait a minute, you're tricking me.
engSearchText:
I mean, I guess I could... Wait a minute, you're
tricking me.
jpnChrName: 親父……もしかして、前から……
jpnSearchText: 親父……もしかして、前から……

engChrName: Whew... Feels like a weight's off my chest, now that I've told you about the truck.
engSearchText:
Whew... Feels like a weight's off my chest, now that
I've told you about the truck.
jpnChrName: ふう、例の運搬車の件、 お前らに話せてスッキリしたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、例の運搬車の件、
お前らに話せてスッキリしたぜ。

engChrName: Just saying it out loud made me realize how silly it was. A car with no driver? Yeah, right.
engSearchText:
Just saying it out loud made me realize how silly
it was. A car with no driver? Yeah, right.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、運転席に誰も乗ってねえとか ありえねえもんな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、運転席に誰も乗ってねえとか
ありえねえもんな。

engChrName: Maybe it's just my old noggin playing tricks on me. I think I'mma clock out and hit the hay early!
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just my old noggin playing tricks on me.
I think I'mma clock out and hit the hay early!
jpnChrName: この歳になると疲れが溜まりやすいのかねえ。 今日は早く切り上げて休むとするか！
jpnSearchText:
この歳になると疲れが溜まりやすいのかねえ。
今日は早く切り上げて休むとするか！

engChrName: I just did a delivery run to get some repair materials where they were needed in the city.
engSearchText:
I just did a delivery run to get some repair materials
where they were needed in the city.
jpnChrName: 修理のために必要な資材を 可能な限り運んでいたところだ。
jpnSearchText:
修理のために必要な資材を
可能な限り運んでいたところだ。

engChrName: I'm really glad my truck didn't get dinged up. I can use it to help everybody out here.
engSearchText:
I'm really glad my truck didn't get dinged up. I can
use it to help everybody out here.
jpnChrName: いやあ、俺のトラックが壊されなくて良かったぜ。 お陰でこうして力になれる事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、俺のトラックが壊されなくて良かったぜ。
お陰でこうして力になれる事だしな。

engChrName: Whatever folks need, I can load it up and haul it over.
engSearchText: Whatever folks need, I can load it up and haul it over.
jpnChrName: 重めの資材も可能な限り 請け負わせてもらうとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
重めの資材も可能な限り
請け負わせてもらうとするさ。

engChrName: I just got back from a delivery to the institute, but it sounds like something big went down there now. The heck did I miss?
engSearchText:
I just got back from a delivery to the institute, but it
sounds like something big went down there now.
The heck did I miss?
jpnChrName: 大学に荷物を届けてきたところなんだが…… どうやら、何かあったみてぇだな？
jpnSearchText:
大学に荷物を届けてきたところなんだが……
どうやら、何かあったみてぇだな？

engChrName: It was in the special research building, I heard. Average Joes aren't even allowed in there...
engSearchText:
It was in the special research building, I heard.
Average Joes aren't even allowed in there...
jpnChrName: 聞く限り、取り込んでいるのは特別研究棟の方か。 あそこは基本的に立ち入り禁止だよな。
jpnSearchText:
聞く限り、取り込んでいるのは特別研究棟の方か。
あそこは基本的に立ち入り禁止だよな。

engChrName: I don't wanna be a thorn in their side while they're dealing with all that. What's a delivery boy to do?
engSearchText:
I don't wanna be a thorn in their side while they're
dealing with all that. What's a delivery boy to do?
jpnChrName: 弱ったな……こうも立て込んでいるとなると、 品物の引き渡しも迷惑か。
jpnSearchText:
弱ったな……こうも立て込んでいるとなると、
品物の引き渡しも迷惑か。

engChrName: Guess I'll just have to sit tight for now, maybe get the supplies to someone in charge.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll just have to sit tight for now, maybe get the
supplies to someone in charge.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょいと様子を見て、落ち着いたら 係員にでも渡しておくかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ちょいと様子を見て、落ち着いたら
係員にでも渡しておくかね。

engChrName: I'm finally done for the day! Gonna grab a bite to eat and then veg out for the evening.
engSearchText:
I'm finally done for the day! Gonna grab a bite to eat
and then veg out for the evening.
jpnChrName: ふう、ようやく今日の分が終わったぜ。 晩飯食って帰るとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ようやく今日の分が終わったぜ。
晩飯食って帰るとするかね。

engChrName: The machinery I see these days is absolutely nuts. How do they manage it all?
engSearchText:
The machinery I see these days is absolutely nuts.
How do they manage it all?
jpnChrName: しっかし、最近はヴェルヌも職人の人らも、 随分と小難しい品を使うようになって……
jpnSearchText:
しっかし、最近はヴェルヌも職人の人らも、
随分と小難しい品を使うようになって……

engChrName: Transmitters, processors, storage devices—you name it, I've seen it, they've got it.
engSearchText:
Transmitters, processors, storage devices—you name
it, I've seen it, they've got it.
jpnChrName: 例えば、伝導体だの高性能演算機の端子だの、 あとは記録媒体だのも運んでいる。
jpnSearchText:
例えば、伝導体だの高性能演算機の端子だの、
あとは記録媒体だのも運んでいる。

engChrName: I can feel myself getting older just looking at them. The world's moving too fast for me, I swear.
engSearchText:
I can feel myself getting older just looking at them.
The world's moving too fast for me, I swear.
jpnChrName: 運ぶ品一つ見ても、時代は変わっていく もんだなって実感するよ。
jpnSearchText:
運ぶ品一つ見ても、時代は変わっていく
もんだなって実感するよ。

engChrName: Whew! Technology, huh? We have to handle all kinds of gizmos and doodads these days.
engSearchText:
Whew! Technology, huh? We have to handle all
kinds of gizmos and doodads these days.
jpnChrName: ふう、ここのところは前以上に 運ぶ機械部品の種類が増えてきたな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ここのところは前以上に
運ぶ機械部品の種類が増えてきたな。

engChrName: I couldn't tell you what half of these even do, but we make sure to treat 'em with care all the same.
engSearchText:
I couldn't tell you what half of these even do, but we
make sure to treat 'em with care all the same.
jpnChrName: どんな部品なのか全部は判らないが、 やはり精密部品ってのは揺らしちゃならねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな部品なのか全部は判らないが、
やはり精密部品ってのは揺らしちゃならねぇ。

engChrName: Usually we end up delivering them by hand—when you put 'em in a truck, they slide and they bang around, and that's not good.
engSearchText:
Usually we end up delivering them by hand—when
you put 'em in a truck, they slide and they bang
around, and that's not good.
jpnChrName: 運搬車も持っているが、精密機械を運ぶには 手を使った方が色々気遣いやすいもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
運搬車も持っているが、精密機械を運ぶには
手を使った方が色々気遣いやすいもんだ。

engChrName: Hey, thanks for the help yesterday. I never imagined something like that would happen on the job... Goddess almighty.
engSearchText:
Hey, thanks for the help yesterday. I never imagined
something like that would happen on the job...
Goddess almighty.
jpnChrName: 昨日は助けてくれてありがとう…… まさか仕事中にあんな事になるなんてな……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は助けてくれてありがとう……
まさか仕事中にあんな事になるなんてな……

engChrName: And I was in such a good mood, too. I was getting along with the artisans, job was going smooth... Man.
engSearchText:
And I was in such a good mood, too. I was getting
along with the artisans, job was going smooth... Man.
jpnChrName: せっかく職人さん達とも仲良くなれて 前向きに仕事をしようとしていた矢先に……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく職人さん達とも仲良くなれて
前向きに仕事をしようとしていた矢先に……

engChrName: Trouble really strikes when you least expect it, huh?
engSearchText: Trouble really strikes when you least expect it, huh?
jpnChrName: よもやこんな事件に巻き込まれるとは 思わなかったよ……
jpnSearchText:
よもやこんな事件に巻き込まれるとは
思わなかったよ……

engChrName: I'm just happy I was able to help that lady. It helps me sleep at night, knowing I did what I could.
engSearchText:
I'm just happy I was able to help that lady. It helps
me sleep at night, knowing I did what I could.
jpnChrName: まあ、あのお婆さんを助けるのに 貢献できた事が唯一良かったかな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あのお婆さんを助けるのに
貢献できた事が唯一良かったかな……

engChrName: I was just starting to get along with those artisans... Some of 'em didn't make it out. I feel sick...
engSearchText:
I was just starting to get along with those artisans...
Some of 'em didn't make it out. I feel sick...
jpnChrName: せっかく職人の人たちとも仲良くなれたのに、 彼らにも怪我人が出たって……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく職人の人たちとも仲良くなれたのに、
彼らにも怪我人が出たって……

engChrName: I wanna at least help get the Artisanal District back on its feet. There has to be something I can do...
engSearchText:
I wanna at least help get the Artisanal District back
on its feet. There has to be something I can do...
jpnChrName: せめて俺も職人街の方の復旧に 何とかして貢献しなくちゃな。
jpnSearchText:
せめて俺も職人街の方の復旧に
何とかして貢献しなくちゃな。

engChrName: We've got fires to put out at our company, but maybe I could convince the higher ups to chip in with the repairs around town.
engSearchText:
We've got fires to put out at our company, but maybe
I could convince the higher ups to chip in with the
repairs around town.
jpnChrName: うちの会社も大変ではあるが……修理に要る資材を もう少し融通できないか交渉してみよう。
jpnSearchText:
うちの会社も大変ではあるが……修理に要る資材を
もう少し融通できないか交渉してみよう。

engChrName: Bleh. I had way too much to drink last night...but it was a decent chance to shoot the shit with the artisans, at least.
engSearchText:
Bleh. I had way too much to drink last night...but it
was a decent chance to shoot the shit with the
artisans, at least.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は飲み過ぎてしまったが……職人の オヤジさん達と話すいい機会になったよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は飲み過ぎてしまったが……職人の
オヤジさん達と話すいい機会になったよ。

engChrName: They're a lot more relatable than I first thought. They take a lot of pride in doing their job right, just like I do.
engSearchText:
They're a lot more relatable than I first thought.
They take a lot of pride in doing their job right, just
like I do.
jpnChrName: 人情があるのもそうだが……あの人達も、 拘りを実現するために色々しているんだな。
jpnSearchText:
人情があるのもそうだが……あの人達も、
拘りを実現するために色々しているんだな。

engChrName: I'm supposed to be the middleman between them and the higher ups, but looking back, I've just been pushing the higher ups' agenda onto them...
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to be the middleman between them and
the higher ups, but looking back, I've just been
pushing the higher ups' agenda onto them...
jpnChrName: 本来なら俺は、職人さん達と本社の間に 立つ立場だったはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
本来なら俺は、職人さん達と本社の間に
立つ立場だったはずなのに……

engChrName: I gotta start listening to their side of the story, y'know? Maybe they can do their job better that way.
engSearchText:
I gotta start listening to their side of the
story, y'know? Maybe they can do their job better
that way.
jpnChrName: 俺が率先して間を取り持って、より良いものを 作れるようにしなきゃいけないんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
俺が率先して間を取り持って、より良いものを
作れるようにしなきゃいけないんだよな。

engChrName: Mrrgh... I get it's a tough job, I really do!
engSearchText: Mrrgh... I get it's a tough job, I really do!
jpnChrName: くぅ……俺だって、俺だってわかるよ、 職人にも矜持がある事くらいさ！
jpnSearchText:
くぅ……俺だって、俺だってわかるよ、
職人にも矜持がある事くらいさ！

engChrName: But damn it, what am I supposed to tell my bosses? It's THEIR deadlines and production quotas we're working with!
engSearchText:
But damn it, what am I supposed to tell my bosses?
It's THEIR deadlines and production quotas we're
working with!
jpnChrName: 仕方ないじゃんか、生産ノルマと 納期ばかりなんだよ、俺の仕事はァ！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ないじゃんか、生産ノルマと
納期ばかりなんだよ、俺の仕事はァ！

engChrName: Oh, we've seen you around once or twice. You're that project owner, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, we've seen you around once or twice. You're that
project owner, right?
jpnChrName: お、たまに来る調達部門の 兄ちゃんじゃないかい。
jpnSearchText:
お、たまに来る調達部門の
兄ちゃんじゃないかい。

engChrName: You've got it rough, too, huh? Y'know, I'm thinking maybe we could vent a bit tonight.
engSearchText:
You've got it rough, too, huh? Y'know, I'm thinking
maybe we could vent a bit tonight.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんたも大変なのは察してるさ。 この機会に吐き出してみたらどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あんたも大変なのは察してるさ。
この機会に吐き出してみたらどうだい？

engChrName: Maybe it'll be easier for you to talk about your stuff outside your usual crowd.
engSearchText:
Maybe it'll be easier for you to talk about your stuff
outside your usual crowd.
jpnChrName: 違う職種だからこそ、後腐れなく 愚痴れる事もあるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
違う職種だからこそ、後腐れなく
愚痴れる事もあるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: You guys're...
engSearchText: You guys're...
jpnChrName: オヤジさん達は……
jpnSearchText: オヤジさん達は……

engChrName: ...Yeah. Look, I hate how I'm always forcing you to do this and stick to that. I hate telling you how to do your job.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. Look, I hate how I'm always forcing you to
do this and stick to that. I hate telling you how to do
your job.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな、普段はあなた達に色々と 制約を押し付けちまってるが……
jpnSearchText:
……そうだな、普段はあなた達に色々と
制約を押し付けちまってるが……

engChrName: I don't wanna make you bend over backward any more than you wanna hear it...
engSearchText:
I don't wanna make you bend over backward any
more than you wanna hear it...
jpnChrName: 俺だってさ、嫌なんだよ、他人の 拘りに茶々入れるなんてさぁ……
jpnSearchText:
俺だってさ、嫌なんだよ、他人の
拘りに茶々入れるなんてさぁ……

engChrName: ...but I can't say no to the higher ups, you know that. What they say goes.
engSearchText:
...but I can't say no to the higher ups, you know that.
What they say goes.
jpnChrName: でもさ、上のオーダーがさぁ……
jpnSearchText: でもさ、上のオーダーがさぁ……

engChrName: Nah, we hear ya. It's not like we have free rein over our work either.
engSearchText:
Nah, we hear ya. It's not like we have free rein over
our work either.
jpnChrName: いや、分かるぜ……俺達だって別に てめぇの好きなようにやるばかりじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、分かるぜ……俺達だって別に
てめぇの好きなようにやるばかりじゃねぇ。

engChrName: I remember getting earfuls from my supervisor all the time when I started out, always telling me to do this differently or do that better.
engSearchText:
I remember getting earfuls from my supervisor all the
time when I started out, always telling me to do this
differently or do that better.
jpnChrName: 俺だって駆け出しの頃は親方にどやされて、 色々と押し付けられてきたさ。
jpnSearchText:
俺だって駆け出しの頃は親方にどやされて、
色々と押し付けられてきたさ。

engChrName: We've all been there, bud. We don't hold it against you.
engSearchText:
We've all been there, bud. We don't hold it
against you.
jpnChrName: 俺達もな、兄ちゃんの事は日頃から 大変そうだなって思ってるんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
俺達もな、兄ちゃんの事は日頃から
大変そうだなって思ってるんだぜ？

engChrName: You're just trying to put food on the table like everybody else.
engSearchText:
You're just trying to put food on the table like
everybody else.
jpnChrName: 会社のオーダー通りにやろうと しているだけだもんな？
jpnSearchText:
会社のオーダー通りにやろうと
しているだけだもんな？

engChrName: Bureaucracy is just part of the business. The bigger you try to be, the more it'll drag you down.
engSearchText:
Bureaucracy is just part of the business. The bigger
you try to be, the more it'll drag you down.
jpnChrName: ま、仕事に真面目に打ち込むヤツこそ、 理不尽な壁に悩むモンさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、仕事に真面目に打ち込むヤツこそ、
理不尽な壁に悩むモンさ。

engChrName: *sniffle* You... You really mean it?
engSearchText: *sniffle* You... You really mean it?
jpnChrName: ……オヤジさん達……グスッ、 マジかよ……
jpnSearchText:
……オヤジさん達……グスッ、
マジかよ……

engChrName: I... I had you guys wrong this whole time. I'm sorry, man...
engSearchText:
I... I had you guys wrong this whole time. I'm
sorry, man...
jpnChrName: あなた達の事を俺は 勘違いしていたみたいだな……
jpnSearchText:
あなた達の事を俺は
勘違いしていたみたいだな……

engChrName: You mind...having a few more rounds with me?
engSearchText: You mind...having a few more rounds with me?
jpnChrName: もし良かったら……もう少し、 酒に付き合って欲しい……
jpnSearchText:
もし良かったら……もう少し、
酒に付き合って欲しい……

engChrName: Sure thing, buddy. Nothing calms me down like a glass of the cold stuff!
engSearchText:
Sure thing, buddy. Nothing calms me down like a
glass of the cold stuff!
jpnChrName: ああ、お互い思う所もあるだろうが、 飲み明かすとしようや！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お互い思う所もあるだろうが、
飲み明かすとしようや！

engChrName: All this time, I thought the artisans had a one-track mind—just stubborn old mules going on and on about their craft.
engSearchText:
All this time, I thought the artisans had a one-track
mind—just stubborn old mules going on and on
about their craft.
jpnChrName: 職人さんたちの事は……目の前の技巧に 固執しがちな頑固者と思っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
職人さんたちの事は……目の前の技巧に
固執しがちな頑固者と思っていたが……

engChrName: But...my bosses are the same, thinking about it. It's all profit margins and productivity quotas with them.
engSearchText:
But...my bosses are the same, thinking about it. It's all
profit margins and productivity quotas with them.
jpnChrName: 考えてみれば、生産性や利益ばかりで、 凝り固まった連中も頑固者だよな……
jpnSearchText:
考えてみれば、生産性や利益ばかりで、
凝り固まった連中も頑固者だよな……

engChrName: Verne works real closely with the Institute of Science.
engSearchText: Verne works real closely with the Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: 理科大学はヴェルヌ社との 産学共同で開発を行ってるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学はヴェルヌ社との
産学共同で開発を行ってるんだ。

engChrName: So yeah, it makes sense that squabbles between the two would trickle down to the professors like that.
engSearchText:
So yeah, it makes sense that squabbles between the
two would trickle down to the professors like that.
jpnChrName: だから、大学側とヴェルヌ社側とで揉めて 教授達にストレスが溜まるってのはあると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だから、大学側とヴェルヌ社側とで揉めて
教授達にストレスが溜まるってのはあると思うぜ。

engChrName: Whew... It's not easy working in product, let me tell you. Mediating between factories and artisans is stressful work.
engSearchText:
Whew... It's not easy working in product, let me
tell you. Mediating between factories and artisans is
stressful work.
jpnChrName: ふう、調達部門の仕事も苦労するな。 職人と量産工場の橋渡しがこうも面倒とは。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、調達部門の仕事も苦労するな。
職人と量産工場の橋渡しがこうも面倒とは。

engChrName: Now the artisans are saying they want to delay everything so they can do just these tiiiny tweaks to the product before it goes on the line.
engSearchText:
Now the artisans are saying they want to delay
everything so they can do just these tiiiny tweaks to
the product before it goes on the line.
jpnChrName: 微調整のために納期を遅らせて欲しいと言うが、 量産品にまで、何故そうも拘れるんだ……？
jpnSearchText:
微調整のために納期を遅らせて欲しいと言うが、
量産品にまで、何故そうも拘れるんだ……？

engChrName: I don't get it. Why do they care so much about that extra 1%? It's good enough as is.
engSearchText:
I don't get it. Why do they care so much about that
extra 1%? It's good enough as is.
jpnChrName: 多少クオリティを妥協してでも、生産性を下げない 方が経済的だとは思うんだが……？
jpnSearchText:
多少クオリティを妥協してでも、生産性を下げない
方が経済的だとは思うんだが……？

engChrName: (This guy works in product procurement, huh?)
engSearchText: (This guy works in product procurement, huh?)
jpnChrName: （今“調達部門の仕事”が  	どうのこうのとか言ってたな……）
jpnSearchText:
（今“調達部門の仕事”が
どうのこうのとか言ってたな……）

engChrName: (Don't think he's workin' for the institute, but he might know a thing or two about 'em. Wouldn't hurt to ask.)
engSearchText:
(Don't think he's workin' for the institute, but he
might know a thing or two about 'em. Wouldn't hurt
to ask.)
jpnChrName: （直接的な大学関係者ではなさそうだが、  	話を聞いてみる価値はありそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（直接的な大学関係者ではなさそうだが、
話を聞いてみる価値はありそうだな。）

engChrName: Right, now that I've got my luggage squared away, I might want to pay a visit to Verne's HQ on behalf of the tech union...
engSearchText:
Right, now that I've got my luggage squared away, I
might want to pay a visit to Verne's HQ on behalf of
the tech union...
jpnChrName: さて、荷物も置いた事だし“連盟”の一員 としてヴェルヌに表敬訪問、と行きたいが……
jpnSearchText:
さて、荷物も置いた事だし“連盟”の一員
としてヴェルヌに表敬訪問、と行きたいが……

engChrName: ...but, I dunno. It's a bit late to just drop by unannounced. I could've gotten here earlier if they actually had direct trains to Basel...
engSearchText:
...but, I dunno. It's a bit late to just drop
by unannounced. I could've gotten here earlier if they
actually had direct trains to Basel...
jpnChrName: やはり遅くなってしまったし明日かな。 直通の列車があればいくらか便利だろうけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり遅くなってしまったし明日かな。
直通の列車があればいくらか便利だろうけどなぁ。

engChrName: But, ehh, not a big deal. I'm here for botany first and business second. Verne can wait.
engSearchText:
But, ehh, not a big deal. I'm here for botany first and
business second. Verne can wait.
jpnChrName: ま、良いか……僕の本題は植物学分野での協力、 ヴェルヌとの折衝の方こそついでだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、良いか……僕の本題は植物学分野での協力、
ヴェルヌとの折衝の方こそついでだしね。

engChrName: I'll have to tour the city while I'm here, too—I mean, I'm in the scientific melting pot of the country! You don't get that chance every day.
engSearchText:
I'll have to tour the city while I'm here, too—I mean,
I'm in the scientific melting pot of the country!
You don't get that chance every day.
jpnChrName: これも役得というものだ、せっかくだし今は、 ユニークな研究でもないか調べてみるかな。
jpnSearchText:
これも役得というものだ、せっかくだし今は、
ユニークな研究でもないか調べてみるかな。

engChrName: (Guessin' he's some scientist from abroad? 'Tech union' rings a bell... Where've I heard that before?)
engSearchText:
(Guessin' he's some scientist from abroad?
'Tech union' rings a bell... Where've I heard
that before?)
jpnChrName: （……どうやら外国から来た研究者みてぇだな。   そういや、“連盟”といやぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（……どうやら外国から来た研究者みてぇだな。
そういや、“連盟”といやぁ……）

engChrName: It's a touch disappointing to see my one and only vegetable recipe hasn't really caught on here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
It's a touch disappointing to see my one and only
vegetable recipe hasn't really caught on here
in Calvard.
jpnChrName: しかし、どうも共和国では僕の思い出の傑作、 “あの野菜”の流通が少ないようで少し悲しいな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、どうも共和国では僕の思い出の傑作、
“あの野菜”の流通が少ないようで少し悲しいな。

engChrName: It's all over Crossbell and Erebonia, but it's yet to track east, I see.
engSearchText:
It's all over Crossbell and Erebonia, but it's yet to
track east, I see.
jpnChrName: 帝国やクロスベルでは品種名を言えば だいたい通じていたんだけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
帝国やクロスベルでは品種名を言えば
だいたい通じていたんだけどなぁ。

engChrName: Maybe I can spread the good word at the institute, though.
engSearchText:
Maybe I can spread the good word at the
institute, though.
jpnChrName: まあ、その辺も含めて明日にでも大学の 方々に勧めてみたりしてみようか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その辺も含めて明日にでも大学の
方々に勧めてみたりしてみようか。

engChrName: Those science-y types know good work when they see it. They're sure to see its greatness!
engSearchText:
Those science-y types know good work when they
see it. They're sure to see its greatness!
jpnChrName: ここの大学も僕との分野と関連する研究を している方は多い、通じ合えるかもしれないしな。
jpnSearchText:
ここの大学も僕との分野と関連する研究を
している方は多い、通じ合えるかもしれないしな。

engChrName: We're gonna have our hands full for a while with cleanup and rebuilding.
engSearchText:
We're gonna have our hands full for a while with
cleanup and rebuilding.
jpnChrName: 俺らは当分の間は街の設備の修理で 忙しくなるとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
俺らは当分の間は街の設備の修理で
忙しくなるとは思うが……

engChrName: Voyager's really impressed me. He's always rushing into things, but he really had a good grasp on things this time.
engSearchText:
Voyager's really impressed me. He's always rushing
into things, but he really had a good grasp on things
this time.
jpnChrName: まさかボイジャーが思い付きで動いて、 こんな形で貢献してくれるとはなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかボイジャーが思い付きで動いて、
こんな形で貢献してくれるとはなぁ。

engChrName: Maybe it's about time I gave him a little more freedom at the shop. I'll have to think about that once all this is over.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's about time I gave him a little more
freedom at the shop. I'll have to think about that once
all this is over.
jpnChrName: まあ、今の状況をこいつもしっかり 乗り越えたら、少しは自由にやらせてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今の状況をこいつもしっかり
乗り越えたら、少しは自由にやらせてみるか。

engChrName: Voyager's optimism is probably his biggest strength. He always looks on the bright side of things.
engSearchText:
Voyager's optimism is probably his biggest strength.
He always looks on the bright side of things.
jpnChrName: ボイジャーはこう、何でも前向きに 捉えて動けるのは大したもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ボイジャーはこう、何でも前向きに
捉えて動けるのは大したもんだよ。

engChrName: He just has a habit of rushing headfirst into everything—makes for sloppy work sometimes.
engSearchText:
He just has a habit of rushing headfirst into
everything—makes for sloppy work sometimes.
jpnChrName: まあ、その分前のめりすぎるから 仕事も雑になっちまうんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その分前のめりすぎるから
仕事も雑になっちまうんだろうが。

engChrName: I wouldn't be so opposed to letting him work on his own if he could show me that he actually knows what he's doing.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be so opposed to letting him work on his
own if he could show me that he actually knows what
he's doing.
jpnChrName: 落ち着きを覚えて作業できるようになったら、 色々と任せても面白いかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
落ち着きを覚えて作業できるようになったら、
色々と任せても面白いかもしれないな。

engChrName: These grid issues are getting even worse... It's really starting to bug me.
engSearchText:
These grid issues are getting even worse... It's really
starting to bug me.
jpnChrName: どうやら、ここ最近の通信不調やら導力異常が、 ちとばかり強まってきたって話でな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら、ここ最近の通信不調やら導力異常が、
ちとばかり強まってきたって話でな。

engChrName: I took a look around the city, just to make sure it wasn't some kinda wiring issue.
engSearchText:
I took a look around the city, just to make sure it
wasn't some kinda wiring issue.
jpnChrName: 一応、街の配線とか照明なんかの状態を 見て回っていたところだ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、街の配線とか照明なんかの状態を
見て回っていたところだ。

engChrName: Sure enough, it isn't. No fraying, no deformation, no nothing. Whatever the problem is, it's not something new parts would fix.
engSearchText:
Sure enough, it isn't. No fraying, no deformation,
no nothing. Whatever the problem is, it's not
something new parts would fix.
jpnChrName: ただ、熱変形とか経年劣化とかでもないようだし 部品を換えてどうにかなるもんでもなさそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、熱変形とか経年劣化とかでもないようだし
部品を換えてどうにかなるもんでもなさそうだ……

engChrName: Orbments have developed a lot, but at the end of the day, they still run on mechanical gears and hinges, just like any other machine.
engSearchText:
Orbments have developed a lot, but at the end of the
day, they still run on mechanical gears and hinges,
just like any other machine.
jpnChrName: 導力器が発達したとはいえ、機械である以上は 歯車やら蝶番やらがものを言う事には変わりねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
導力器が発達したとはいえ、機械である以上は
歯車やら蝶番やらがものを言う事には変わりねぇ。

engChrName: That's good news for us metalworkers—we're the backbone of the whole orbment industry. We'll have steady work for decades, I'm thinking.
engSearchText:
That's good news for us metalworkers—we're the
backbone of the whole orbment industry. We'll have
steady work for decades, I'm thinking.
jpnChrName: お陰で俺達みたいな金属加工業も、 当分は仕事はなくならないってものだ。
jpnSearchText:
お陰で俺達みたいな金属加工業も、
当分は仕事はなくならないってものだ。

engChrName: The more moving parts you've got in a machine, the more likely one of them will break.
engSearchText:
The more moving parts you've got in a machine, the
more likely one of them will break.
jpnChrName: 複雑な機構であればある程、目に見えないほど 細かい金具の狂いが命取りになるからな。
jpnSearchText:
複雑な機構であればある程、目に見えないほど
細かい金具の狂いが命取りになるからな。

engChrName: You really got to work with Giscard as a parts supplier?! That's amazing!
engSearchText:
You really got to work with Giscard as a
parts supplier?! That's amazing!
jpnChrName: えっ、親方ってジスカールさんのところに 例の新装備の部品納入してたんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
えっ、親方ってジスカールさんのところに
例の新装備の部品納入してたんですか！？

engChrName: Oh, man, I can't believe I get to be your student!
engSearchText: Oh, man, I can't believe I get to be your student!
jpnChrName: あの新兵器に部分的とはいえ関わるなんて…… 弟子としてめっちゃ嬉しいっす！
jpnSearchText:
あの新兵器に部分的とはいえ関わるなんて……
弟子としてめっちゃ嬉しいっす！

engChrName: Hah. Yup, sure did. They had me working on the joints—they needed parts precise down to the microrege.
engSearchText:
Hah. Yup, sure did. They had me working on the
joints—they needed parts precise down to
the microrege.
jpnChrName: ああ、関節部にマイクロリジュ単位で正確な 金属部品が要るらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、関節部にマイクロリジュ単位で正確な
金属部品が要るらしくてな。

engChrName: Our factory's already famous for casting and lathing, but I'm still honored that they picked us for the task over the other shops.
engSearchText:
Our factory's already famous for casting and lathing,
but I'm still honored that they picked us for the task
over the other shops.
jpnChrName: 鋳造と旋盤が得意なうちの工房に白羽の矢が 立ったって事さ、嬉しい限りだな。
jpnSearchText:
鋳造と旋盤が得意なうちの工房に白羽の矢が
立ったって事さ、嬉しい限りだな。

engChrName: I'll say! That's so cool! Just, I'm kinda bummed that I'm only hearing about it now.
engSearchText:
I'll say! That's so cool! Just, I'm kinda bummed that
I'm only hearing about it now.
jpnChrName: うわぁー、良いっすね、浪漫ありますねぇ！ でも、どうせなら俺にも言ってくださいよ～。
jpnSearchText:
うわぁー、良いっすね、浪漫ありますねぇ！
でも、どうせなら俺にも言ってくださいよ～。

engChrName: I hope I get to work on big projects like that someday! When's my big chance gonna come around?
engSearchText:
I hope I get to work on big projects like
that someday! When's my big chance gonna
come around?
jpnChrName: 俺も早く、そういうビッグなプロジェクトに 関わってみたいっすよ～！
jpnSearchText:
俺も早く、そういうビッグなプロジェクトに
関わってみたいっすよ～！

engChrName: Y'know, that's a good goal, but I don't think you're ready for that just yet. You have this habit of ditching your work before it's polished.
engSearchText:
Y'know, that's a good goal, but I don't think you're
ready for that just yet. You have this habit of ditching
your work before it's polished.
jpnChrName: まあ、その熱意は認めるが…… 流石にプロジェクト参加はまだお預けだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その熱意は認めるが……
流石にプロジェクト参加はまだお預けだ。

engChrName: You gotta look where you're walking, y'know? You look too far ahead and you'll trip over yourself.
engSearchText:
You gotta look where you're walking, y'know?
You look too far ahead and you'll trip over yourself.
jpnChrName: お前は前のめり過ぎる分、まだ仕事の 仕上げ方が雑なんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前は前のめり過ぎる分、まだ仕事の
仕上げ方が雑なんだよ。

engChrName: Thanks so much for letting me come along on this delivery!
engSearchText:
Thanks so much for letting me come along on
this delivery!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、部品の納入に同行させてくれて ありがとうございました、親方！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、部品の納入に同行させてくれて
ありがとうございました、親方！

engChrName: Ooh, whoa! Is that the top secret project over there?! That's so cool...!
engSearchText:
Ooh, whoa! Is that the top secret project over there?!
That's so cool...!
jpnChrName: ちらっと見えましたが、あれがジスカール工房で 作っている例の……！
jpnSearchText:
ちらっと見えましたが、あれがジスカール工房で
作っている例の……！

engChrName: Easy, boy. You're like a big ol' puppy.
engSearchText: Easy, boy. You're like a big ol' puppy.
jpnChrName: フン、想像通りに興奮しやがって。
jpnSearchText: フン、想像通りに興奮しやがって。

engChrName: Even the small stuff on this job is serious business, y'know? We gotta make sure we do every step right.
engSearchText:
Even the small stuff on this job is serious
business, y'know? We gotta make sure we do every
step right.
jpnChrName: だが……部品だけとは言え、俺も一応は プロジェクト参加者として責任はあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
だが……部品だけとは言え、俺も一応は
プロジェクト参加者として責任はあるからな。

engChrName: I'd just feel nervous slottin' you in on a big project like that already.
engSearchText:
I'd just feel nervous slottin' you in on a big project like
that already.
jpnChrName: 今のお前を、そう簡単に参加させるような 口利きをしてやるわけには……
jpnSearchText:
今のお前を、そう簡単に参加させるような
口利きをしてやるわけには……

engChrName: So, if I can stop making you nervous, you'll let me on? I just gotta get better, right?!
engSearchText:
So, if I can stop making you nervous, you'll let me on?
I just gotta get better, right?!
jpnChrName: つまり、“今のまま”じゃなきゃ良い！ 実績を出せばいいって事ですよね親方！
jpnSearchText:
つまり、“今のまま”じゃなきゃ良い！
実績を出せばいいって事ですよね親方！

engChrName: *sigh* I guess that's not the WRONG way to take what I said.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess that's not the WRONG way to take
what I said.
jpnChrName: まあ……そういう風にも 取れるかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……そういう風にも
取れるかもしれないが……

engChrName: Just, start looking before you leap. You gotta stop charging blindly into things, bud.
engSearchText:
Just, start looking before you leap. You gotta stop
charging blindly into things, bud.
jpnChrName: とにかく、色々と言ってる前に まず手を動かしてみろや。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、色々と言ってる前に
まず手を動かしてみろや。

engChrName: I was looking around the workshop for spare bolts for the generator, and I stumbled upon this.
engSearchText:
I was looking around the workshop for spare bolts for
the generator, and I stumbled upon this.
jpnChrName: ジェネレーター用の特注ボルト、足りないって 聞いて工房内の在庫を探していた所だが……
jpnSearchText:
ジェネレーター用の特注ボルト、足りないって
聞いて工房内の在庫を探していた所だが……

engChrName: Voyager, did you make this?
engSearchText: Voyager, did you make this?
jpnChrName: そのボルト、お前が作ったのかボイジャー？
jpnSearchText: そのボルト、お前が作ったのかボイジャー？

engChrName: Uh-huh! Everyone's working their butts off, so it didn't feel fair for me to just sit around.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh! Everyone's working their butts off, so it
didn't feel fair for me to just sit around.
jpnChrName: はいっ！　親方や皆が頑張ってるときに、 自分だけいつもの修行って訳に行かないし……
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　親方や皆が頑張ってるときに、
自分だけいつもの修行って訳に行かないし……

engChrName: So I had a go at making one of these while you were out. I...didn't screw it up, did I?
engSearchText:
So I had a go at making one of these while you
were out. I...didn't screw it up, did I?
jpnChrName: 親方が出向いてる間に、工房の機材で 試してみましたが……ダメっすかね？
jpnSearchText:
親方が出向いてる間に、工房の機材で
試してみましたが……ダメっすかね？

engChrName: Well, actually, no. This is pretty well polished compared to your other stuff. I can tell you actually took your time on it.
engSearchText:
Well, actually, no. This is pretty well polished
compared to your other stuff. I can tell you actually
took your time on it.
jpnChrName: ──いや、お前にしちゃなかなかの精度だ。 一時しのぎの代替品には申し分ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──いや、お前にしちゃなかなかの精度だ。
一時しのぎの代替品には申し分ねぇ。

engChrName: You really can do it if you try, huh? Guess the circumstances brought that out in you, heh.
engSearchText:
You really can do it if you try, huh? Guess the
circumstances brought that out in you, heh.
jpnChrName: やればできるじゃねぇかボイジャー、 この状況で本気が出たってところか？
jpnSearchText:
やればできるじゃねぇかボイジャー、
この状況で本気が出たってところか？

engChrName: He... He COMPLIMENTED me! YES! Oh, yeah!
engSearchText: He... He COMPLIMENTED me! YES! Oh, yeah!
jpnChrName: やったー！　親方についにほめられた！
jpnSearchText: やったー！　親方についにほめられた！

engChrName: See, yeah, I CAN do it when I try! Maybe if you could let those project managers know, I can—
engSearchText:
See, yeah, I CAN do it when I try! Maybe if you
could let those project managers know, I can—
jpnChrName: そんなら、今後は大プロジェクトへの 口利きも──
jpnSearchText:
そんなら、今後は大プロジェクトへの
口利きも──

engChrName: Make thirty more of these by EOD.
engSearchText: Make thirty more of these by EOD.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえずこの精度で同じボルト、 今日中にあと３０本ほど用意してみろ。
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえずこの精度で同じボルト、
今日中にあと３０本ほど用意してみろ。

engChrName: It's good practice, and hey, it'll really help us out if we can get some more of these.
engSearchText:
It's good practice, and hey, it'll really help us out if we
can get some more of these.
jpnChrName: そうすりゃ俺らも助かるし、 お前の腕前も……
jpnSearchText:
そうすりゃ俺らも助かるし、
お前の腕前も……

engChrName: Aaaaagh! *sigh* I knew it was too good to be true...!
engSearchText: Aaaaagh! *sigh* I knew it was too good to be true...!
jpnChrName: ガーン……まあ、予想はしてたけど マジっすか……
jpnSearchText:
ガーン……まあ、予想はしてたけど
マジっすか……

engChrName: The road to artisanship is long indeed...
engSearchText: The road to artisanship is long indeed...
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり職人の道は 厳しいっすねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱり職人の道は
厳しいっすねぇ……

engChrName: But now I've got a goal, and I'm sticking to it! Nothing's gonna stop me!
engSearchText:
But now I've got a goal, and I'm sticking to it!
Nothing's gonna stop me!
jpnChrName: ま、やる事が決まったからには とりあえず頑張るしかないっすね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、やる事が決まったからには
とりあえず頑張るしかないっすね！

engChrName: I feel like it really helped that I was doing it on my own, though...
engSearchText:
I feel like it really helped that I was doing it on my
own, though...
jpnChrName: あーでも、今回の場合は一人で 集中したってのもあるしどうなるかな？
jpnSearchText:
あーでも、今回の場合は一人で
集中したってのもあるしどうなるかな？

engChrName: I'm not sure I can make them as well if I've got him yelling in my ears.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I can make them as well if I've got him
yelling in my ears.
jpnChrName: 親方に睨まれながらでも、 ちゃんと作れると良いっすがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
親方に睨まれながらでも、
ちゃんと作れると良いっすがねぇ。

engChrName: *sigh* I'm really dying to take part in that project. I gotta hurry up and get smithing.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm really dying to take part in that project.
I gotta hurry up and get smithing.
jpnChrName: うーん、俺も早いところ成果だして、 プロジェクトに同席させて欲しいんっすけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、俺も早いところ成果だして、
プロジェクトに同席させて欲しいんっすけどねぇ。

engChrName: The boss really doesn't like my work, though...
engSearchText: The boss really doesn't like my work, though...
jpnChrName: うーん、雑なのかな俺の作業って……
jpnSearchText: うーん、雑なのかな俺の作業って……

engChrName: I do kinda feel like I'm rushing things, but...how can't I? He's always yelling in the background. It puts me on edge.
engSearchText:
I do kinda feel like I'm rushing things, but...how
can't I? He's always yelling in the background. It puts
me on edge.
jpnChrName: 確かに親方にどやされながらだと、 若干焦っちゃってる部分もあるかもっすね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに親方にどやされながらだと、
若干焦っちゃってる部分もあるかもっすね。

engChrName: Maybe there's a time or place where it's nice and quiet. I'll try and make some stuff then.
engSearchText:
Maybe there's a time or place where it's nice
and quiet. I'll try and make some stuff then.
jpnChrName: 一回、環境を変えて一人で集中して 作業してみるってのもアリかもっすね。
jpnSearchText:
一回、環境を変えて一人で集中して
作業してみるってのもアリかもっすね。

engChrName: We've been having some power issues lately, so my boss told me to look into it.
engSearchText:
We've been having some power issues lately, so my
boss told me to look into it.
jpnChrName: 何か導力網の調子が悪いところもあるみたいで、 親方に言われて確認してたところっす。
jpnSearchText:
何か導力網の調子が悪いところもあるみたいで、
親方に言われて確認してたところっす。

engChrName: I thought it might be a problem with the wiring here at the shop, but nope, everything looks fine on our end.
engSearchText:
I thought it might be a problem with the wiring here
at the shop, but nope, everything looks fine on
our end.
jpnChrName: もしかしたら、伝導系の部品の劣化も あり得るかもって言ってたっすが……
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたら、伝導系の部品の劣化も
あり得るかもって言ってたっすが……

engChrName: It's really stumping me. What's going on...?
engSearchText: It's really stumping me. What's going on...?
jpnChrName: 今のところはそういう兆候も 無さそうっすねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
今のところはそういう兆候も
無さそうっすねぇ……

engChrName: My boss' strength is precision—he can cast metal parts even more precisely than machine metalworks can.
engSearchText:
My boss' strength is precision—he can cast metal
parts even more precisely than machine
metalworks can.
jpnChrName: 親方は、最新の機械よりも正確に繊細な金具を 作れると言われる“鋳造職人”の一人なんすよ。
jpnSearchText:
親方は、最新の機械よりも正確に繊細な金具を
作れると言われる“鋳造職人”の一人なんすよ。

engChrName: I really hope I can make stuff as good as he does, someday.
engSearchText:
I really hope I can make stuff as good as he
does, someday.
jpnChrName: 親方の工房に弟子入りできたからには、 俺も何か成し遂げてみたいんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
親方の工房に弟子入りできたからには、
俺も何か成し遂げてみたいんだよなぁ。

engChrName: And man, have you heard about the projects he's on? He gets to work on these awesome machines! It's so cool!
engSearchText:
And man, have you heard about the projects he's on?
He gets to work on these awesome machines! It's
so cool!
jpnChrName: 親方があんな浪漫あるプロジェクトに 参画しているなんて知った以上は、尚更っすね！
jpnSearchText:
親方があんな浪漫あるプロジェクトに
参画しているなんて知った以上は、尚更っすね！

engChrName: Oh, you're the youngsters from yesterday—and I see Quatre's with you, too. I can't thank you enough for helping me.
engSearchText:
Oh, you're the youngsters from yesterday—and I see
Quatre's with you, too. I can't thank you enough for
helping me.
jpnChrName: あんたらは昨日の……それにカトルも一緒か。 昨日は本当に助かった、改めて礼を言わせとくれ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらは昨日の……それにカトルも一緒か。
昨日は本当に助かった、改めて礼を言わせとくれ。

engChrName: I'd gotten word of people using those kinds of machine monsters to attack people...but I never expected to run afoul of one here.
engSearchText:
I'd gotten word of people using those kinds of
machine monsters to attack people...but I never
expected to run afoul of one here.
jpnChrName: 機械の怪物を兵器としてけしかける……噂には 聞いた事はあったが、出くわすことになるとは……
jpnSearchText:
機械の怪物を兵器としてけしかける……噂には
聞いた事はあったが、出くわすことになるとは……

engChrName: But I'm not gonna sit around and mope. Long as I've still got my arms and legs, I'm gonna do what I can to help clean up.
engSearchText:
But I'm not gonna sit around and mope. Long as I've
still got my arms and legs, I'm gonna do what I can to
help clean up.
jpnChrName: ともあれ……儂も五体満足で助かった以上、 バーゼルの復旧に貢献せねばな。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ……儂も五体満足で助かった以上、
バーゼルの復旧に貢献せねばな。

engChrName: I may be retired, but I was a damn fine artisan in my heyday. I'll make myself useful somehow.
engSearchText:
I may be retired, but I was a damn fine artisan in
my heyday. I'll make myself useful somehow.
jpnChrName: これでも元は職人だ、多少の修理なら あちこちで力になれるじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
これでも元は職人だ、多少の修理なら
あちこちで力になれるじゃろう……

engChrName: I'm lucky to be alive after all that...
engSearchText: I'm lucky to be alive after all that...
jpnChrName: 昨日はあの機械の怪物が襲来した時、 逃げ遅れてしまってな……
jpnSearchText:
昨日はあの機械の怪物が襲来した時、
逃げ遅れてしまってな……

engChrName: I might not've made it, if those students from the capital didn't help me out. I owe them my life.
engSearchText:
I might not've made it, if those students from the
capital didn't help me out. I owe them my life.
jpnChrName: 首都から来たという学生さん達が手を 引いてくれなければどうなっておったか……
jpnSearchText:
首都から来たという学生さん達が手を
引いてくれなければどうなっておったか……

engChrName: Long as my heart's still beatin', I'm gonna do what I can to help. I owe it to them and the city.
engSearchText:
Long as my heart's still beatin', I'm gonna do what I
can to help. I owe it to them and the city.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、命を拾った以上はこの街の 復旧に微力なりとも貢献したいものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、命を拾った以上はこの街の
復旧に微力なりとも貢献したいものじゃ。

engChrName: I may be an old dog, but I've still got my old tricks from my artisan career. I can handle a repair job or three.
engSearchText:
I may be an old dog, but I've still got my old tricks
from my artisan career. I can handle a repair job
or three.
jpnChrName: これでも昔は職人じゃったしな、 機械の修理程度なら腕もなまっちゃおらん。
jpnSearchText:
これでも昔は職人じゃったしな、
機械の修理程度なら腕もなまっちゃおらん。

engChrName: Technology's really takin' off...but it's always because of violence that it leaps like that. The road to progress is paved in blood.
engSearchText:
Technology's really takin' off...but it's always because
of violence that it leaps like that. The road to progress
is paved in blood.
jpnChrName: 思えば、ここ数年で技術は急激に発達したが、 争いや事変が背後にある事も多かった……
jpnSearchText:
思えば、ここ数年で技術は急激に発達したが、
争いや事変が背後にある事も多かった……

engChrName: Crossbell last year was proof of that. Never seen anything like it in all my years...
engSearchText:
Crossbell last year was proof of that. Never seen
anything like it in all my years...
jpnChrName: 特に一昨年のクロスベル再事変など、 儂らの理解を越えていたものだと聞くが……
jpnSearchText:
特に一昨年のクロスベル再事変など、
儂らの理解を越えていたものだと聞くが……

engChrName: I heard Callaghan was workin' like a man possessed in the days before he went missing. I can only wonder what he was workin' on.
engSearchText:
I heard Callaghan was workin' like a man possessed
in the days before he went missing. I can only wonder
what he was workin' on.
jpnChrName: 何かに憑りつかれているようだったと聞く キャラハンも、一体何を目指していたのか……
jpnSearchText:
何かに憑りつかれているようだったと聞く
キャラハンも、一体何を目指していたのか……

engChrName: There's just somethin' about his disappearance that gives me déjà vu. I got a real bad feeling...
engSearchText:
There's just somethin' about his disappearance that
gives me déjà vu. I got a real bad feeling...
jpnChrName: 彼が行方知れずとなった今、どういう訳か そうした事を思い出すのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
彼が行方知れずとなった今、どういう訳か
そうした事を思い出すのじゃ。

engChrName: I was an artisan here up until about 10 years ago, and in that time, I saw the whole world evolve around me.
engSearchText:
I was an artisan here up until about 10 years ago, and
in that time, I saw the whole world evolve around me.
jpnChrName: 儂も十年ほど前までは職人として働いておってな、 半世紀の間色々な機械を見てきた。
jpnSearchText:
儂も十年ほど前までは職人として働いておってな、
半世紀の間色々な機械を見てきた。

engChrName: From big machines to tiny little orbments, life has changed a ton—for the better, I'd say. We live a lot easier than we used to...
engSearchText:
From big machines to tiny little orbments, life has
changed a ton—for the better, I'd say. We live a lot
easier than we used to...
jpnChrName: 導力器の発展で社会が便利になるのは良いが…… その分、兵器も怖ろしいものが生まれてきた。
jpnSearchText:
導力器の発展で社会が便利になるのは良いが……
その分、兵器も怖ろしいものが生まれてきた。

engChrName: ...but we fight harder, too. Warships, railway guns, those Panzer Soldats...
engSearchText:
...but we fight harder, too. Warships, railway guns,
those Panzer Soldats...
jpnChrName: 帝国の列車砲や機甲兵もそうじゃし、 軍用の飛行船も使い方次第では……
jpnSearchText:
帝国の列車砲や機甲兵もそうじゃし、
軍用の飛行船も使い方次第では……

engChrName: I worry that one of these days, we'll make somethin' truly terrible—somethin' that'll doom us all.
engSearchText:
I worry that one of these days, we'll make somethin'
truly terrible—somethin' that'll doom us all.
jpnChrName: 技術の発展が……何か取り返しのつかない事に 繋がらぬか、最近は心配になるのじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
技術の発展が……何か取り返しのつかない事に
繋がらぬか、最近は心配になるのじゃ……

engChrName: Are you showin' these folks around, Quatre?
engSearchText: Are you showin' these folks around, Quatre?
jpnChrName: おお、カトル。 その人達を案内かね？
jpnSearchText:
おお、カトル。
その人達を案内かね？

engChrName: That's right. They're conducting an investigation here.
engSearchText:
That's right. They're conducting an
investigation here.
jpnChrName: ええ、スティンソンさん。 調査の仕事で来た方々で。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、スティンソンさん。
調査の仕事で来た方々で。

engChrName: One of them is also a student here on an educational visitation.
engSearchText:
One of them is also a student here on an
educational visitation.
jpnChrName: まあ、そのうち一人は視察研修で いらしている学生さんですが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そのうち一人は視察研修で
いらしている学生さんですが……

engChrName: An investigation, you say? Wouldn't have anything to do with these orbment issues as of late, would it?
engSearchText:
An investigation, you say? Wouldn't have anything to
do with these orbment issues as of late, would it?
jpnChrName: ふむ、調査とな？　何の事かはわからんが、 よもやここ数日の導力不調の関連か？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、調査とな？　何の事かはわからんが、
よもやここ数日の導力不調の関連か？

engChrName: They weren't contracted by a Verne company or a workshop, were they? I can't imagine Tausend asking for outside help.
engSearchText:
They weren't contracted by a Verne company or a
workshop, were they? I can't imagine Tausend asking
for outside help.
jpnChrName: タウゼントがわざわざ外部の者を雇うとは 思えんし、どこぞの子会社や工房か……
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントがわざわざ外部の者を雇うとは
思えんし、どこぞの子会社や工房か……

engChrName: I'm guessing it was either one of those, or maybe a Verne shareholder acting alone.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing it was either one of those, or maybe a
Verne shareholder acting alone.
jpnChrName: 或いは、株主筋の依頼と言ったところかな？
jpnSearchText: 或いは、株主筋の依頼と言ったところかな？

engChrName: (Smart cookie. Used to be an artisan, if I had to guess.)
engSearchText:
(Smart cookie. Used to be an artisan, if I had
to guess.)
jpnChrName: （随分と的確だな……まあ、この御仁も   隠居した職人なんだろうが……）
jpnSearchText:
（随分と的確だな……まあ、この御仁も
隠居した職人なんだろうが……）

engChrName: (Sounds like he's learned a lot about the inner workings from his years on the job.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like he's learned a lot about the inner
workings from his years on the job.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、職人として街で長くやってりゃ、   経営陣の傾向も経験則で判るか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、職人として街で長くやってりゃ、
経営陣の傾向も経験則で判るか。）

engChrName: Well, if there's anything I can help with, don't be afraid to ask. The Artisanal District's always happy to lend you a hand.
engSearchText:
Well, if there's anything I can help with, don't be
afraid to ask. The Artisanal District's always happy to
lend you a hand.
jpnChrName: カトルよ、何かあるのなら皆を頼れ。 職人街の者らは力になってくれるじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
カトルよ、何かあるのなら皆を頼れ。
職人街の者らは力になってくれるじゃろう……

engChrName: We know how much you go through, and how much responsibility you've got on your shoulders—and you're only fifteen, to boot.
engSearchText:
We know how much you go through, and how much
responsibility you've got on your shoulders—and
you're only fifteen, to boot.
jpnChrName: お前さんの苦労も、大学やヴェルヌとの 関係も儂らは分かっとるからな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの苦労も、大学やヴェルヌとの
関係も儂らは分かっとるからな。

engChrName: I've been hearin' that a lot of places in town are havin' problems with the grid.
engSearchText:
I've been hearin' that a lot of places in town are havin'
problems with the grid.
jpnChrName: 少し前から、街の各所で軽い通信不調や 導力供給の乱れがあると聞く。
jpnSearchText:
少し前から、街の各所で軽い通信不調や
導力供給の乱れがあると聞く。

engChrName: Never had that back in my day—'cause there WAS no grid, of course. Goes to show, the more you rely on tech, the more it can let you down.
engSearchText:
Never had that back in my day—'cause there WAS
no grid, of course. Goes to show, the more you rely
on tech, the more it can let you down.
jpnChrName: 儂らの時代と違って……通信機や端末がこうも 普及した今では一層困るじゃろうな……
jpnSearchText:
儂らの時代と違って……通信機や端末がこうも
普及した今では一層困るじゃろうな……

engChrName: Dad says he's heading out to help with the repairs. Everyone here in the workshop is really busy now...
engSearchText:
Dad says he's heading out to help with the repairs.
Everyone here in the workshop is really busy now...
jpnChrName: お父さんもこの後、修理に行くんだって。 工房の皆さん、本当に大変そうで……
jpnSearchText:
お父さんもこの後、修理に行くんだって。
工房の皆さん、本当に大変そうで……

engChrName: There's gotta be something I can do to help... Oh! Maybe there's some computer work that needs doing? I'm good with those.
engSearchText:
There's gotta be something I can do to help... Oh!
Maybe there's some computer work that needs doing?
I'm good with those.
jpnChrName: 何か私にできる事は……そうだ、 端末なら基本的な事は分かるかな……
jpnSearchText:
何か私にできる事は……そうだ、
端末なら基本的な事は分かるかな……

engChrName: I can't do backend stuff, but I might be able to help with like, setup, diagnosing network problems... It's worth a shot!
engSearchText:
I can't do backend stuff, but I might be able to help
with like, setup, diagnosing network problems...
It's worth a shot!
jpnChrName: 端末のセットアップとかネット環境の調整とか…… 少しでもお父さんたちを手助けしないと！
jpnSearchText:
端末のセットアップとかネット環境の調整とか……
少しでもお父さんたちを手助けしないと！

engChrName: I'm really glad I was able to help out Dad today. I wanna start pulling my own weight!
engSearchText:
I'm really glad I was able to help out Dad today.
I wanna start pulling my own weight!
jpnChrName: ふう、お父さんも喜んでくれてて良かった。 私なりに工房のお手伝いできてればいいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、お父さんも喜んでくれてて良かった。
私なりに工房のお手伝いできてればいいけど。

engChrName: I used to just do grocery runs when people would need it, but now they're busier than ever. They really appreciate it now!
engSearchText:
I used to just do grocery runs when people would
need it, but now they're busier than ever. They really
appreciate it now!
jpnChrName: 前から買い出しはたまにしてたけど、 最近は一層忙しいから助かるんだって。
jpnSearchText:
前から買い出しはたまにしてたけど、
最近は一層忙しいから助かるんだって。

engChrName: They really look busy today, too. Hmm... Oh, maybe I should try making them lunch someday! I think they'd like that.
engSearchText:
They really look busy today, too. Hmm... Oh, maybe
I should try making them lunch someday! I think
they'd like that.
jpnChrName: お父さんも皆さんも大変そうだし…… 今度、お弁当か何か作ってあげようかな。
jpnSearchText:
お父さんも皆さんも大変そうだし……
今度、お弁当か何か作ってあげようかな。

engChrName: You're a really great driver! You handled my Ingert like it was nothing.
engSearchText:
You're a really great driver! You handled my Ingert
like it was nothing.
jpnChrName: さっきは、私のインゲルトがあんな走りを するなんて驚いちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
さっきは、私のインゲルトがあんな走りを
するなんて驚いちゃった。

engChrName: I wish I could drive like you... I'll just have to keep at it!
engSearchText:
I wish I could drive like you... I'll just have to keep
at it!
jpnChrName: 私ももっと格好良く 走らせられるようになりたい……！
jpnSearchText:
私ももっと格好良く
走らせられるようになりたい……！

engChrName: I gotta keep practicing against Dick. I can't let my driving skills get rusty!
engSearchText:
I gotta keep practicing against Dick. I can't let my
driving skills get rusty!
jpnChrName: その為にも、ディックと一緒に まだまだ練習あるのみだよね。
jpnSearchText:
その為にも、ディックと一緒に
まだまだ練習あるのみだよね。

engChrName: Phew... Those errands took a lot longer than I thought they would.
engSearchText:
Phew... Those errands took a lot longer than I
thought they would.
jpnChrName: ふう、思ったよりお使いが長引いちゃった。
jpnSearchText: ふう、思ったよりお使いが長引いちゃった。

engChrName: I think I'll rest up a bit before I go see Dad—he works at a shop floor here in the Artisanal District. I'd say I've earned the break!
engSearchText:
I think I'll rest up a bit before I go see Dad—he
works at a shop floor here in the Artisanal District.
I'd say I've earned the break!
jpnChrName: お父さんは職人街の工房で働いてるの。 ふふっ、後で顔を見に行ってあげないとね。
jpnSearchText:
お父さんは職人街の工房で働いてるの。
ふふっ、後で顔を見に行ってあげないとね。

engChrName: I love taking in the breeze here at night... Calms me down.
engSearchText:
I love taking in the breeze here at night... Calms
me down.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、夜はこの辺りの風が 特に気持ち良いよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、夜はこの辺りの風が
特に気持ち良いよねぇ。

engChrName: I don't make a point of coming out here regularly, though—I just make the trip whenever my heart wants to.
engSearchText:
I don't make a point of coming out here regularly,
though—I just make the trip whenever my heart
wants to.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここに来るのも来ないのも 気分次第と言えば、そうだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここに来るのも来ないのも
気分次第と言えば、そうだけどね。

engChrName: There's this professor at the institute who comes by here—and I swear, he's always a step ahead of me.
engSearchText:
There's this professor at the institute who comes by
here—and I swear, he's always a step ahead of me.
jpnChrName: そういえば……何故か毎回、先回りしてうちで 食べてくれる大学の先生がいるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……何故か毎回、先回りしてうちで
食べてくれる大学の先生がいるんだよね。

engChrName: I sorta wander around a lot, without really thinking about where I'm going...so how does he always know where I end up?
engSearchText:
I sorta wander around a lot, without really thinking
about where I'm going...so how does he always know
where I end up?
jpnChrName: 僕は気分次第でやってるけど…… あの先生は何故、僕の行き先が判るのかな。
jpnSearchText:
僕は気分次第でやってるけど……
あの先生は何故、僕の行き先が判るのかな。

engChrName: Hmph. Well, good to see Millia's okay. I wouldn't want my rival getting injured.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Well, good to see Millia's okay. I wouldn't
want my rival getting injured.
jpnChrName: フン、ミーリアのやつも無事だったか…… まあ、ライバルとしちゃあ安心だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ミーリアのやつも無事だったか……
まあ、ライバルとしちゃあ安心だぜ。

engChrName: There's no point in kicking someone while they're down, you know? I wanna beat her at her best!
engSearchText:
There's no point in kicking someone while they're
down, you know? I wanna beat her at her best!
jpnChrName: ケガした相手にＲＣ勝負で勝っても 面白くないしな！
jpnSearchText:
ケガした相手にＲＣ勝負で勝っても
面白くないしな！

engChrName: Once the town's back to normal, you bet your butt I'm challenging her to another race. One-on-one this time!
engSearchText:
Once the town's back to normal, you bet your butt
I'm challenging her to another race. One-on-one
this time!
jpnChrName: よし……色々片付いたら、今度こそ 正々堂々とリベンジマッチしてやる！
jpnSearchText:
よし……色々片付いたら、今度こそ
正々堂々とリベンジマッチしてやる！

engChrName: Thanks so much for the help earlier! Racing is just the best.
engSearchText:
Thanks so much for the help earlier! Racing is just
the best.
jpnChrName: 兄ちゃんたち、さっきはありがとな！ やっぱラジコン勝負ってサイコーだよ！
jpnSearchText:
兄ちゃんたち、さっきはありがとな！
やっぱラジコン勝負ってサイコーだよ！

engChrName: I picked up a lotta good pointers, so I should level up as a racer soon.
engSearchText:
I picked up a lotta good pointers, so I should level up
as a racer soon.
jpnChrName: 兄ちゃん達の走り方をまねすれば もっと上手くなれる気がするんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
兄ちゃん達の走り方をまねすれば
もっと上手くなれる気がするんだよな。

engChrName: Next time, I'm taking Millia down all on my own! Just you watch!
engSearchText:
Next time, I'm taking Millia down all on my own!
Just you watch!
jpnChrName: かっこよくキメて ミーリアをぎゃふんと言わせてやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
かっこよくキメて
ミーリアをぎゃふんと言わせてやるぜ！

engChrName: I thought my dad was against my career path all this time, but...evidently not. He sounds like he's accepted it.
engSearchText:
I thought my dad was against my career path all this
time, but...evidently not. He sounds like he's
accepted it.
jpnChrName: 親父も……一応は俺なりに道を選ぶ事自体は 反対してなかったってのか……
jpnSearchText:
親父も……一応は俺なりに道を選ぶ事自体は
反対してなかったってのか……

engChrName: I swear, it's so hard to tell what's on his mind...
engSearchText: I swear, it's so hard to tell what's on his mind...
jpnChrName: まったく、わかりにくいんだよ親父はよ……
jpnSearchText: まったく、わかりにくいんだよ親父はよ……

engChrName: Still, I guess it's better to have it sorted out later than never. Maybe some good came out of this after all.
engSearchText:
Still, I guess it's better to have it sorted out later
than never. Maybe some good came out of this
after all.
jpnChrName: まあ、今回の件でちょっとは素直に なってくれたんなら別にいいけどさ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今回の件でちょっとは素直に
なってくれたんなら別にいいけどさ……

engChrName: The Artisanal District has this unique vibe to it—it's so unlike the rest of the city. It's really charming!
engSearchText:
The Artisanal District has this unique vibe to it—it's
so unlike the rest of the city. It's really charming!
jpnChrName: こっちの職人街は、趣が違って ちょっと可愛いわよね～！
jpnSearchText:
こっちの職人街は、趣が違って
ちょっと可愛いわよね～！

engChrName: I just wish there weren't so many stairs here...
engSearchText: I just wish there weren't so many stairs here...
jpnChrName: けどちょっと辛いのが…… ……階段の多さかな……
jpnSearchText:
けどちょっと辛いのが……
……階段の多さかな……

engChrName: It's fine when you can use the aerotram to get around, but when you can't? Ugh... It's a nightmare.
engSearchText:
It's fine when you can use the aerotram to get around,
but when you can't? Ugh... It's a nightmare.
jpnChrName: エアロトラムのお陰で途中までは 楽だったけど……階段多すぎだよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムのお陰で途中までは
楽だったけど……階段多すぎだよ～！！

engChrName: I get why, but still! Could they NOT have built this city in the middle of a ravine?
engSearchText:
I get why, but still! Could they NOT have built this
city in the middle of a ravine?
jpnChrName: 峡谷を切り開いた街みたいだし 仕方ないんだろうけどさ！！
jpnSearchText:
峡谷を切り開いた街みたいだし
仕方ないんだろうけどさ！！

engChrName: Ah, haha... I imagine getting around town was even more difficult before cars and trams.
engSearchText:
Ah, haha... I imagine getting around town was even
more difficult before cars and trams.
jpnChrName: あはは……導力車やエアロトラムが 発明されて良かったね、オデット。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……導力車やエアロトラムが
発明されて良かったね、オデット。

engChrName: Hmm... Yeah, I can see how this workshop ended up the flagbearer for the whole Artisans' Guild.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Yeah, I can see how this workshop ended up
the flagbearer for the whole Artisans' Guild.
jpnChrName: なるほど……ジスカール工房が職人組合の 代表たる所以が改めてわかった気がするな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……ジスカール工房が職人組合の
代表たる所以が改めてわかった気がするな。

engChrName: Each of the other workshops we've visited specializes in their own little niche instead of covering all the bases.
engSearchText:
Each of the other workshops we've visited specializes
in their own little niche instead of covering all
the bases.
jpnChrName: 他の工房もそれぞれ特定の分野で 唯一無二の技術力を持っている……
jpnSearchText:
他の工房もそれぞれ特定の分野で
唯一無二の技術力を持っている……

engChrName: It's all of them working together that makes Verne the powerhouse that it is—and the city along with it.
engSearchText:
It's all of them working together that makes Verne
the powerhouse that it is—and the city along with it.
jpnChrName: それがバーゼルの、ひいては ヴェルヌと理科大学の成果に……ぶつぶつ。
jpnSearchText:
それがバーゼルの、ひいては
ヴェルヌと理科大学の成果に……ぶつぶつ。

engChrName: (Real big on tech, isn't he? Heh, nerd.)
engSearchText: (Real big on tech, isn't he? Heh, nerd.)
jpnChrName: （なんだ、このメガネも   オタク気質かよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだ、このメガネも
オタク気質かよ？）

engChrName: (Yeah, he's always had an eye for these things.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, he's always had an eye for these things.)
jpnChrName: （どうなんでしょう……昔から   こういう話は好きだった気がしますけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（どうなんでしょう……昔から
こういう話は好きだった気がしますけど。）

engChrName: (As a native of Basel, I'm happy to see people learn about what makes this place so nice.)
engSearchText:
(As a native of Basel, I'm happy to see people learn
about what makes this place so nice.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、バーゼルの人間としては   悪い気はしないけどね。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、バーゼルの人間としては
悪い気はしないけどね。）

engChrName: Well, I guess staying home and taking the job off isn't so bad. Lets me do what I want without a certain killjoy breathing down my neck.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess staying home and taking the job off isn't
so bad. Lets me do what I want without a certain
killjoy breathing down my neck.
jpnChrName: ま、たまには留守番くらいしてやるよ。 オッサンの視線無しで寛げるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、たまには留守番くらいしてやるよ。
オッサンの視線無しで寛げるしな。

engChrName: Might be nice to crack open a cold one downstairs.
engSearchText: Might be nice to crack open a cold one downstairs.
jpnChrName: クク、下で飲むのも悪かなさそうだしな。
jpnSearchText: クク、下で飲むのも悪かなさそうだしな。

engChrName: If you need me for anything, just gimme a call.
engSearchText: If you need me for anything, just gimme a call.
jpnChrName: ……外で面白いモン見つけたら オレを呼べよな？
jpnSearchText:
……外で面白いモン見つけたら
オレを呼べよな？

engChrName: It's kind of a bummer I can't explore the city at night with you, because that sounds really cool...
engSearchText:
It's kind of a bummer I can't explore the city at night
with you, because that sounds really cool...
jpnChrName: うーん、夜のバーゼルも興味ありますし、 一緒に行けないのは残念ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、夜のバーゼルも興味ありますし、
一緒に行けないのは残念ですけど……

engChrName: ...but I'll stay here and leave it to you guys. Lemme know if you find anything, okay?
engSearchText:
...but I'll stay here and leave it to you guys.
Lemme know if you find anything, okay?
jpnChrName: 三人とも頑張ってください、 何かあったら呼んでくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
三人とも頑張ってください、
何かあったら呼んでくださいね！

engChrName: Man alive... We had enough problems to deal with BEFORE the whole city came under attack.
engSearchText:
Man alive... We had enough problems to deal with
BEFORE the whole city came under attack.
jpnChrName: ただでさえ大変だったってのに、まさか こんな大事件に街が巻き込まれるなんてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ大変だったってのに、まさか
こんな大事件に街が巻き込まれるなんてねぇ。

engChrName: I heard that a lot of tourists are stranded here since they closed all the roads out. They can't get back home.
engSearchText:
I heard that a lot of tourists are stranded here since
they closed all the roads out. They can't get
back home.
jpnChrName: 何でも、交通規制のせいで足止めされてる 人もいるって話じゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
何でも、交通規制のせいで足止めされてる
人もいるって話じゃないの。

engChrName: We have to figure something out for them. They need a place to stay and food to eat!
engSearchText:
We have to figure something out for them.
They need a place to stay and food to eat!
jpnChrName: そうなれば、あたしらで寝るところと 飯の助けはやるっきゃないね！
jpnSearchText:
そうなれば、あたしらで寝るところと
飯の助けはやるっきゃないね！

engChrName: Some of our guests have been talking about Giscard landing some big new project.
engSearchText:
Some of our guests have been talking about Giscard
landing some big new project.
jpnChrName: そういえば、お客さんらも噂しているけど、 またジスカール工房で大きい仕事をしてるってね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、お客さんらも噂しているけど、
またジスカール工房で大きい仕事をしてるってね。

engChrName: It's a common story nowadays. There's lots of demand for research now, and that's good for spirits and business both.
engSearchText:
It's a common story nowadays. There's lots of
demand for research now, and that's good for spirits
and business both.
jpnChrName: 他にも大学の方でも色々な研究に投資されてるって 事で、最近はバーゼルも前より羽振りが良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも大学の方でも色々な研究に投資されてるって
事で、最近はバーゼルも前より羽振りが良いわ。

engChrName: I like to think we've been helping them along in our own way. Now we've gotta step up our game, with their projects ramping up. They gotta eat!
engSearchText:
I like to think we've been helping them along in our
own way. Now we've gotta step up our game, with
their projects ramping up. They gotta eat!
jpnChrName: それなりにこの街を見てきたつもりだけど、 今後はうちも一層力になっていかないと。
jpnSearchText:
それなりにこの街を見てきたつもりだけど、
今後はうちも一層力になっていかないと。

engChrName: It makes me all the more glad I got my brother to develop that online ordering system. It's a real life-saver.
engSearchText:
It makes me all the more glad I got my brother to
develop that online ordering system. It's a
real life-saver.
jpnChrName: その意味でも、弟にデリバリーサービスの システムを作らせたのも正解だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でも、弟にデリバリーサービスの
システムを作らせたのも正解だったわ。

engChrName: As you can see, this place is popular with artisans once they're off the clock.
engSearchText:
As you can see, this place is popular with artisans
once they're off the clock.
jpnChrName: うちは見ての通り、仕事上がりの職人が 特によく来るもんでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは見ての通り、仕事上がりの職人が
特によく来るもんでねぇ。

engChrName: They all come in looking exhausted. No wonder they need pick-me-ups for tomorrow.
engSearchText:
They all come in looking exhausted. No wonder they
need pick-me-ups for tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 皆ほら、頭も体も疲れ切ってるけど、 明日のためにブーストがいるわけよ。
jpnSearchText:
皆ほら、頭も体も疲れ切ってるけど、
明日のためにブーストがいるわけよ。

engChrName: The previous owner would always take care of them really well. He always knew what they needed.
engSearchText:
The previous owner would always take care of them
really well. He always knew what they needed.
jpnChrName: ま、先代の店主がそこら辺の気が よく利く人だったからさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、先代の店主がそこら辺の気が
よく利く人だったからさ。
