engChrName: I hope I'm doing the same for them.
engSearchText: I hope I'm doing the same for them.
jpnChrName: あたしも、そういう風に気を利かせた 酒場主になりたくてやってきたのよね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも、そういう風に気を利かせた
酒場主になりたくてやってきたのよね。

engChrName: Thanks for stopping by earlier! I hope you enjoyed that engadin—I really put my all into it!
engSearchText:
Thanks for stopping by earlier! I hope you enjoyed
that engadin—I really put my all into it!
jpnChrName: 毎度さん、さっきのエンガディーナは 美味かったかい？　あたしの自信作よ。
jpnSearchText:
毎度さん、さっきのエンガディーナは
美味かったかい？　あたしの自信作よ。

engChrName: My brother works the register and handles the inn guests, so I get to focus on the food.
engSearchText:
My brother works the register and handles the inn
guests, so I get to focus on the food.
jpnChrName: 弟に宿泊業務やら会計やらを一任できたお陰で、 あたしは自分の好きな酒場業務に専念できてね。
jpnSearchText:
弟に宿泊業務やら会計やらを一任できたお陰で、
あたしは自分の好きな酒場業務に専念できてね。

engChrName: I'm really glad it worked out like that. I can't stand that clerical stuff, but cooking? That's what I like!
engSearchText:
I'm really glad it worked out like that. I can't stand
that clerical stuff, but cooking? That's what I like!
jpnChrName: お陰で、料理も上達一直線だしね。 宿酒場を継いだ甲斐があったってものだわ！
jpnSearchText:
お陰で、料理も上達一直線だしね。
宿酒場を継いだ甲斐があったってものだわ！

engChrName: I mean, we all have things we're good at and things we're not. It's plain to see here in the Artisanal District.
engSearchText:
I mean, we all have things we're good at and things
we're not. It's plain to see here in the
Artisanal District.
jpnChrName: やっぱり適材適所ってね、職人さん達を 見ていても重要なものだと思うのよね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり適材適所ってね、職人さん達を
見ていても重要なものだと思うのよね。

engChrName: Working here in the bar just happens to be my niche. I'm happy I'm getting better as a cook because of it!
engSearchText:
Working here in the bar just happens to be my niche.
I'm happy I'm getting better as a cook because of it!
jpnChrName: その意味で、弟に事務やら会計を任せて料理の腕を 上げていくのは、まさに理にかなっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、弟に事務やら会計を任せて料理の腕を
上げていくのは、まさに理にかなっているわ。

engChrName: My sister's really fired up—she's been coordinating food and shelter for those stranded tourists. I can't blame her.
engSearchText:
My sister's really fired up—she's been coordinating
food and shelter for those stranded tourists. I can't
blame her.
jpnChrName: 姉さん、結構張り切って炊き出しやら 寝床の提供やらで皆を助けるつもりのようで。
jpnSearchText:
姉さん、結構張り切って炊き出しやら
寝床の提供やらで皆を助けるつもりのようで。

engChrName: Normally I'd be worried about chewing through our budget and ingredients, but desperate times, and all.
engSearchText:
Normally I'd be worried about chewing through our
budget and ingredients, but desperate times, and all.
jpnChrName: 本当なら、経費やら食材の残りやらも 心配なところですが、状況も状況ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
本当なら、経費やら食材の残りやらも
心配なところですが、状況も状況ですしね。

engChrName: Our phones and stuff are back online, at least, so I'm gonna need to send out some calls to get everything squared away.
engSearchText:
Our phones and stuff are back online, at least, so I'm
gonna need to send out some calls to get everything
squared away.
jpnChrName: 通信も回復しましたし、僕の方でも管理会計、 その他諸々で調整していけそうです。
jpnSearchText:
通信も回復しましたし、僕の方でも管理会計、
その他諸々で調整していけそうです。

engChrName: Everyone's just doing what they can right now—and so should I.
engSearchText:
Everyone's just doing what they can right now—and
so should I.
jpnChrName: まあ、裏方なりに出来る範囲で 力になってみるとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、裏方なりに出来る範囲で
力になってみるとしましょうか。

engChrName: One of our guests was saying that our network issues have gotten even worse over the last day or so.
engSearchText:
One of our guests was saying that our network issues
have gotten even worse over the last day or so.
jpnChrName: どうやら昨日よりも不具合が悪化している みたいです、お客さんから聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら昨日よりも不具合が悪化している
みたいです、お客さんから聞きました。

engChrName: Some people are just going off the grid altogether and staying offline until it all blows over.
engSearchText:
Some people are just going off the grid altogether and
staying offline until it all blows over.
jpnChrName: ただ、そのせいかお客さん達もネットで 注文するのは避けているようでして。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、そのせいかお客さん達もネットで
注文するのは避けているようでして。

engChrName: Ironically, our online ordering system is a bit more stable now. I guess there's less demand on the grid or something?
engSearchText:
Ironically, our online ordering system is a bit more
stable now. I guess there's less demand on the grid
or something?
jpnChrName: まあ、そのお陰かうちの通信はかえって 改善してるみたいで……なんか皮肉ですね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そのお陰かうちの通信はかえって
改善してるみたいで……なんか皮肉ですね。

engChrName: The whole city's been having these weird network issues lately.
engSearchText:
The whole city's been having these weird network
issues lately.
jpnChrName: どうやら市内で通信不調があるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: どうやら市内で通信不調があるみたいですね。

engChrName: Our online ordering system is bugging out, too. I was in a panic the first time it happened, heh.
engSearchText:
Our online ordering system is bugging out, too. I was
in a panic the first time it happened, heh.
jpnChrName: ネット注文システムがたまに固まって、 最初は少し焦ったものですよ……
jpnSearchText:
ネット注文システムがたまに固まって、
最初は少し焦ったものですよ……

engChrName: I thought I'd messed up a line of code or something—and if I DID, my sister would've had my head.
engSearchText:
I thought I'd messed up a line of code or
something—and if I DID, my sister would've had
my head.
jpnChrName: 僕の組んだプログラムの問題だったら、 姉さんに絶対どやされそうですし……
jpnSearchText:
僕の組んだプログラムの問題だったら、
姉さんに絶対どやされそうですし……

engChrName: Thankfully it wasn't me, but it's still a problem. I'll have to see if I can reduce the server load at all, maybe that'd help.
engSearchText:
Thankfully it wasn't me, but it's still a problem.
I'll have to see if I can reduce the server load at all,
maybe that'd help.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、このままじゃ僕も困りますし、 少し負荷を下げる工夫も考えますかね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、このままじゃ僕も困りますし、
少し負荷を下げる工夫も考えますかね。

engChrName: My sister told me that she'll hold down the bar, and I can do all the other stuff in exchange.
engSearchText:
My sister told me that she'll hold down the bar, and I
can do all the other stuff in exchange.
jpnChrName: 宿泊や会計は僕の方で担当しています、 姉さんは酒場業務に専念したいって事で。
jpnSearchText:
宿泊や会計は僕の方で担当しています、
姉さんは酒場業務に専念したいって事で。

engChrName: Honestly, though, I feel like I'm doing the lion's share of the work. She dumps everything on me.
engSearchText:
Honestly, though, I feel like I'm doing the lion's share
of the work. She dumps everything on me.
jpnChrName: まあ……それ以外も諸々押し付けられちゃって いるというのも事実ですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……それ以外も諸々押し付けられちゃって
いるというのも事実ですけどね。

engChrName: And now I have to manage this delivery system she just cooked up on a whim last month.
engSearchText:
And now I have to manage this delivery system she
just cooked up on a whim last month.
jpnChrName: 先月姉さんが思い付きで始めたデリバリーも、 注文システムを組むの丸投げされましたし……
jpnSearchText:
先月姉さんが思い付きで始めたデリバリーも、
注文システムを組むの丸投げされましたし……

engChrName: I'm in charge of helping out guests outside the bar, so lemme know if there's anything I can help you with.
engSearchText:
I'm in charge of helping out guests outside the bar, so
lemme know if there's anything I can help you with.
jpnChrName: 宿泊業務は何年もやらされて慣れっこなので、 遠慮なくお声かけ頂ければと。
jpnSearchText:
宿泊業務は何年もやらされて慣れっこなので、
遠慮なくお声かけ頂ければと。

engChrName: I just wasn't figuring I'd have to do all the online order work, too...
engSearchText:
I just wasn't figuring I'd have to do all the online
order work, too...
jpnChrName: それでも流石にデリバリー対応まで 任せられたのは想定外でしたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
それでも流石にデリバリー対応まで
任せられたのは想定外でしたけどね。

engChrName: We have a dedicated delivery guy now, at least—and the online ordering system is up and running, too, so it's a lot more manageable now.
engSearchText:
We have a dedicated delivery guy now, at least—and
the online ordering system is up and running, too, so
it's a lot more manageable now.
jpnChrName: まあ、今の所はネット注文システムもあり 配達員の方もいますし、ご心配には及びませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今の所はネット注文システムもあり
配達員の方もいますし、ご心配には及びませんよ。

engChrName: The whole city's fallen on hard times, so we gotta help however we can.
engSearchText:
The whole city's fallen on hard times, so we gotta
help however we can.
jpnChrName: 大変な事になってしまったし、 石切り亭でも支援とかはやるそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
大変な事になってしまったし、
石切り亭でも支援とかはやるそうですね。

engChrName: I'm just a part-timer, but I feel like I really am making a difference. I like seeing people's faces light up when their food arrives.
engSearchText:
I'm just a part-timer, but I feel like I really am
making a difference. I like seeing people's faces light
up when their food arrives.
jpnChrName: 僕もバイトではあるけど、頑張る人達のための 差し入れで力になりたいところですよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕もバイトではあるけど、頑張る人達のための
差し入れで力になりたいところですよ。

engChrName: The food here is really good, so it should be a nice pick-me-up for the people out there who need it.
engSearchText:
The food here is really good, so it should be a nice
pick-me-up for the people out there who need it.
jpnChrName: ここの弁当を持っていけば、皆張り切って 作業に打ち込んでくれるはずですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ここの弁当を持っていけば、皆張り切って
作業に打ち込んでくれるはずですしね。

engChrName: Whew... Even on a slow day, I'm running all across town. Crazy to think this isn't even close to peak.
engSearchText:
Whew... Even on a slow day, I'm running all
across town. Crazy to think this isn't even close
to peak.
jpnChrName: ふう、それなりの件数を配達しましたが、 今日はこれでも少ない方で。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、それなりの件数を配達しましたが、
今日はこれでも少ない方で。

engChrName: Gillies says the online service is glitching out for some reason, so we're not getting as many delivery orders today.
engSearchText:
Gillies says the online service is glitching out for some
reason, so we're not getting as many delivery
orders today.
jpnChrName: ギリースさんが言うには、今日はネットからの 注文が少ないという事です。
jpnSearchText:
ギリースさんが言うには、今日はネットからの
注文が少ないという事です。

engChrName: Just goes to show how many people are using it. Now that it's bugging out, the whole system's backed up.
engSearchText:
Just goes to show how many people are using it.
Now that it's bugging out, the whole system's
backed up.
jpnChrName: そう思うと普段、デリバリーサービスが結構 頼りにされてるって実感できますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そう思うと普段、デリバリーサービスが結構
頼りにされてるって実感できますねぇ。

engChrName: I'm almost done with today's deliveries. Looks like I'll be putting in overtime, though—lotta late dinner orders today.
engSearchText:
I'm almost done with today's deliveries. Looks like I'll
be putting in overtime, though—lotta late dinner
orders today.
jpnChrName: 今日の配達も、もうじき終わりです、 晩飯を届ける事もちょくちょくあるもので。
jpnSearchText:
今日の配達も、もうじき終わりです、
晩飯を届ける事もちょくちょくあるもので。

engChrName: Once I'm done with work, I can finally get my OWN dinner...and then it's off to bed to get ready for tomorrow. Lather, rinse, repeat, eh?
engSearchText:
Once I'm done with work, I can finally get my OWN
dinner...and then it's off to bed to get ready
for tomorrow. Lather, rinse, repeat, eh?
jpnChrName: そしたら、後は僕がご飯を食べて 明日に備えるのみですよ。
jpnSearchText:
そしたら、後は僕がご飯を食べて
明日に備えるのみですよ。

engChrName: Grani always cooks for me at the end of the day. I really appreciate it... She's such a good person, man.
engSearchText:
Grani always cooks for me at the end of the day.
I really appreciate it... She's such a good person, man.
jpnChrName: グラーニさんは何やかんやで気前良いですしね、 僕の分のまかないも用意してくれるんです。
jpnSearchText:
グラーニさんは何やかんやで気前良いですしね、
僕の分のまかないも用意してくれるんです。

engChrName: All right, I've picked up all the lunch orders—now to deliver them!
engSearchText:
All right, I've picked up all the lunch orders—now to
deliver them!
jpnChrName: さて、注文分の弁当も受け取りましたし、 職人の人たちに届けに行くとしますか！
jpnSearchText:
さて、注文分の弁当も受け取りましたし、
職人の人たちに届けに行くとしますか！

engChrName: A lot of the artisans have this habit of getting so caught up in work that they forget to eat.
engSearchText:
A lot of the artisans have this habit of getting so
caught up in work that they forget to eat.
jpnChrName: 職人さん達って、仕事に熱中して食事時を 逃しちゃう事も多いですしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
職人さん達って、仕事に熱中して食事時を
逃しちゃう事も多いですしねぇ。

engChrName: So the inn decided to start up this delivery service last month. That way, they don't accidentally go hungry!
engSearchText:
So the inn decided to start up this delivery service
last month. That way, they don't accidentally
go hungry!
jpnChrName: ここの宿酒場、そんな職人たちのために先月から デリバリーサービスってのを始めたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここの宿酒場、そんな職人たちのために先月から
デリバリーサービスってのを始めたんですよ。

engChrName: It was just the right time for me, actually—I was trying to find a job, and then the inn came a-knocking. Worked out perfectly!
engSearchText:
It was just the right time for me, actually—I was
trying to find a job, and then the inn
came a-knocking. Worked out perfectly!
jpnChrName: 僕もちょうどバイト探してたところですしね、 本当に間が良かったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕もちょうどバイト探してたところですしね、
本当に間が良かったですよ。

engChrName: I never dreamed a disaster like this would befall our fair city... I need to make sure all the workshops are holding up.
engSearchText:
I never dreamed a disaster like this would befall our
fair city... I need to make sure all the workshops are
holding up.
jpnChrName: よもやこんな事になるとは…… 付き合いのある工房の様子も見に行かないとな。
jpnSearchText:
よもやこんな事になるとは……
付き合いのある工房の様子も見に行かないとな。

engChrName: I work closely with them for my job. If they're out of commission, it could throw a wrench in our whole pipeline.
engSearchText:
I work closely with them for my job. If they're out of
commission, it could throw a wrench in our
whole pipeline.
jpnChrName: 被害を受けたのであれば、地方からの仕事に ついても配慮せねばならないし……
jpnSearchText:
被害を受けたのであれば、地方からの仕事に
ついても配慮せねばならないし……

engChrName: But more than that, I want to make sure the PEOPLE are okay. I'll have to make the most of my connections here.
engSearchText:
But more than that, I want to make sure the
PEOPLE are okay. I'll have to make the most of my
connections here.
jpnChrName: 何より、自分としても一刻も早く復旧できるよう、 伝手を活かして力になりたいしな。
jpnSearchText:
何より、自分としても一刻も早く復旧できるよう、
伝手を活かして力になりたいしな。

engChrName: Those two siblings are like a whole routine in and of themselves. It never gets old watching them work the floor.
engSearchText:
Those two siblings are like a whole routine in and
of themselves. It never gets old watching them work
the floor.
jpnChrName: はは、それにしてもこの宿酒場の姉弟は 見ていて飽きないね、最早名物感がある。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それにしてもこの宿酒場の姉弟は
見ていて飽きないね、最早名物感がある。

engChrName: The network issues here have messed up my itinerary today, so I'm just standing by here.
engSearchText:
The network issues here have messed up my itinerary
today, so I'm just standing by here.
jpnChrName: まあ、例の不調のせいか商談の予定が少々 変わってしまってね、宿で待機していたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、例の不調のせいか商談の予定が少々
変わってしまってね、宿で待機していたんだが……

engChrName: But I'm not complaining—there's hardly a boring moment here with those two around.
engSearchText:
But I'm not complaining—there's hardly a boring
moment here with those two around.
jpnChrName: あの姉弟を見れるお陰で暇にはならないのも、 この宿酒場の良い所なんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
あの姉弟を見れるお陰で暇にはならないのも、
この宿酒場の良い所なんだよね。

engChrName: Basel is home to many a skilled artisan, and that draws demand from all around the globe.
engSearchText:
Basel is home to many a skilled artisan, and that
draws demand from all around the globe.
jpnChrName: バーゼルには優秀な職人も多いし、 遠くからの委託の需要も多いが……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルには優秀な職人も多いし、
遠くからの委託の需要も多いが……

engChrName: But in some ways, we actually have TOO many—it can make picking the right one difficult, especially for the uninitiated client.
engSearchText:
But in some ways, we actually have TOO many—it
can make picking the right one difficult, especially for
the uninitiated client.
jpnChrName: やはり、バーゼルとの付き合いが薄い人や 技術に疎い人だと契約相手に迷う事もある。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、バーゼルとの付き合いが薄い人や
技術に疎い人だと契約相手に迷う事もある。

engChrName: That's where I come in. I act as a consultant to help clients pick the workshop that's right for them.
engSearchText:
That's where I come in. I act as a consultant to help
clients pick the workshop that's right for them.
jpnChrName: それでまあ、技師上がりの自分が各地を 周って間を取り持ってる訳でね。
jpnSearchText:
それでまあ、技師上がりの自分が各地を
周って間を取り持ってる訳でね。

engChrName: It's funny, really: I used to be an engineer, but I hardly do any engineering myself anymore.
engSearchText:
It's funny, really: I used to be an engineer, but I
hardly do any engineering myself anymore.
jpnChrName: まあ、出張技師と言いつつ、コンサルみたいな 事も多少はやってる感じだな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、出張技師と言いつつ、コンサルみたいな
事も多少はやってる感じだな。

engChrName: I'm an engineering consultant who works with clients and workshops both, so that they can work together at peak efficiency.
engSearchText:
I'm an engineering consultant who works with clients
and workshops both, so that they can work together
at peak efficiency.
jpnChrName: 自分は出張技師として各地を回りながら 工房間の橋渡しをしていてね。
jpnSearchText:
自分は出張技師として各地を回りながら
工房間の橋渡しをしていてね。

engChrName: So my travels often bring me to Basel, naturally. I'm something of a regular here at the inn.
engSearchText:
So my travels often bring me to Basel, naturally.
I'm something of a regular here at the inn.
jpnChrName: まあ、当然ながらバーゼルは頻繁に 寄るもので、この宿屋ともすっかり馴染みさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、当然ながらバーゼルは頻繁に
寄るもので、この宿屋ともすっかり馴染みさ。

engChrName: Basel's artisans speak for themselves in terms of quality. Clients everywhere want their work, and my job is to help them get it.
engSearchText:
Basel's artisans speak for themselves in terms
of quality. Clients everywhere want their work, and
my job is to help them get it.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、職人街の技術は他の街の メーカーでも重宝されているものでねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、職人街の技術は他の街の
メーカーでも重宝されているものでねぇ……

engChrName: Just the other day, I hooked up a prestigious watchmaking firm with Gowland's Workshop to make their custom gears.
engSearchText:
Just the other day, I hooked up a prestigious
watchmaking firm with Gowland's Workshop to
make their custom gears.
jpnChrName: 例えばオラシオンの由緒ある時計屋さんに、 ゴーランド工房の精巧な歯車を紹介したりね。
jpnSearchText:
例えばオラシオンの由緒ある時計屋さんに、
ゴーランド工房の精巧な歯車を紹介したりね。

engChrName: I was sitting down for business talks with Verne when everything just...fell to chaos! I couldn't believe my eyes...!
engSearchText:
I was sitting down for business talks with Verne when
everything just...fell to chaos! I couldn't believe my
eyes...!
jpnChrName: びっくりしたわよ、もう！ ヴェルヌ社で商談中に町が襲撃されるなんて！
jpnSearchText:
びっくりしたわよ、もう！
ヴェルヌ社で商談中に町が襲撃されるなんて！

engChrName: We were safe inside that building, thankfully, but everybody was shaken—and understandably so.
engSearchText:
We were safe inside that building, thankfully, but
everybody was shaken—and understandably so.
jpnChrName: 幸いビルの中は安全だったけど ヴェルヌ社の重役たちも動揺してたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
幸いビルの中は安全だったけど
ヴェルヌ社の重役たちも動揺してたみたいね。

engChrName: I hear they attacked some other town, too... And now that the roads are closed in response, I'm stranded here.
engSearchText:
I hear they attacked some other town, too... And now
that the roads are closed in response, I'm
stranded here.
jpnChrName: そういえば別の町でも事件があったらしいし…… 交通網も封鎖されてるとかで帰れないし。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば別の町でも事件があったらしいし……
交通網も封鎖されてるとかで帰れないし。

engChrName: Mmgh... There's just nothing I can do. I guess, well... I might as well make the most of it, if I'm gonna be stuck here!
engSearchText:
Mmgh... There's just nothing I can do. I guess, well...
I might as well make the most of it, if I'm gonna be
stuck here!
jpnChrName: くっ……しばらく滞在するしかないわね。 仕方ないから満喫しましょ！　それしかないわ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……しばらく滞在するしかないわね。
仕方ないから満喫しましょ！　それしかないわ！

engChrName: I've got a big meeting with a representative from Verne today.
engSearchText:
I've got a big meeting with a representative from
Verne today.
jpnChrName: 今日はヴェルヌ社の担当さんと会って ちょっとした商談をしないとね……
jpnSearchText:
今日はヴェルヌ社の担当さんと会って
ちょっとした商談をしないとね……

engChrName: I really can't be bothered, if I'm being honest. I agreed to the trip for pleasure first and business second.
engSearchText:
I really can't be bothered, if I'm being honest.
I agreed to the trip for pleasure first and
business second.
jpnChrName: 勢いで請けちゃった仕事だし イマイチやる気が起きないけど……
jpnSearchText:
勢いで請けちゃった仕事だし
イマイチやる気が起きないけど……

engChrName: But I need to at least ACT like I care, or I can kiss any future business trips goodbye. And I can't have that, now can I?
engSearchText:
But I need to at least ACT like I care, or I can kiss
any future business trips goodbye. And I can't have
that, now can I?
jpnChrName: ポーズだけでも取っとかないと 二度と出張が認めてもらえなくなるかも……
jpnSearchText:
ポーズだけでも取っとかないと
二度と出張が認めてもらえなくなるかも……

engChrName: I've gotta suck it up and nail this meeting—if for nothing else, for securing cushy trips like these in the future!
engSearchText:
I've gotta suck it up and nail this meeting—if for
nothing else, for securing cushy trips like these in
the future!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ、またオイシイ思いをするためにも 仕事はキッチリしておかないと……！
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬ、またオイシイ思いをするためにも
仕事はキッチリしておかないと……！

engChrName: This cafeteria's a bit on the noisy side...but then, so is Basel. It fits the city, no? So maybe it's not so bad.
engSearchText:
This cafeteria's a bit on the noisy side...but then, so
is Basel. It fits the city, no? So maybe it's not so bad.
jpnChrName: この食堂、ちょっと騒がしいけど 地元の生活感が感じられてアリよね。
jpnSearchText:
この食堂、ちょっと騒がしいけど
地元の生活感が感じられてアリよね。

engChrName: And I can't complain when the beer tastes this good.
engSearchText: And I can't complain when the beer tastes this good.
jpnChrName: 地ビールもイケルわね～、ごきゅごきゅ……
jpnSearchText: 地ビールもイケルわね～、ごきゅごきゅ……

engChrName: It really does taste better when you're just drinking for yourself instead of having to schmooze with clients.
engSearchText:
It really does taste better when you're just drinking for
yourself instead of having to schmooze with clients.
jpnChrName: ぷは～っ！　接待仕事じゃない ビールはサイコーね！！
jpnSearchText:
ぷは～っ！　接待仕事じゃない
ビールはサイコーね！！

engChrName: And since my company's paying the tab... Heh heh heh! I can drink as much as I want! Guilt-free drinks are the best drinks!
engSearchText:
And since my company's paying the tab... Heh
heh heh! I can drink as much as I want!
Guilt-free drinks are the best drinks!
jpnChrName: 経費は全部会社持ちだし、今日は ジャンジャン飲んで英気を養うわよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
経費は全部会社持ちだし、今日は
ジャンジャン飲んで英気を養うわよ～っ！！

engChrName: Ahh...! Now I'm all checked in here, and I can take it easy for the rest of the day. This is the life!
engSearchText:
Ahh...! Now I'm all checked in here, and I can take it
easy for the rest of the day. This is the life!
jpnChrName: ふい～、チェックインも済ませたし 今日はのんびり過ごしますか！
jpnSearchText:
ふい～、チェックインも済ませたし
今日はのんびり過ごしますか！

engChrName: What am I here for? Well, I work for a wholesale company that deals with industrial orbments.
engSearchText:
What am I here for? Well, I work for a wholesale
company that deals with industrial orbments.
jpnChrName: うちの会社、業務用導力製品の 卸売りをしていてね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの会社、業務用導力製品の
卸売りをしていてね。

engChrName: They shipped me out here to check out what's hot on the market and bring some samples back, plus talk to some of the manufacturers.
engSearchText:
They shipped me out here to check out what's hot on
the market and bring some samples back, plus talk to
some of the manufacturers.
jpnChrName: バーゼルで新製品を見繕って 仕入れとか商談とかしに来たんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルで新製品を見繕って
仕入れとか商談とかしに来たんだけど……

engChrName: But all of that can wait for tomorrow! Today, I've got dinner for one and a bottomless wallet! Thank Goddess for company funds!
engSearchText:
But all of that can wait for tomorrow! Today, I've got
dinner for one and a bottomless wallet!
Thank Goddess for company funds!
jpnChrName: いや～、会社のミラで旅行できるなんてサイコーね！ 仕事は明日からでいっか！！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、会社のミラで旅行できるなんてサイコーね！
仕事は明日からでいっか！！

engChrName: Zin had told me that Renne was capable, and goodness, he wasn't kidding. 'Capable' is almost underselling her.
engSearchText:
Zin had told me that Renne was capable, and
goodness, he wasn't kidding. 'Capable' is almost
underselling her.
jpnChrName: レンさんについてはジンさんから 伺っていましたが……想像以上に頼もしいですね。
jpnSearchText:
レンさんについてはジンさんから
伺っていましたが……想像以上に頼もしいですね。

engChrName: She had our issues diagnosed in a flash—and she even pointed out the potential link between the network and the septium veins, too.
engSearchText:
She had our issues diagnosed in a flash—and she even
pointed out the potential link between the network
and the septium veins, too.
jpnChrName: 七耀脈と導力ネットの関係への着目といい……
jpnSearchText: 七耀脈と導力ネットの関係への着目といい……

engChrName: She's wise beyond her years, for certain. It's a shame that experience had to come from the sort of 'trouble' she referenced.
engSearchText:
She's wise beyond her years, for certain. It's a shame
that experience had to come from the sort of 'trouble'
she referenced.
jpnChrName: 数々の“事変”を経験しているそうですが 納得する他ありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
数々の“事変”を経験しているそうですが
納得する他ありませんよ。

engChrName: While she's an excellent mind, we can't push all the work onto her—she is still a child, after all. We adults need to pull our own weight.
engSearchText:
While she's an excellent mind, we can't push all the
work onto her—she is still a child, after all. We adults
need to pull our own weight.
jpnChrName: とはいえ我々も頼りきりという訳にはいきません。 彼女と連携しつつ調査を進めなくては。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ我々も頼りきりという訳にはいきません。
彼女と連携しつつ調査を進めなくては。

engChrName: Blanca was badly injured in the assault, but the doctors are saying she's in stable condition now. That's a huge relief...
engSearchText:
Blanca was badly injured in the assault, but the
doctors are saying she's in stable condition now.
That's a huge relief...
jpnChrName: ブランカさんは重傷を負ってしまいましたが、 命に別状は無く……本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
ブランカさんは重傷を負ってしまいましたが、
命に別状は無く……本当に良かったです。

engChrName: I didn't think Almata would wreak this much havoc. Have they no mercy?
engSearchText:
I didn't think Almata would wreak this much havoc.
Have they no mercy?
jpnChrName: しかしここまでの事件を引き起こすとは── アルマータ、やはり何としても止めなければ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしここまでの事件を引き起こすとは──
アルマータ、やはり何としても止めなければ。

engChrName: We need to do everything we can to stop them, and we won't rest until they're brought to justice. You all stay safe out there!
engSearchText:
We need to do everything we can to stop them, and
we won't rest until they're brought to justice. You all
stay safe out there!
jpnChrName: 我々も手を尽くすつもりです。 ヴァンさん達もどうかお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText:
我々も手を尽くすつもりです。
ヴァンさん達もどうかお気をつけて！

engChrName: I've reported all this to the Edith branch and brought Zin up to speed.
engSearchText:
I've reported all this to the Edith branch and brought
Zin up to speed.
jpnChrName: 現状に関しては首都の総支部に報告し、 ジンさんとも共有しておきました。
jpnSearchText:
現状に関しては首都の総支部に報告し、
ジンさんとも共有しておきました。

engChrName: They said they're gonna try looking into the Anchorville Company for us, too.
engSearchText:
They said they're gonna try looking into the
Anchorville Company for us, too.
jpnChrName: あちらでも《アンカーヴィル商会》近辺の 洗い出しに当たってくれるとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
あちらでも《アンカーヴィル商会》近辺の
洗い出しに当たってくれるとの事です。

engChrName: I investigated them myself, and I learned that they've been bringing this suspicious freight truck into the city lately...
engSearchText:
I investigated them myself, and I learned that they've
been bringing this suspicious freight truck into the
city lately...
jpnChrName: 僕も改めて調べているんですが…… 何度か大型トラックを使用した形跡がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
僕も改めて調べているんですが……
何度か大型トラックを使用した形跡がありますね。

engChrName: I'll have to look into that more. Could it be related to Almata's dealings with Professor Callaghan...?
engSearchText:
I'll have to look into that more. Could it be related to
Almata's dealings with Professor Callaghan...?
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授に接触し始めた時期か── もう少し詳しく調べてみますよ。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授に接触し始めた時期か──
もう少し詳しく調べてみますよ。

engChrName: We need to be proactive here, or we'll have another Tharbad on our hands.
engSearchText:
We need to be proactive here, or we'll have another
Tharbad on our hands.
jpnChrName: あのサルバッドの二の舞いに ならないよう、慎重に進めないと……
jpnSearchText:
あのサルバッドの二の舞いに
ならないよう、慎重に進めないと……

engChrName: Stay sharp, everyone!
engSearchText: Stay sharp, everyone!
jpnChrName: 皆さんも十分に気を付けてくださいね！
jpnSearchText: 皆さんも十分に気を付けてくださいね！

engChrName: Oh, I was just wondering about you, Van.
engSearchText: Oh, I was just wondering about you, Van.
jpnChrName: そういえば、ヴァンさん達が 出張にいらした理由ですが──
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ヴァンさん達が
出張にいらした理由ですが──

engChrName: I take it you got called out here to investigate all these events yourself? Those suspicious sightings did garner a lot of attention.
engSearchText:
I take it you got called out here to investigate all these
events yourself? Those suspicious sightings did garner
a lot of attention.
jpnChrName: やはり“不審者”の件も含めた 総合的な調査なのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
やはり“不審者”の件も含めた
総合的な調査なのでしょうか？

engChrName: Pretty much, yeah.
engSearchText: Pretty much, yeah.
jpnChrName: まあ、そんなところだ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そんなところだ。

engChrName: You sound like you're well up on the issue yourself.
engSearchText: You sound like you're well up on the issue yourself.
jpnChrName: てか、その口ぶりだとそっちでも 何か掴んでいるのか？
jpnSearchText:
てか、その口ぶりだとそっちでも
何か掴んでいるのか？

engChrName: Indeed. That's partly why I called Alvis and Regina here.
engSearchText:
Indeed. That's partly why I called Alvis and
Regina here.
jpnChrName: ええ、そういう事情もあって、 アルヴィスさん達を呼びましたので。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そういう事情もあって、
アルヴィスさん達を呼びましたので。

engChrName: It could all just be a big load of nothing, so we can't set aside too many men for it, but better safe than sorry.
engSearchText:
It could all just be a big load of nothing, so we can't
set aside too many men for it, but better safe
than sorry.
jpnChrName: 確証はありませんし、ギルドとしては 優先度を下げざるを得ないのですが……
jpnSearchText:
確証はありませんし、ギルドとしては
優先度を下げざるを得ないのですが……

engChrName: I did want to ask for your opinion on all this, given you've had your fair share of run-ins with Almata yourself.
engSearchText:
I did want to ask for your opinion on all this, given
you've had your fair share of run-ins with
Almata yourself.
jpnChrName: その辺りは、アルマータと相対した経験が豊富な ヴァンさんの意見も参考になりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りは、アルマータと相対した経験が豊富な
ヴァンさんの意見も参考になりそうですね。

engChrName: Heh. Tell me about it.
engSearchText: Heh. Tell me about it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、連中とは本当に 嫌な縁ができちまったっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、連中とは本当に
嫌な縁ができちまったっつーか……

engChrName: My take: it's just too early to tell. Not enough to go on, here.
engSearchText:
My take: it's just too early to tell. Not enough to
go on, here.
jpnChrName: ま、今日の所は何とも言えねえな。
jpnSearchText: ま、今日の所は何とも言えねえな。

engChrName: I get that... Thanks for your input. If anything does happen, please let us know.
engSearchText:
I get that... Thanks for your input. If anything does
happen, please let us know.
jpnChrName: そうですか……分かりました。 何かあればギルドにもご一報を。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……分かりました。
何かあればギルドにもご一報を。

engChrName: I've told the others to cut you some slack, at any rate.
engSearchText: I've told the others to cut you some slack, at any rate.
jpnChrName: 一応、アルヴィスさん達にも変に反目し 過ぎないよう改めて話はしておきましたので。
jpnSearchText:
一応、アルヴィスさん達にも変に反目し
過ぎないよう改めて話はしておきましたので。

engChrName: I don't exactly have the intuition for this yet, but even I can tell something isn't right here...
engSearchText:
I don't exactly have the intuition for this yet, but even
I can tell something isn't right here...
jpnChrName: 僕もベテランという訳じゃないですが、 ふむ……どうも引っかかる話が多いですね。
jpnSearchText:
僕もベテランという訳じゃないですが、
ふむ……どうも引っかかる話が多いですね。

engChrName: With everything that's happened these last few months, we can't just write off leads and oddities anymore.
engSearchText:
With everything that's happened these last few
months, we can't just write off leads and
oddities anymore.
jpnChrName: ここ数ヶ月の動向からすれば── 油断だけはしない方が良さそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数ヶ月の動向からすれば──
油断だけはしない方が良さそうです。

engChrName: I might have to loop back with Blanca and get her perspective on things.
engSearchText:
I might have to loop back with Blanca and get her
perspective on things.
jpnChrName: ブランカさんにも改めて 話をしておくとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ブランカさんにも改めて
話をしておくとしましょうか。

engChrName: Word is you've been busy yourself, Van. I keep hearing about all these jobs you're taking on.
engSearchText:
Word is you've been busy yourself, Van. I keep
hearing about all these jobs you're taking on.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのここ最近の活躍は 僕も聞き及んでいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんのここ最近の活躍は
僕も聞き及んでいますよ。

engChrName: Seems like all of Calvard's running into trouble...and I can't deny that worries me. It makes these reports here all the more alarming.
engSearchText:
Seems like all of Calvard's running into trouble...and
I can't deny that worries me. It makes these reports
here all the more alarming.
jpnChrName: 他の地方でも色々あったそうで…… やはり心配ですね、最近の動向は。
jpnSearchText:
他の地方でも色々あったそうで……
やはり心配ですね、最近の動向は。

engChrName: Guild's on alert, too, huh? I dunno much about what's goin' on here in Basel yet, but hopefully we'll get to the bottom of it soon.
engSearchText:
Guild's on alert, too, huh? I dunno much about what's
goin' on here in Basel yet, but hopefully we'll get to
the bottom of it soon.
jpnChrName: ギルドでも懸念してるみたいだな。 ……ま、今の所手掛かりもねえんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドでも懸念してるみたいだな。
……ま、今の所手掛かりもねえんだが。

engChrName: I hope so, too... We're not technically working together, but it would be best for us to cooperate on this nonetheless.
engSearchText:
I hope so, too... We're not technically working
together, but it would be best for us to cooperate on
this nonetheless.
jpnChrName: ですね、まあお互い立場もありますが── できる範囲で協力していくとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ですね、まあお互い立場もありますが──
できる範囲で協力していくとしましょうか。

engChrName: Agreed. Good luck out there, Alex.
engSearchText: Agreed. Good luck out there, Alex.
jpnChrName: ああ、頼んだぜ、アレックス。
jpnSearchText: ああ、頼んだぜ、アレックス。

engChrName: I've gotten word about how the power grid and orbal network have been acting up lately, too.
engSearchText:
I've gotten word about how the power grid and orbal
network have been acting up lately, too.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットや導力供給網に わずかな不調があるという話は把握しています。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットや導力供給網に
わずかな不調があるという話は把握しています。

engChrName: It's only been minor blips so far—I didn't notice until somebody pointed it out.
engSearchText:
It's only been minor blips so far—I didn't notice until
somebody pointed it out.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……正直体感できる レベルでもありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……正直体感できる
レベルでもありませんしね。

engChrName: But we shouldn't just ignore it...and that's all the more reason we need a tech-savvy bracer out here to help us out.
engSearchText:
But we shouldn't just ignore it...and that's all the
more reason we need a tech-savvy bracer out here to
help us out.
jpnChrName: 導力技術に詳しい遊撃士がいれば 良かったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
導力技術に詳しい遊撃士がいれば
良かったんですが……

engChrName: Regina's even able to use the generalized Aeon system, so she should be just what the doctor ordered.
engSearchText:
Regina's even able to use the generalized Aeon
system, so she should be just what the doctor ordered.
jpnChrName: その意味で、汎用型エイオンシステムまで使える レジーナさんが来てくれたのは心強いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、汎用型エイオンシステムまで使える
レジーナさんが来てくれたのは心強いですよ。

engChrName: So there was trouble down in that mine, was there? I'm glad you all came out of there unscathed— Quatre, too.
engSearchText:
So there was trouble down in that mine, was there?
I'm glad you all came out of there unscathed—
Quatre, too.
jpnChrName: レアメタルの採掘道で事件が…… カトルさんが無事で何よりでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
レアメタルの採掘道で事件が……
カトルさんが無事で何よりでしたが……

engChrName: Still, something just seems...off. I've never heard of monsters getting aggressive like that.
engSearchText:
Still, something just seems...off. I've never heard of
monsters getting aggressive like that.
jpnChrName: やはり、少々気になりますね。 魔獣の活性化？　いや、そんな報告は……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、少々気になりますね。
魔獣の活性化？　いや、そんな報告は……

engChrName: We'll look into it on our end—we might be able to find a lead or two.
engSearchText:
We'll look into it on our end—we might be able to
find a lead or two.
jpnChrName: ギルドの方でも調べてみるとしましょう。 何か分かるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの方でも調べてみるとしましょう。
何か分かるかもしれません。

engChrName: I'm ashamed that you had to see me like that yesterday. I have no excuses—they overpowered me, plain and simple.
engSearchText:
I'm ashamed that you had to see me like
that yesterday. I have no excuses—they overpowered
me, plain and simple.
jpnChrName: 昨日はみっともない所を見せたわね…… ……油断したつもりは無かったのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
昨日はみっともない所を見せたわね……
……油断したつもりは無かったのだけど……

engChrName: Don't beat yourself up over it—they got one of my guys, too. Happens to the best of us.
engSearchText:
Don't beat yourself up over it—they got one of my
guys, too. Happens to the best of us.
jpnChrName: いや、ウチの従業員も一人やられたくらいだ。 流石に相手が悪かったって事だろ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ウチの従業員も一人やられたくらいだ。
流石に相手が悪かったって事だろ。

engChrName: Just getting out of there alive is reason enough to celebrate.
engSearchText:
Just getting out of there alive is reason enough
to celebrate.
jpnChrName: むしろあの二人相手に よくやったっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
むしろあの二人相手に
よくやったっつーか。

engChrName: I agree—and the fact that you were able to hold them off that long bought us valuable time.
engSearchText:
I agree—and the fact that you were able to hold them
off that long bought us valuable time.
jpnChrName: はい……そのお陰で私たちは “間に合った”のかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
はい……そのお陰で私たちは
“間に合った”のかもしれません。

engChrName: Heh... Guess you're right, yeah. Look on the bright side, huh?
engSearchText:
Heh... Guess you're right, yeah. Look on the bright
side, huh?
jpnChrName: フフ……だといいのだけど……
jpnSearchText: フフ……だといいのだけど……

engChrName: We'll need your help and a whole lot more if we're to even stand a chance against Almata and the Gardens.
engSearchText:
We'll need your help and a whole lot more if we're to
even stand a chance against Almata and the Gardens.
jpnChrName: アルマータに《庭園》…… 対抗するには、貴方たちの力が必要だわ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに《庭園》……
対抗するには、貴方たちの力が必要だわ。

engChrName: We're counting on you. Don't let them get away with this...
engSearchText:
We're counting on you. Don't let them get away
with this...
jpnChrName: どうか……後を頼むわね…… あの連中を止めてちょうだい……
jpnSearchText:
どうか……後を頼むわね……
あの連中を止めてちょうだい……

engChrName: We won't!
engSearchText: We won't!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！！

engChrName: That goes without sayin'. You bet your ass we'll bring 'em to justice.
engSearchText:
That goes without sayin'. You bet your ass we'll bring
'em to justice.
jpnChrName: 言わずもがなだ。 借りはきっちり返させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
言わずもがなだ。
借りはきっちり返させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: We'll need your help and a whole lot more if we're to even stand a chance against Almata and the Gardens.
engSearchText:
We'll need your help and a whole lot more if we're to
even stand a chance against Almata and the Gardens.
jpnChrName: アルマータに《庭園》…… 対抗するには、貴方たちの力が必要だわ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに《庭園》……
対抗するには、貴方たちの力が必要だわ。

engChrName: We're counting on you. Don't let them get away with this...
engSearchText:
We're counting on you. Don't let them get away
with this...
jpnChrName: どうか……後を頼むわね…… あの連中を止めてちょうだい……
jpnSearchText:
どうか……後を頼むわね……
あの連中を止めてちょうだい……

engChrName: Did Alvis head off on patrol?
engSearchText: Did Alvis head off on patrol?
jpnChrName: ところで、アルヴィス君は 見回りに行ったのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
ところで、アルヴィス君は
見回りに行ったのかしら……？

engChrName: Yeah, he went out earlier. Once he's done, I'll start my rounds.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he went out earlier. Once he's done, I'll start
my rounds.
jpnChrName: ええ、勢い込んで出かけました。 後で交代する約束なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、勢い込んで出かけました。
後で交代する約束なんですが……

engChrName: It's a shame he couldn't have let you do your rounds first so you could hit the hay earlier.
engSearchText:
It's a shame he couldn't have let you do your rounds
first so you could hit the hay earlier.
jpnChrName: う～ん、そこは女子を先にして 早めに休ませてほしいわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、そこは女子を先にして
早めに休ませてほしいわよねぇ。

engChrName: How inconsiderate. He'd have scored brownie points with you if he said 'ladies first'.
engSearchText:
How inconsiderate. He'd have scored brownie points
with you if he said 'ladies first'.
jpnChrName: 惜しいなぁ、もう少し気が使えると モテると思うんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
惜しいなぁ、もう少し気が使えると
モテると思うんだけど……

engChrName: I, erm... I guess? Haha...
engSearchText: I, erm... I guess? Haha...
jpnChrName: あ、あはは…… 全くその通りですよね……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……
全くその通りですよね……

engChrName: First the fire at that plant, and then that car was having trouble...
engSearchText:
First the fire at that plant, and then that car was
having trouble...
jpnChrName: 第二工業プラントでのボヤ騒ぎに 導力車のエンジントラブル……
jpnSearchText:
第二工業プラントでのボヤ騒ぎに
導力車のエンジントラブル……

engChrName: *sigh* I'm beat, and it's only the afternoon. I really can't do all this on my own.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm beat, and it's only the afternoon. I really
can't do all this on my own.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、午後も中々ハイペースね。 一人で対応して回るのも大変だわ。
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、午後も中々ハイペースね。
一人で対応して回るのも大変だわ。

engChrName: Thank the Goddess that Regina and the others are here to help.
engSearchText:
Thank the Goddess that Regina and the others are
here to help.
jpnChrName: ま、ついさっき応援も来てくれた事だし。
jpnSearchText: ま、ついさっき応援も来てくれた事だし。

engChrName: Maybe we can finally clear out that backlog I've built up.
engSearchText:
Maybe we can finally clear out that backlog I've
built up.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、これで溜まってる仕事も バリバリ片付けられるかしらね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、これで溜まってる仕事も
バリバリ片付けられるかしらね？

engChrName: Alex was telling me all about you. You're awfully interesting folks, from the sounds of it!
engSearchText:
Alex was telling me all about you. You're awfully
interesting folks, from the sounds of it!
jpnChrName: 貴方たちの噂、アレックスから聞いてるわ。 ふふ、面白い子たちだそうね。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちの噂、アレックスから聞いてるわ。
ふふ、面白い子たちだそうね。

engChrName: Hopefully we don't have to tackle any big cases together, but if we do, I'll have your back.
engSearchText:
Hopefully we don't have to tackle any big cases
together, but if we do, I'll have your back.
jpnChrName: 応援に来てくれた子たち共々 よろしくしてくれると助かるわ。
jpnSearchText:
応援に来てくれた子たち共々
よろしくしてくれると助かるわ。

engChrName: Basel's deceptively big, is the thing. I like to set a quota of ten cases a day, just to maintain a steady pace.
engSearchText:
Basel's deceptively big, is the thing. I like to set a
quota of ten cases a day, just to maintain a
steady pace.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、バーゼルは案外広いから。 １日１０件くらいはこなさないと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、バーゼルは案外広いから。
１日１０件くらいはこなさないと。

engChrName: Man, you're really on top of things.
engSearchText: Man, you're really on top of things.
jpnChrName: ブランカさん、相変わらず 手際が凄まじいですよね……
jpnSearchText:
ブランカさん、相変わらず
手際が凄まじいですよね……

engChrName: Come to think of it, you used to be in the fire department, didn't you?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, you used to be in the fire
department, didn't you?
jpnChrName: そういえば遊撃士になる前は 《火災救助隊》にいたんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば遊撃士になる前は
《火災救助隊》にいたんですよね？

engChrName: I did. I learned some valuable skills on the job—they still come in handy today.
engSearchText:
I did. I learned some valuable skills on the job—they
still come in handy today.
jpnChrName: ええ、あの頃の経験は 役に立ってるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あの頃の経験は
役に立ってるわねぇ。

engChrName: It's a tough job. Basel's full of factories and other heavy industry—fire hazards are abundant.
engSearchText:
It's a tough job. Basel's full of factories and other
heavy industry—fire hazards are abundant.
jpnChrName: バーゼルには工業プラントや 特殊な施設が多いでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルには工業プラントや
特殊な施設が多いでしょう？

engChrName: Every second counts with those places. A moment's hesitation could mean the difference between saving a life and losing one.
engSearchText:
Every second counts with those places. A moment's
hesitation could mean the difference between saving a
life and losing one.
jpnChrName: ひとたび火災や爆発、なんて事になれば 手が付けられないから。
jpnSearchText:
ひとたび火災や爆発、なんて事になれば
手が付けられないから。

engChrName: That's how I learned to be swift and decisive on the job. Sometimes you don't have the luxury of second-guessing.
engSearchText:
That's how I learned to be swift and decisive on
the job. Sometimes you don't have the luxury
of second-guessing.
jpnChrName: 一瞬の迷いが命取り。 迅速に、的確に──これが私の信条ね。
jpnSearchText:
一瞬の迷いが命取り。
迅速に、的確に──これが私の信条ね。

engChrName: I... I see! I'll bear that in mind!
engSearchText: I... I see! I'll bear that in mind!
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……勉強になります！
jpnSearchText: な、なるほど……勉強になります！

engChrName: We're gonna head out pretty shortly ourselves.
engSearchText: We're gonna head out pretty shortly ourselves.
jpnChrName: 俺たちもこの後すぐに出るつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちもこの後すぐに出るつもりだ。

engChrName: Alex should be able to hold down the fort, especially with Renne helping out.
engSearchText:
Alex should be able to hold down the fort, especially
with Renne helping out.
jpnChrName: アレックスと彼女がいれば オペレーションは問題ないだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
アレックスと彼女がいれば
オペレーションは問題ないだろうからな。

engChrName: If Almata does want Basel, there's no way this was their only planned attack. They're gonna be back for more someday.
engSearchText:
If Almata does want Basel, there's no way this was
their only planned attack. They're gonna be back for
more someday.
jpnChrName: ……こちらが“本命”である以上、 まだ終わっていないって事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
……こちらが“本命”である以上、
まだ終わっていないって事だろう。

engChrName: That's all the more reason why we've gotta stop them in their tracks!
engSearchText:
That's all the more reason why we've gotta stop them
in their tracks!
jpnChrName: 必ず止めてやるさ。 何を企んでるかは知らないけどな！！
jpnSearchText:
必ず止めてやるさ。
何を企んでるかは知らないけどな！！

engChrName: I really shouldn't have gotten so carried away over RC cars...
engSearchText:
I really shouldn't have gotten so carried away over
RC cars...
jpnChrName: つい、ラジコン対決なんて のんきな事で盛り上がってしまったが……
jpnSearchText:
つい、ラジコン対決なんて
のんきな事で盛り上がってしまったが……

engChrName: Especially when I have bigger jobs to worry about. There are a lot of questions we still can't answer.
engSearchText:
Especially when I have bigger jobs to worry about.
There are a lot of questions we still can't answer.
jpnChrName: 採掘道の件しかり、バーゼルで 何が起きてるか……気が抜けない状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
採掘道の件しかり、バーゼルで
何が起きてるか……気が抜けない状況だ。

engChrName: If you learn anything on your end, let the guild know ASAP, 'kay?
engSearchText:
If you learn anything on your end, let the guild know
ASAP, 'kay?
jpnChrName: お前達も、何か分かったら ギルドに報告しろよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前達も、何か分かったら
ギルドに報告しろよ。

engChrName: Hmph. Of course you guys got here first. We had to stop by a bunch of small towns on the way here.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Of course you guys got here first. We had to
stop by a bunch of small towns on the way here.
jpnChrName: フン、こっちはいくつか 小さな町の依頼をこなしつつ来たんだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、こっちはいくつか
小さな町の依頼をこなしつつ来たんだ。

engChrName: But that's the tradeoff with being a public servant instead of a private eye.
engSearchText:
But that's the tradeoff with being a public servant
instead of a private eye.
jpnChrName: なのにお前たちが先に来ているなんて── 早々に頭が痛くなるぞ、まったく……
jpnSearchText:
なのにお前たちが先に来ているなんて──
早々に頭が痛くなるぞ、まったく……

engChrName: As soon as we're all checked in, we're heading right out into the field. Don't go making more work for us!
engSearchText:
As soon as we're all checked in, we're heading right
out into the field. Don't go making more work for us!
jpnChrName: 着任手続きを終えたら俺たちも動く。 いいか、くれぐれも問題を起こすんじゃないぞ！
jpnSearchText:
着任手続きを終えたら俺たちも動く。
いいか、くれぐれも問題を起こすんじゃないぞ！

engChrName: I might have broken a bone or two, but I'll be okay. This shouldn't slow me down all that much.
engSearchText:
I might have broken a bone or two, but I'll be okay.
This shouldn't slow me down all that much.
jpnChrName: ……骨を何本かやられたけど 私は大丈夫よ……すぐ復帰するわ……
jpnSearchText:
……骨を何本かやられたけど
私は大丈夫よ……すぐ復帰するわ……

engChrName: I just can't believe what they did to Professor Callaghan... They really are dangerous.
engSearchText:
I just can't believe what they did to
Professor Callaghan... They really are dangerous.
jpnChrName: にしてもキャラハン教授が…… ……連中、とんでもないわね………
jpnSearchText:
にしてもキャラハン教授が……
……連中、とんでもないわね………

engChrName: I agree, but please, don't push yourself. Just leave this to us, all right?
engSearchText:
I agree, but please, don't push yourself. Just leave this
to us, all right?
jpnChrName: ええ……でもどうか任せて ブランカさんは休んでください。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……でもどうか任せて
ブランカさんは休んでください。

engChrName: We'll sort all this out—promise!
engSearchText: We'll sort all this out—promise!
jpnChrName: 私たちで必ず解決して見せますから！
jpnSearchText: 私たちで必ず解決して見せますから！

engChrName: I'm sure you will. Heh, we can't have Marduk showing us up more than they already have.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you will. Heh, we can't have Marduk
showing us up more than they already have.
jpnChrName: フフ……よろしく頼むわね、レジーナ。 ＭＫ社に主導権を握られないためにも──
jpnSearchText:
フフ……よろしく頼むわね、レジーナ。
ＭＫ社に主導権を握られないためにも──

engChrName: This is gonna be really sketchy with Blanca out of commission, but we can't let that get to us. We've gotta cover for her!
engSearchText:
This is gonna be really sketchy with Blanca out of
commission, but we can't let that get to us.
We've gotta cover for her!
jpnChrName: ……ブランカさんの分も、 私たちがカバーして動かないと……
jpnSearchText:
……ブランカさんの分も、
私たちがカバーして動かないと……

engChrName: We're counting on you, too! Let us know if you learn anything out there.
engSearchText:
We're counting on you, too! Let us know if you learn
anything out there.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちにも協力してもらうわよ。 何か掴んだらギルドにも連絡して頂戴！
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちにも協力してもらうわよ。
何か掴んだらギルドにも連絡して頂戴！

engChrName: Blanca's just so skilled as a bracer–and she's a wonderful person, too. I hope to be like her one day.
engSearchText:
Blanca's just so skilled as a bracer–and she's a
wonderful person, too. I hope to be like her one day.
jpnChrName: ブランカさんは仕事もできるし、 女性としても憧れるわね。
jpnSearchText:
ブランカさんは仕事もできるし、
女性としても憧れるわね。

engChrName: I've got a long way to go before I compare to her...
engSearchText: I've got a long way to go before I compare to her...
jpnChrName: ……私もブランカさんを見習って 頑張らないと。
jpnSearchText:
……私もブランカさんを見習って
頑張らないと。

engChrName: We ran into Blanca not long after we arrived. Man, she's fast as ever!
engSearchText:
We ran into Blanca not long after we arrived.
Man, she's fast as ever!
jpnChrName: さっきそこでブランカさんと会ったけど、 相変わらず仕事の早い人よね。
jpnSearchText:
さっきそこでブランカさんと会ったけど、
相変わらず仕事の早い人よね。

engChrName: We'll really have to get cracking if we wanna keep up with her.
engSearchText:
We'll really have to get cracking if we wanna keep up
with her.
jpnChrName: さて、私たちも気を引き締めていかないと。
jpnSearchText: さて、私たちも気を引き締めていかないと。

engChrName: If you come across anything, just let us know—you're doing work for the guild anyway, so we might as well share intel.
engSearchText:
If you come across anything, just let us know—you're
doing work for the guild anyway, so we might as well
share intel.
jpnChrName: 何かあった時は連絡して頂戴。 下請けもやってもらってることだしね。
jpnSearchText:
何かあった時は連絡して頂戴。
下請けもやってもらってることだしね。

engChrName: I'll keep looking on my end, of course.
engSearchText: I'll keep looking on my end, of course.
jpnChrName: こちらでも引き続き探ってみるわ。
jpnSearchText: こちらでも引き続き探ってみるわ。

engChrName: A certain factory is counting on me, among other people and groups. I can't exactly turn a blind eye to all of this.
engSearchText:
A certain factory is counting on me, among other
people and groups. I can't exactly turn a blind eye to
all of this.
jpnChrName: ＺＣＦの“特別顧問”に“代理折衝役”、 それに“連盟”としても捨て置けない事態だし。
jpnSearchText:
ＺＣＦの“特別顧問”に“代理折衝役”、
それに“連盟”としても捨て置けない事態だし。

engChrName: I've left Sasha in charge of the other students. I'm sure she'll be able to handle things for the rest of the day.
engSearchText:
I've left Sasha in charge of the other students.
I'm sure she'll be able to handle things for the rest of
the day.
jpnChrName: 生徒たちの方はサーシャに任せているから 今日一日くらいは大丈夫でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
生徒たちの方はサーシャに任せているから
今日一日くらいは大丈夫でしょう。

engChrName: I'd like to have another chat with Professor Cronkite, too, if I get the chance.
engSearchText:
I'd like to have another chat with Professor Cronkite,
too, if I get the chance.
jpnChrName: それより……クロンカイト教授とも 改めて話をした方が良さそうね。
jpnSearchText:
それより……クロンカイト教授とも
改めて話をした方が良さそうね。

engChrName: I hope my hunch is off, but if it isn't, I'll have lots of things to look into.
engSearchText:
I hope my hunch is off, but if it isn't, I'll have lots of
things to look into.
jpnChrName: 私の予感が正しいなら…… 一応、確認した方が良い事も多そうだし。
jpnSearchText:
私の予感が正しいなら……
一応、確認した方が良い事も多そうだし。

engChrName: We're browsing the Artisanal District at the moment. These workshops are quite impressive.
engSearchText:
We're browsing the Artisanal District at the moment.
These workshops are quite impressive.
jpnChrName: ふふ、職人街を回って いくつかの工房を訪ねている所よ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、職人街を回って
いくつかの工房を訪ねている所よ。

engChrName: Basel reminds me a lot of Zeiss–it's this factory city over in Liberl.
engSearchText:
Basel reminds me a lot of Zeiss–it's this factory city
over in Liberl.
jpnChrName: 私はリベールのツァイスに馴染みがあるけれど どこか似た雰囲気を感じるわね。
jpnSearchText:
私はリベールのツァイスに馴染みがあるけれど
どこか似た雰囲気を感じるわね。

engChrName: And all these engineering types remind me of a certain old fellow, too...
engSearchText:
And all these engineering types remind me of a
certain old fellow, too...
jpnChrName: それに……職人という意味では “お爺さん”に通じる所も。
jpnSearchText:
それに……職人という意味では
“お爺さん”に通じる所も。

engChrName: Hmm? Who would that be?
engSearchText: Hmm? Who would that be?
jpnChrName: レン先輩……？
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……？

engChrName: Oh, nobody. Heehee.
engSearchText: Oh, nobody. Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、なんでもないわ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、なんでもないわ。

engChrName: (You've gotten yourselves wrapped up in yet more trouble, haven't you?)
engSearchText:
(You've gotten yourselves wrapped up in yet more
trouble, haven't you?)
jpnChrName: （そちらも色々キナ臭い事に   なっているようだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（そちらも色々キナ臭い事に
なっているようだけど……）

engChrName: (Do be careful—that goes for all of you.)
engSearchText: (Do be careful—that goes for all of you.)
jpnChrName: （くれぐれも気を付けなさい。   アニエス、それにお兄さんたちも。）
jpnSearchText:
（くれぐれも気を付けなさい。
アニエス、それにお兄さんたちも。）

engChrName: (We will, don't worry.)
engSearchText: (We will, don't worry.)
jpnChrName: （先輩……はい、もちろんです。）
jpnSearchText: （先輩……はい、もちろんです。）

engChrName: (If we need your help, we'll let'cha know.)
engSearchText: (If we need your help, we'll let'cha know.)
jpnChrName: （ま、いざって時は頼らせてもらうぜ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、いざって時は頼らせてもらうぜ。）

engChrName: (Okay, who is this chick, anyway? Suspicious with a capital S.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, who is this chick, anyway? Suspicious with a
capital S.)
jpnChrName: （つーかマジ何者なんだ？   こいつはよ……）
jpnSearchText:
（つーかマジ何者なんだ？
こいつはよ……）

engChrName: I'm glad I was able to chat with Giscard while I was here. It would've been such a wasted opportunity otherwise.
engSearchText:
I'm glad I was able to chat with Giscard while I
was here. It would've been such a wasted
opportunity otherwise.
jpnChrName: ジスカール親方と話せたのはよかったわね。 いい土産話になりそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール親方と話せたのはよかったわね。
いい土産話になりそうだわ。

engChrName: There's something else on my mind, too... Something worrying.
engSearchText:
There's something else on my mind, too...
Something worrying.
jpnChrName: ……それと少し気になる事も 出てきているけれど……
jpnSearchText:
……それと少し気になる事も
出てきているけれど……

engChrName: But it could just be nothing, of course. I'll have to poke around a little, just in case.
engSearchText:
But it could just be nothing, of course. I'll have to
poke around a little, just in case.
jpnChrName: 流石に杞憂かしらね。 まあ手隙の時にでも調べてみようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
流石に杞憂かしらね。
まあ手隙の時にでも調べてみようかしら。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's passing is most tragic, indeed. May Aidios guide his wayward soul.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan's passing is most tragic, indeed.
May Aidios guide his wayward soul.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授については残念でした…… せめて彼が女神様の元に行けるよう……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授については残念でした……
せめて彼が女神様の元に行けるよう……

engChrName: His actions and yesterday's events have left many uneasy and confused. The future is deeply uncertain...
engSearchText:
His actions and yesterday's events have left many
uneasy and confused. The future is deeply uncertain...
jpnChrName: そして……昨日の襲撃で不安を抱えた方や、 パワハラで心に傷を負った研究員の方もいます。
jpnSearchText:
そして……昨日の襲撃で不安を抱えた方や、
パワハラで心に傷を負った研究員の方もいます。

engChrName: ...but as a servant of the Goddess, I have faith in Her mercy and compassion. I must do what I can to ease the people's hearts.
engSearchText:
...but as a servant of the Goddess, I have faith in Her
mercy and compassion. I must do what I can to ease
the people's hearts.
jpnChrName: 今一度、街の皆さんに寄り添い、 平穏な日常を取り戻す手助けとならねば……
jpnSearchText:
今一度、街の皆さんに寄り添い、
平穏な日常を取り戻す手助けとならねば……

engChrName: I have heard about Professor Callaghan's disappearance as well.
engSearchText:
I have heard about Professor Callaghan's
disappearance as well.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の失踪は聞き及んでおります。
jpnSearchText: キャラハン教授の失踪は聞き及んでおります。

engChrName: We have asked the congregation to share any hints toward his whereabouts, but we haven't learned anything so far.
engSearchText:
We have asked the congregation to share any hints
toward his whereabouts, but we haven't learned
anything so far.
jpnChrName: 礼拝の方にも情報を募っておりますが、 まだ手がかりになりそうな事は……
jpnSearchText:
礼拝の方にも情報を募っておりますが、
まだ手がかりになりそうな事は……

engChrName: I did also hear that he had been mistreating his assistants...
engSearchText:
I did also hear that he had been mistreating
his assistants...
jpnChrName: しかし、やはり彼が研究員の方々に 無理を強いていましたか……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、やはり彼が研究員の方々に
無理を強いていましたか……

engChrName: I hoped it was only coincidence that his assistants looked exhausted whenever I would see them...but I was wrong, I see.
engSearchText:
I hoped it was only coincidence that his assistants
looked exhausted whenever I would see them...but I
was wrong, I see.
jpnChrName: 追い詰められた様子の研究員が教会に来た 事もあり、もしやとは思っていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
追い詰められた様子の研究員が教会に来た
事もあり、もしやとは思っていたのですが……

engChrName: Sister Paula seemed very nervous when she first arrived, but I can see that she's settling into her role well.
engSearchText:
Sister Paula seemed very nervous when she first
arrived, but I can see that she's settling into her
role well.
jpnChrName: シスター・ポーラも少しずつ 前へ進んでいるようですね。
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ポーラも少しずつ
前へ進んでいるようですね。

engChrName: I do plan to help teach her some more, if and when I get the chance.
engSearchText:
I do plan to help teach her some more, if and when I
get the chance.
jpnChrName: また機会があれば色々な話を して差し上げるとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
また機会があれば色々な話を
して差し上げるとしましょうか。

engChrName: Well, what a pleasant surprise. It's not often we greet travelers from afar in our humble church.
engSearchText:
Well, what a pleasant surprise. It's not often we greet
travelers from afar in our humble church.
jpnChrName: おや、旅の方が 教会にいらっしゃるのは珍しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、旅の方が
教会にいらっしゃるのは珍しいですね。

engChrName: We tend to only see locals here—artisans, students, researchers, and the like.
engSearchText:
We tend to only see locals here—artisans, students,
researchers, and the like.
jpnChrName: この礼拝堂は、地元の職人街や 大学関係者の方がいらっしゃる事が多いのです。
jpnSearchText:
この礼拝堂は、地元の職人街や
大学関係者の方がいらっしゃる事が多いのです。

engChrName: We see some rather famous faces here, even. Big or small, we welcome everyone all the same.
engSearchText:
We see some rather famous faces here, even. Big or
small, we welcome everyone all the same.
jpnChrName: 中には高名な方もいらっしゃいますが…… 人である以上、等しく悩みを抱えるものです。
jpnSearchText:
中には高名な方もいらっしゃいますが……
人である以上、等しく悩みを抱えるものです。

engChrName: To worry is human. Those anxious or disconcerted may turn to open doors.
engSearchText:
To worry is human. Those anxious or disconcerted
may turn to open doors.
jpnChrName: 恥じる事はありませんよ。 どうか皆様に安らぎが訪れますように。
jpnSearchText:
恥じる事はありませんよ。
どうか皆様に安らぎが訪れますように。

engChrName: I see! So astronomy originated in the Central East?
engSearchText: I see! So astronomy originated in the Central East?
jpnChrName: まあ！　それでは天文学は 中東から伝わったのですね……！
jpnSearchText:
まあ！　それでは天文学は
中東から伝わったのですね……！

engChrName: That it did. To our understanding, astronomy came westward in the Middle Ages as trade and cultural exchange began to blossom.
engSearchText:
That it did. To our understanding, astronomy came
westward in the Middle Ages as trade and cultural
exchange began to blossom.
jpnChrName: ええ、中世の時代より 文化交流があったと言われていますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、中世の時代より
文化交流があったと言われていますね。

engChrName: The University of Elsaim can trace itself back to that age, too—and that cultural exchange gave rise to the natural sciences as well.
engSearchText:
The University of Elsaim can trace itself back to that
age, too—and that cultural exchange gave rise to the
natural sciences as well.
jpnChrName: 中東のエルザイム大学も当時から存在し、 互いに自然科学の発展に大きく貢献したとか。
jpnSearchText:
中東のエルザイム大学も当時から存在し、
互いに自然科学の発展に大きく貢献したとか。

engChrName: I see... I've never had much interest in hard sciences, but that's interesting to hear.
engSearchText:
I see... I've never had much interest in hard sciences,
but that's interesting to hear.
jpnChrName: 優秀な方々が交流を深めながら…… ふふっ、科学ってなんだか敬遠してましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
優秀な方々が交流を深めながら……
ふふっ、科学ってなんだか敬遠してましたけど。

engChrName: It feels...relatable, I guess, to hear that they were human inventions, too.
engSearchText:
It feels...relatable, I guess, to hear that they were
human inventions, too.
jpnChrName: 人と人が紡いできたのだと思うと、 ようやく親しみが持てた気が致します。
jpnSearchText:
人と人が紡いできたのだと思うと、
ようやく親しみが持てた気が致します。

engChrName: That's good to hear. If you're curious about anything else, I would be happy to help.
engSearchText:
That's good to hear. If you're curious about anything
else, I would be happy to help.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それは良かった。 またいつでも質問にいらして下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それは良かった。
またいつでも質問にいらして下さい。

engChrName: We've been awfully busy today. Yesterday's events have taken a toll on everyone...
engSearchText:
We've been awfully busy today. Yesterday's events
have taken a toll on everyone...
jpnChrName: 昨日は被害に遭われた方もおり…… 私たちも対応に追われていました。
jpnSearchText:
昨日は被害に遭われた方もおり……
私たちも対応に追われていました。

engChrName: I still can't believe it happened at all. Why here... and how?
engSearchText:
I still can't believe it happened at all. Why here...
and how?
jpnChrName: それに、やはりショックというか…… この街であんな事件が起きるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それに、やはりショックというか……
この街であんな事件が起きるだなんて……

engChrName: But I... I have to do something. The people here need our help.
engSearchText:
But I... I have to do something. The people here need
our help.
jpnChrName: まだ不安を感じている人も多いみたいです。 わ、私も力にならないとですね……！
jpnSearchText:
まだ不安を感じている人も多いみたいです。
わ、私も力にならないとですね……！

engChrName: I'm still feeling uneasy myself, but as a woman of the cloth, I have to stay strong.
engSearchText:
I'm still feeling uneasy myself, but as a woman of the
cloth, I have to stay strong.
jpnChrName: 私も怖くないといえば嘘になりますが…… これでも聖職者ですから。
jpnSearchText:
私も怖くないといえば嘘になりますが……
これでも聖職者ですから。

engChrName: I need to help out however I can, like Father Flictam does!
engSearchText:
I need to help out however I can, like Father
Flictam does!
jpnChrName: フリクタム教区長を見習って 精一杯力になろうと思います……！
jpnSearchText:
フリクタム教区長を見習って
精一杯力になろうと思います……！

engChrName: I heard that a professor from the institute went missing... I can only pray that Aidios extends Her guiding hand to them.
engSearchText:
I heard that a professor from the institute
went missing... I can only pray that Aidios extends
Her guiding hand to them.
jpnChrName: なんでも大学の教授が行方不明だとか…… 女神よ……どうかこの街に平穏を……
jpnSearchText:
なんでも大学の教授が行方不明だとか……
女神よ……どうかこの街に平穏を……

engChrName: I'm far from an expert on this city and its customs...
engSearchText: I'm far from an expert on this city and its customs...
jpnChrName: ……私も、この街の事情については 詳しく存じ上げませんが……
jpnSearchText:
……私も、この街の事情については
詳しく存じ上げませんが……

engChrName: ...but I believe the Goddess' light shines brightly here, all the same.
engSearchText:
...but I believe the Goddess' light shines brightly here,
all the same.
jpnChrName: それでも祈る事、教会の人間として 人を助けることは出来ます……
jpnSearchText:
それでも祈る事、教会の人間として
人を助けることは出来ます……

engChrName: I will pray for the professor's safety today.
engSearchText: I will pray for the professor's safety today.
jpnChrName: かの教授にも、どうか女神の ご加護がありますように……
jpnSearchText:
かの教授にも、どうか女神の
ご加護がありますように……

engChrName: I've never held much interest in the sciences, but they do seem more relatable to me, now.
engSearchText:
I've never held much interest in the sciences, but they
do seem more relatable to me, now.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、科学というものに ようやく親しみが持てた気が致します。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、科学というものに
ようやく親しみが持てた気が致します。

engChrName: Maybe it won't feel so foreign anymore, when the congregation talks about them.
engSearchText:
Maybe it won't feel so foreign anymore, when the
congregation talks about them.
jpnChrName: 今なら、礼拝にいらっしゃる皆さんの話も 一層よくお聞きしてあげられそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
今なら、礼拝にいらっしゃる皆さんの話も
一層よくお聞きしてあげられそうですね。

engChrName: Oh, hello there. My name is Sister Paula. I'm new to Basel and this church.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello there. My name is Sister Paula. I'm new to
Basel and this church.
jpnChrName: あっ、こんにちは…… 少し前に赴任したポーラと言います。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、こんにちは……
少し前に赴任したポーラと言います。

engChrName: Admittedly, it's quite daunting... I grew up in the country. These fancy machines and technology are so far beyond me.
engSearchText:
Admittedly, it's quite daunting... I grew up in
the country. These fancy machines and technology
are so far beyond me.
jpnChrName: わたし、田舎育ちなのもあって科学とか 機械にはあまり馴染みが無いもので……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、田舎育ちなのもあって科学とか
機械にはあまり馴染みが無いもので……

engChrName: I can hardly wrap my head around what the artisans and students discuss with me...
engSearchText:
I can hardly wrap my head around what the artisans
and students discuss with me...
jpnChrName: 学者さんや職人さんのお話を聞いても チンプンカンプンで……
jpnSearchText:
学者さんや職人さんのお話を聞いても
チンプンカンプンで……

engChrName: Still, er... I-I'll do my best! I'm still knowledgeable about matters of the heart—if anything has you nervous, I'll help however I can.
engSearchText:
Still, er... I-I'll do my best! I'm still knowledgeable
about matters of the heart—if anything has you
nervous, I'll help however I can.
jpnChrName: ううっ、で、でも頑張りますので！ その、何かあればいらしてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、で、でも頑張りますので！
その、何かあればいらしてくださいね！

engChrName: I hardly ever saw machines in my hometown, and now I'm surrounded by them.
engSearchText:
I hardly ever saw machines in my hometown, and
now I'm surrounded by them.
jpnChrName: バーゼルに来るまで、科学とか 機械などに触れたことがなくて……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルに来るまで、科学とか
機械などに触れたことがなくて……

engChrName: I want to help the townsfolk here just as Father Flictam does, but I've definitely got my work cut out for me.
engSearchText:
I want to help the townsfolk here just as Father
Flictam does, but I've definitely got my work cut out
for me.
jpnChrName: 何とか皆さんの期待に応えて、教区長のように 力になれるようになりたいです。
jpnSearchText:
何とか皆さんの期待に応えて、教区長のように
力になれるようになりたいです。

engChrName: I'm planning to call in a specialist to help, but for now, I need to focus on calming her down first.
engSearchText:
I'm planning to call in a specialist to help, but for
now, I need to focus on calming her down first.
jpnChrName: 専門家の方々との連絡も取るつもりだけど、 まずは、この子が落ち着けるかどうかね……
jpnSearchText:
専門家の方々との連絡も取るつもりだけど、
まずは、この子が落ち着けるかどうかね……

engChrName: The church has helped me through my problems an awful lot over the years. I know they can help her, too.
engSearchText:
The church has helped me through my problems an
awful lot over the years. I know they can help
her, too.
jpnChrName: ここの礼拝堂には私達も度々世話になってね、 今は忙しいとは思うけれど……
jpnSearchText:
ここの礼拝堂には私達も度々世話になってね、
今は忙しいとは思うけれど……

engChrName: I just hope Cindy takes this opportunity to start on a healthier path.
engSearchText:
I just hope Cindy takes this opportunity to start on a
healthier path.
jpnChrName: せめてシンディが状況と向き合う 機会になれば良いと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
せめてシンディが状況と向き合う
機会になれば良いと思ってね。

engChrName: I could just feel my mind going blank at first.
engSearchText: I could just feel my mind going blank at first.
jpnChrName: ……本当に何も考えられなくなって いましたが……
jpnSearchText:
……本当に何も考えられなくなって
いましたが……

engChrName: But Professor Aurelie and Father Flictam did help me calm down a bit... I think I'm feeling better now.
engSearchText:
But Professor Aurelie and Father Flictam did help me
calm down a bit... I think I'm feeling better now.
jpnChrName: オレリー教授と教区長様のお話を聞いて…… まだ不安ですけど少しは……
jpnSearchText:
オレリー教授と教区長様のお話を聞いて……
まだ不安ですけど少しは……

engChrName: I'm still awfully nervous, but I'm not panicking anymore. I think now I have to start figuring out where to go from here.
engSearchText:
I'm still awfully nervous, but I'm not
panicking anymore. I think now I have to start
figuring out where to go from here.
jpnChrName: ……落ち着いてきましたし、改めて自分が今後 どうすべきか、向き合おうと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……落ち着いてきましたし、改めて自分が今後
どうすべきか、向き合おうと思います。

engChrName: I'm not sure I ever would've asked for help if Professor Aurelie hadn't came and talked about it with me...
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I ever would've asked for help if
Professor Aurelie hadn't came and talked about it
with me...
jpnChrName: オレリー教授が言って下さらなかったら、こうして 相談に来る事すら思い至れたかどうか……
jpnSearchText:
オレリー教授が言って下さらなかったら、こうして
相談に来る事すら思い至れたかどうか……

engChrName: It felt like my head was gonna explode...but it's over now. I can start putting it behind me.
engSearchText:
It felt like my head was gonna explode...but it's
over now. I can start putting it behind me.
jpnChrName: 昨日までは本当に、頭の中がいっぱいでしたが、 今なら少しは整理がつきそうで……
jpnSearchText:
昨日までは本当に、頭の中がいっぱいでしたが、
今なら少しは整理がつきそうで……

engChrName: She's right: I can't change what happened, but I CAN start over.
engSearchText:
She's right: I can't change what happened, but I
CAN start over.
jpnChrName: オレリー教授の仰る通りですよね…… 落ち着いて再スタートできれば……
jpnSearchText:
オレリー教授の仰る通りですよね……
落ち着いて再スタートできれば……

engChrName: As if we didn't have enough on our plate... Now we've got this. We look real bad right now.
engSearchText:
As if we didn't have enough on our plate...
Now we've got this. We look real bad right now.
jpnChrName: パーツの件は面目ねえ、こんな時期に 厄介なことになっちまってよ。
jpnSearchText:
パーツの件は面目ねえ、こんな時期に
厄介なことになっちまってよ。

engChrName: How'd we screw up the math on this? The numbers don't add up, so we must've made a mistake somewhere and compounded on it...
engSearchText:
How'd we screw up the math on this? The numbers
don't add up, so we must've made a mistake
somewhere and compounded on it...
jpnChrName: あちこちの工房とやり取りしてる部品の数が どうも少しずつ合わねえようでよ。
jpnSearchText:
あちこちの工房とやり取りしてる部品の数が
どうも少しずつ合わねえようでよ。

engChrName: We'll look into this, but we've got our hands full with Callaghan, too. You guys learn anything, let us know, all right?!
engSearchText:
We'll look into this, but we've got our hands full with
Callaghan, too. You guys learn anything, let us know,
all right?!
jpnChrName: キャラハンの行方と合わせて調べてみるが お前らも気にかけておいてくれ、頼んだぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
キャラハンの行方と合わせて調べてみるが
お前らも気にかけておいてくれ、頼んだぜ！！

engChrName: Damn it all! The Artisanal District's all on fire, but we can't give up our position or WE'RE screwed...!
engSearchText:
Damn it all! The Artisanal District's all on fire, but
we can't give up our position or WE'RE screwed...!
jpnChrName: クソッ、職人街の連中も心配だが 今は守りを固めるしかねえか……
jpnSearchText:
クソッ、職人街の連中も心配だが
今は守りを固めるしかねえか……

engChrName: Keep an eye out for anybody caught in the crossfire! There's people trapped everywhere!
engSearchText:
Keep an eye out for anybody caught in the crossfire!
There's people trapped everywhere!
jpnChrName: お前ら、もし余裕があったら 逃げ遅れたヤツがいねえか気を付けてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
お前ら、もし余裕があったら
逃げ遅れたヤツがいねえか気を付けてくれ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: ええ、分かりました……！
jpnSearchText: ええ、分かりました……！

engChrName: We've been around already! We think everyone's safely out!
engSearchText:
We've been around already! We think everyone's
safely out!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫です、親方！ 一回りしてきましたから！
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫です、親方！
一回りしてきましたから！

engChrName: We're gonna head over to the institute now. Anybody we find on the way, we'll help 'em out.
engSearchText:
We're gonna head over to the institute now.
Anybody we find on the way, we'll help 'em out.
jpnChrName: このまま大学方面に向かいつつ 周辺にも気を配っておく。
jpnSearchText:
このまま大学方面に向かいつつ
周辺にも気を配っておく。

engChrName: You and your guys hold down the workshop, all right?
engSearchText: You and your guys hold down the workshop, all right?
jpnChrName: 爺さんは工房の近辺を頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText: 爺さんは工房の近辺を頼むぜ！

engChrName: Got'cha!
engSearchText: Got'cha!
jpnChrName: おうよ、任せておきな！
jpnSearchText: おうよ、任せておきな！

engChrName: They've crossed the line now, the bastards...
engSearchText: They've crossed the line now, the bastards...
jpnChrName: アルマータとかいう連中……まさか ここまでの事をしてくれるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータとかいう連中……まさか
ここまでの事をしてくれるとはな。

engChrName: ...but we're not gonna sit here and take it! We're taking our Basel back! I'm counting on you, youngsters!
engSearchText:
...but we're not gonna sit here and take it!
We're taking our Basel back! I'm counting on
you, youngsters!
jpnChrName: とにかく、これ以上バーゼルの街を荒らさせる 訳にはいかねぇ、頼んだぜお前たち！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、これ以上バーゼルの街を荒らさせる
訳にはいかねぇ、頼んだぜお前たち！

engChrName: Tch. Tausend... If he wanted to do what's best for Verne, he'd grow a damn spine.
engSearchText:
Tch. Tausend... If he wanted to do what's best for
Verne, he'd grow a damn spine.
jpnChrName: まったく、タウゼントめ……会社を守りたきゃ ちっとは覚悟ってモンを見せろってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、タウゼントめ……会社を守りたきゃ
ちっとは覚悟ってモンを見せろってんだ。

engChrName: No, he can't know about every little under-the-table deal those billion subsidiaries are doing...
engSearchText:
No, he can't know about every little under-the-table
deal those billion subsidiaries are doing...
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社の構造上、ＣＥＯでも 知らねぇ事があるっつうのは仕方ねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社の構造上、ＣＥＯでも
知らねぇ事があるっつうのは仕方ねぇが……

engChrName: ...but it's still his job to keep everything above board. He's gotta stamp that crap out when he sees it.
engSearchText:
...but it's still his job to keep everything above board.
He's gotta stamp that crap out when he sees it.
jpnChrName: それでも肝を据えて、社を纏め上げるのが 経営者の勤めってモンだろうによ……
jpnSearchText:
それでも肝を据えて、社を纏め上げるのが
経営者の勤めってモンだろうによ……

engChrName: We at the Artisans' Guild're gonna try and crack down on Callaghan. If Tausend won't do it, we'll bring that blockhead down ourselves.
engSearchText:
We at the Artisans' Guild're gonna try and crack
down on Callaghan. If Tausend won't do it, we'll
bring that blockhead down ourselves.
jpnChrName: タウゼントはあんなんだが……職人組合でも キャラハンの馬鹿野郎は探してみるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントはあんなんだが……職人組合でも
キャラハンの馬鹿野郎は探してみるつもりだ。

engChrName: We're starting with his supply chains—he might've shacked up in some abandoned warehouse somewhere. We're tracking his purchases, too.
engSearchText:
We're starting with his supply chains—he might've
shacked up in some abandoned warehouse somewhere.
We're tracking his purchases, too.
jpnChrName: 機材を調達した業者やら、使ってない倉庫やら まずはそこら辺を洗っているぜ。
jpnSearchText:
機材を調達した業者やら、使ってない倉庫やら
まずはそこら辺を洗っているぜ。

engChrName: I thought you'd have called it for the day. Hard workers you lot are, huh?
engSearchText:
I thought you'd have called it for the day.
Hard workers you lot are, huh?
jpnChrName: ……お前ェら、こんな時間まで調査か？ 精が出るじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
……お前ェら、こんな時間まで調査か？
精が出るじゃねえか。

engChrName: Just between you and me: keep an eye on Quatre, will ya?
engSearchText:
Just between you and me: keep an eye on Quatre,
will ya?
jpnChrName: ついでと言っちゃなんだが、 カトルの事も改めて気にかけてやってくれや。
jpnSearchText:
ついでと言っちゃなんだが、
カトルの事も改めて気にかけてやってくれや。

engChrName: He shouldn't have to take on all that responsibility at his age, if you ask me. It's like he never got to be a kid.
engSearchText:
He shouldn't have to take on all that responsibility at
his age, if you ask me. It's like he never got to be
a kid.
jpnChrName: あの歳で、汚ェ大人のしがらみに 首を突っ込まされてやがる……
jpnSearchText:
あの歳で、汚ェ大人のしがらみに
首を突っ込まされてやがる……

engChrName: Seeing him all stressed out and overworked just makes me sad, as an ol' geezer with none of that youth left.
engSearchText:
Seeing him all stressed out and overworked just
makes me sad, as an ol' geezer with none of that
youth left.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、俺ァあの子が 縛られてるように思えてならねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、俺ァあの子が
縛られてるように思えてならねえぜ。

engChrName: What's Quatre crunching for? He shouldn't have to stay so late at the institute...
engSearchText:
What's Quatre crunching for? He shouldn't have to
stay so late at the institute...
jpnChrName: カトルは今日も大学に残ってるみてえだな。 やれやれ……
jpnSearchText:
カトルは今日も大学に残ってるみてえだな。
やれやれ……

engChrName: I get it's important to him—he wants to follow in the professor's footsteps with all his research there. Just... *sigh*
engSearchText:
I get it's important to him—he wants to follow in the
professor's footsteps with all his research there. Just...
*sigh*
jpnChrName: 天文台はあいつにとって博士との絆── 無理もねえ話なんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
天文台はあいつにとって博士との絆──
無理もねえ話なんだろうが……

engChrName: Y'know, I don't take kindly to outsiders, but a friend of Quatre's is a friend of mine. I owe you that much for saving his life.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I don't take kindly to outsiders, but a friend
of Quatre's is a friend of mine. I owe you that much
for saving his life.
jpnChrName: カトルの恩人なら仕方ねえ。 ここに出入りするのも許可してやる。
jpnSearchText:
カトルの恩人なら仕方ねえ。
ここに出入りするのも許可してやる。

engChrName: Might hafta ask you wear a blindfold here on the floor, though. Top secret stuff goin' on here.
engSearchText:
Might hafta ask you wear a blindfold here on the
floor, though. Top secret stuff goin' on here.
jpnChrName: ただし目は瞑っておきやがれ。 一応“機密”なんでなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし目は瞑っておきやがれ。
一応“機密”なんでなァ。

engChrName: That might be a bit dangerous. Uhh, haha...
engSearchText: That might be a bit dangerous. Uhh, haha...
jpnChrName: あはは……さすがに 目を瞑って歩くのは危ないですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……さすがに
目を瞑って歩くのは危ないですけど。

engChrName: Hey, you're not so crotchety after all. Nice to have a friend in you, ol' bud.
engSearchText:
Hey, you're not so crotchety after all. Nice to have a
friend in you, ol' bud.
jpnChrName: 話の分かる爺さんで助かった。 今後ともよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
話の分かる爺さんで助かった。
今後ともよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Same here. Of course, you cause any trouble and you'll be right back out the door. Wahaha!
engSearchText:
Same here. Of course, you cause any trouble and
you'll be right back out the door. Wahaha!
jpnChrName: おうよ、まあ何かあったら 遠慮なく叩き出すがな、ワッハッハ！
jpnSearchText:
おうよ、まあ何かあったら
遠慮なく叩き出すがな、ワッハッハ！

engChrName: You're showing 'em around, Quatre? Just be careful with that.
engSearchText:
You're showing 'em around, Quatre? Just be careful
with that.
jpnChrName: で、カトルはそいつらを案内すんのか？ お前なら大丈夫だろうが、まあ気ィつけてな。
jpnSearchText:
で、カトルはそいつらを案内すんのか？
お前なら大丈夫だろうが、まあ気ィつけてな。

engChrName: You know the drill: Eugen's got you covered if your drones need a fixin'.
engSearchText:
You know the drill: Eugen's got you covered if your
drones need a fixin'.
jpnChrName: 《導力ドローン》の調整が必要なら オイゲンの奴に声を掛けやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
《導力ドローン》の調整が必要なら
オイゲンの奴に声を掛けやがれ。

engChrName: Thank you! I really do appreciate you always looking out for me.
engSearchText:
Thank you! I really do appreciate you always looking
out for me.
jpnChrName: ええ──！ いつもお世話になります、親方。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──！
いつもお世話になります、親方。

engChrName: Quatre's like a grandson to me—I'd walk through Gehenna for that kid. This stuff's the least I can do.
engSearchText:
Quatre's like a grandson to me—I'd walk through
Gehenna for that kid. This stuff's the least I can do.
jpnChrName: カトルは俺たちにとっちゃ孫みてえなもんだ。 便宜くらい図ってやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
カトルは俺たちにとっちゃ孫みてえなもんだ。
便宜くらい図ってやるさ。

engChrName: I'm sure you'll be just fine out there, lad, but be careful!
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'll be just fine out there, lad, but
be careful!
jpnChrName: カトル、お前なら大丈夫だろうが 気ィつけやがれよ！
jpnSearchText:
カトル、お前なら大丈夫だろうが
気ィつけやがれよ！

engChrName: I feel awful... I'm the chief on site here, so this responsibility falls onto me.
engSearchText:
I feel awful... I'm the chief on site here, so this
responsibility falls onto me.
jpnChrName: 本当に済まない…… 現場主任として責任を感じるよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当に済まない……
現場主任として責任を感じるよ。

engChrName: We'll investigate however we can, at any rate. It still feels really ominous here...
engSearchText:
We'll investigate however we can, at any rate. It still
feels really ominous here...
jpnChrName: こうなった以上、全て精査するしかないが…… 導力ネットの件もあるし、どうにも不気味だな……
jpnSearchText:
こうなった以上、全て精査するしかないが……
導力ネットの件もあるし、どうにも不気味だな……

engChrName: We really do owe you one, though. I can see why our supervisor trusts you.
engSearchText:
We really do owe you one, though. I can see why our
supervisor trusts you.
jpnChrName: すまない、本当に助かったよ…… 流石は親方の認めた人たちだね。
jpnSearchText:
すまない、本当に助かったよ……
流石は親方の認めた人たちだね。

engChrName: I'm not sure how I feel about Quatre going with you, but...that's his choice. Please take care of him.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure how I feel about Quatre going with you,
but...that's his choice. Please take care of him.
jpnChrName: カトルも同行するつもりのようだが…… どうか、この後もカトルの事を頼む。
jpnSearchText:
カトルも同行するつもりのようだが……
どうか、この後もカトルの事を頼む。

engChrName: We will. Don't do anything reckless yourself, you hear?
engSearchText:
We will. Don't do anything reckless yourself,
you hear?
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。 あんたらも無理はしないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、任せとけ。
あんたらも無理はしないようにな。

engChrName: I agree. Please stay safe, Eugen!
engSearchText: I agree. Please stay safe, Eugen!
jpnChrName: オイゲンさんも、 どうかお気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText:
オイゲンさんも、
どうかお気をつけて……！

engChrName: We have our doors open to anyone who needs shelter.
engSearchText: We have our doors open to anyone who needs shelter.
jpnChrName: 僕らも、逃げてきた人たちを 受け入れている所だ。
jpnSearchText:
僕らも、逃げてきた人たちを
受け入れている所だ。

engChrName: Stay safe out there, everyone. Aidios watch over you!
engSearchText: Stay safe out there, everyone. Aidios watch over you!
jpnChrName: 君達も十分に気をつけてくれ…… どうか女神の加護を！
jpnSearchText:
君達も十分に気をつけてくれ……
どうか女神の加護を！

engChrName: That researcher said those metals were the last things she needed.
engSearchText:
That researcher said those metals were the last things
she needed.
jpnChrName: 女性研究員なら、レアメタルを買って 必要な買い物は終わったとか言っていたよ。
jpnSearchText:
女性研究員なら、レアメタルを買って
必要な買い物は終わったとか言っていたよ。

engChrName: Then she said she was off to Liberl next, so I'm guessing she made for Auge Canyon?
engSearchText:
Then she said she was off to Liberl next, so I'm
guessing she made for Auge Canyon?
jpnChrName: 次はリベール方面に行くとか何とか…… だからオージュ峡谷の方に向かったんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
次はリベール方面に行くとか何とか……
だからオージュ峡谷の方に向かったんじゃないかな？

engChrName: Some students from Aramis came by to visit earlier.
engSearchText: Some students from Aramis came by to visit earlier.
jpnChrName: さっきアラミスの学生さんたちが 見学に来ていたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきアラミスの学生さんたちが
見学に来ていたんだよ。

engChrName: I wasn't able to tell them much, but I did give them a general overview of what we do here.
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to tell them much, but I did give them a
general overview of what we do here.
jpnChrName: さすがに機密については話せないけど、 普段の仕事ぶりや職人街の話を聞かせたよ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがに機密については話せないけど、
普段の仕事ぶりや職人街の話を聞かせたよ。

engChrName: They were smart cookies, but one of them was leaps and bounds above the others... Hard to believe she was just a student.
engSearchText:
They were smart cookies, but one of them was leaps
and bounds above the others... Hard to believe she
was just a student.
jpnChrName: ……一人物凄く利発な子が いたみたいだけど……何者なんだろうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
……一人物凄く利発な子が
いたみたいだけど……何者なんだろうなぁ。

engChrName: Even the supervisor was impressed!
engSearchText: Even the supervisor was impressed!
jpnChrName: 親方も一目置いているみたいだったが。
jpnSearchText: 親方も一目置いているみたいだったが。

engChrName: I hate making the kids wait, but this deadline is non-negotiable.
engSearchText:
I hate making the kids wait, but this deadline
is non-negotiable.
jpnChrName: 子供たちを待たせて悪いが、 納期もギリギリだしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
子供たちを待たせて悪いが、
納期もギリギリだしなぁ。

engChrName: Speaking of kids, I hear Millia was up to something earlier today.
engSearchText:
Speaking of kids, I hear Millia was up to something
earlier today.
jpnChrName: そういえばミーリアは、日中も何か やっていたらしいね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばミーリアは、日中も何か
やっていたらしいね？

engChrName: Most of the time, she's a model daughter. She helps me with the shopping, the cooking, and the cleaning...
