engSearchText:
Most of the time, she's a model daughter. She helps
me with the shopping, the cooking, and
the cleaning...
jpnChrName: 買い出しに料理、掃除まで 手伝ってくれる出来た娘だけど……
jpnSearchText:
買い出しに料理、掃除まで
手伝ってくれる出来た娘だけど……

engChrName: ...but every now and then, I hear just the strangest things about what she's up to. I can't deny it worries me sometimes.
engSearchText:
...but every now and then, I hear just the strangest
things about what she's up to. I can't deny it worries
me sometimes.
jpnChrName: たまに妙な噂を聞くんだよなぁ。 父親としては少し心配だよ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに妙な噂を聞くんだよなぁ。
父親としては少し心配だよ。

engChrName: I'm really sorry for how hostile we were earlier. It's just, our work here is extremely confidential.
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry for how hostile we were earlier.
It's just, our work here is extremely confidential.
jpnChrName: さっきは追い返そうとして悪かったね、 一応、機密に当たる仕事だからね……
jpnSearchText:
さっきは追い返そうとして悪かったね、
一応、機密に当たる仕事だからね……

engChrName: After saving Quatre, though? We owe you the keys to the whole damn town.
engSearchText:
After saving Quatre, though? We owe you the keys to
the whole damn town.
jpnChrName: だがカトルを助けてくれた以上、 僕らも力にならないとな。
jpnSearchText:
だがカトルを助けてくれた以上、
僕らも力にならないとな。

engChrName: So if you need any work done on your orbments, just let us know. We're happy to help.
engSearchText:
So if you need any work done on your orbments, just
let us know. We're happy to help.
jpnChrName: もし工房仕事が入用なら言ってくれ。 作業の合間に対応させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
もし工房仕事が入用なら言ってくれ。
作業の合間に対応させてもらうよ。

engChrName: Whoa, really? Isn't this the best workshop in Basel or something?
engSearchText:
Whoa, really? Isn't this the best workshop in Basel
or something?
jpnChrName: ジスカール工房って、たしか バーゼルで一番の工房なんですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール工房って、たしか
バーゼルで一番の工房なんですよね……？

engChrName: That it is. Eugen here is Supervisor Giscard's righthand man.
engSearchText:
That it is. Eugen here is Supervisor Giscard's
righthand man.
jpnChrName: ああ、その上オイゲン主任は ジスカール親方の右腕なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その上オイゲン主任は
ジスカール親方の右腕なんだ。

engChrName: He's one of the most skilled engineers in the whole country—I can personally vouch for that.
engSearchText:
He's one of the most skilled engineers in the whole
country—I can personally vouch for that.
jpnChrName: 共和国でも指折りの腕前なのは 僕が保証するよ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国でも指折りの腕前なのは
僕が保証するよ。

engChrName: Wow... I'm honored!
engSearchText: Wow... I'm honored!
jpnChrName: そ、それは……物凄く心強いですね。
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……物凄く心強いですね。

engChrName: Damn, sick deal. Hey, you couldn't give us a friend-of-an-employee discount, could you?
engSearchText:
Damn, sick deal. Hey, you couldn't give us a
friend-of-an-employee discount, could you?
jpnChrName: クク、大盤振る舞いじゃねえか。 ついでに安くなんねーのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、大盤振る舞いじゃねえか。
ついでに安くなんねーのかよ？

engChrName: I can't go quite that far, I'm afraid...
engSearchText: I can't go quite that far, I'm afraid...
jpnChrName: う～ん、そこまでは……
jpnSearchText: う～ん、そこまでは……

engChrName: And really, I'm not THAT good...am I? Haha...
engSearchText: And really, I'm not THAT good...am I? Haha...
jpnChrName: というか持ち上げられすぎて 恥ずかしいな、ははは……
jpnSearchText:
というか持ち上げられすぎて
恥ずかしいな、ははは……

engChrName: Quatre's a familiar face here. We helped develop his orbal drones.
engSearchText:
Quatre's a familiar face here. We helped develop his
orbal drones.
jpnChrName: カトルはウチの常連でね、《導力ドローン》の 開発も僕らが手伝わせてもらったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
カトルはウチの常連でね、《導力ドローン》の
開発も僕らが手伝わせてもらったんだ。

engChrName: Though really, he did most of the work. We just helped manufacture the parts themselves.
engSearchText:
Though really, he did most of the work. We just
helped manufacture the parts themselves.
jpnChrName: もっとも生体パーツの製作や組み上げ…… ハードウェア部分に力を貸した程度だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも生体パーツの製作や組み上げ……
ハードウェア部分に力を貸した程度だけどね。

engChrName: Oh, don't sell yourself short. You were an immense help with testing and debugging.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't sell yourself short. You were an immense
help with testing and debugging.
jpnChrName: いえ、動作テストにも 付き合ってもらってますし……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、動作テストにも
付き合ってもらってますし……

engChrName: It was a team effort—I couldn't have finished them without all of your help.
engSearchText:
It was a team effort—I couldn't have finished them
without all of your help.
jpnChrName: 僕一人じゃ到底完成できませんでしたよ。
jpnSearchText: 僕一人じゃ到底完成できませんでしたよ。

engChrName: Don't sell YOUR self short, haha.
engSearchText: Don't sell YOUR self short, haha.
jpnChrName: はは……僕はそうは思わないが。
jpnSearchText: はは……僕はそうは思わないが。

engChrName: At any rate, Quatre's like family to all of us here. FIO and XEROS, too.
engSearchText:
At any rate, Quatre's like family to all of us here.
FIO and XEROS, too.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、僕らにとってカトルは大事な家族さ。 ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳもね。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、僕らにとってカトルは大事な家族さ。
ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳもね。

engChrName: This is just a disaster...! We can't let those weapon parts out into the field!
engSearchText:
This is just a disaster...! We can't let those weapon
parts out into the field!
jpnChrName: たた、大変大変……！！ 仮にも“兵器”のパーツが、そんな……
jpnSearchText:
たた、大変大変……！！
仮にも“兵器”のパーツが、そんな……

engChrName: It'd be difficult to actually reverse-engineer them, but it's not completely off the table, and that really unnerves me...
engSearchText:
It'd be difficult to actually reverse-engineer them, but
it's not completely off the table, and that really
unnerves me...
jpnChrName: まあパーツがあったって 簡単に利用できるようなものでもないけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあパーツがあったって
簡単に利用できるようなものでもないけど……

engChrName: This project is supposed to be absolutely confidential, too. We just CAN'T let this happen...
engSearchText:
This project is supposed to be absolutely
confidential, too. We just CAN'T let this happen...
jpnChrName: それでも機密扱いだし、 こんなミス、いつもだったら起きるはずが……
jpnSearchText:
それでも機密扱いだし、
こんなミス、いつもだったら起きるはずが……

engChrName: I gotta get to the bottom of this, and fast...!
engSearchText: I gotta get to the bottom of this, and fast...!
jpnChrName: ううっ、とにかく徹底的に調べないと……！
jpnSearchText: ううっ、とにかく徹底的に調べないと……！

engChrName: Thank you so much for your help. You've really grown up into a strong young man, haven't you, Quatre?
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for your help. You've really
grown up into a strong young man, haven't
you, Quatre?
jpnChrName: 解決屋の人たちにカトル君……本当にありがとう。 カトル君も頼もしいっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
解決屋の人たちにカトル君……本当にありがとう。
カトル君も頼もしいっていうか……

engChrName: Just don't go rushing into trouble, all right? If things look bad, get out!
engSearchText:
Just don't go rushing into trouble, all right? If things
look bad, get out!
jpnChrName: でも、無理はしないのよ？ 危なくなったら引き返すこと！
jpnSearchText:
でも、無理はしないのよ？
危なくなったら引き返すこと！

engChrName: I-I'm fine, honestly. I've got FIO and XEROS here with me.
engSearchText:
I-I'm fine, honestly. I've got FIO and XEROS here
with me.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫だよ。 ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳもいるし──
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫だよ。
ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳもいるし──

engChrName: It wouldn't feel right to just sit idly by. What would I say to Gran if I just let them overrun the city?
engSearchText:
It wouldn't feel right to just sit idly by. What would I
say to Gran if I just let them overrun the city?
jpnChrName: 何より、ここで食い止めないと グランマにも胸を張れないと思うから。
jpnSearchText:
何より、ここで食い止めないと
グランマにも胸を張れないと思うから。

engChrName: I... I guess you're right. Just please be careful!
engSearchText: I... I guess you're right. Just please be careful!
jpnChrName: うん……そうね。 でも本当に気を付けてね……！
jpnSearchText:
うん……そうね。
でも本当に気を付けてね……！

engChrName: I'm sure you're in good hands with these friends of yours...and FIO and XEROS, too...
engSearchText:
I'm sure you're in good hands with these friends of
yours...and FIO and XEROS, too...
jpnChrName: 解決屋の人達が頼もしいのも、 ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳがいるのも判るけど──
jpnSearchText:
解決屋の人達が頼もしいのも、
ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳがいるのも判るけど──

engChrName: ...but just, I'm such a worrywart with these things! Promise me you'll come back safely...!
engSearchText:
...but just, I'm such a worrywart with these things!
Promise me you'll come back safely...!
jpnChrName: カトル君、どうか無理はしないで。 必ず無事に帰ってきてね……！
jpnSearchText:
カトル君、どうか無理はしないで。
必ず無事に帰ってきてね……！

engChrName: I heard about what happened over at the institute. It sounds like the Artisans' Guild is helping out however they can.
engSearchText:
I heard about what happened over at the institute.
It sounds like the Artisans' Guild is helping out
however they can.
jpnChrName: 大学の方の事件は聞いたわ、 職人組合でも色々と協議されているみたい。
jpnSearchText:
大学の方の事件は聞いたわ、
職人組合でも色々と協議されているみたい。

engChrName: I'm really worried for Quatre, though...
engSearchText: I'm really worried for Quatre, though...
jpnChrName: こういう事があると、一層カトル君が 心配になるわ……
jpnSearchText:
こういう事があると、一層カトル君が
心配になるわ……

engChrName: And the institute... We can't just let those goons take it over, or all of Professor Hamilton's work will go to waste!
engSearchText:
And the institute... We can't just let those goons take
it over, or all of Professor Hamilton's work will go
to waste!
jpnChrName: それに、博士の想いが籠った大学が、 マフィアに利用されるなんて許せないわ……！
jpnSearchText:
それに、博士の想いが籠った大学が、
マフィアに利用されるなんて許せないわ……！

engChrName: Whew... I think we're almost done for the day. I hate making Nat wait like this.
engSearchText:
Whew... I think we're almost done for the day. I hate
making Nat wait like this.
jpnChrName: ふう、そろそろ作業終了かな。 ナットも待たせちゃってるし……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、そろそろ作業終了かな。
ナットも待たせちゃってるし……

engChrName: I really am glad I started working here, though.
engSearchText: I really am glad I started working here, though.
jpnChrName: それにしても、やっぱりここに 弟子入りしてよかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、やっぱりここに
弟子入りしてよかったわ。

engChrName: I remember being scared half to death over how I'd handle the pressure. It's been really tough work, for sure...
engSearchText:
I remember being scared half to death over how I'd
handle the pressure. It's been really tough work,
for sure...
jpnChrName: 天下のジスカール工房でどこまでできるか 不安だったし、今も大変だけど……
jpnSearchText:
天下のジスカール工房でどこまでできるか
不安だったし、今も大変だけど……

engChrName: ...but it's so rewarding! And I can feel myself getting better day by day. Plus I've made friends with Quatre and so many others!
engSearchText:
...but it's so rewarding! And I can feel myself getting
better day by day. Plus I've made friends with Quatre
and so many others!
jpnChrName: 挑戦したおかげで腕も上がったし、 カトル君とも友達になれたもの。
jpnSearchText:
挑戦したおかげで腕も上がったし、
カトル君とも友達になれたもの。

engChrName: Thank you so much for rescuing Quatre. I was really worried when I heard he'd gone down to the mine all by himself.
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for rescuing Quatre. I was really
worried when I heard he'd gone down to the mine all
by himself.
jpnChrName: カトル君を助けてくれてありがとうね。 もう、一人で入ったって聞いて心配したのよ。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君を助けてくれてありがとうね。
もう、一人で入ったって聞いて心配したのよ。

engChrName: Hey, we got a card rank upgrade out of it. I think it worked out pretty well for us.
engSearchText:
Hey, we got a card rank upgrade out of it. I think it
worked out pretty well for us.
jpnChrName: まあ、お陰でカードのランクを 上げてもらう機会も持てたしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お陰でカードのランクを
上げてもらう機会も持てたしな。

engChrName: I really wish you'd just turned back when things got ugly, though... Your drones can't do everything out there.
engSearchText:
I really wish you'd just turned back when things got
ugly, though... Your drones can't do everything
out there.
jpnChrName: カトル君も危ないと思ったら引き返してよね。 導力ドローンがいるとは言え、君は生身なんだし。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君も危ないと思ったら引き返してよね。
導力ドローンがいるとは言え、君は生身なんだし。

engChrName: We were all worried to death... What if you'd gotten hurt?
engSearchText:
We were all worried to death... What if you'd
gotten hurt?
jpnChrName: ケガでもしたら、私も悲しいんだから。
jpnSearchText: ケガでもしたら、私も悲しいんだから。

engChrName: You're right... I'm not sure what I was thinking. I'm really sorry for worrying you.
engSearchText:
You're right... I'm not sure what I was thinking.
I'm really sorry for worrying you.
jpnChrName: うん……それに関しては弁明のしようもないな。
jpnSearchText: うん……それに関しては弁明のしようもないな。

engChrName: I just... I felt like I had to act. It didn't feel right to sit back and do nothing.
engSearchText:
I just... I felt like I had to act. It didn't feel right to sit
back and do nothing.
jpnChrName: 何とかしなきゃって…… 少し焦り過ぎていたみたいだよ。
jpnSearchText:
何とかしなきゃって……
少し焦り過ぎていたみたいだよ。

engChrName: I know, and that's really admirable of you. You're such a big help to everyone here...
engSearchText:
I know, and that's really admirable of you.
You're such a big help to everyone here...
jpnChrName: まあ、そこがカトル君の良いところでも あるけどね、やっぱりあの人譲りかしら。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そこがカトル君の良いところでも
あるけどね、やっぱりあの人譲りかしら。

engChrName: ...but don't risk yourself for other people like that, okay? We're here to help you when you need it, too.
engSearchText:
...but don't risk yourself for other people like
that, okay? We're here to help you when you need
it, too.
jpnChrName: でも、何かあったら工房の私らも頼って。 私らにも手伝える事はあるはずだからさ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、何かあったら工房の私らも頼って。
私らにも手伝える事はあるはずだからさ。

engChrName: Most of the people who work here are on the older side, so I really like having someone my age as a friend.
engSearchText:
Most of the people who work here are on the older
side, so I really like having someone my age as
a friend.
jpnChrName: うちって年上の男ばっかりの職場だしねー、 カトル君みたいな友達は私にも貴重なの。
jpnSearchText:
うちって年上の男ばっかりの職場だしねー、
カトル君みたいな友達は私にも貴重なの。

engChrName: Riel let me come along like usual, but she said today, she was scared to leave me at home.
engSearchText:
Riel let me come along like usual, but she said today,
she was scared to leave me at home.
jpnChrName: ひとりでルスバンはシンパイだっていって、 きょうもリール姉ちゃんがつれてきてくれたの。
jpnSearchText:
ひとりでルスバンはシンパイだっていって、
きょうもリール姉ちゃんがつれてきてくれたの。

engChrName: And everybody's kinda sad today, for some reason...
engSearchText: And everybody's kinda sad today, for some reason...
jpnChrName: でも……まちのヒトたち、 なんだかこまってるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
でも……まちのヒトたち、
なんだかこまってるみたい。

engChrName: I wonder what happened?
engSearchText: I wonder what happened?
jpnChrName: コウボウのヒトも、なんだかかなしそう……
jpnSearchText: コウボウのヒトも、なんだかかなしそう……

engChrName: Careful up there, Riel!
engSearchText: Careful up there, Riel!
jpnChrName: リール姉ちゃん、気をつけてねー！
jpnSearchText: リール姉ちゃん、気をつけてねー！

engChrName: I really wanna see the machines from up there, too! But everyone says it's too dangerous, so I gotta wait...
engSearchText:
I really wanna see the machines from up there, too!
But everyone says it's too dangerous, so I gotta wait...
jpnChrName: うーん、ボクも早く上からキカイをみてみたい！ でもアブナいっていうし、まだガマン！
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ボクも早く上からキカイをみてみたい！
でもアブナいっていうし、まだガマン！

engChrName: When I'm older, I'm gonna work here like Riel does, and then I can see all the cool stuff I want!
engSearchText:
When I'm older, I'm gonna work here like Riel does,
and then I can see all the cool stuff I want!
jpnChrName: オトナになってコウボウにはいれたら、 イッパイのぼってキカイさわれるもんね！
jpnSearchText:
オトナになってコウボウにはいれたら、
イッパイのぼってキカイさわれるもんね！

engChrName: I'm so glad Quatre's okay!
engSearchText: I'm so glad Quatre's okay!
jpnChrName: カトル兄ちゃんがケガとかしてなくて ほんとうに良かったよ！
jpnSearchText:
カトル兄ちゃんがケガとかしてなくて
ほんとうに良かったよ！

engChrName: You were the ones who helped him, right? Are you his friends?
engSearchText:
You were the ones who helped him, right? Are you
his friends?
jpnChrName: カトル兄ちゃん助けてくれたお兄さんたち、 カトル兄ちゃんのトモダチ？
jpnSearchText:
カトル兄ちゃん助けてくれたお兄さんたち、
カトル兄ちゃんのトモダチ？

engChrName: Eh, more like acquaintances. He's been helpin' us out a bit.
engSearchText:
Eh, more like acquaintances. He's been helpin' us out
a bit.
jpnChrName: まあ、友達ではないが、ちとばかり 世話にはなってるってところだな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、友達ではないが、ちとばかり
世話にはなってるってところだな。

engChrName: What about you, kid? Your mom or pop work here?
engSearchText: What about you, kid? Your mom or pop work here?
jpnChrName: そういう坊主は、工房の 誰かの子供か何かか？
jpnSearchText:
そういう坊主は、工房の
誰かの子供か何かか？

engChrName: His name's Nat. He's Riel's younger brother.
engSearchText: His name's Nat. He's Riel's younger brother.
jpnChrName: リールさんの弟のナット君です。
jpnSearchText: リールさんの弟のナット君です。

engChrName: He just can't keep himself out of the factory, so he tags along with her a lot. Vehicles especially pique his interest.
engSearchText:
He just can't keep himself out of the factory, so he
tags along with her a lot. Vehicles especially pique
his interest.
jpnChrName: 乗り物の類が特に好きで……工房見たさに、 よくリールさんについて来てしまうんです。
jpnSearchText:
乗り物の類が特に好きで……工房見たさに、
よくリールさんについて来てしまうんです。

engChrName: Yeah! They're making a big robot here now, right?
engSearchText: Yeah! They're making a big robot here now, right?
jpnChrName: うん、サイキンはあのおっきな人形みたいな のりもの作ってるって聞いて！
jpnSearchText:
うん、サイキンはあのおっきな人形みたいな
のりもの作ってるって聞いて！

engChrName: I wanna see it! C'mon, lemme see!
engSearchText: I wanna see it! C'mon, lemme see!
jpnChrName: ゼッタイ見なきゃって！
jpnSearchText: ゼッタイ見なきゃって！

engChrName: We've all warned Riel that Nat shouldn't be walking around the shop floor, but she just can't say no to him...
engSearchText:
We've all warned Riel that Nat shouldn't be walking
around the shop floor, but she just can't say no
to him...
jpnChrName: 危ないって一応皆さんも言っているんですけど、 リールさんも弟には甘いみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
危ないって一応皆さんも言っているんですけど、
リールさんも弟には甘いみたいで。

engChrName: And they do a lot of top-secret work here. They turn a blind eye to him because he's family, but still...
engSearchText:
And they do a lot of top-secret work here. They turn
a blind eye to him because he's family, but still...
jpnChrName: 一応部外秘のプロジェクトでもありますけど、 親方たちも身内という事でお目こぼししてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
一応部外秘のプロジェクトでもありますけど、
親方たちも身内という事でお目こぼししてくれて。

engChrName: Hey, Nat, just don't get too close to anything, okay? You don't want to make people worried.
engSearchText:
Hey, Nat, just don't get too close to anything, okay?
You don't want to make people worried.
jpnChrName: ナット、危ないしお姉さんたちも心配するから、 なるべく離れた所から見ているようにね。
jpnSearchText:
ナット、危ないしお姉さんたちも心配するから、
なるべく離れた所から見ているようにね。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: うん！
jpnSearchText: うん！

engChrName: I really like this workshop! My sister works here, and they make these cool cars sometimes, too!
engSearchText:
I really like this workshop! My sister works here, and
they make these cool cars sometimes, too!
jpnChrName: リール姉ちゃんがはたらいてるコウボウ、 たまにのりものもつくってるから大好きなの！
jpnSearchText:
リール姉ちゃんがはたらいてるコウボウ、
たまにのりものもつくってるから大好きなの！

engChrName: Sometimes they tell me it's dangerous and I shouldn't walk around, but everyone's really cool here!
engSearchText:
Sometimes they tell me it's dangerous and I shouldn't
walk around, but everyone's really cool here!
jpnChrName: アブナイっておこられることもあるけど、 オヤカタもシュニンさんもみんなやさしいし！
jpnSearchText:
アブナイっておこられることもあるけど、
オヤカタもシュニンさんもみんなやさしいし！

engChrName: Thank you sooo much for helping us out there!
engSearchText: Thank you sooo much for helping us out there!
jpnChrName: さっきはありがとね、 カトル君に裏解決屋さんたち～！
jpnSearchText:
さっきはありがとね、
カトル君に裏解決屋さんたち～！

engChrName: We'll try and get in touch with everyone we can. Just leave that to me—I'm one of Professor Hamilton's students for a reason!
engSearchText:
We'll try and get in touch with everyone we can.
Just leave that to me—I'm one of Professor
Hamilton's students for a reason!
jpnChrName: 各方面との連絡はわたしに任せておいて～。 これでもハミルトン門下の一人だし～。
jpnSearchText:
各方面との連絡はわたしに任せておいて～。
これでもハミルトン門下の一人だし～。

engChrName: Please do be careful if you're headed for the institute, all right?
engSearchText:
Please do be careful if you're headed for the institute,
all right?
jpnChrName: みんなも、このまま大学に向かうなら ホントに気を付けてね～？
jpnSearchText:
みんなも、このまま大学に向かうなら
ホントに気を付けてね～？

engChrName: Same to you, Essy. Just stay inside, we'll handle this!
engSearchText: Same to you, Essy. Just stay inside, we'll handle this!
jpnChrName: ああ、エレ姉こそ無茶は…… と、というか屋内にいてよね！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、エレ姉こそ無茶は……
と、というか屋内にいてよね！

engChrName: I'm worried sick about the institute... I hope all the students managed to get out of there safely.
engSearchText:
I'm worried sick about the institute... I hope all the
students managed to get out of there safely.
jpnChrName: それにしても大学の方が心配だね～。 まだ学生たちも残ってるだろうし……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても大学の方が心配だね～。
まだ学生たちも残ってるだろうし……

engChrName: The whole place is full of priceless equipment, to boot... Is that their aim?
engSearchText:
The whole place is full of priceless equipment,
to boot... Is that their aim?
jpnChrName: それに貴重な演算装置も…… うーん、やっぱり彼らの狙いは……
jpnSearchText:
それに貴重な演算装置も……
うーん、やっぱり彼らの狙いは……

engChrName: Agnès says she'll be here in about fifteen minutes!
engSearchText: Agnès says she'll be here in about fifteen minutes!
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、１５分くらいで こちらに来られるみたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん、１５分くらいで
こちらに来られるみたいですっ。

engChrName: That's surprisingly quick. I was about to suggest we get started if she was gonna be much longer.
engSearchText:
That's surprisingly quick. I was about to suggest we
get started if she was gonna be much longer.
jpnChrName: 意外に早かったな。 先に始めようかと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
意外に早かったな。
先に始めようかと思ってたが。

engChrName: All right, then. While we're waiting, it's engadin time!
engSearchText:
All right, then. While we're waiting, it's
engadin time!
jpnChrName: よし、そんじゃあ待ってる間に 胡桃と蜂蜜のタルト（エンガディーナ）を──
jpnSearchText:
よし、そんじゃあ待ってる間に
胡桃と蜂蜜のタルト（エンガディーナ）を──

engChrName: ...Right now?
engSearchText: ...Right now?
jpnChrName: エンガディーナを……？
jpnSearchText: エンガディーナを……？

engChrName: Umm... Yeah! Gotta order ahead of time so we can dig in as soon as Agnès gets here, of course!
engSearchText:
Umm... Yeah! Gotta order ahead of time so we can
dig in as soon as Agnès gets here, of course!
jpnChrName: アニエスと一緒に食べられるように、 前もって注文しとかねえとなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスと一緒に食べられるように、
前もって注文しとかねえとなぁ～。

engChrName: I thought so.
engSearchText: I thought so.
jpnChrName: ですよねっ。
jpnSearchText: ですよねっ。

engChrName: Real slick.
engSearchText: Real slick.
jpnChrName: ギリギリ誤魔化しやがったな。
jpnSearchText: ギリギリ誤魔化しやがったな。

engChrName: Shall we order one along with some coffee, then?
engSearchText: Shall we order one along with some coffee, then?
jpnChrName: ふふ、ではコーヒーと一緒に 今のうちに注文しておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ではコーヒーと一緒に
今のうちに注文しておきましょうか。

engChrName: Here we are. This is the Artisanal District.
engSearchText: Here we are. This is the Artisanal District.
jpnChrName: 到着──ここが職人街だね。
jpnSearchText: 到着──ここが職人街だね。

engChrName: Now I just need to find the hotel they're staying at.
engSearchText: Now I just need to find the hotel they're staying at.
jpnChrName: ええと、予約していた宿酒場は……
jpnSearchText: ええと、予約していた宿酒場は……

engChrName: Oh! There's Van's pickup truck.
engSearchText: Oh! There's Van's pickup truck.
jpnChrName: あっ…… ヴァンさんのＰＵトラックです。
jpnSearchText:
あっ……
ヴァンさんのＰＵトラックです。

engChrName: So he drives an Ingert? He's even customized the frame.
engSearchText:
So he drives an Ingert? He's even customized
the frame.
jpnChrName: インゲルト製──フレームまで 拡張カスタムしているんだね。
jpnSearchText:
インゲルト製──フレームまで
拡張カスタムしているんだね。

engChrName: Wait! That material was only just developed! How did he get his hands on it?
engSearchText:
Wait! That material was only just developed!
How did he get his hands on it?
jpnChrName: ってあの素材は 開発されたばかりの……！？
jpnSearchText:
ってあの素材は
開発されたばかりの……！？

engChrName: I didn't realize you were an expert.
engSearchText: I didn't realize you were an expert.
jpnChrName: 詳しいんですか？
jpnSearchText: 詳しいんですか？

engChrName: You pick this kind of thing up if you work with Verne long enough, I suppose.
engSearchText:
You pick this kind of thing up if you work with Verne
long enough, I suppose.
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴェルヌに関わっていると 自然にってだけだけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴェルヌに関わっていると
自然にってだけだけど。

engChrName: So how did you get to know people like them?
engSearchText: So how did you get to know people like them?
jpnChrName: それで──アニエスさんは あの人たちとどういう関係なの？
jpnSearchText:
それで──アニエスさんは
あの人たちとどういう関係なの？

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?

engChrName: The spriggan—whatever you call him—and that red-haired guy both seemed really shady to me.
engSearchText:
The spriggan—whatever you call him—and that
red-haired guy both seemed really shady to me.
jpnChrName: 《解決屋》だっけ……所長と赤毛の人は 見るからに胡散臭そうな感じだったからさ。
jpnSearchText:
《解決屋》だっけ……所長と赤毛の人は
見るからに胡散臭そうな感じだったからさ。

engChrName: Though the girl and the...maid, I think? They looked like good people, at least.
engSearchText:
Though the girl and the...maid, I think? They looked
like good people, at least.
jpnChrName: あの女の子に、メイドさん？は 一応はマトモそうだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの女の子に、メイドさん？は
一応はマトモそうだったけど……

engChrName: I'm just having a hard time picturing what kind of group it actually is if you're involved with them, too.
engSearchText:
I'm just having a hard time picturing what kind of
group it actually is if you're involved with them, too.
jpnChrName: 貴女みたいな人が関係しているとなると どういう事務所なのかなって思ってさ。
jpnSearchText:
貴女みたいな人が関係しているとなると
どういう事務所なのかなって思ってさ。

engChrName: (Well, I can't blame him for thinking that way about them...)
engSearchText:
(Well, I can't blame him for thinking that way
about them...)
jpnChrName: （確かに怪しいですよね……）
jpnSearchText: （確かに怪しいですよね……）

engChrName: Umm... Van runs a problem-solving agency, in short. I work there as a part-time assistant for reasons I can't get into.
engSearchText:
Umm... Van runs a problem-solving agency, in short.
I work there as a part-time assistant for reasons I can't
get into.
jpnChrName: ……その、とある事情で 助手としてアルバイトをしていまして。
jpnSearchText:
……その、とある事情で
助手としてアルバイトをしていまして。

engChrName: And both work and my duties as a student happened to bring me here at the same time.
engSearchText:
And both work and my duties as a student happened
to bring me here at the same time.
jpnChrName: 今回のカリキュラムと重なったので そちらの仕事も並行してやる予定なんです。
jpnSearchText:
今回のカリキュラムと重なったので
そちらの仕事も並行してやる予定なんです。

engChrName: Sounds like you've got a lot on your plate...
engSearchText: Sounds like you've got a lot on your plate...
jpnChrName: それはまた……
jpnSearchText: それはまた……

engChrName: Are you sure it's okay to be working with them, though? Verne's CEO didn't seem very happy about them sniffing around.
engSearchText:
Are you sure it's okay to be working with
them, though? Verne's CEO didn't seem very happy
about them sniffing around.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫なの？　ＣＥＯなんか 疫病神みたいな扱いしてたけど。
jpnSearchText:
……大丈夫なの？　ＣＥＯなんか
疫病神みたいな扱いしてたけど。

engChrName: O-Our work is complicated, I'll admit, but we don't do anything illegal!
engSearchText:
O-Our work is complicated, I'll admit, but we don't
do anything illegal!
jpnChrName: た、確かに色々ありますけど 決して後ろ暗い事はしてませんからっ。
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに色々ありますけど
決して後ろ暗い事はしてませんからっ。

engChrName: (...Technically.)
engSearchText: (...Technically.)
jpnChrName: （……ええと、   一線を越えない意味では……！）
jpnSearchText:
（……ええと、
一線を越えない意味では……！）

engChrName: *sigh* His willingness to hire an upstanding young lady like you does reflect well on him, I'll give him that.
engSearchText:
*sigh* His willingness to hire an upstanding young
lady like you does reflect well on him, I'll give
him that.
jpnChrName: ふう……まあ、貴女みたいな人を 雇ってる時点で少しは信頼できるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……まあ、貴女みたいな人を
雇ってる時点で少しは信頼できるのかな？

engChrName: ...Even if I don't think highly of his choice to involve someone like you in a business like his.
engSearchText:
...Even if I don't think highly of his choice to involve
someone like you in a business like his.
jpnChrName: といってもあの所長──胡散臭い商売に 女の子を関わらせてるのはどうかと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
といってもあの所長──胡散臭い商売に
女の子を関わらせてるのはどうかと思うけど。

engChrName: Ahaha... People say that about him a lot.
engSearchText: Ahaha... People say that about him a lot.
jpnChrName: あはは……よく言われます。
jpnSearchText: あはは……よく言われます。

engChrName: You have nothing to worry about, though, really. He might skirt the rules here and there...
engSearchText:
You have nothing to worry about, though, really.
He might skirt the rules here and there...
jpnChrName: でも、心配しないでください。 ちょっとだけズルい所もありますけど……
jpnSearchText:
でも、心配しないでください。
ちょっとだけズルい所もありますけど……

engChrName: ...but he's still a man I can genuinely respect.
engSearchText: ...but he's still a man I can genuinely respect.
jpnChrName: 尊敬できる人なのは間違いありませんから。
jpnSearchText: 尊敬できる人なのは間違いありませんから。

engChrName: Well, if you say so.
engSearchText: Well, if you say so.
jpnChrName: ふーん……まあいいけど。
jpnSearchText: ふーん……まあいいけど。

engChrName: He feels like one of those guys who takes some getting used to. The way he treated me was just...
engSearchText:
He feels like one of those guys who takes some
getting used to. The way he treated me was just...
jpnChrName: 何にしてもクセの強そうな人だよね。 ……僕のこともあんなふうに──
jpnSearchText:
何にしてもクセの強そうな人だよね。
……僕のこともあんなふうに──

engChrName: Ugh. I was so close to forgetting, too...
engSearchText: Ugh. I was so close to forgetting, too...
jpnChrName: ってああもう、思い出しちゃったよ……
jpnSearchText: ってああもう、思い出しちゃったよ……

engChrName: Did...something happen?
engSearchText: Did...something happen?
jpnChrName: えっと、ヴァンさんが何か……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、ヴァンさんが何か……？

engChrName: N-Nothing worth bringing up! Anyway, we shouldn't keep your friends waiting.
engSearchText:
N-Nothing worth bringing up! Anyway, we shouldn't
keep your friends waiting.
jpnChrName: なんでもないからっ。 ほら、待たせちゃ悪いし行こう。
jpnSearchText:
なんでもないからっ。
ほら、待たせちゃ悪いし行こう。

engChrName: Agnès! We're over here!
engSearchText: Agnès! We're over here!
jpnChrName: あっ、アニエスさーん！ こっちです！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、アニエスさーん！
こっちです！

engChrName: You came quick.
engSearchText: You came quick.
jpnChrName: おう、早かったな。
jpnSearchText: おう、早かったな。

engChrName: Oh, wait a sec. Isn't that...?
engSearchText: Oh, wait a sec. Isn't that...?
jpnChrName: アン、あの小僧は確か……
jpnSearchText: アン、あの小僧は確か……

engChrName: Sorry for keeping you.
engSearchText: Sorry for keeping you.
jpnChrName: すみません、お待たせしました。
jpnSearchText: すみません、お待たせしました。

engChrName: Quatre was good enough to guide me here.
engSearchText: Quatre was good enough to guide me here.
jpnChrName: こちらのカトル君に 案内してもらいまして。
jpnSearchText:
こちらのカトル君に
案内してもらいまして。

engChrName: Huh. Thanks for helpin' her out.
engSearchText: Huh. Thanks for helpin' her out.
jpnChrName: へえ、手間をかけちまったな。
jpnSearchText: へえ、手間をかけちまったな。

engChrName: We ordered an engadin for the group. You wanna join us?
engSearchText:
We ordered an engadin for the group. You wanna
join us?
jpnChrName: エンガディーナを頼んでるんだが お前さんも食っていくかい？
jpnSearchText:
エンガディーナを頼んでるんだが
お前さんも食っていくかい？

engChrName: Hmm? No, I'm fine. I'm not hungry right now.
engSearchText: Hmm? No, I'm fine. I'm not hungry right now.
jpnChrName: ……？ いえ、別に空腹じゃありませんし。
jpnSearchText:
……？
いえ、別に空腹じゃありませんし。

engChrName: Your loss. That taste is downright divine. I'll make it up to you some other time, then.
engSearchText:
Your loss. That taste is downright divine. I'll make it
up to you some other time, then.
jpnChrName: そうか、美味いんだが…… そんじゃそのうち別の形で返すぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、美味いんだが……
そんじゃそのうち別の形で返すぜ。

engChrName: ...You don't owe me anything. It's not like I did anything special.
engSearchText:
...You don't owe me anything. It's not like I did
anything special.
jpnChrName: ……当然のことをしただけですし 別に借りなんて思わなくても。
jpnSearchText:
……当然のことをしただけですし
別に借りなんて思わなくても。

engChrName: I suggest you don't pull any funny business while you're in the city, though.
engSearchText:
I suggest you don't pull any funny business while
you're in the city, though.
jpnChrName: ああ、でしたら“お仕事”であんまり 胡乱に動かないことをお勧めしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、でしたら“お仕事”であんまり
胡乱に動かないことをお勧めしますよ。

engChrName: No causing trouble for the women in your group, either.
engSearchText:
No causing trouble for the women in your
group, either.
jpnChrName: そちらの赤毛の人はともかく── 女性陣に迷惑をかけないようにね。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの赤毛の人はともかく──
女性陣に迷惑をかけないようにね。

jpnChrName: あら……
jpnSearchText: あら……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？

engChrName: I'll get going now, Agnès. Let me know if you need my help with anything.
engSearchText:
I'll get going now, Agnès. Let me know if you need
my help with anything.
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ、アニエスさん。 何かあれば遠慮なく連絡してね。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ、アニエスさん。
何かあれば遠慮なく連絡してね。

engChrName: Oh! I will. Thank you!
engSearchText: Oh! I will. Thank you!
jpnChrName: あ、はい。 ありがとうございました！
jpnSearchText:
あ、はい。
ありがとうございました！

engChrName: Man, would've been nice if he gave me the chance to thank him somehow.
engSearchText:
Man, would've been nice if he gave me the chance to
thank him somehow.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… お詫びもかねてだったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
お詫びもかねてだったんだが。

engChrName: Heh. Puberty's rough.
engSearchText: Heh. Puberty's rough.
jpnChrName: クク、思春期のガキは難しいからな。
jpnSearchText: クク、思春期のガキは難しいからな。

engChrName: He sure had a soft spot for you, though.
engSearchText: He sure had a soft spot for you, though.
jpnChrName: そういやオメーの方は 随分と懐かれてたみてぇだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
そういやオメーの方は
随分と懐かれてたみてぇだなァ？

engChrName: Do you think? He just struck me as the very friendly sort in general. We got along right away.
engSearchText:
Do you think? He just struck me as the very friendly
sort in general. We got along right away.
jpnChrName: ？　ええ。 なんだか仲良くなっちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
？　ええ。
なんだか仲良くなっちゃって。

engChrName: I hope I can be friends with him, too.
engSearchText: I hope I can be friends with him, too.
jpnChrName: そうなんですか…… わたしも仲良くしたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか……
わたしも仲良くしたいですっ。

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure that won't be a problem one bit. I'll be happy to introduce you if we get the chance.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sure that won't be a problem one bit. I'll be
happy to introduce you if we get the chance.
jpnChrName: ふふ、フェリちゃんなら大丈夫ですよ。 機会があれば改めて紹介しますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、フェリちゃんなら大丈夫ですよ。
機会があれば改めて紹介しますね。

engChrName: How old are you, five?
engSearchText: How old are you, five?
jpnChrName: 日曜学校の年少かよ……
jpnSearchText: 日曜学校の年少かよ……

engChrName: There's nothing wrong with wanting to make friends.
engSearchText: There's nothing wrong with wanting to make friends.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… 仲良きことはでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
仲良きことはでしょう。

engChrName: Yeah, no need to rain on her parade.
engSearchText: Yeah, no need to rain on her parade.
jpnChrName: クク、お前も一度 やり直しちゃどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、お前も一度
やり直しちゃどうだ？

engChrName: Here's your order! One of our famed engadins.
engSearchText: Here's your order! One of our famed engadins.
jpnChrName: お待たせしましたー、 当店自慢の《エンガディーナ》です！
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしましたー、
当店自慢の《エンガディーナ》です！

engChrName: Now THIS is what I'm talkin' about!
engSearchText: Now THIS is what I'm talkin' about!
jpnChrName: おおっ、コレだコレ！
jpnSearchText: おおっ、コレだコレ！

engChrName: Come and have a seat, Agnès!
engSearchText: Come and have a seat, Agnès!
jpnChrName: ほらほら、アニエスさんも 座ってくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
ほらほら、アニエスさんも
座ってくださいっ。

engChrName: I'll get to cutting it right away.
engSearchText: I'll get to cutting it right away.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは切り分けますね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それでは切り分けますね。

engChrName: She always used to make engadins for me back in the day...
engSearchText:
She always used to make engadins for me back in
the day...
jpnChrName: ……エンガディーナ、か。 よく作ってくれたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
……エンガディーナ、か。
よく作ってくれたっけ。

engChrName: I've finished, Quatre. I'm quite confident in today's dessert.
engSearchText:
I've finished, Quatre. I'm quite confident in
today's dessert.
jpnChrName: ──焼けたわよ、カトル。 今日のは自信作なの。
jpnSearchText:
──焼けたわよ、カトル。
今日のは自信作なの。

engChrName: The more worried you are about something, the more important it is to take a break and relax. No need to push through.
engSearchText:
The more worried you are about something, the more
important it is to take a break and relax. No need to
push through.
jpnChrName: 悩んでいる時ほど根を詰めすぎないこと。 リフレッシュしてまた頑張りましょう──
jpnSearchText:
悩んでいる時ほど根を詰めすぎないこと。
リフレッシュしてまた頑張りましょう──

engChrName: (I think I can trust Agnès, but I'd better keep a close eye on the rest of them.)
engSearchText:
(I think I can trust Agnès, but I'd better keep a close
eye on the rest of them.)
jpnChrName: （……アニエスさんの事は別にしても   一応こっちでも気を付けておかないと。）
jpnSearchText:
（……アニエスさんの事は別にしても
一応こっちでも気を付けておかないと。）

engChrName: (I don't want anything threatening a place so special to me.)
engSearchText:
(I don't want anything threatening a place so special
to me.)
jpnChrName: （“あの場所”を守るためにも──）
jpnSearchText: （“あの場所”を守るためにも──）

engChrName: Hmm... I suppose it wouldn't hurt to say hello to the supervisor and take care of my usual work while I'm here.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I suppose it wouldn't hurt to say hello to the
supervisor and take care of my usual work while
I'm here.
jpnChrName: ふう……ついでだし親方に挨拶して、 “いつもの”を片付けておこうかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ついでだし親方に挨拶して、
“いつもの”を片付けておこうかな？

engChrName: Mmm! THAT'S the stuff!
engSearchText: Mmm! THAT'S the stuff!
jpnChrName: んん～……これだよ、これ。
jpnSearchText: んん～……これだよ、これ。

engChrName: You won't find a better marriage of flavors than these bitter walnuts with sweet caramel nougat. It's so mouthwateringly rich!
engSearchText:
You won't find a better marriage of flavors than these
bitter walnuts with sweet caramel nougat. It's so
mouthwateringly rich!
jpnChrName: このクルミとキャラメルヌガーの ほろ苦くも甘く、濃厚な味わい……
jpnSearchText:
このクルミとキャラメルヌガーの
ほろ苦くも甘く、濃厚な味わい……

engChrName: And you wouldn't believe how well it pairs with strong coffee! I swear, I was born just to savor moments like these...
engSearchText:
And you wouldn't believe how well it pairs with
strong coffee! I swear, I was born just to savor
moments like these...
jpnChrName: 濃いめのコーヒーとの組み合わせは まさしく王道にして正義でもあるな……！
jpnSearchText:
濃いめのコーヒーとの組み合わせは
まさしく王道にして正義でもあるな……！

engChrName: No one wants to hear this every time, you know. Just eat the damn thing.
engSearchText:
No one wants to hear this every time, you know.
Just eat the damn thing.
jpnChrName: ウゼえ、ひたすらウザすぎる。
jpnSearchText: ウゼえ、ひたすらウザすぎる。

engChrName: Ahaha. He's describing it to a T, though. I can't get enough of that buttery flavor.
engSearchText:
Ahaha. He's describing it to a T, though. I can't get
enough of that buttery flavor.
jpnChrName: あはは……でも確かに絶品ですね。 バターの風味もたまりませんし。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でも確かに絶品ですね。
バターの風味もたまりませんし。

engChrName: *munch* If Van says it's good, then you know you're in for a treat.
engSearchText:
*munch* If Van says it's good, then you know you're
in for a treat.
jpnChrName: モグモグ……ヴァンさんのイチオシは どれも外れがありませんっ。
jpnSearchText:
モグモグ……ヴァンさんのイチオシは
どれも外れがありませんっ。

engChrName: Heh. My nose is good for more than just sniffin' out trouble, you know!
engSearchText:
Heh. My nose is good for more than just sniffin' out
trouble, you know!
jpnChrName: フッ、こういうのを捜し出すのも 裏解決屋（スプリガン）の嗅覚ってな……
jpnSearchText:
フッ、こういうのを捜し出すのも
裏解決屋（スプリガン）の嗅覚ってな……

engChrName: I feel like you're joking, but I could buy it working for stuff like this easy.
engSearchText:
I feel like you're joking, but I could buy it working for
stuff like this easy.
jpnChrName: てめぇが言うと 冗談に聞こえねぇんだが。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇが言うと
冗談に聞こえねぇんだが。

engChrName: Indeed. Now, I think we've rested for long enough. Perhaps we should get to work.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Now, I think we've rested for long enough.
Perhaps we should get to work.
jpnChrName: ふふ……一息ついたところで そろそろ行動を開始しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……一息ついたところで
そろそろ行動を開始しましょうか。

engChrName: Do you think we should prioritize investigating Verne?
engSearchText:
Do you think we should prioritize
investigating Verne?
jpnChrName: すぐにヴェルヌ社周辺の “調査”を開始しますか？
jpnSearchText:
すぐにヴェルヌ社周辺の
“調査”を開始しますか？

engChrName: Nah, I think we should hold off doing that. I can't imagine we'd find anything major this fast even if we tried.
engSearchText:
Nah, I think we should hold off doing that. I can't
imagine we'd find anything major this fast even if
we tried.
jpnChrName: いや、そっちは一旦寝かしておく。 すぐには大した情報も掛からんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そっちは一旦寝かしておく。
すぐには大した情報も掛からんだろう。

engChrName: I'm thinkin' we should start with wandering around Basel and takin' care of 4SPGs. That'll give us a decent idea of the situation here.
engSearchText:
I'm thinkin' we should start with wandering around
Basel and takin' care of 4SPGs. That'll give us a
decent idea of the situation here.
jpnChrName: まずは街を回って４ｓｐｇに対応しながら バーゼルの“状況”を掴んでいくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは街を回って４ｓｐｇに対応しながら
バーゼルの“状況”を掴んでいくぞ。

engChrName: The same pattern as usual, then? But how can you be so sure that word of our work has spread to here?
engSearchText:
The same pattern as usual, then? But how can you be
so sure that word of our work has spread to here?
jpnChrName: これまでと同じですね…… ですが、今回は誰が“噂”の方を？
jpnSearchText:
これまでと同じですね……
ですが、今回は誰が“噂”の方を？

engChrName: Good question... Verne's boss sure didn't seem like he wanted to help us any more than he had to.
engSearchText:
Good question... Verne's boss sure didn't seem like he
wanted to help us any more than he had to.
jpnChrName: そういえば……ヴェルヌの方は 協力的じゃなさそうでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……ヴェルヌの方は
協力的じゃなさそうでしたし。

engChrName: Oh, I don't think we gotta worry about that. Not after my headache of a friend slapped this job on us.
engSearchText:
Oh, I don't think we gotta worry about that.
Not after my headache of a friend slapped this job
on us.
jpnChrName: ま、“ヤツ”が話を持ってきた時点で そのあたりは織り込み済みだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、“ヤツ”が話を持ってきた時点で
そのあたりは織り込み済みだろ。

engChrName: Right...
engSearchText: Right...

engChrName: That man from the CID?
engSearchText: That man from the CID?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの眼鏡のヒトですね。
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤの眼鏡のヒトですね。

engChrName: He did seem like a highly capable person—though that's the least to be expected of their chief analyst.
engSearchText:
He did seem like a highly capable person—though
that's the least to be expected of their chief analyst.
jpnChrName: 主任分析官──でしたか。 相当優秀な方とお見受けしました。
jpnSearchText:
主任分析官──でしたか。
相当優秀な方とお見受けしました。

engChrName: You and he go back quite some time, I believe?
engSearchText: You and he go back quite some time, I believe?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の昔馴染みなのだとか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様の昔馴染みなのだとか？

engChrName: Unfortunately, yeah.
engSearchText: Unfortunately, yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ、“腐れ”がつく類いのな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、“腐れ”がつく類いのな。

engChrName: I doubt he's here in person, though. More than likely he sent someone in his place.
engSearchText:
I doubt he's here in person, though. More than likely
he sent someone in his place.
jpnChrName: だがまあ本人は来てねえだろ。 代理を寄越してるってところか。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ本人は来てねえだろ。
代理を寄越してるってところか。

engChrName: Between this and that other project he teased, I'm sure there's a ton of scheming going on in that head of his.
engSearchText:
Between this and that other project he teased, I'm
sure there's a ton of scheming going on in that head
of his.
jpnChrName: ハン、もう一つのプロジェクトといい、 胡散臭い思惑もありそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、もう一つのプロジェクトといい、
胡散臭い思惑もありそうだが。

engChrName: Guess we should go find out what kinda 4SPGs we've got waiting for us, then.
engSearchText:
Guess we should go find out what kinda 4SPGs we've
got waiting for us, then.
jpnChrName: とりあえず連中の撒いたエサで どんな魚が掛かるか確かめるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず連中の撒いたエサで
どんな魚が掛かるか確かめるとすっか。

engChrName: So, when do you need to be back at the hotel?
engSearchText: So, when do you need to be back at the hotel?
jpnChrName: それで、ホテルに戻るのは 何時くらいになりそうなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
それで、ホテルに戻るのは
何時くらいになりそうなんだ？

engChrName: And what're you gonna do about your uniform?
engSearchText: And what're you gonna do about your uniform?
jpnChrName: それから制服の方だが──
jpnSearchText: それから制服の方だが──

engChrName: Renne said to be back by 6:30PM.
engSearchText: Renne said to be back by 6:30PM.
jpnChrName: えっと、１８：３０ですね。 それまでに戻るようにと先輩が。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、１８：３０ですね。
それまでに戻るようにと先輩が。

engChrName: I brought some clothes besides my uniform, don't worry! Let me go and get changed.
engSearchText:
I brought some clothes besides my uniform,
don't worry! Let me go and get changed.
jpnChrName: あとちゃんと私服は持ってきました。 すぐに着替えちゃいますね！
jpnSearchText:
あとちゃんと私服は持ってきました。
すぐに着替えちゃいますね！

engChrName: I'll take you to our room, then!
engSearchText: I'll take you to our room, then!
jpnChrName: あ、それじゃ案内します！
jpnSearchText: あ、それじゃ案内します！

engChrName: We will handle paying the bill in the meantime.
engSearchText: We will handle paying the bill in the meantime.
jpnChrName: ふふ、会計も 済ませておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、会計も
済ませておきましょうか。

engChrName: Feri took Agnès to the girls' room so that she could get changed.
engSearchText:
Feri took Agnès to the girls' room so that she could
get changed.
jpnChrName: その後、フェリたちの部屋で アニエスが手早く私服に着替え──
jpnSearchText:
その後、フェリたちの部屋で
アニエスが手早く私服に着替え──

engChrName: After she was done, they reunited with the rest of the group and began their first day of work in Basel.
engSearchText:
After she was done, they reunited with the rest of the
group and began their first day of work in Basel.
jpnChrName: 改めて工学都市バーゼルでの 初日の解決業務を開始するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
改めて工学都市バーゼルでの
初日の解決業務を開始するのだった。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Get a load of that...
engSearchText: Get a load of that...
jpnChrName: オイオイ、あれは……
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、あれは……

engChrName: Giscard Workshop
engSearchText: Giscard Workshop
jpnChrName: ジスカール工房
jpnSearchText: ジスカール工房

engChrName: Come on, we ain't got all day! Get that work done!
engSearchText: Come on, we ain't got all day! Get that work done!
jpnChrName: おら、グズグズすんじゃねえ！ とっとと仕上げるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おら、グズグズすんじゃねえ！
とっとと仕上げるぞ！

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: ウーッス！！
jpnSearchText: ウーッス！！

engChrName: Are those from one of the Empire's Panzer Soldats? ...No, they seem a little different.
engSearchText:
Are those from one of the Empire's Panzer Soldats?
...No, they seem a little different.
jpnChrName: 帝国の《機甲兵》…… ……ううん、違うんですね。
jpnSearchText:
帝国の《機甲兵》……
……ううん、違うんですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Word about these things has gotten out in certain circles, but most people still don't know about 'em yet.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Word about these things has gotten out in
certain circles, but most people still don't know about
'em yet.
jpnChrName: ああ、一部の界隈では 既に噂も広まっているが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一部の界隈では
既に噂も広まっているが……

engChrName: Guessin' you do, though. Your company's involved in their development, right?
engSearchText:
Guessin' you do, though. Your company's involved in
their development, right?
jpnChrName: ──お前さんの所も 多少は絡んでるんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
──お前さんの所も
多少は絡んでるんだったか？

engChrName: Yes—though not that much. We have only been assisting in trials.
engSearchText:
Yes—though not that much. We have only been
assisting in trials.
jpnChrName: ええ、試験運用の一環くらいですが。
jpnSearchText: ええ、試験運用の一環くらいですが。

engChrName: Who're you guys? I haven't seen you around before... This is a restricted area, y'know.
engSearchText:
Who're you guys? I haven't seen you around before...
This is a restricted area, y'know.
jpnChrName: なんだアンタら、見ない顔だな？ ここは関係者以外は立入禁止だぞ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだアンタら、見ない顔だな？
ここは関係者以外は立入禁止だぞ。

engChrName: I totally get why you'd wanna gawk at these beauties, but they're technically not public knowledge yet.
engSearchText:
I totally get why you'd wanna gawk at these beauties,
but they're technically not public knowledge yet.
jpnChrName: 珍しいのは分かるが、 一応、“まだ”部外秘なんでね。
jpnSearchText:
珍しいのは分かるが、
一応、“まだ”部外秘なんでね。

engChrName: Go ahead and move along, now.
engSearchText: Go ahead and move along, now.
jpnChrName: ほらほら、出てった出てった。
jpnSearchText: ほらほら、出てった出てった。

engChrName: ...Hmm? Wonder if they're the guys...
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Wonder if they're the guys...
jpnChrName: ハン……？ もしかしてアイツらが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
もしかしてアイツらが……

engChrName: I didn't know machines like that were being made here in Calvard, too.
engSearchText:
I didn't know machines like that were being made
here in Calvard, too.
jpnChrName: ……驚きました、 共和国でも作ってたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
……驚きました、
共和国でも作ってたんですね。

engChrName: Sure are. I've heard the concept behind their design is different from the Soldats over in Erebonia, though.
engSearchText:
Sure are. I've heard the concept behind their design is
different from the Soldats over in Erebonia, though.
jpnChrName: ああ、だが帝国のヤツとは 設計概念がそもそも違うらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だが帝国のヤツとは
設計概念がそもそも違うらしい。

engChrName: They're gonna be revealed to the public along with their name sometime soon.
engSearchText:
They're gonna be revealed to the public along with
their name sometime soon.
jpnChrName: “名前”も含めてそのうち お披露目されるっつう話だな。
jpnSearchText:
“名前”も含めてそのうち
お披露目されるっつう話だな。

engChrName: Hmph. Sure feels like we saw something we weren't supposed to, even if it was just the legs.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Sure feels like we saw something we weren't
supposed to, even if it was just the legs.
jpnChrName: ハン……しかし脚だけとはいえ、 簡単に見ちまったが、いいのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……しかし脚だけとはいえ、
簡単に見ちまったが、いいのかよ？

engChrName: I imagine that while they're being kept a secret from the public, most major groups and organizations have already been told about them.
engSearchText:
I imagine that while they're being kept a secret from
the public, most major groups and organizations have
already been told about them.
jpnChrName: 多分、一般に規制されているだけで 各方面には告知済みなんだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
多分、一般に規制されているだけで
各方面には告知済みなんだと思います。

engChrName: That includes those abroad, our international allies... maybe even the Empire.
engSearchText:
That includes those abroad, our international allies...
maybe even the Empire.
jpnChrName: 関連する外国企業はもちろん、 友好国や──恐らく帝国などにも。
jpnSearchText:
関連する外国企業はもちろん、
友好国や──恐らく帝国などにも。

engChrName: I believe you're correct in your assumptions.
engSearchText: I believe you're correct in your assumptions.
jpnChrName: ……その認識で間違いないかと。
jpnSearchText: ……その認識で間違いないかと。

engChrName: Think that's true for all the weaponry that's gonna be rolled out soon, too. Not just our Soldat-lookalikes.
engSearchText:
Think that's true for all the weaponry that's gonna be
rolled out soon, too. Not just our Soldat-lookalikes.
jpnChrName: ま、アレに限らず 刷新される兵器全般らしいけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アレに限らず
刷新される兵器全般らしいけどな。

engChrName: Either way, this looks like the biggest workshop in the Artisanal District. We'll have to come back another time if we get a chance.
engSearchText:
Either way, this looks like the biggest workshop in
the Artisanal District. We'll have to come back
another time if we get a chance.
jpnChrName: ここは職人街一の工房だった筈だ。 そのうちまた覗いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ここは職人街一の工房だった筈だ。
そのうちまた覗いてみるか。

engChrName: Hmm... I wonder who lives here.
engSearchText: Hmm... I wonder who lives here.
jpnChrName: こちらは…… 一般の方の住居みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは……
一般の方の住居みたいですね。

engChrName: Yeah. It's really high up.
engSearchText: Yeah. It's really high up.
jpnChrName: はい、ずいぶん 高い場所にありますけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、ずいぶん
高い場所にありますけど……

engChrName: Oooh! There they aaare! I'm so glad I finally found them.
engSearchText:
Oooh! There they aaare! I'm so glad I finally
found them.
jpnChrName: は～、あったあった。 よかった～、資料が見つかって。
jpnSearchText:
は～、あったあった。
よかった～、資料が見つかって。

engChrName: Hmm? Hello. Is there something you need from here?
engSearchText:
Hmm? Hello. Is there something you need
from here?
jpnChrName: あら～、貴方たちは？ もしかしてこの家にご用でも～？
jpnSearchText:
あら～、貴方たちは？
もしかしてこの家にご用でも～？

engChrName: The owner of this house hasn't been home in a while, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
The owner of this house hasn't been home in a while,
I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: こちらのご主人なら、 ずっと留守にしてますよ～。
jpnSearchText:
こちらのご主人なら、
ずっと留守にしてますよ～。

engChrName: We were just walkin' around and happened to end up here. So you know who owns this place, then?
engSearchText:
We were just walkin' around and happened to end
up here. So you know who owns this place, then?
jpnChrName: いや、街歩きがてら迷い込んじまってね。 アンタはその家の？
jpnSearchText:
いや、街歩きがてら迷い込んじまってね。
アンタはその家の？

engChrName: Yeah. You could say we're acquaintances—well, that might sound a little too cold, actually.
engSearchText:
Yeah. You could say we're acquaintances—well, that
might sound a little too cold, actually.
jpnChrName: 知り合いというか、関係者というか～。
jpnSearchText: 知り合いというか、関係者というか～。

engChrName: Hmm... I don't know if I could really call us family? But we are clooose... Just not as close as he is...
engSearchText:
Hmm... I don't know if I could really call us family?
But we are clooose... Just not as close as he is...
jpnChrName: うーん、家族って言ってもいいのかな？ でもあの子ほど近いかと言われると～……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、家族って言ってもいいのかな？
でもあの子ほど近いかと言われると～……

engChrName: (Girl's IQ points've all gone into her face and tits. Total Ditz with a capital D.)
engSearchText:
(Girl's IQ points've all gone into her face and tits.
Total Ditz with a capital D.)
jpnChrName: （トッポそうな姉ちゃんだな。   胸とツラは悪くねぇが。）
jpnSearchText:
（トッポそうな姉ちゃんだな。
胸とツラは悪くねぇが。）

engChrName: (A-Aaron!)
engSearchText: (A-Aaron!)
jpnChrName: （ちょっとアーロンさん……）
jpnSearchText: （ちょっとアーロンさん……）

engChrName: You know, you guys are all just adorable! Especially you, you tiny thing.
engSearchText:
You know, you guys are all just adorable!
Especially you, you tiny thing.
jpnChrName: わ～、可愛い子たちですねぇ。 そっちのちっちゃい子なんかもう……！
jpnSearchText:
わ～、可愛い子たちですねぇ。
そっちのちっちゃい子なんかもう……！

engChrName: Where are you from? Do you want me to show you around?
engSearchText:
Where are you from? Do you want me to show
you around?
jpnChrName: どこから来たのかな～？ お姉さんが案内してあげましょうか～？
jpnSearchText:
どこから来たのかな～？
お姉さんが案内してあげましょうか～？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: I'm not that tiny...
engSearchText: I'm not that tiny...
jpnChrName: ちっちゃい……
jpnSearchText: ちっちゃい……

engChrName: Oh! Silly me. I forgot I have somewhere else to be!
engSearchText: Oh! Silly me. I forgot I have somewhere else to be!
jpnChrName: とと、こんな事してる場合じゃ なかったんだった～！
jpnSearchText:
とと、こんな事してる場合じゃ
なかったんだった～！

engChrName: You won't be able to meet this house's owner, buuut the boy looking after it in her absence should be back tonight. Goodbye nooow!
engSearchText:
You won't be able to meet this house's owner, buuut
the boy looking after it in her absence should be
back tonight. Goodbye nooow!
jpnChrName: 用があるなら留守番をしてる子が 夜には戻ってくると思うので、それじゃ～。
jpnSearchText:
用があるなら留守番をしてる子が
夜には戻ってくると思うので、それじゃ～。

engChrName: She was dressed like she's a researcher at the institute or somethin'. Wish we could've talked to her a bit more about that.
engSearchText:
She was dressed like she's a researcher at the institute
or somethin'. Wish we could've talked to her a bit
more about that.
jpnChrName: 格好からして大学関係者ってトコか。 話を聞いときゃよかったかもな。
jpnSearchText:
格好からして大学関係者ってトコか。
話を聞いときゃよかったかもな。

engChrName: I wanted to make her understand my size isn't all there is to me! I'm strong, too!
engSearchText:
I wanted to make her understand my size isn't all
there is to me! I'm strong, too!
jpnChrName: ちっちゃいだけじゃなくて 強いって主張したかったです。
jpnSearchText:
ちっちゃいだけじゃなくて
強いって主張したかったです。

engChrName: Late twenties, huge tits, kind of an airhead, freckles, glasses... Yeah, I'd hit it.
engSearchText:
Late twenties, huge tits, kind of an airhead,
freckles, glasses... Yeah, I'd hit it.
jpnChrName: アラサー手前の巨乳天然 ソバカス眼鏡か……アリだな。
jpnSearchText:
アラサー手前の巨乳天然
ソバカス眼鏡か……アリだな。

engChrName: Are you going to start behaving like an adult, Aaron, or am I going to have to force you to?
engSearchText:
Are you going to start behaving like an adult, Aaron,
or am I going to have to force you to?
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……？ いい加減にしましょうね？
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん……？
いい加減にしましょうね？

engChrName: (I wonder if that could be...)
engSearchText: (I wonder if that could be...)
jpnChrName: （……あの方はもしや……）
jpnSearchText: （……あの方はもしや……）

engChrName: Sorry, guys. We're back.
engSearchText: Sorry, guys. We're back.
jpnChrName: すまねえ、邪魔するぜ。
jpnSearchText: すまねえ、邪魔するぜ。

engChrName: Wh-Who are you?
engSearchText: Wh-Who are you?
jpnChrName: な、なんだアンタたちは？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだアンタたちは？

engChrName: Oh, you're the group from earlier. I thought we told you that this was a restricted area?
engSearchText:
Oh, you're the group from earlier. I thought we told
you that this was a restricted area?
jpnChrName: さっきの人たちか…… ここは立入禁止と言っただろう？
jpnSearchText:
さっきの人たちか……
ここは立入禁止と言っただろう？

engChrName: Umm... Sorry, but Quatre hasn't been past here, has he?
engSearchText:
Umm... Sorry, but Quatre hasn't been past here,
has he?
jpnChrName: あの、カトル君が こちらに来ていませんか……！？
jpnSearchText:
あの、カトル君が
こちらに来ていませんか……！？

engChrName: Wait, what?
engSearchText: Wait, what?
jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: How do you know about—
engSearchText: How do you know about—
jpnChrName: どうしてカトルのことを……
jpnSearchText: どうしてカトルのことを……

engChrName: I'll handle this.
engSearchText: I'll handle this.
jpnChrName: 待ちな。
jpnSearchText: 待ちな。

engChrName: I'm the supervisor of this here workshop, Giscard.
engSearchText: I'm the supervisor of this here workshop, Giscard.
jpnChrName: ここの責任者、ジスカールだ。
jpnSearchText: ここの責任者、ジスカールだ。

engChrName: I had a feeling when I saw you kids here earlier, but are you the ones Quatre's been showing around town?
engSearchText:
I had a feeling when I saw you kids here earlier, but
are you the ones Quatre's been showing around town?
jpnChrName: さっきも見かけた余所者みたいだな。 ──カトルが案内してるっつう連中か？
jpnSearchText:
さっきも見かけた余所者みたいだな。
──カトルが案内してるっつう連中か？

engChrName: He told you about us?
engSearchText: He told you about us?
jpnChrName: 小僧から聞いてたみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: 小僧から聞いてたみてぇだな。

engChrName: That's right. We're from Arkride Solutions over in the capital.
engSearchText:
That's right. We're from Arkride Solutions over in
the capital.
jpnChrName: ああ、首都から出張してきてる アークライド解決事務所のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、首都から出張してきてる
アークライド解決事務所のモンだ。

engChrName: I'll get right to the point: we have reason to believe he's in danger.
engSearchText:
I'll get right to the point: we have reason to believe
he's in danger.
jpnChrName: 良く聞け──あのカトルって子が危ねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 良く聞け──あのカトルって子が危ねぇ。

engChrName: We think he might be in a mine or somethin' like one. If that rings any bells, can you take us there?
engSearchText:
We think he might be in a mine or somethin'
like one. If that rings any bells, can you take us there?
jpnChrName: 多分、坑道みたいな場所のはずだ。 知ってたら案内しちゃもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
多分、坑道みたいな場所のはずだ。
知ってたら案内しちゃもらえないか？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: Qu-Quatre's in danger?!
engSearchText: Qu-Quatre's in danger?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかカトルに何か……！？
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかカトルに何か……！？

engChrName: Come with me. I'll hear your story while we're on the move.
engSearchText:
Come with me. I'll hear your story while we're on
the move.
jpnChrName: ……ついてこい。 話は走りながら聞いてやる。
jpnSearchText:
……ついてこい。
話は走りながら聞いてやる。

engChrName: You two, contact the guild just in case! Get on it!
engSearchText: You two, contact the guild just in case! Get on it!
jpnChrName: お前らは念の為ギルドに連絡だ、急げ！
jpnSearchText: お前らは念の為ギルドに連絡だ、急げ！

engChrName: So there's a mine shaft in the vicinity after all.
engSearchText: So there's a mine shaft in the vicinity after all.
jpnChrName: ……やはり近場にある 何らかの坑道でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり近場にある
何らかの坑道でしたか。

engChrName: Yeah. It's used to extract a minor metal called linium.
engSearchText: Yeah. It's used to extract a minor metal called linium.
jpnChrName: ああ──『リニウム鉱』っつう レアメタルの採掘道がある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──『リニウム鉱』っつう
レアメタルの採掘道がある。

engChrName: The signal's not great down there, which explains all the noise on your call.
engSearchText:
The signal's not great down there, which explains
all the noise on your call.
jpnChrName: 通信波があまり届かなくってな。 ノイズってのはそれが原因だろう。
jpnSearchText:
通信波があまり届かなくってな。
ノイズってのはそれが原因だろう。

engChrName: So this is where Quatre likely is?
engSearchText: So this is where Quatre likely is?
jpnChrName: ここにカトル君が……
jpnSearchText: ここにカトル君が……

engChrName: Most likely, I'd wager. He goes to check all the lights and such're working every so often. He just went in earlier to do it again.
engSearchText:
Most likely, I'd wager. He goes to check all the lights
and such're working every so often. He just went in
earlier to do it again.
jpnChrName: 定期的に照明なんかの点検をして くれていてな──さっき入ったばかりだ。
jpnSearchText:
定期的に照明なんかの点検をして
くれていてな──さっき入ったばかりだ。

engChrName: It ain't all that big of a shaft, though, and there aren't usually any monsters down here.
engSearchText:
It ain't all that big of a shaft, though, and there aren't
usually any monsters down here.
jpnChrName: だがそれほど大きくねえし、 普段は魔獣もいねぇはずだが……
jpnSearchText:
だがそれほど大きくねえし、
普段は魔獣もいねぇはずだが……

engChrName: Hmph. You should've just waited for us to arrive instead of going ahead on your own.
engSearchText:
Hmph. You should've just waited for us to arrive
instead of going ahead on your own.
jpnChrName: フン、ギルドの到着を待たずに 勝手に先行するとは……
jpnSearchText:
フン、ギルドの到着を待たずに
勝手に先行するとは……

engChrName: ...Though I suppose I can commend you for rescuing him, at least.
engSearchText:
...Though I suppose I can commend you for rescuing
him, at least.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、彼を助けたことは 良くやったと言ってもいいが。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、彼を助けたことは
良くやったと言ってもいいが。

engChrName: Haha. You did a bang-up job down there yourself.
engSearchText: Haha. You did a bang-up job down there yourself.
jpnChrName: はは、お前さんもやっぱりやるな。
jpnSearchText: はは、お前さんもやっぱりやるな。

engChrName: You got no chill every time we bump into you, but you pulled your weight back in Creil, too.
engSearchText:
You got no chill every time we bump into you, but
you pulled your weight back in Creil, too.
jpnChrName: いつも微妙にテンパってそうだが クレイユでもちゃんと対処してたし。
jpnSearchText:
いつも微妙にテンパってそうだが
クレイユでもちゃんと対処してたし。

engChrName: Hmph. I'm this close to being promoted to B-rank, so I would hope I could handle this much.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I'm this close to being promoted to B-rank,
so I would hope I could handle this much.
jpnChrName: フン、これでも Ｂ級に昇格目前なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、これでも
Ｂ級に昇格目前なんでな。

engChrName: As for your snide little comment, you can mind your own damn business! I'm PERFECTLY chill, thank you!
engSearchText:
As for your snide little comment, you can mind your
own damn business! I'm PERFECTLY chill,
thank you!
jpnChrName: ってテンパってるとは何だ、 テンパってるとは！？
jpnSearchText:
ってテンパってるとは何だ、
テンパってるとは！？

engChrName: You're just proving his point, you know...
engSearchText: You're just proving his point, you know...
jpnChrName: ああもう、すぐ熱くならないの。
jpnSearchText: ああもう、すぐ熱くならないの。

engChrName: As for you, Quatre, why didn't you call us to let us know somethin' was off?!
engSearchText:
As for you, Quatre, why didn't you call us to let us
know somethin' was off?!
jpnChrName: しかしカトル……お前も異常が起きたら とっとと連絡しろってんだ！
jpnSearchText:
しかしカトル……お前も異常が起きたら
とっとと連絡しろってんだ！

engChrName: Everything worked out all right in the end this time, but that could've easily ended worse than it did.
engSearchText:
Everything worked out all right in the end this time,
but that could've easily ended worse than it did.
jpnChrName: コイツらが駆け付けたからよかったものの ヘタすりゃ取り返しのつかねぇ事になってたぞ？
jpnSearchText:
コイツらが駆け付けたからよかったものの
ヘタすりゃ取り返しのつかねぇ事になってたぞ？

engChrName: I'm really sorry for worrying you...
engSearchText: I'm really sorry for worrying you...
jpnChrName: ……すみません、心配をかけて。
jpnSearchText: ……すみません、心配をかけて。

engChrName: I thought I could handle it without any help since I had FIO with me.
engSearchText:
I thought I could handle it without any help since I
had FIO with me.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯもいたし、何とか一人で 対処できると思ったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯもいたし、何とか一人で
対処できると思ったんですが……

engChrName: Cheese 'n' crackers... Well, s'long as you're all right. That's all that matters.
engSearchText:
Cheese 'n' crackers... Well, s'long as you're all right.
That's all that matters.
jpnChrName: ……ったく。 まあ無事だったのは良かったが。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
まあ無事だったのは良かったが。

engChrName: It's real worrying that monsters that big're showin' up down there, though. That shouldn't be happening.
engSearchText:
It's real worrying that monsters that big're showin' up
down there, though. That shouldn't be happening.
jpnChrName: しかし、あの採掘道に そこまでの魔獣が現れるたぁな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、あの採掘道に
そこまでの魔獣が現れるたぁな。

engChrName: Course, orbment lights work to keep monsters away. Makes me wonder if them acting up is the cause...
engSearchText:
Course, orbment lights work to keep monsters away.
Makes me wonder if them acting up is the cause...
jpnChrName: 魔獣避けでもある導力灯に異常が 起きてんならあり得る話だが……
jpnSearchText:
魔獣避けでもある導力灯に異常が
起きてんならあり得る話だが……

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?

engChrName: Is something on your mind, Quatre?
engSearchText: Is something on your mind, Quatre?
jpnChrName: えと、思い当たることでも？
jpnSearchText: えと、思い当たることでも？

engChrName: Well, we saw them doing just that earlier, right? That's not the first time, either. It's been happening every so often lately.
engSearchText:
Well, we saw them doing just that earlier, right?
That's not the first time, either. It's been happening
every so often lately.
jpnChrName: その……さっきの導力灯みたいな 不可解な異常がたまに起きてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その……さっきの導力灯みたいな
不可解な異常がたまに起きてるんだ。

engChrName: They've gone out even when there was nothing wrong with the lights themselves, or they've done things they shouldn't be able to technically do.
engSearchText:
They've gone out even when there was nothing wrong
with the lights themselves, or they've done things they
shouldn't be able to technically do.
jpnChrName: 故障が確認できないのに作動しないとか、 構造上有り得ない挙動を見せたりとか……
jpnSearchText:
故障が確認できないのに作動しないとか、
構造上有り得ない挙動を見せたりとか……

engChrName: There have been times when they've been malfunctioning one minute, then totally fine the next.
engSearchText:
There have been times when they've been
malfunctioning one minute, then totally fine the next.
jpnChrName: かと思えば、知らないうちに直っている、 なんてこともあってね。
jpnSearchText:
かと思えば、知らないうちに直っている、
なんてこともあってね。

engChrName: So you went down there because it was bothering you?
engSearchText:
So you went down there because it was
bothering you?
jpnChrName: それで気になって一人で ノコノコ調べに入ったワケか。
jpnSearchText:
それで気になって一人で
ノコノコ調べに入ったワケか。

engChrName: ...That's more or less in line with what we've been hearing back at the guild.
engSearchText:
...That's more or less in line with what we've been
hearing back at the guild.
jpnChrName: ……支部で聞いた話とも重なるな。
jpnSearchText: ……支部で聞いた話とも重なるな。

engChrName: I don't think we can rule out a connection with what we're here to investigate, either.
engSearchText:
I don't think we can rule out a connection with what
we're here to investigate, either.
jpnChrName: ……わたくしたちの 調査ともやや重なってくるかと。
jpnSearchText:
……わたくしたちの
調査ともやや重なってくるかと。

engChrName: Yeah. Wish you'd told us that back when we were at Verne's HQ.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Wish you'd told us that back when we were
at Verne's HQ.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういう話は できればさっき聞きたかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういう話は
できればさっき聞きたかったぜ。

engChrName: I'm sorry. I couldn't really mention it in front of the CEO...
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. I couldn't really mention it in front of
the CEO...
jpnChrName: すみません……ＣＥＯの手前。
jpnSearchText: すみません……ＣＥＯの手前。

engChrName: Thanks for this. This is all great to know, so the guild will keep it in mind, too.
engSearchText:
Thanks for this. This is all great to know, so the guild
will keep it in mind, too.
jpnChrName: ……事情は分かりました。 こちらでも気に留めておきます。
jpnSearchText:
……事情は分かりました。
こちらでも気に留めておきます。

engChrName: If anything else happens, could you let us know right away?
engSearchText:
If anything else happens, could you let us know
right away?
jpnChrName: また何か異常が起きたら 真っ先に連絡していただけると。
jpnSearchText:
また何か異常が起きたら
真っ先に連絡していただけると。

engChrName: Can do. Thanks for coming all the way over here.
engSearchText: Can do. Thanks for coming all the way over here.
jpnChrName: おう、兄ちゃんたちも恩に着るぜ。
jpnSearchText: おう、兄ちゃんたちも恩に着るぜ。

engChrName: I know you're here due to business with the Verne Company, but you should avoid any suspicious moves while you're at it.
engSearchText:
I know you're here due to business with the Verne
Company, but you should avoid any suspicious moves
while you're at it.
jpnChrName: アンタらも、ヴェルヌ絡みらしいが あんまり怪しげな動きは慎めよ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタらも、ヴェルヌ絡みらしいが
あんまり怪しげな動きは慎めよ？

engChrName: Got it, milord. We'll be sure to follow your lead and be on our best behavior.
engSearchText:
Got it, milord. We'll be sure to follow your lead and
be on our best behavior.
jpnChrName: おお、持ちつ持たれつ、 上手い具合に棲み分けようや。
jpnSearchText:
おお、持ちつ持たれつ、
上手い具合に棲み分けようや。

engChrName: You can start with axing the snark!
engSearchText: You can start with axing the snark!
jpnChrName: だ、だから胡乱なことを するなって言ってるんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だから胡乱なことを
するなって言ってるんだ……！

engChrName: *sigh* Here we go again... Well, see you later, everyone.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Here we go again... Well, see you
later, everyone.
jpnChrName: ああもう── それじゃあ失礼するわね。
jpnSearchText:
ああもう──
それじゃあ失礼するわね。

engChrName: *sigh* Did you have to pick a fight with them when they just helped us out?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Did you have to pick a fight with them when
they just helped us out?
jpnChrName: もう……ヴァンさん。 せっかく助けてもらったのに。
jpnSearchText:
もう……ヴァンさん。
せっかく助けてもらったのに。

engChrName: It's fine. We're better off keepin' the guild at arm's length while we're here.
engSearchText:
It's fine. We're better off keepin' the guild at arm's
length while we're here.
jpnChrName: ま、ギルドとはあのくらいの 距離感が丁度いいからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ギルドとはあのくらいの
距離感が丁度いいからな。

engChrName: Well, let me just say again that I really do appreciate you coming to my rescue.
engSearchText:
Well, let me just say again that I really do appreciate
you coming to my rescue.
jpnChrName: ……改めて先ほどは 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
……改めて先ほどは
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: But was there something you needed me for when you called me earlier?
engSearchText:
But was there something you needed me for when
you called me earlier?
jpnChrName: ああ──そういえば、 僕に何か用事があったんじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ──そういえば、
僕に何か用事があったんじゃ？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Almost forgot.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. Almost forgot.
jpnChrName: おお、そういやそうだった。
jpnSearchText: おお、そういやそうだった。

engChrName: There was something we wanted to discuss with you, actually...
engSearchText:
There was something we wanted to discuss with
you, actually...
jpnChrName: その、実は相談したいことが──
jpnSearchText: その、実は相談したいことが──

engChrName: So you want to go inside the Institute of Science, do you? You're right that only Agnès has the authority to do that.
engSearchText:
So you want to go inside the Institute of Science,
do you? You're right that only Agnès has the
authority to do that.
jpnChrName: 理科大学の構内に…… 確かにアニエスさん以外は無理ですね。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学の構内に……
確かにアニエスさん以外は無理ですね。

engChrName: And I wish I could help all of you get through with her, but I can't upgrade your card. You'd need to speak to—
engSearchText:
And I wish I could help all of you get through with
her, but I can't upgrade your card. You'd need to
speak to—
jpnChrName: とはいえ、僕にその権限はありません。 相談なら──
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、僕にその権限はありません。
相談なら──

engChrName: This guy right here! Lemme see your card.
engSearchText: This guy right here! Lemme see your card.
jpnChrName: ハッ、だったら話が早えやな。 認証カードを出しな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、だったら話が早えやな。
認証カードを出しな。

engChrName: Received C-rank ID certification.
engSearchText: Received C-rank ID certification.
jpnChrName: 認証カードのセキュリティランクを 《Ｃ》に変更しました。
jpnSearchText:
認証カードのセキュリティランクを
《Ｃ》に変更しました。

engChrName: Oh! The writing on it changed!
engSearchText: Oh! The writing on it changed!
jpnChrName: あ……！ カードの文字が変わりましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
あ……！
カードの文字が変わりましたっ。

engChrName: You're C-rank just like me now...which means you can go inside the institute!
engSearchText:
You're C-rank just like me now...which means you
can go inside the institute!
jpnChrName: 私と同じ“Ｃ”ランク…… これでみんなで理科大学に行けますね。
jpnSearchText:
私と同じ“Ｃ”ランク……
これでみんなで理科大学に行けますね。

engChrName: We really owe you one. You sure it's okay to do stuff like this without runnin' it by that CEO first, though?
engSearchText:
We really owe you one. You sure it's okay to do stuff
like this without runnin' it by that CEO first, though?
jpnChrName: こりゃ助かるが──いいのかい？ あのＣＥＯに黙ってこんな事をして。
jpnSearchText:
こりゃ助かるが──いいのかい？
あのＣＥＯに黙ってこんな事をして。

engChrName: Basel's run by three groups: the Verne Company, the Institute of Science, and the Artisans' Guild.
engSearchText:
Basel's run by three groups: the Verne Company, the
Institute of Science, and the Artisans' Guild.
jpnChrName: バーゼル市は、理科大学と職人組合、 ヴェルヌの３者が共同管理しててな。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル市は、理科大学と職人組合、
ヴェルヌの３者が共同管理しててな。

engChrName: I'm the head of the third one, so I don't need anyone's approval but my own for stuff like this.
engSearchText:
I'm the head of the third one, so I don't need
anyone's approval but my own for stuff like this.
jpnChrName: 俺ァ職人組合の元締めもしてるから この程度の権限はもともと持ってる。
jpnSearchText:
俺ァ職人組合の元締めもしてるから
この程度の権限はもともと持ってる。

engChrName: 'Sides, you saved the professor's favorite youngin'.
engSearchText: 'Sides, you saved the professor's favorite youngin'.
jpnChrName: それに── “秘蔵っ子”を助けてもらったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それに──
“秘蔵っ子”を助けてもらったんだ。

engChrName: I wouldn't be fit to call myself an artisan of Basel if I didn't find some way to thank you.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be fit to call myself an artisan of Basel if I
didn't find some way to thank you.
jpnChrName: このくらいの筋は通さなきゃ バーゼル職人の名が廃るってもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
このくらいの筋は通さなきゃ
バーゼル職人の名が廃るってもんだぜ。

engChrName: Supervisor...
engSearchText: Supervisor...
jpnChrName: 親方……
jpnSearchText: 親方……

engChrName: Can't argue with that. Thanks a lot.
engSearchText: Can't argue with that. Thanks a lot.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そういうことなら 有り難く使わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そういうことなら
有り難く使わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Just outta curiosity, is C as far as you can upgrade our card?
engSearchText:
Just outta curiosity, is C as far as you can upgrade
our card?
jpnChrName: ちなみに参考までに聞きたいんだが 上げられるのは“Ｃ”までなのかい？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに参考までに聞きたいんだが
上げられるのは“Ｃ”までなのかい？

engChrName: Hahaha! You got guts on you, kid! You call yourself a 'spriggan,' right?
engSearchText:
Hahaha! You got guts on you, kid! You call yourself a
'spriggan,' right?
jpnChrName: ワッハッハ、ちゃっかりした若造だ！ 解決事務所──いや“裏解決屋（スプリガン）”だったか？
jpnSearchText:
ワッハッハ、ちゃっかりした若造だ！
解決事務所──いや“裏解決屋（スプリガン）”だったか？

engChrName: Can't say I'd peg you as the squeaky-clean type, but I've got a feelin' you can do some good work where the guild can't.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'd peg you as the squeaky-clean type, but
I've got a feelin' you can do some good work where
the guild can't.
jpnChrName: 胡散臭ぇことこの上ねぇが、なるほど、 遊撃士とは別の強みがあるのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭ぇことこの上ねぇが、なるほど、
遊撃士とは別の強みがあるのかもな。

engChrName: I can bump your card's rank up to a B if I feel like you've earned it. So keep up the good work.
engSearchText:
I can bump your card's rank up to a B if I feel like
you've earned it. So keep up the good work.
jpnChrName: ──働き次第じゃ“Ｂ”まで上げてやる。 せいぜい頑張りな。
jpnSearchText:
──働き次第じゃ“Ｂ”まで上げてやる。
せいぜい頑張りな。

engChrName: I thought he'd be more of a stubborn old mule, but he's more lax than I gave him credit for.
engSearchText:
I thought he'd be more of a stubborn old mule, but
he's more lax than I gave him credit for.
jpnChrName: ハッ、偏屈そうに見えて 話が分かるジジイじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、偏屈そうに見えて
話が分かるジジイじゃねえか。

engChrName: Aww. I think it's more he just trusts us a little.
engSearchText: Aww. I think it's more he just trusts us a little.
jpnChrName: えへへ……ちょっとは 信用してくれたみたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……ちょっとは
信用してくれたみたいですっ。

engChrName: Well, his trust in you makes me feel better about helping you, too.
engSearchText:
Well, his trust in you makes me feel better about
helping you, too.
jpnChrName: ……フフ、親方が認めたのなら 僕としても気が楽かな。
jpnSearchText:
……フフ、親方が認めたのなら
僕としても気が楽かな。

engChrName: That card's all you need to get into the institute, but how about I show you the way there?
engSearchText:
That card's all you need to get into the institute, but
how about I show you the way there?
jpnChrName: ──そのカードで構内に入れますけど 折角だから大学まで案内しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
──そのカードで構内に入れますけど
折角だから大学まで案内しますよ。

engChrName: Think of it as my way of saying thank you for saving me.
engSearchText:
Think of it as my way of saying thank you for
saving me.
jpnChrName: 先ほどのお礼も兼ねてね。
jpnSearchText: 先ほどのお礼も兼ねてね。

engChrName: Are you leaving, Quatre?
engSearchText: Are you leaving, Quatre?
jpnChrName: カトル、デカケル？
jpnSearchText: カトル、デカケル？

engChrName: I am, but you're coming with.
engSearchText: I am, but you're coming with.
jpnChrName: ああ、ＦＩＯはついてきて。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ＦＩＯはついてきて。

engChrName: Thanks for the help earlier, XEROS. Could you take care of things here while I'm gone?
engSearchText:
Thanks for the help earlier, XEROS. Could you take
care of things here while I'm gone?
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ、さっきはありがとう。 留守番をお願いできるかい？
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳ、さっきはありがとう。
留守番をお願いできるかい？

engChrName: RUFF.
engSearchText: RUFF.
jpnChrName: ＷＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＷＯＷ．

engChrName: So their names are FIO and XEROS? They're amazing...
engSearchText:
So their names are FIO and XEROS?
They're amazing...
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃんにＸＥＲＯＳ君ですか。 改めて凄いですよね……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯちゃんにＸＥＲＯＳ君ですか。
改めて凄いですよね……

engChrName: Yeah. They're like loyal animal friends straight out of a fairy tale!
engSearchText:
Yeah. They're like loyal animal friends straight out of
a fairy tale!
jpnChrName: はいっ、まるで お伽噺の従者みたいです！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、まるで
お伽噺の従者みたいです！

engChrName: The black one looks rad, in my opinion.
engSearchText: The black one looks rad, in my opinion.
jpnChrName: ハッ、銀色の丸いのはともかく 黒いのはなかなかイカしてるな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、銀色の丸いのはともかく
黒いのはなかなかイカしてるな。

engChrName: I'm glad you can appreciate their brilliance.
engSearchText: I'm glad you can appreciate their brilliance.
jpnChrName: まあ、それほどでもあるかな？
jpnSearchText: まあ、それほどでもあるかな？

engChrName: They are autonomous orbal drones based on holo AIs, if I recall? I've heard about the technology involved to create them.
engSearchText:
They are autonomous orbal drones based on holo
AIs, if I recall? I've heard about the technology
involved to create them.
jpnChrName: ホロウＡＩをベースに自律稼働する 《導力ドローン》──噂には聞いていました。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウＡＩをベースに自律稼働する
《導力ドローン》──噂には聞いていました。

engChrName: I didn't expect to see both a floating support type and a ground-based offensive type while in the field, however.
engSearchText:
I didn't expect to see both a floating support type and
a ground-based offensive type while in the
field, however.
jpnChrName: 浮遊サポート型に加え、地上強襲型まで 実用レベルだったのは驚きでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
浮遊サポート型に加え、地上強襲型まで
実用レベルだったのは驚きでしたが。

engChrName: You're...very well informed.
engSearchText: You're...very well informed.
jpnChrName: ……色々詳しいみたいですね？
jpnSearchText: ……色々詳しいみたいですね？

engChrName: My apologies for not introducing myself sooner. I am Risette Twinings, and I'm a concierge for Marduk Total Security Company.
engSearchText:
My apologies for not introducing myself sooner. I am
Risette Twinings, and I'm a concierge for Marduk
Total Security Company.
jpnChrName: 申し遅れました、マルドゥック社ＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）、 リゼット・トワイニングと申します。
jpnSearchText:
申し遅れました、マルドゥック社ＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）、
リゼット・トワイニングと申します。

engChrName: I'm currently supporting Arkride Solutions in their endeavors.
engSearchText:
I'm currently supporting Arkride Solutions in
their endeavors.
jpnChrName: 現在、解決事務所に出向中の身でして。
jpnSearchText: 現在、解決事務所に出向中の身でして。

engChrName: Well, that explains how you know so much.
engSearchText: Well, that explains how you know so much.
jpnChrName: あのマルドゥックの…… なるほど、ＳＥでもあるわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
あのマルドゥックの……
なるほど、ＳＥでもあるわけですか。

engChrName: But hold on. Didn't you say this request was from...?
engSearchText: But hold on. Didn't you say this request was from...?
jpnChrName: あれ、でも依頼は確か──
jpnSearchText: あれ、でも依頼は確か──

engChrName: I thought Marduk's sponsors were covertly at odds with the principality...
engSearchText:
I thought Marduk's sponsors were covertly at odds
with the principality...
jpnChrName: ……確かＭＫ社のスポンサーは 公国と水面下で対立してたような。
jpnSearchText:
……確かＭＫ社のスポンサーは
公国と水面下で対立してたような。

engChrName: ...so how did you end up establishing such a bizarre group like this?
engSearchText:
...so how did you end up establishing such a bizarre
group like this?
jpnChrName: 本当にどういう顔触れなんですか？
jpnSearchText: 本当にどういう顔触れなんですか？

engChrName: I ask myself the same thing every day...
engSearchText: I ask myself the same thing every day...
jpnChrName: いや、お前さんの疑念はご尤もだ。 俺も心からこいつらに言いたいね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、お前さんの疑念はご尤もだ。
俺も心からこいつらに言いたいね。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Might as well resign yourself to your fate.
engSearchText: Might as well resign yourself to your fate.
jpnChrName: クク、いい加減諦めろや。
jpnSearchText: クク、いい加減諦めろや。

engChrName: It was clearly Arusha's guidance that brought us together!
engSearchText:
It was clearly Arusha's guidance that brought
us together!
jpnChrName: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）のお導きですっ。
jpnSearchText: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）のお導きですっ。

engChrName: That and Mr. Arkride's personal magnetism.
engSearchText: That and Mr. Arkride's personal magnetism.
jpnChrName: ええ、それとひとえに ヴァン様の人徳の賜物かと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それとひとえに
ヴァン様の人徳の賜物かと。

engChrName: How am I getting bundled with the Goddess here?!
engSearchText: How am I getting bundled with the Goddess here?!
jpnChrName: 女神と俺のせいかよっ！？
jpnSearchText: 女神と俺のせいかよっ！？

engChrName: (I guess I'll just have to let it go for now...)
engSearchText: (I guess I'll just have to let it go for now...)
jpnChrName: （……まあいいか、今は。）
jpnSearchText: （……まあいいか、今は。）

engChrName: Anyway, the aerotram boarding platform is this way. You'll be able to use it now that your card's been upgraded.
engSearchText:
Anyway, the aerotram boarding platform is this way.
You'll be able to use it now that your card's
been upgraded.
jpnChrName: エアロトラム乗り場に行きましょう。 今ならカードが使えますから。
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラム乗り場に行きましょう。
今ならカードが使えますから。

engChrName: Wow! We're so high up!
engSearchText: Wow! We're so high up!
jpnChrName: わあっ、高いですねぇ……！
jpnSearchText: わあっ、高いですねぇ……！

engChrName: Heh. This is kinda nice.
engSearchText: Heh. This is kinda nice.
jpnChrName: ハン……まあ悪くねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……まあ悪くねぇな。

engChrName: It's the kinda thing you'd only find here. Professor Hamilton designed this, right?
engSearchText:
It's the kinda thing you'd only find here.
Professor Hamilton designed this, right?
jpnChrName: ま、この街ならではだしな。 設計はハミルトン博士だったか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、この街ならではだしな。
設計はハミルトン博士だったか？

engChrName: Oh! I'm impressed you knew!
engSearchText: Oh! I'm impressed you knew!
jpnChrName: ！　よくご存じですね。
jpnSearchText: ！　よくご存じですね。

engChrName: Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……？
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……？

engChrName: Not at all. It's just that while I've heard about everything here...
engSearchText:
Not at all. It's just that while I've heard about
everything here...
jpnChrName: ……ああ、いえ。 話だけは聞いていたもので。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、いえ。
話だけは聞いていたもので。

engChrName: ...seeing the whole world with your own eyes for the first time is without doubt an unparalleled experience.
engSearchText:
...seeing the whole world with your own eyes for the
first time is without doubt an unparalleled experience.
jpnChrName: 本当に……自分の目で見ると やはり格別なものがありますね。
jpnSearchText:
本当に……自分の目で見ると
やはり格別なものがありますね。

engChrName: ...? I know what you mean. I feel the same way after diving into the world of a good book for the first time.
engSearchText:
...? I know what you mean. I feel the same way
after diving into the world of a good book for
the first time.
jpnChrName: ？　……ふふっ、そうですね。 私も本が好きなので気持ちは分かります。
jpnSearchText:
？　……ふふっ、そうですね。
私も本が好きなので気持ちは分かります。

engChrName: Well, we'll be going back to our hotel now.
