engSearchText: Well, we'll be going back to our hotel now.
jpnChrName: それでは、今日はもう ホテルの方に戻りますね。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、今日はもう
ホテルの方に戻りますね。

engChrName: Sure thing. Try not to stay up too late just 'cause no one's keepin' an eye on you.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. Try not to stay up too late just 'cause no
one's keepin' an eye on you.
jpnChrName: おう、学生だけだからって 遅くまで夜更かしするなよ。
jpnSearchText:
おう、学生だけだからって
遅くまで夜更かしするなよ。

engChrName: That telescope was AMAZING though, wasn't it? I wish we could've had another look through it before we left!
engSearchText:
That telescope was AMAZING though, wasn't it?
I wish we could've had another look through it before
we left!
jpnChrName: でもあの望遠鏡は凄かったね～。 帰る前にもう一度見てみたいかも。
jpnSearchText:
でもあの望遠鏡は凄かったね～。
帰る前にもう一度見てみたいかも。

engChrName: How about you come and walk around with us some on the last day, Feri? We'd love to have you!
engSearchText:
How about you come and walk around with us some
on the last day, Feri? We'd love to have you!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんも良かったら最終日とか お姉さんたちと一緒に回ろうよ～。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんも良かったら最終日とか
お姉さんたちと一緒に回ろうよ～。

engChrName: Really? Your work sounds amazing, so I'd like that a lot!
engSearchText:
Really? Your work sounds amazing, so I'd like that
a lot!
jpnChrName: えへへ……そちらの活動も ちょっと面白そうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……そちらの活動も
ちょっと面白そうですけど。

engChrName: I'll just leave playtime to the kids, then.
engSearchText: I'll just leave playtime to the kids, then.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、ガキ同士、 存分に遊んでくりゃあいいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、ガキ同士、
存分に遊んでくりゃあいいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: I'm more in the market for a place catered to adults. Hell, you wanna join in on the fun, four-eyes?
engSearchText:
I'm more in the market for a place catered to adults.
Hell, you wanna join in on the fun, four-eyes?
jpnChrName: 俺は大人な店にでも──何なら そっちの眼鏡も連れてってやるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
俺は大人な店にでも──何なら
そっちの眼鏡も連れてってやるぜ？

engChrName: *gulp* I-I would never want to go to such a place!
engSearchText: *gulp* I-I would never want to go to such a place!
jpnChrName: お、大人な店…… って行くわけないでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
お、大人な店……
って行くわけないでしょう！？

engChrName: Haha! That sounds like it'd be kinda fun in its own way.
engSearchText:
Haha! That sounds like it'd be kinda fun in its
own way.
jpnChrName: あはは、いいな～、そっちも楽しそうで。
jpnSearchText: あはは、いいな～、そっちも楽しそうで。

engChrName: It was nice to finally meet the famous Risette, too. Maybe we could talk some more another... Hmm?
engSearchText:
It was nice to finally meet the famous Risette, too.
Maybe we could talk some more another... Hmm?
jpnChrName: 噂のリゼットさんにも会えたし 次はもっとおしゃべりも──ってアレ？
jpnSearchText:
噂のリゼットさんにも会えたし
次はもっとおしゃべりも──ってアレ？

engChrName: Oh, yes. I would like that very much indeed.
engSearchText: Oh, yes. I would like that very much indeed.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 最終日にもし余裕があれば、是非。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
最終日にもし余裕があれば、是非。

engChrName: Yay! Then it's happening!
engSearchText: Yay! Then it's happening!
jpnChrName: やった～、約束ですよ！
jpnSearchText: やった～、約束ですよ！

engChrName: (...Did you notice?)
engSearchText: (...Did you notice?)
jpnChrName: （……気づいてるわね？）
jpnSearchText: （……気づいてるわね？）

engChrName: (Yeah. You manage to learn anything on your end?)
engSearchText: (Yeah. You manage to learn anything on your end?)
jpnChrName: （ああ……   ──で、そっちはどうだった？）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……
──で、そっちはどうだった？）

engChrName: (I'm afraid not. We heard something interesting from that genius professor, but that's about it.)
engSearchText:
(I'm afraid not. We heard something interesting from
that genius professor, but that's about it.)
jpnChrName: （ま、天才教授から面白そうな話は聞けたけど、   まだ全然かしら。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、天才教授から面白そうな話は聞けたけど、
まだ全然かしら。）

engChrName: (I'm not going to have much free time here, however, so I'm going to have to leave it to that nose of yours this time. ♪)
engSearchText:
(I'm not going to have much free time here, however,
so I'm going to have to leave it to that nose of yours
this time. ♪)
jpnChrName: （こっちはそこまで時間が取れないし、   今回は貴方の嗅覚に期待してるわ♪）
jpnSearchText:
（こっちはそこまで時間が取れないし、
今回は貴方の嗅覚に期待してるわ♪）

engChrName: (Dumpin' all the work on me, huh? Great.)
engSearchText: (Dumpin' all the work on me, huh? Great.)
jpnChrName: （丸投げかよ……ったく。）
jpnSearchText: （丸投げかよ……ったく。）

engChrName: Ah, here's the tram. Then we bid you all farewell.
engSearchText: Ah, here's the tram. Then we bid you all farewell.
jpnChrName: 来たわね。 それじゃあごきげんよう。
jpnSearchText:
来たわね。
それじゃあごきげんよう。

engChrName: I should be able to meet you tomorrow morning at around eight o'clock.
engSearchText:
I should be able to meet you tomorrow morning at
around eight o'clock.
jpnChrName: 明日の朝ですが、８時には そちらに合流できると思います。
jpnSearchText:
明日の朝ですが、８時には
そちらに合流できると思います。

engChrName: I know it's a little early for good nights, but I hope you all have one regardless.
engSearchText:
I know it's a little early for good nights, but I hope you
all have one regardless.
jpnChrName: 少し早いですがお休みなさい。
jpnSearchText: 少し早いですがお休みなさい。

engChrName: Same to you. See ya tomorrow.
engSearchText: Same to you. See ya tomorrow.
jpnChrName: おう、また明日な。
jpnSearchText: おう、また明日な。

engChrName: Sleep tight!
engSearchText: Sleep tight!
jpnChrName: ゆっくり休んでくださいねっ。
jpnSearchText: ゆっくり休んでくださいねっ。

engChrName: So what's eating away at you, phony maid?
engSearchText: So what's eating away at you, phony maid?
jpnChrName: ──で、エセメイド。 さっきから何が引っかかってんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──で、エセメイド。
さっきから何が引っかかってんだ？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnSearchText: っ……

engChrName: Hmm? Is something up?
engSearchText: Hmm? Is something up?
jpnChrName: ？　えと、何かあるんですか？
jpnSearchText: ？　えと、何かあるんですか？

engChrName: (...Can't hide a thing from him.)
engSearchText: (...Can't hide a thing from him.)
jpnChrName: （……そりゃ、コイツなら気づくか。）
jpnSearchText: （……そりゃ、コイツなら気づくか。）

engChrName: ...Haha. I should have realized I wouldn't be able to keep my concerns a secret.
engSearchText:
...Haha. I should have realized I wouldn't be able to
keep my concerns a secret.
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ。 やはり隠し事はできませんね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふっ。
やはり隠し事はできませんね。

engChrName: To tell you the truth, I'm getting a peculiar sense of déjà vu from what's happening here in Basel.
engSearchText:
To tell you the truth, I'm getting a peculiar sense of
déjà vu from what's happening here in Basel.
jpnChrName: 実は今回のこの状況── どこか心当たりがありまして。
jpnSearchText:
実は今回のこの状況──
どこか心当たりがありまして。

engChrName: Déjà vu?
engSearchText: Déjà vu?
jpnChrName: 心当たり、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 心当たり、ですか……

engChrName: Your main job's being a concierge, but you also handle crisis management all over the country, right?
engSearchText:
Your main job's being a concierge, but you also
handle crisis management all over the country, right?
jpnChrName: ……お前さんはＳＣをやりながら 各地の危機管理をしてるんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……お前さんはＳＣをやりながら
各地の危機管理をしてるんだったな。

engChrName: So which does this orbal net and distribution network issue make you think of more:
engSearchText:
So which does this orbal net and distribution network
issue make you think of more:
jpnChrName: 導力供給網と導力ネットの異常──
jpnSearchText: 導力供給網と導力ネットの異常──

engChrName: Liberl six years ago, or Crossbell four years ago?
engSearchText: Liberl six years ago, or Crossbell four years ago?
jpnChrName: ６年前のリベールか、 ４年前のクロスベルのどっちだ？
jpnSearchText:
６年前のリベールか、
４年前のクロスベルのどっちだ？

engChrName: ...You're proving perceptive and knowledgeable beyond belief.
engSearchText:
...You're proving perceptive and knowledgeable
beyond belief.
jpnChrName: ………流石はヴァン様。
jpnSearchText: ………流石はヴァン様。

engChrName: Hmm? I'm sure I've heard both of those things before, but...
engSearchText:
Hmm? I'm sure I've heard both of those things
before, but...
jpnChrName: えっと……どちらも 聞いたことがあるような。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……どちらも
聞いたことがあるような。

engChrName: Yeah, I think Cao's mentioned them at some point, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I think Cao's mentioned them at some
point, too.
jpnChrName: 前にツァオあたりから チラ聞きしたことはあるが……
jpnSearchText:
前にツァオあたりから
チラ聞きしたことはあるが……

engChrName: The former was when all orbal power was shut off by the appearance of an ancient floating city.
engSearchText:
The former was when all orbal power was shut off by
the appearance of an ancient floating city.
jpnChrName: 前者は古代都市が出現したことで 起きた『導力の一斉停止現象』──
jpnSearchText:
前者は古代都市が出現したことで
起きた『導力の一斉停止現象』──

engChrName: The latter was when the orbal network was used to perform a manmade miracle.
engSearchText:
The latter was when the orbal network was used to
perform a manmade miracle.
jpnChrName: 後者は導力ネットを利用した 『人工の奇蹟』にかかわる事件だ。
jpnSearchText:
後者は導力ネットを利用した
『人工の奇蹟』にかかわる事件だ。

engChrName: I never witnessed 'em firsthand, so there's a lot of gaps in what I know...
engSearchText:
I never witnessed 'em firsthand, so there's a lot of
gaps in what I know...
jpnChrName: 直接居合わせたわけじゃないから 俺も詳しい事までは知らねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
直接居合わせたわけじゃないから
俺も詳しい事までは知らねぇが……

engChrName: ...but both were caused by things you wouldn't think could exist.
engSearchText:
...but both were caused by things you wouldn't think
could exist.
jpnChrName: どちらも“あり得ない存在”によって 引き起こされたのは確からしい。
jpnSearchText:
どちらも“あり得ない存在”によって
引き起こされたのは確からしい。

engChrName: Man, I'd think you'd made both events up if I didn't know better.
engSearchText:
Man, I'd think you'd made both events up if I didn't
know better.
jpnChrName: どんな与太話だよ──と言いたい所だが。
jpnSearchText: どんな与太話だよ──と言いたい所だが。

engChrName: I know what happened a year and a half ago in Crossbell, and that's just as batshit crazy on paper.
engSearchText:
I know what happened a year and a half ago in
Crossbell, and that's just as batshit crazy on paper.
jpnChrName: １年半前の“再事変”は聞いてるし、 それこそあり得ねえ話でもねぇのか。
jpnSearchText:
１年半前の“再事変”は聞いてるし、
それこそあり得ねえ話でもねぇのか。

engChrName: Oh, when the whole continent was...hacked, or whatever the word is?
engSearchText:
Oh, when the whole continent was...hacked, or
whatever the word is?
jpnChrName: あ……大陸中に “はっきんぐ”をしたっていう？
jpnSearchText:
あ……大陸中に
“はっきんぐ”をしたっていう？

engChrName: I'm afraid I can't answer most of your questions because they would contain classified information.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid I can't answer most of your questions
because they would contain classified information.
jpnChrName: ……本社の機密情報にあたるため、 詳細は差し控えさせてください。
jpnSearchText:
……本社の機密情報にあたるため、
詳細は差し控えさせてください。

engChrName: However, I believe this may end with a crisis different from the ones that Mr. Arkride mentioned.
engSearchText:
However, I believe this may end with a crisis different
from the ones that Mr. Arkride mentioned.
jpnChrName: ですが、その２件とはまた違った意味で、 “想定外の危機”に繋がるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、その２件とはまた違った意味で、
“想定外の危機”に繋がるかもしれません。

engChrName: Huh...
engSearchText: Huh...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Well, Miss Perfect's Genesis started glowing again. There's bound to be something.
engSearchText:
Well, Miss Perfect's Genesis started glowing again.
There's bound to be something.
jpnChrName: ハン……小娘のゲネシスも 光ってたっつー話だからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……小娘のゲネシスも
光ってたっつー話だからな。

engChrName: No way this ends without giving us a headache.
engSearchText: No way this ends without giving us a headache.
jpnChrName: 何も起きてねえ筈はねぇか。
jpnSearchText: 何も起きてねえ筈はねぇか。

engChrName: Yeah. We're gonna need to be ready for trouble.
engSearchText: Yeah. We're gonna need to be ready for trouble.
jpnChrName: ああ、腹を括る必要はあんだろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、腹を括る必要はあんだろう。

engChrName: You gotta head out somewhere now, right? I'll come with you if you want.
engSearchText:
You gotta head out somewhere now, right? I'll come
with you if you want.
jpnChrName: ──これから出かけるんだろ？ 良かったら付き合うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──これから出かけるんだろ？
良かったら付き合うぜ。

engChrName: Again, you are perceptive beyond belief.
engSearchText: Again, you are perceptive beyond belief.
jpnChrName: ……本当にお見通しですね。
jpnSearchText: ……本当にお見通しですね。

engChrName: We might've only met in person recently, but I've known you for a real long time now.
engSearchText:
We might've only met in person recently, but I've
known you for a real long time now.
jpnChrName: 通信越しだったが、お前さんとも それなりに長い付き合いだからな。
jpnSearchText:
通信越しだったが、お前さんとも
それなりに長い付き合いだからな。

engChrName: Whenever you stumble on a major problem brewin', you gotta report it to HQ, right?
engSearchText:
Whenever you stumble on a major problem brewin',
you gotta report it to HQ, right?
jpnChrName: 重大な危機管理案件に遭遇したら 本社に報告する義務が発生するんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
重大な危機管理案件に遭遇したら
本社に報告する義務が発生するんだろ？

engChrName: Correct. What is happening here certainly falls under Code E of our regulations—but I see no harm in having someone with me during my report.
engSearchText:
Correct. What is happening here certainly falls under
Code E of our regulations—but I see no harm in
having someone with me during my report.
jpnChrName: ええ、本件は《コードＥ》に抵触── ですが同行者の制限はありません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、本件は《コードＥ》に抵触──
ですが同行者の制限はありません。

engChrName: We could also patrol the area at the same time. Does that sound all right?
engSearchText:
We could also patrol the area at the same time.
Does that sound all right?
jpnChrName: 巡回ついでにご一緒していただいても？
jpnSearchText: 巡回ついでにご一緒していただいても？

engChrName: More than all right. Let's get goin'.
engSearchText: More than all right. Let's get goin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっそく行くか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、さっそく行くか。

engChrName: W-Wait!
engSearchText: W-Wait!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってくださいっ……！
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってくださいっ……！

engChrName: It's not just you two here, y'know. Don't even think of leaving us out.
engSearchText:
It's not just you two here, y'know. Don't even think
of leaving us out.
jpnChrName: コラ、二人で分かって 勝手に決めてんじゃねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
コラ、二人で分かって
勝手に決めてんじゃねぇぞ。

engChrName: I don't mind takin' one of you, but the other's gonna have to stay behind.
engSearchText:
I don't mind takin' one of you, but the other's gonna
have to stay behind.
jpnChrName: あー、ついてくるのはいいが 一人は残ってもらうぜ？
jpnSearchText:
あー、ついてくるのはいいが
一人は残ってもらうぜ？

engChrName: Someone'll need to be available if Agnès or that boy we met decide to call.
engSearchText:
Someone'll need to be available if Agnès or that boy
we met decide to call.
jpnChrName: アニエスや、あの少年からも 連絡があるかもしれないしな。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスや、あの少年からも
連絡があるかもしれないしな。

engChrName: Right. That makes sense...
engSearchText: Right. That makes sense...
jpnChrName: それは……確かにそうですね。
jpnSearchText: それは……確かにそうですね。

engChrName: Fine. Then c'mon: who are you taking?
engSearchText: Fine. Then c'mon: who are you taking?
jpnChrName: チッ…… だったらとっとと選べや。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
だったらとっとと選べや。

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Van and Risette. They can be swapped out later using the computer in the hotel room.
engSearchText:
Select one additional member to accompany Van
and Risette. They can be swapped out later using the
computer in the hotel room.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。 ※宿の部屋に置いてある端末から、いつでも変更可能です。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
※宿の部屋に置いてある端末から、いつでも変更可能です。

engChrName: So where do you have to go to give your report?
engSearchText: So where do you have to go to give your report?
jpnChrName: それで、どちらに 報告に向かうんですか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、どちらに
報告に向かうんですか？

engChrName: Your company's headquarters isn't even in Calvard, is it?
engSearchText:
Your company's headquarters isn't even in Calvard,
is it?
jpnChrName: リゼットさんの本社って 外国なんですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさんの本社って
外国なんですよね……？

engChrName: So where do we have to go to even give this report?
engSearchText: So where do we have to go to even give this report?
jpnChrName: で、報告つっても わざわざどこに行くんだ？
jpnSearchText:
で、報告つっても
わざわざどこに行くんだ？

engChrName: Your company HQ's so far away, I would've thought you'd just call them.
engSearchText:
Your company HQ's so far away, I would've thought
you'd just call them.
jpnChrName: そもそも長距離通信で 送りゃあいいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも長距離通信で
送りゃあいいじゃねえか。

engChrName: There's a bit of a process involved for security reasons. For starters, we need to leave the city toward the canyon.
engSearchText:
There's a bit of a process involved for security reasons.
For starters, we need to leave the city toward
the canyon.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ちょっとした手順がありまして、 一度峡谷道方面に出ようかと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ちょっとした手順がありまして、
一度峡谷道方面に出ようかと。

engChrName: This needn't take priority over any other work you would like to do, however.
engSearchText:
This needn't take priority over any other work you
would like to do, however.
jpnChrName: ああ、もちろん他に用事があれば 優先していただいて構いませんので。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もちろん他に用事があれば
優先していただいて構いませんので。

engChrName: (I see now...)
engSearchText: (I see now...)
jpnChrName: （なるほどな……）
jpnSearchText: （なるほどな……）

engChrName: Got it. We'll head over once we've walked around a little, then.
engSearchText:
Got it. We'll head over once we've walked around a
little, then.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──軽く回ってから 向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ──軽く回ってから
向かうとするか。

engChrName: Wow...
engSearchText: Wow...
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: ...I see now.
engSearchText: ...I see now.
jpnChrName: ………なるほどな………
jpnSearchText: ………なるほどな………

engChrName: Analyze this device for us, Quatre.
engSearchText: Analyze this device for us, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル、この装置を分析してみろ。
jpnSearchText: カトル、この装置を分析してみろ。

engChrName: Can I touch it?
engSearchText: Can I touch it?
jpnChrName: 触っても？
jpnSearchText: 触っても？

engChrName: Yes, of course.
engSearchText: Yes, of course.
jpnChrName: はい、構いません。
jpnSearchText: はい、構いません。

engChrName: Judging by the way it's aged, I wouldn't even say it's anywhere close to being a century old—so definitely not an artifact.
engSearchText:
Judging by the way it's aged, I wouldn't even say it's
anywhere close to being a century old—so definitely
not an artifact.
jpnChrName: この経年劣化の具合…… せいぜい数十年、古代遺物じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
この経年劣化の具合……
せいぜい数十年、古代遺物じゃない。

engChrName: All these buttons and indicators make the front look obtuse at first, but it's all organized and looks to serve a clear purpose.
engSearchText:
All these buttons and indicators make the front look
obtuse at first, but it's all organized and looks to serve
a clear purpose.
jpnChrName: 複雑だけど意味のあるボタン配置に 各種インジケーターの数値……
jpnSearchText:
複雑だけど意味のあるボタン配置に
各種インジケーターの数値……

engChrName: From my perspective, it resembles more the original generation of orbments back when they were based off of clocks.
engSearchText:
From my perspective, it resembles more the original
generation of orbments back when they were based
off of clocks.
jpnChrName: ……導力技術黎明期の 時計技術を応用した品に似ている？
jpnSearchText:
……導力技術黎明期の
時計技術を応用した品に似ている？

engChrName: It's significantly more complex than any of those, however. This here is the work of a genius.
engSearchText:
It's significantly more complex than any of
those, however. This here is the work of a genius.
jpnChrName: でもそれらよりはるかに複雑で、 間違いなく“天才”が手掛けた品──
jpnSearchText:
でもそれらよりはるかに複雑で、
間違いなく“天才”が手掛けた品──

engChrName: W-Wait... Could this have been made by...?
engSearchText: W-Wait... Could this have been made by...?
jpnChrName: ま、まさか…… ──この装置の制作者は……！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか……
──この装置の制作者は……！？

engChrName: A commendable effort.
engSearchText: A commendable effort.
jpnChrName: 博士の代わりに及第点はやろう。
jpnSearchText: 博士の代わりに及第点はやろう。

engChrName: It is one of the experimental devices that my own master was involved in developing, leading to the establishment of orbment technology.
engSearchText:
It is one of the experimental devices that my own
master was involved in developing, leading to the
establishment of orbment technology.
jpnChrName: 我が師も関わったという、 導力技術の確立を導いた実験装置。
jpnSearchText:
我が師も関わったという、
導力技術の確立を導いた実験装置。

engChrName: One of the eight orbment prototypes developed by Professor C. Epstein.
engSearchText:
One of the eight orbment prototypes developed by
Professor C. Epstein.
jpnChrName: かのＣ・エプスタインが手掛けた ８つのプロトタイプ・オーブメント──
jpnSearchText:
かのＣ・エプスタインが手掛けた
８つのプロトタイプ・オーブメント──

engChrName: They are called the Eight Geneses.
engSearchText: They are called the Eight Geneses.
jpnChrName: 《オクト＝ゲネシス》の一つだろう。
jpnSearchText: 《オクト＝ゲネシス》の一つだろう。

engChrName: I was not aware they were still in existence.
engSearchText: I was not aware they were still in existence.
jpnChrName: ──今も現存しているなど ついぞ聞いたことがなかったがな。
jpnSearchText:
──今も現存しているなど
ついぞ聞いたことがなかったがな。

engChrName: I can't believe I'm touching an orbment designed by Professor Epstein...
engSearchText:
I can't believe I'm touching an orbment designed by
Professor Epstein...
jpnChrName: ……まさかエプスタイン博士の 手がけた導力器に触れられるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……まさかエプスタイン博士の
手がけた導力器に触れられるなんて……

engChrName: How did you come to have something like this, Agnès?
engSearchText:
How did you come to have something like
this, Agnès?
jpnChrName: ……アニエスさん、 どうして貴女がこれを……？
jpnSearchText:
……アニエスさん、
どうして貴女がこれを……？

engChrName: Sorry, but we're gonna have to stay tight-lipped on that one—even if you are connected to one of the three disciples.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but we're gonna have to stay tight-lipped on
that one—even if you are connected to one of the
three disciples.
jpnChrName: おっと、悪いがそこまでにしてもらおう。 たとえアンタらが“三高弟”繋がりでもな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、悪いがそこまでにしてもらおう。
たとえアンタらが“三高弟”繋がりでもな。

engChrName: Like we said before showing it to you, we're countin' on you guys to keep their existence a secret.
engSearchText:
Like we said before showing it to you, we're countin'
on you guys to keep their existence a secret.
jpnChrName: 見せる前に言った通り、存在自体も ここにいるメンツ以外は他言無用で頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
見せる前に言った通り、存在自体も
ここにいるメンツ以外は他言無用で頼むぜ。

engChrName: I will be true to my word.
engSearchText: I will be true to my word.
jpnChrName: ああ、約束は守ろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、約束は守ろう。

engChrName: And it does help me understand what you're doing here in Basel now.
engSearchText:
And it does help me understand what you're doing
here in Basel now.
jpnChrName: だがなるほど──君たちが バーゼルに来た理由は何となく分かった。
jpnSearchText:
だがなるほど──君たちが
バーゼルに来た理由は何となく分かった。

engChrName: Now, it's time I compensated you for what you have shown us.
engSearchText:
Now, it's time I compensated you for what you have
shown us.
jpnChrName: それでは対価の支払いといこう。
jpnSearchText: それでは対価の支払いといこう。

engChrName: You wanted to know about Professor Callaghan's research, correct?
engSearchText:
You wanted to know about Professor Callaghan's
research, correct?
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の 研究内容についてだったな。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の
研究内容についてだったな。

engChrName: Yeah. We've heard he was the one who developed the weaponry that's being used by Calvard at the moment.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We've heard he was the one who developed the
weaponry that's being used by Calvard at
the moment.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの先生は共和国軍の 現世代兵器の開発者って話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの先生は共和国軍の
現世代兵器の開発者って話だったな。

engChrName: So whatever he's trying to develop right now has to do with military tech, too?
engSearchText:
So whatever he's trying to develop right now has to
do with military tech, too?
jpnChrName: やっぱり軍事技術方面なのか？
jpnSearchText: やっぱり軍事技術方面なのか？

engChrName: You are indeed correct regarding what he achieved, but he is a researcher of engineering science first and foremost.
engSearchText:
You are indeed correct regarding what he achieved,
but he is a researcher of engineering science first
and foremost.
jpnChrName: 専攻はあくまで物理工学だがな。
jpnSearchText: 専攻はあくまで物理工学だがな。

engChrName: In a sense, he is currently grappling with one of that field's most difficult challenges:
engSearchText:
In a sense, he is currently grappling with one of that
field's most difficult challenges:
jpnChrName: ある意味、今回彼がやっているのは そちらの難題に挑戦するようなものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味、今回彼がやっているのは
そちらの難題に挑戦するようなものだ。

engChrName: The realization of a certain thought experiment...and the use of the physical phenomena involved as weapons.
engSearchText:
The realization of a certain thought experiment...and
the use of the physical phenomena involved
as weapons.
jpnChrName: “とある思考実験”における物理現象を 兵器として利用するというな。
jpnSearchText:
“とある思考実験”における物理現象を
兵器として利用するというな。

engChrName: What's a thought experiment?
engSearchText: What's a thought experiment?
jpnChrName: しこうじっけん……？
jpnSearchText: しこうじっけん……？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: (It couldn't be...)
engSearchText: (It couldn't be...)

engChrName: Ah, yes. It doesn't surprise me in the least that someone from Marduk would have heard of that to which I am referring.
engSearchText:
Ah, yes. It doesn't surprise me in the least that
someone from Marduk would have heard of that to
which I am referring.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックの人間ならば 一応、聞いたことくらいはあるか。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックの人間ならば
一応、聞いたことくらいはあるか。

engChrName: Of course, the existence of such weapons is purely theoretical. It is impossible to create them using modern technology.
engSearchText:
Of course, the existence of such weapons is
purely theoretical. It is impossible to create them
using modern technology.
jpnChrName: 無論、あくまで空想上の産物── 最新技術であっても実現不可能な兵器だ。
jpnSearchText:
無論、あくまで空想上の産物──
最新技術であっても実現不可能な兵器だ。

engChrName: Not without a discovery so groundbreaking that it fundamentally upends what is possible.
engSearchText:
Not without a discovery so groundbreaking that it
fundamentally upends what is possible.
jpnChrName: ──それこそ何らかの “ブレイクスルー”でもない限りは。
jpnSearchText:
──それこそ何らかの
“ブレイクスルー”でもない限りは。

engChrName: Well, then, I have said all I intend to. Now I must return to work.
engSearchText:
Well, then, I have said all I intend to. Now I must
return to work.
jpnChrName: 話せるのはここまでだ── 私はそろそろ戻らせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
話せるのはここまでだ──
私はそろそろ戻らせてもらう。

engChrName: Hey!
engSearchText: Hey!
jpnChrName: ってオイ……！？
jpnSearchText: ってオイ……！？

engChrName: I'm not following any of this...
engSearchText: I'm not following any of this...
jpnChrName: よく分からないんですが……
jpnSearchText: よく分からないんですが……

engChrName: I don't believe in discussing the research of others at length publicly until it has been published.
engSearchText:
I don't believe in discussing the research of others at
length publicly until it has been published.
jpnChrName: 発表前の他人の研究内容を みだりに触れ回る趣味はないのでね。
jpnSearchText:
発表前の他人の研究内容を
みだりに触れ回る趣味はないのでね。

engChrName: I've given you all of the information that the antique you showed me justifies.
engSearchText:
I've given you all of the information that the antique
you showed me justifies.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの“骨董品”の対価として 十分なヒントは与えたつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどの“骨董品”の対価として
十分なヒントは与えたつもりだ。

engChrName: Quatre will enlighten you on the rest, I'm sure.
engSearchText: Quatre will enlighten you on the rest, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: あとはそこの弟弟子が辿り着くだろう。
jpnSearchText: あとはそこの弟弟子が辿り着くだろう。

engChrName: So that's where he draws the line as a researcher, huh?
engSearchText: So that's where he draws the line as a researcher, huh?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、研究者としての 一線は譲らないってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、研究者としての
一線は譲らないってワケか。

engChrName: This is very like him.
engSearchText: This is very like him.
jpnChrName: ……ヤン兄らしいです。
jpnSearchText: ……ヤン兄らしいです。

engChrName: So are you able to pick up where he left off?
engSearchText: So are you able to pick up where he left off?
jpnChrName: カトル君…… それで、先ほどの話は……？
jpnSearchText:
カトル君……
それで、先ほどの話は……？

engChrName: Yeah. What's this thought experiment he was talking about?
engSearchText:
Yeah. What's this thought experiment he was
talking about?
jpnChrName: “思考実験”つったか── どんな内容なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
“思考実験”つったか──
どんな内容なんだ？

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...

engChrName: I remember hearing about this from Professors Callaghan and Hamilton a long time ago.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing about this from Professors
Callaghan and Hamilton a long time ago.
jpnChrName: ……博士とキャラハン先生が 以前、話していたことがあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……博士とキャラハン先生が
以前、話していたことがあるんだ。

engChrName: About a theoretical form of tech in which the smallest units of matter would create a fusion reaction, producing a massive amount of energy.
engSearchText:
About a theoretical form of tech in which the smallest
units of matter would create a fusion reaction,
producing a massive amount of energy.
jpnChrName: 物質の最小単位の反応融合を利用して 莫大なエネルギーとして取り出す技術。
jpnSearchText:
物質の最小単位の反応融合を利用して
莫大なエネルギーとして取り出す技術。

engChrName: Such diabolical weapons cannot be created—but if they could, the consequences could be unthinkable.
engSearchText:
Such diabolical weapons cannot be created—but if
they could, the consequences could be unthinkable.
jpnChrName: 絶対に実現できない── いや、してはいけない悪魔の仮想兵器。
jpnSearchText:
絶対に実現できない──
いや、してはいけない悪魔の仮想兵器。

engChrName: They are often referred to as nuclear weapons.
engSearchText: They are often referred to as nuclear weapons.
jpnChrName: 《反応兵器（リアクターウエポン）》。 ……そんな風に呼ばれていたよ。
jpnSearchText:
《反応兵器（リアクターウエポン）》。
……そんな風に呼ばれていたよ。

engChrName: What an ominous idea...
engSearchText: What an ominous idea...
jpnChrName: ……反応、兵器………
jpnSearchText: ……反応、兵器………

engChrName: I could barely understand your explanation, but just hearing it sent a chill down my spine.
engSearchText:
I could barely understand your explanation, but just
hearing it sent a chill down my spine.
jpnChrName: なんでしょう…… 理解が追いついてはくれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
なんでしょう……
理解が追いついてはくれませんが。

engChrName: Yeah, you can say that again.
engSearchText: Yeah, you can say that again.
jpnChrName: クク……怖気がするような ヤバさを感じさせるじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
クク……怖気がするような
ヤバさを感じさせるじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Their existence is purely theoretical. No one has ever come close to creating such a thing.
engSearchText:
Their existence is purely theoretical. No one has ever
come close to creating such a thing.
jpnChrName: ……あくまで思考実験、 理論上の存在でしかないはずです。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまで思考実験、
理論上の存在でしかないはずです。

engChrName: The predictive simulations that Marduk has run rate their probability of being realized anytime soon as extremely low.
engSearchText:
The predictive simulations that Marduk has run rate
their probability of being realized anytime soon as
extremely low.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の予測シミュレーションでも 現時点での実現可能性は極小レベル──
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の予測シミュレーションでも
現時点での実現可能性は極小レベル──

engChrName: Parallel-distributed computing alone isn't going to be enough to get over the insurmountable hurdles that stand in its way.
engSearchText:
Parallel-distributed computing alone isn't going to be
enough to get over the insurmountable hurdles that
stand in its way.
jpnChrName: たとえ“並列分散処理”を利用しても 越えられないブレイクスルーでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
たとえ“並列分散処理”を利用しても
越えられないブレイクスルーでしょう。

engChrName: Agreed. Even if whatever was at work behind the scenes in Crossbell a year and a half ago was the one involved.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Even if whatever was at work behind the
scenes in Crossbell a year and a half ago was the
one involved.
jpnChrName: ええ、僕もそう思います…… たとえ一年半前の再事変の黒幕でも。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、僕もそう思います……
たとえ一年半前の再事変の黒幕でも。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan would know all of this, too, so if he really is still trying...
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan would know all of this, too, so if
he really is still trying...
jpnChrName: それでもキャラハン先生が その不可能に挑んでいたとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
それでもキャラハン先生が
その不可能に挑んでいたとしたら……

engChrName: That makes it even harder to guess where he could be.
engSearchText:
That makes it even harder to guess where he
could be.
jpnChrName: ああ、ますます所在不明のままには しておけなくなってきたな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ますます所在不明のままには
しておけなくなってきたな。

engChrName: But we still have to find him! Whatever it takes!
engSearchText: But we still have to find him! Whatever it takes!
jpnChrName: はい──何としても見つけないと！
jpnSearchText: はい──何としても見つけないと！

engChrName: The aerotrams are all at a stop. We'll have to take the road instead.
engSearchText:
The aerotrams are all at a stop. We'll have to take the
road instead.
jpnChrName: エアロトラムは止まってるな。 車道は何とか使えそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムは止まってるな。
車道は何とか使えそうだが。

engChrName: Then let's get to it!
engSearchText: Then let's get to it!
jpnChrName: だったらとっとと渡っちまうぞ！
jpnSearchText: だったらとっとと渡っちまうぞ！

engChrName: We'll have to keep a close eye out as we go. There might still be people who need our help!
engSearchText:
We'll have to keep a close eye out as we go.
There might still be people who need our help!
jpnChrName: 逃げ遅れた人もいるかもしれませんし 気を配りながら行きましょう！
jpnSearchText:
逃げ遅れた人もいるかもしれませんし
気を配りながら行きましょう！

engChrName: This is cinnamon coffee, huh? Kinda has a different fragrance to it, but it's not bad.
engSearchText:
This is cinnamon coffee, huh? Kinda has a different
fragrance to it, but it's not bad.
jpnChrName: へぇ、桂皮珈琲（シナモンコーヒー）ってヤツか。 独特の香りだが悪くねえな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、桂皮珈琲（シナモンコーヒー）ってヤツか。
独特の香りだが悪くねえな。

engChrName: The professor's a big fan of it, so I've had it a lot. I've heard it's pretty popular over in the Central East.
engSearchText:
The professor's a big fan of it, so I've had it a lot.
I've heard it's pretty popular over in the Central East.
jpnChrName: 博士が好きで、僕もよく飲んでいてね。 中東じゃ結構馴染みの味なんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
博士が好きで、僕もよく飲んでいてね。
中東じゃ結構馴染みの味なんだっけ？

engChrName: Yeah! I drank it a lot back at home. Always with milk, though.
engSearchText:
Yeah! I drank it a lot back at home. Always with
milk, though.
jpnChrName: はい、故郷でもよく飲んでました。 ミルク入りですけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、故郷でもよく飲んでました。
ミルク入りですけど……

engChrName: I could see myself getting addicted to this fragrance.
engSearchText: I could see myself getting addicted to this fragrance.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、クセになる香りですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、クセになる香りですね。

engChrName: It pairs perfectly with the chocolate, too! We've got ourselves a little slice of heaven here. ♪
engSearchText:
It pairs perfectly with the chocolate, too! We've got
ourselves a little slice of heaven here. ♪
jpnChrName: ああ、コイツがまた チョコレートにも合うんだ♪
jpnSearchText:
ああ、コイツがまた
チョコレートにも合うんだ♪

engChrName: Will someone put a sock in this guy already?
engSearchText: Will someone put a sock in this guy already?
jpnChrName: 躊躇ねぇなコイツ……
jpnSearchText: 躊躇ねぇなコイツ……

engChrName: You're a big fan of sweet things, huh? You seemed to like the engadin, too.
engSearchText:
You're a big fan of sweet things, huh? You seemed to
like the engadin, too.
jpnChrName: 甘い物好きなんだっけ？ エンガディーナもそうだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
甘い物好きなんだっけ？
エンガディーナもそうだったけど。

engChrName: He can't help himself, I'm afraid.
engSearchText: He can't help himself, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: あはは……まあ、 大目に見てください。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……まあ、
大目に見てください。

engChrName: It feels so strange to have this place be so lively again. I've been the only one here for so long now.
engSearchText:
It feels so strange to have this place be so lively again.
I've been the only one here for so long now.
jpnChrName: ……なんだか不思議な気分かな。 いつも一人だった家が賑やかなのは。
jpnSearchText:
……なんだか不思議な気分かな。
いつも一人だった家が賑やかなのは。

engChrName: Yang and Essy are so busy with their work that they can only afford to drop by every once in a blue moon these days.
engSearchText:
Yang and Essy are so busy with their work that they
can only afford to drop by every once in a blue moon
these days.
jpnChrName: ヤン兄やエレ姉も忙しくて たまに訪ねてくるくらいだったから。
jpnSearchText:
ヤン兄やエレ姉も忙しくて
たまに訪ねてくるくらいだったから。

engChrName: That's too bad...
engSearchText: That's too bad...
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: So you were still really young when you were adopted by the professor?
engSearchText:
So you were still really young when you were adopted
by the professor?
jpnChrName: ……小さい頃に 博士に引き取られたんだってな？
jpnSearchText:
……小さい頃に
博士に引き取られたんだってな？

engChrName: That's right—though I'd rather skip how it came about.
engSearchText:
That's right—though I'd rather skip how it
came about.
jpnChrName: うん……その、とある事情で。
jpnSearchText: うん……その、とある事情で。

engChrName: Even though we're not related by blood, she's treated me like a real grandchild.
engSearchText:
Even though we're not related by blood, she's treated
me like a real grandchild.
jpnChrName: 血も繋がっていない僕にも 本当の孫みたいに接してくれて……
jpnSearchText:
血も繋がっていない僕にも
本当の孫みたいに接してくれて……

engChrName: As soon as I started taking an interest in technology and absorbing anything I could, she would always find time in her busy schedule to teach me.
engSearchText:
As soon as I started taking an interest in technology
and absorbing anything I could, she would always
find time in her busy schedule to teach me.
jpnChrName: 学問や技術に興味を持つようになると 忙しい中、自ら指南もしてくれてさ。
jpnSearchText:
学問や技術に興味を持つようになると
忙しい中、自ら指南もしてくれてさ。

engChrName: After that, I started visiting the observatory a lot because that was where she did her research.
engSearchText:
After that, I started visiting the observatory a lot
because that was where she did her research.
jpnChrName: その頃から、博士の研究室でもある 天文台に通い詰めるようになって……
jpnSearchText:
その頃から、博士の研究室でもある
天文台に通い詰めるようになって……

engChrName: My interest in astronomy then led to Yang and Essy teaching me all kinds of things along with her.
engSearchText:
My interest in astronomy then led to Yang and Essy
teaching me all kinds of things along with her.
jpnChrName: 天体観測を通じて、ヤン兄や エレ姉からも色んなことを教わって……
jpnSearchText:
天体観測を通じて、ヤン兄や
エレ姉からも色んなことを教わって……

engChrName: I was a complete nobody...and yet they chose to make me part of their family.
engSearchText:
I was a complete nobody...and yet they chose to make
me part of their family.
jpnChrName: 何者でもなかった僕を、 “家族”の一員にしてくれたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何者でもなかった僕を、
“家族”の一員にしてくれたんだ。

engChrName: They seem like absolutely lovely people.
engSearchText: They seem like absolutely lovely people.
jpnChrName: ……素敵な人たちですね。
jpnSearchText: ……素敵な人たちですね。

engChrName: I can see why you're so desperate to protect everything they left behind in their absence.
engSearchText:
I can see why you're so desperate to protect
everything they left behind in their absence.
jpnChrName: はい、カトルさんが留守を 守りたくなるのも分かります。
jpnSearchText:
はい、カトルさんが留守を
守りたくなるのも分かります。

engChrName: ...But I've failed. The Aurora was destroyed, Risette suffered just to keep me safe...
engSearchText:
...But I've failed. The Aurora was destroyed, Risette
suffered just to keep me safe...
jpnChrName: ……でも、結果的にアウローラは壊されて リゼットさんにもあんな目に遭わせて……
jpnSearchText:
……でも、結果的にアウローラは壊されて
リゼットさんにもあんな目に遭わせて……

engChrName: I don't know how I'm going to be able to face the professor when she comes home.
engSearchText:
I don't know how I'm going to be able to face the
professor when she comes home.
jpnChrName: ……どう博士に顔向けしたら………
jpnSearchText: ……どう博士に顔向けしたら………

engChrName: Like Risette said, there's a lot of people around who love you.
engSearchText:
Like Risette said, there's a lot of people around who
love you.
jpnChrName: まあ、リゼットの言ってた通り、 お前には大切な人間が大勢いるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、リゼットの言ってた通り、
お前には大切な人間が大勢いるだろう。

engChrName: This might be a good time to learn to lean on them a little more.
engSearchText:
This might be a good time to learn to lean on them a
little more.
jpnChrName: この機にもうちょっと周りを 頼ることを覚えてもいいとは思うがな。
jpnSearchText:
この機にもうちょっと周りを
頼ることを覚えてもいいとは思うがな。

engChrName: You are not alone, Quatre.
engSearchText: You are not alone, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル、一人ジャナイ。
jpnSearchText: カトル、一人ジャナイ。

engChrName: RUFF.
engSearchText: RUFF.
jpnChrName: ＷＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＷＯＷ．

engChrName: Yeah... I'm coming to realize that, too.
engSearchText: Yeah... I'm coming to realize that, too.
jpnChrName: ……うん、 それは本当に痛感してるよ。
jpnSearchText:
……うん、
それは本当に痛感してるよ。

engChrName: I thought I'd learned that lesson when we all came together to finish FIO and XEROS, but apparently I was a few steps away.
engSearchText:
I thought I'd learned that lesson when we all came
together to finish FIO and XEROS, but apparently I
was a few steps away.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳを完成させた時に 学んだはずだったんだけどな……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳを完成させた時に
学んだはずだったんだけどな……

engChrName: I could never have done that on my own. It took Gran's help, Yang and Essy's help...
engSearchText:
I could never have done that on my own. It took
Gran's help, Yang and Essy's help...
jpnChrName: グランマ（おばあちゃん）はもちろん、 ヤン兄やエレ姉、ジスカール親方……
jpnSearchText:
グランマ（おばあちゃん）はもちろん、
ヤン兄やエレ姉、ジスカール親方……

engChrName: Even Professor Callaghan played a pivotal role in getting the job done.
engSearchText:
Even Professor Callaghan played a pivotal role in
getting the job done.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生の手も借りなければ きっと完成させられなかっただろうから。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生の手も借りなければ
きっと完成させられなかっただろうから。

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan helped make your orbal drones?
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan helped make your orbal drones?
jpnChrName: あのキャラハン教授も 導力ドローンの製作に協力を……？
jpnSearchText:
あのキャラハン教授も
導力ドローンの製作に協力を……？

engChrName: I remember hearing that he used to stop by here despite being Hamilton's rival, but it's still hard to imagine.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing that he used to stop by here
despite being Hamilton's rival, but it's still hard
to imagine.
jpnChrName: ハン、ライバルだがたまに 天文台に顔を出してたらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ライバルだがたまに
天文台に顔を出してたらしいが。

engChrName: You all only know him as he is now, but like I said yesterday, he wasn't always like that.
engSearchText:
You all only know him as he is now, but like I said
yesterday, he wasn't always like that.
jpnChrName: ……昨日も言ったけど、 昔はあんな風じゃなかったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……昨日も言ったけど、
昔はあんな風じゃなかったんだ。

engChrName: He was the leading figure in the field of engineering science. He even designed a whole lot of the current Republican Army's weaponry.
engSearchText:
He was the leading figure in the field of
engineering science. He even designed a whole lot of
the current Republican Army's weaponry.
jpnChrName: 物理工学の第一人者にして 共和国軍の現世代兵器の設計者……
jpnSearchText:
物理工学の第一人者にして
共和国軍の現世代兵器の設計者……

engChrName: He used to be something of a rival to Professor Hamilton and us, but both sides fully respected one another and took it as a way for all of us to grow.
engSearchText:
He used to be something of a rival to Professor
Hamilton and us, but both sides fully respected one
another and took it as a way for all of us to grow.
jpnChrName: かつては一門のライバルとして 尊敬し合い、高め合えていた存在で……
jpnSearchText:
かつては一門のライバルとして
尊敬し合い、高め合えていた存在で……

engChrName: It was because Professor Callaghan and Professor Hamilton joined forces that they were able to create the Aurora, too—
engSearchText:
It was because Professor Callaghan and Professor
Hamilton joined forces that they were able to create
the Aurora, too—
jpnChrName: あの《アウローラ》にしたって、 博士と彼が手を取り合ったからこそ──
jpnSearchText:
あの《アウローラ》にしたって、
博士と彼が手を取り合ったからこそ──

engChrName: Actually...
engSearchText: Actually...
jpnChrName: ……もしかして……
jpnSearchText: ……もしかして……

engChrName: Wh-What is it?
engSearchText: Wh-What is it?
jpnChrName: カ、カトル君？
jpnSearchText: カ、カトル君？

engChrName: Why did he run off?
engSearchText: Why did he run off?
jpnChrName: どうしたんですか……？
jpnSearchText: どうしたんですか……？

engChrName: I found it!
engSearchText: I found it!

engChrName: Hmm? That looks a lot like the Aurora.
engSearchText: Hmm? That looks a lot like the Aurora.
jpnChrName: あれ、その写真は──
jpnSearchText: あれ、その写真は──

engChrName: Yeah. Not exactly the same, but pretty damn close.
engSearchText: Yeah. Not exactly the same, but pretty damn close.
jpnChrName: 少し違う気もするが…… 昨日破壊された中央端末か？
jpnSearchText:
少し違う気もするが……
昨日破壊された中央端末か？

engChrName: It is. It's part of another idea that was considered during the planning stages for the Aurora.
engSearchText:
It is. It's part of another idea that was considered
during the planning stages for the Aurora.
jpnChrName: いや……《アウローラ》には設計段階で 断念された別の構想があったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……《アウローラ》には設計段階で
断念された別の構想があったんだ。

engChrName: It was to be one half of a twin-core system that was modeled after the left and right sides of the human brain.
engSearchText:
It was to be one half of a twin-core system that was
modeled after the left and right sides of the
human brain.
jpnChrName: 人間の右脳と左脳をモデルとした “ツインコアターミナル”構想──
jpnSearchText:
人間の右脳と左脳をモデルとした
“ツインコアターミナル”構想──

engChrName: The two systems would perform totally different calculations in tandem with one another, much like our brains do.
engSearchText:
The two systems would perform totally different
calculations in tandem with one another, much like
our brains do.
jpnChrName: 方向性の違う演算をさせ、連動させることで 人の思考に近い処理を実現するという……
jpnSearchText:
方向性の違う演算をさせ、連動させることで
人の思考に近い処理を実現するという……

engChrName: In the end, budgetary constraints meant that only the Aurora was completed, but a prototype version of the other system was made!
engSearchText:
In the end, budgetary constraints meant that only the
Aurora was completed, but a prototype version of the
other system was made!
jpnChrName: 予算の都合で見送りにはなったけど 対になる試作器が存在していたはず……！
jpnSearchText:
予算の都合で見送りにはなったけど
対になる試作器が存在していたはず……！

engChrName: So then...
engSearchText: So then...
jpnChrName: ！　そいつは……
jpnSearchText: ！　そいつは……

engChrName: Then there's effectively a prototype of the central computer from yesterday out there somewhere?
engSearchText:
Then there's effectively a prototype of the central
computer from yesterday out there somewhere?
jpnChrName: あの中央端末のプロトタイプ版が 何処かにあるということですか……！
jpnSearchText:
あの中央端末のプロトタイプ版が
何処かにあるということですか……！

engChrName: ...I did think it was weird that they'd destroy the Aurora, considerin' their endgame.
engSearchText:
...I did think it was weird that they'd destroy the
Aurora, considerin' their endgame.
jpnChrName: ……ヤツらの目的を考えると、中央端末を 破壊しちまったのは違和感って話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
……ヤツらの目的を考えると、中央端末を
破壊しちまったのは違和感って話だったな。

engChrName: But if Professor Callaghan was one of the developers behind the whole project, it'd make sense if he gave 'em that prototype, too.
engSearchText:
But if Professor Callaghan was one of the developers
behind the whole project, it'd make sense if he gave
'em that prototype, too.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授が製作者の一人となると 試作器を確保してた可能性はゼロじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授が製作者の一人となると
試作器を確保してた可能性はゼロじゃねぇ。

engChrName: If we assume that is the case, that'll significantly help in narrowing down where it could be now!
engSearchText:
If we assume that is the case, that'll significantly help
in narrowing down where it could be now!
jpnChrName: うん、その仮定を元に“条件”を 当てはめれば候補地が判明するかも！
jpnSearchText:
うん、その仮定を元に“条件”を
当てはめれば候補地が判明するかも！

engChrName: Could you give me a hand finding the other documents we have on it here?
engSearchText:
Could you give me a hand finding the other
documents we have on it here?
jpnChrName: みんな、今から言う資料を 手分けして探してもらえないかな！？
jpnSearchText:
みんな、今から言う資料を
手分けして探してもらえないかな！？

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はいっ、モチロンですっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、モチロンですっ！

engChrName: Just tell us what you want us to do!
engSearchText: Just tell us what you want us to do!
jpnChrName: 指示してください、カトル君……！
jpnSearchText: 指示してください、カトル君……！

engChrName: I GUESS I can put the work in.
engSearchText: I GUESS I can put the work in.
jpnChrName: ハン、メンドくせーがしゃあねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、メンドくせーがしゃあねぇ。

engChrName: But if you can't pinpoint where the thing is after we find all the stuff you want, we're gonna force you to run butt-naked through Basel.
engSearchText:
But if you can't pinpoint where the thing is after we
find all the stuff you want, we're gonna force you to
run butt-naked through Basel.
jpnChrName: 突き止められなかったらマッパで ストリーキングでもしてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
突き止められなかったらマッパで
ストリーキングでもしてもらおうか？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
jpnChrName: はいはい、いくらでもどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: はいはい、いくらでもどうぞ。

engChrName: Agnès, I need you to find a map of the septium veins in this area—
engSearchText:
Agnès, I need you to find a map of the septium veins
in this area—
jpnChrName: それじゃあアニエスさんは このあたりの七耀脈の分布図を──
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあアニエスさんは
このあたりの七耀脈の分布図を──

engChrName: Tch. He sure picked himself up fast.
engSearchText: Tch. He sure picked himself up fast.
jpnChrName: チッ…… すっかり調子を取り戻しやがって。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
すっかり調子を取り戻しやがって。

engChrName: He's a hell of a lot more grown up than you are, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
He's a hell of a lot more grown up than you are, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: クク、お前より よっぽど大人じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、お前より
よっぽど大人じゃねえか。

engChrName: Oort Abandoned Factory. I think that's our place.
engSearchText: Oort Abandoned Factory. I think that's our place.
jpnChrName: 《オールト廃工場》。 ──多分、ここだ。
jpnSearchText:
《オールト廃工場》。
──多分、ここだ。

engChrName: That's the place where a lot of the research leadin' to the last generation of gunships was done, right?
engSearchText:
That's the place where a lot of the research leadin' to
the last generation of gunships was done, right?
jpnChrName: 旧世代のガンシップの研究開発が 行われてたっつう場所か。
jpnSearchText:
旧世代のガンシップの研究開発が
行われてたっつう場所か。

engChrName: The area was sealed off a while ago because it was so worn down, but you really think we're gonna find our target there?
engSearchText:
The area was sealed off a while ago because it was so
worn down, but you really think we're gonna find our
target there?
jpnChrName: 老朽化で閉鎖されたそうだが…… “可能性”はどのくらいある？
jpnSearchText:
老朽化で閉鎖されたそうだが……
“可能性”はどのくらいある？

engChrName: I'd say the odds are about 87%—no, 90%.
engSearchText: I'd say the odds are about 87%—no, 90%.

engChrName: I tried taking the waveforms of the distortions in the orbal and energy supply networks, then combining them with that map of the septium veins.
engSearchText:
I tried taking the waveforms of the distortions in the
orbal and energy supply networks, then combining
them with that map of the septium veins.
jpnChrName: ネット網と供給網の揺らぎの波形…… 七耀脈の分布と照らし合わせた。
jpnSearchText:
ネット網と供給網の揺らぎの波形……
七耀脈の分布と照らし合わせた。

engChrName: The only place that matches that data, is big and quiet enough to hide a device of the Aurora's size...
engSearchText:
The only place that matches that data, is big and
quiet enough to hide a device of the Aurora's size...
jpnChrName: 加えてアウローラ並みの端末を隠しつつ 導力ネットにもギリギリ干渉できる座標……
jpnSearchText:
加えてアウローラ並みの端末を隠しつつ
導力ネットにもギリギリ干渉できる座標……

engChrName: ...and is still close enough to Basel to interfere with the orbal network. Nowhere else is as good a match as this.
engSearchText:
...and is still close enough to Basel to interfere with
the orbal network. Nowhere else is as good a match
as this.
jpnChrName: バーゼル近郊の他のどんな場所と比較しても ここしか考えられないと思う。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル近郊の他のどんな場所と比較しても
ここしか考えられないと思う。

engChrName: That's some confidence.
engSearchText: That's some confidence.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言い切りやがったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言い切りやがったな。

engChrName: But I don't think it's misplaced. This area matches everything we know so far!
engSearchText:
But I don't think it's misplaced. This area matches
everything we know so far!
jpnChrName: ですが入手したどんな情報とも 矛盾していないのは確かです……！
jpnSearchText:
ですが入手したどんな情報とも
矛盾していないのは確かです……！

engChrName: An abandoned factory far from civilization seems like the perfect place for Almata to use as a hideout.
engSearchText:
An abandoned factory far from civilization seems like
the perfect place for Almata to use as a hideout.
jpnChrName: 人里離れた廃工場……アルマータの 潜伏場所（ハイドアウト）としても相応しいかと。
jpnSearchText:
人里離れた廃工場……アルマータの
潜伏場所（ハイドアウト）としても相応しいかと。

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing?
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing?
jpnChrName: わわっ……？
jpnSearchText: わわっ……？

engChrName: Congratulatin' you on a job well done.
engSearchText: Congratulatin' you on a job well done.
jpnChrName: やるじゃねえか、少年。
jpnSearchText: やるじゃねえか、少年。

engChrName: I'm sure even that genius professor would be impressed by your efforts here.
engSearchText:
I'm sure even that genius professor would be
impressed by your efforts here.
jpnChrName: これならあの天才教授も 合格点をくれるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
これならあの天才教授も
合格点をくれるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Haha... I wouldn't be so sure about that.
engSearchText: Haha... I wouldn't be so sure about that.
jpnChrName: ……はは、どうかな。
jpnSearchText: ……はは、どうかな。

engChrName: It's just a guess right now. We won't know for sure until we make our way over there.
engSearchText:
It's just a guess right now. We won't know for sure
until we make our way over there.
jpnChrName: あくまで“仮説”── 後は足を運んで検証してみないと。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで“仮説”──
後は足を運んで検証してみないと。

engChrName: Well, we've come this far. Time to finish this leg of the race.
engSearchText:
Well, we've come this far. Time to finish this leg of
the race.
jpnChrName: ま、ここまで来りゃあ 後は突っ込んでみるだけだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここまで来りゃあ
後は突っ込んでみるだけだろ。

engChrName: I agree! It's 2PM already, so we don't have much time.
engSearchText:
I agree! It's 2PM already, so we don't have
much time.
jpnChrName: はい、午後２時…… あまり時間もありません！
jpnSearchText:
はい、午後２時……
あまり時間もありません！

engChrName: I think we should let Renne, the guild, and the CID know what we're doing.
engSearchText:
I think we should let Renne, the guild, and the CID
know what we're doing.
jpnChrName: ギルドやＣＩＤ、先輩たちにも 一応連絡した方がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドやＣＩＤ、先輩たちにも
一応連絡した方がよさそうですね。

engChrName: The abandoned road leading to the factory is on the bottom level of New Town—on the other side of a locked gate.
engSearchText:
The abandoned road leading to the factory is on the
bottom level of New Town—on the other side of a
locked gate.
jpnChrName: オールト廃道は新市街の最下層、 封鎖されたゲートの向こうにある。
jpnSearchText:
オールト廃道は新市街の最下層、
封鎖されたゲートの向こうにある。

engChrName: My certification card will get us through it. I'm ready to leave as soon as you all are.
engSearchText:
My certification card will get us through it. I'm ready
to leave as soon as you all are.
jpnChrName: 僕のカードなら通れるはずだから いつでも行けるよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕のカードなら通れるはずだから
いつでも行けるよ。

engChrName: Got it. We'll head on over as soon as we're ready, then.
engSearchText:
Got it. We'll head on over as soon as we're
ready, then.
jpnChrName: 分かった──そんじゃあ 諸々準備できたら早速向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった──そんじゃあ
諸々準備できたら早速向かうぞ。

engChrName: They informed Renne, the guild, and the CID that they were going to make their way to Oort Abandoned Road.
engSearchText:
They informed Renne, the guild, and the CID that
they were going to make their way to Oort
Abandoned Road.
jpnChrName: ギルドにＣＩＤ、レンたちに オールト廃道へ向かうことを連絡した。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドにＣＩＤ、レンたちに
オールト廃道へ向かうことを連絡した。

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Van! Surprised to see you taking a business trip this time of year.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Van! Surprised to see you taking a
business trip this time of year.
jpnChrName: おや、お久しぶりですねヴァンさん。 この時期の出張とは珍しい。
jpnSearchText:
おや、お久しぶりですねヴァンさん。
この時期の出張とは珍しい。

engChrName: Yeah. Client came in with a big job, so we're out here takin' care of that.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Client came in with a big job, so we're out here
takin' care of that.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょっと大口の仕事が入ってな……
jpnSearchText: ああ、ちょっと大口の仕事が入ってな……

engChrName: Looks like you're movin' on up in the world, too. Last I saw, you were a part-timer still in school, and now you're the receptionist?
engSearchText:
Looks like you're movin' on up in the world, too.
Last I saw, you were a part-timer still in school, and
now you're the receptionist?
jpnChrName: お前さんも、とうとう正式な受付になったか。 前来た時はまだ手伝いの学生だったな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも、とうとう正式な受付になったか。
前来た時はまだ手伝いの学生だったな。

engChrName: Yup, yup. They hired me here fresh out of college.
engSearchText: Yup, yup. They hired me here fresh out of college.
jpnChrName: ええ、卒業したらいつの間にか ここに収まってしまっていて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、卒業したらいつの間にか
ここに収まってしまっていて……

engChrName: He another acquaintance of yours? You've got friends in all sorts of places.
engSearchText:
He another acquaintance of yours? You've got friends
in all sorts of places.
jpnChrName: なんだなんだ、また知り合いか？ アンタはどこにでもコネがあんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだなんだ、また知り合いか？
アンタはどこにでもコネがあんのかよ。

engChrName: Oh, we're just in the same field. We worked together on a job a while back.
engSearchText:
Oh, we're just in the same field. We worked together
on a job a while back.
jpnChrName: はは、僕らはそこまで深い付き合いではないですよ。 以前、お仕事で協力したことがあっただけで。
jpnSearchText:
はは、僕らはそこまで深い付き合いではないですよ。
以前、お仕事で協力したことがあっただけで。

engChrName: Zin was actually telling me about you the other day! He said that we should be fine contracting you for help if we need to.
engSearchText:
Zin was actually telling me about you the other day!
He said that we should be fine contracting you for
help if we need to.
jpnChrName: それより、ジンさんから聞きましたよ。 必要なら下請けとして依頼を回してもいいと。
jpnSearchText:
それより、ジンさんから聞きましたよ。
必要なら下請けとして依頼を回してもいいと。

engChrName: I heard the same from a friend of mine outside the guild.
engSearchText:
I heard the same from a friend of mine outside
the guild.
jpnChrName: それと、“とある方面”からも 同じことを言われましたか──
jpnSearchText:
それと、“とある方面”からも
同じことを言われましたか──

engChrName: If something serious goes down, there's no shame in us working together.
engSearchText:
If something serious goes down, there's no shame in
us working together.
jpnChrName: 有事の際には協力した方がいいってね。
jpnSearchText: 有事の際には協力した方がいいってね。

engChrName: Oh? Who?
engSearchText: Oh? Who?
jpnChrName: とある方面……？
jpnSearchText: とある方面……？

engChrName: (René or Kilika, I'm guessin'...)
engSearchText: (René or Kilika, I'm guessin'...)
jpnChrName: （大方ルネかあの“室長”あたりだろうが……）
jpnSearchText: （大方ルネかあの“室長”あたりだろうが……）

engChrName: I swear, I can't walk five arge without people draggin' me into their business. I ain't a bracer, y'know?
engSearchText:
I swear, I can't walk five arge without people draggin'
me into their business. I ain't a bracer, y'know?
jpnChrName: ったく、そんな根回しまで…… 俺は出張遊撃士じゃねぇっての。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、そんな根回しまで……
俺は出張遊撃士じゃねぇっての。

engChrName: Oh, speaking of which...
engSearchText: Oh, speaking of which...
jpnChrName: そう言えば……
jpnSearchText: そう言えば……

engChrName: Y-You're...!
engSearchText: Y-You're...!
jpnChrName: お、お前たちは……！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>お、お前たちは……！？

engChrName: Alvis! Regina!
engSearchText: Alvis! Regina!
jpnChrName: アルヴィスさんとレジーナさん……！
jpnSearchText: アルヴィスさんとレジーナさん……！

engChrName: Haha. Speak of the devils.
engSearchText: Haha. Speak of the devils.
jpnChrName: はは、噂をすれば。
jpnSearchText: はは、噂をすれば。

engChrName: These two bracers work in Edith, correct?
engSearchText: These two bracers work in Edith, correct?
jpnChrName: 首都総支部の遊撃士のお二方ですね。
jpnSearchText: 首都総支部の遊撃士のお二方ですね。

engChrName: Hey there. I didn't think I'd run into you guys here.
engSearchText: Hey there. I didn't think I'd run into you guys here.
jpnChrName: どうも…… まさかこんな所で会うなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
どうも……
まさかこんな所で会うなんてね。

engChrName: Oh, man. Don't tell me we all got shipped out here on behalf of the same guy?
engSearchText:
Oh, man. Don't tell me we all got shipped out here
on behalf of the same guy?
jpnChrName: ハン、まさか俺らと同じ筋からの 依頼じゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、まさか俺らと同じ筋からの
依頼じゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: *sigh* Obviously not. I have no idea why you're even here, but we're here on official orders from the guild, not an individual client.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Obviously not. I have no idea why you're even
here, but we're here on official orders from the guild,
not an individual client.
jpnChrName: ふう、お前たちが何の用事で来てるかは 知らないがこっちは正式な地方出張だ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、お前たちが何の用事で来てるかは
知らないがこっちは正式な地方出張だ。

engChrName: And wherever you guys go, trouble seems to follow... I think it's making me superstitious, not gonna lie.
engSearchText:
And wherever you guys go, trouble seems to follow...
I think it's making me superstitious, not gonna lie.
jpnChrName: 毎回厄介事の真ん中にいるお前たちが 来ているというだけで頭が痛いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
毎回厄介事の真ん中にいるお前たちが
来ているというだけで頭が痛いんだが……

engChrName: Hopefully that's not the case here.
engSearchText: Hopefully that's not the case here.
jpnChrName: まさか今回も何かあるんじゃないだろうな？
jpnSearchText: まさか今回も何かあるんじゃないだろうな？

engChrName: Man, I don't enjoy it any more than you do. Stop framin' it like I'm the one at fault.
engSearchText:
Man, I don't enjoy it any more than you do.
Stop framin' it like I'm the one at fault.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、ひどい言われ様だぜ。 人を疫病神かなにかみたいに。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、ひどい言われ様だぜ。
人を疫病神かなにかみたいに。

engChrName: I'm just doin' my job and puttin' food on the table.
engSearchText: I'm just doin' my job and puttin' food on the table.
jpnChrName: こっちは食い扶持のために 必死に働いてるだけってのに。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは食い扶持のために
必死に働いてるだけってのに。

engChrName: Surely a C-rank bracer's got better things to worry about than some spriggan, so stop lettin' me live rent free in your head, yeah?
engSearchText:
Surely a C-rank bracer's got better things to worry
about than some spriggan, so stop lettin' me live rent
free in your head, yeah?
jpnChrName: Ｃ級の遊撃士だろ？　高位ランク目前なんだから 小物ごとき大目に見てくれや。
jpnSearchText:
Ｃ級の遊撃士だろ？　高位ランク目前なんだから
小物ごとき大目に見てくれや。

engChrName: ...Smartass. I swear, this is why I can't stand you. You're always just...
engSearchText:
...Smartass. I swear, this is why I can't stand you.
You're always just...
jpnChrName: くっ、また減らず口を……！ これだから裏解決屋は……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、また減らず口を……！
これだから裏解決屋は……

engChrName: Bah, forget it! Just don't get up in our business, got it?!
engSearchText:
Bah, forget it! Just don't get up in our business,
got it?!
jpnChrName: ええい、もういい！ くれぐれも問題を起こすんじゃないぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、もういい！
くれぐれも問題を起こすんじゃないぞ！

engChrName: E-Erm, I know he's a bit abrasive with you, but I do think he respects your abilities.
engSearchText:
E-Erm, I know he's a bit abrasive with you, but I do
think he respects your abilities.
jpnChrName: その、ああは言ってるけど 貴方たちの実力自体は認めてると思うから。
jpnSearchText:
その、ああは言ってるけど
貴方たちの実力自体は認めてると思うから。

engChrName: If you come across anything, just let us know—you're doing work for the guild anyway, so we might as well share intel.
engSearchText:
If you come across anything, just let us know—you're
doing work for the guild anyway, so we might as well
share intel.
jpnChrName: 何かあった時は連絡して頂戴。 下請けもやってもらってることだしね。
jpnSearchText:
何かあった時は連絡して頂戴。
下請けもやってもらってることだしね。

engChrName: Funny way for him to show 'respect,' but well, you do you, bracer boy.
engSearchText:
Funny way for him to show 'respect,' but well, you do
you, bracer boy.
jpnChrName: ハッ……認めてるねぇ。 そうは見えねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……認めてるねぇ。
そうは見えねえが。

engChrName: I'm not too worried about him. If we need the guild to lend a hand, we'll ask for it. For now, we got our own business to focus on.
engSearchText:
I'm not too worried about him. If we need the guild
to lend a hand, we'll ask for it. For now, we got our
own business to focus on.
jpnChrName: ま、必要ならせいぜい力を貸してもらうだけだろ。 そろそろ行くとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、必要ならせいぜい力を貸してもらうだけだろ。
そろそろ行くとしようぜ。

engChrName: This must be the aerotram station. I can't believe it goes all the way up in the sky...!
engSearchText:
This must be the aerotram station. I can't believe
it goes all the way up in the sky...!
jpnChrName: これが《エアロトラム》ですね？ 本当に空から行くなんて……
jpnSearchText:
これが《エアロトラム》ですね？
本当に空から行くなんて……

engChrName: That's right. This'll take us to New Town in no time.
engSearchText: That's right. This'll take us to New Town in no time.
jpnChrName: はい、これに乗れば 新市街まですぐです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、これに乗れば
新市街まですぐです。

engChrName: All you need to do is hold your certification card over the ticket gate.
engSearchText:
All you need to do is hold your certification card over
the ticket gate.
jpnChrName: あそこの改札に認証カードをかざせば……
jpnSearchText: あそこの改札に認証カードをかざせば……

engChrName: Oh. Guess we're not takin' this one after all.
engSearchText: Oh. Guess we're not takin' this one after all.
jpnChrName: あー、生憎俺らには乗れねえみてえでな。
jpnSearchText: あー、生憎俺らには乗れねえみてえでな。

engChrName: Our D-rank card isn't accepted on this aerotram, apparently. We need a C-rank card or higher.
engSearchText:
Our D-rank card isn't accepted on this
aerotram, apparently. We need a C-rank card
or higher.
jpnChrName: 私たちの認証カードはランクＤ、 エアロトラムの利用は出来ないようです。
jpnSearchText:
私たちの認証カードはランクＤ、
エアロトラムの利用は出来ないようです。

engChrName: Are you sure? I could've sworn we had a C...
engSearchText: Are you sure? I could've sworn we had a C...
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか？ 視察研修生はランクＣだったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですか？
視察研修生はランクＣだったんですが……

engChrName: Way to roll out the welcome mat when we're here for Elsaim. Would it kill them to throw one of their biggest stakeholders a bone?
engSearchText:
Way to roll out the welcome mat when we're here
for Elsaim. Would it kill them to throw one of their
biggest stakeholders a bone?
jpnChrName: ハッ、大株主のエルザイムからの依頼だろーに とりあえずの面目が立てばって感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、大株主のエルザイムからの依頼だろーに
とりあえずの面目が立てばって感じだったな。

engChrName: I was really looking forward to it, too...
engSearchText: I was really looking forward to it, too...
jpnChrName: 結構楽しみにしていたんですけど、 エアロトラム……
jpnSearchText:
結構楽しみにしていたんですけど、
エアロトラム……

engChrName: Well, no use cryin' over spilled milk.
engSearchText: Well, no use cryin' over spilled milk.
jpnChrName: ないものねだりしても仕方ねえだろう。
jpnSearchText: ないものねだりしても仕方ねえだろう。

engChrName: You can head on up if you want, Agnès. We'll just take the long way.
engSearchText:
You can head on up if you want, Agnès. We'll just
take the long way.
jpnChrName: アニエスは先に向かっててもいいぜ？ 俺らは歩きになりそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスは先に向かっててもいいぜ？
俺らは歩きになりそうだが。

engChrName: No, it's all right. I'd rather stick together.
engSearchText: No, it's all right. I'd rather stick together.
jpnChrName: いえ、私も一緒に歩いて行きます。
jpnSearchText: いえ、私も一緒に歩いて行きます。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll get to ride the tram another day, Feri. Don't let it get you down!
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll get to ride the tram another day, Feri.
Don't let it get you down!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんも落ち込まないでください。 きっとまた機会はありますから。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんも落ち込まないでください。
きっとまた機会はありますから。

engChrName: You're right, yeah.
engSearchText: You're right, yeah.
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですよねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうですよねっ。

engChrName: Well, this was where we saw Willy last night...
engSearchText: Well, this was where we saw Willy last night...
jpnChrName: さて、昨晩見かけたのはここのはずだったが……
jpnSearchText: さて、昨晩見かけたのはここのはずだったが……

engChrName: ...but sure enough, he's long gone.
engSearchText: ...but sure enough, he's long gone.
jpnChrName: まあ、さすがに同じ場所にはいねぇか。
jpnSearchText: まあ、さすがに同じ場所にはいねぇか。

engChrName: Nadir said that Willy was here until late last night, but there's no trace of him left.
engSearchText:
Nadir said that Willy was here until late last night,
but there's no trace of him left.
jpnChrName: ナディールさんの話だと、昨晩は遅くまで この辺りにいたはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
ナディールさんの話だと、昨晩は遅くまで
この辺りにいたはずですが……

engChrName: I guess it only makes sense that he'd have moved by now.
engSearchText:
I guess it only makes sense that he'd have moved
by now.
jpnChrName: やはり同じ場所にはいないようですね。
jpnSearchText: やはり同じ場所にはいないようですね。

engChrName: Hey there. You guys looking for Willy's café?
engSearchText: Hey there. You guys looking for Willy's café?
jpnChrName: あんたらウィリーのカフェを探しているのかい？
jpnSearchText: あんたらウィリーのカフェを探しているのかい？

engChrName: You could say that, yeah.
engSearchText: You could say that, yeah.
jpnChrName: ま、一応そんなところだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、一応そんなところだな。

engChrName: I was eating at his place when he was here last night.
engSearchText: I was eating at his place when he was here last night.
jpnChrName: そうか、ならある程度は力になれると思うぜ。 昨日の晩、俺はあの店で遅めの晩飯を食ってな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、ならある程度は力になれると思うぜ。
昨日の晩、俺はあの店で遅めの晩飯を食ってな。

engChrName: After I finished my meal, he closed up shop and went off toward New Town.
engSearchText:
After I finished my meal, he closed up shop and went
off toward New Town.
jpnChrName: 食い終わった後、店仕舞いしてから 新市街の方に去って行ったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
食い終わった後、店仕舞いしてから
新市街の方に去って行ったんだ。

engChrName: If I had to guess, he's probably over there today, or close to it.
engSearchText:
If I had to guess, he's probably over there today, or
close to it.
jpnChrName: 多分、今朝はその続きで 新市街のどこかでやっているんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
多分、今朝はその続きで
新市街のどこかでやっているんじゃないか？

engChrName: You can never be sure with him, guy's a real free bird. But that's as good a guess as any.
engSearchText:
You can never be sure with him, guy's a real free bird.
But that's as good a guess as any.
jpnChrName: 気ままな兄ちゃんだし、確かな事は言えんが……
jpnSearchText: 気ままな兄ちゃんだし、確かな事は言えんが……

engChrName: Got'cha... Now that you mention it, he was over there this time yesterday, too.
engSearchText:
Got'cha... Now that you mention it, he was over there
this time yesterday, too.
jpnChrName: なるほど……そういや昨日もこの時間帯は 新市街で店をやっていたな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……そういや昨日もこの時間帯は
新市街で店をやっていたな。

engChrName: Sucks he doesn't stick to a schedule...but maybe he does have a pattern.
engSearchText:
Sucks he doesn't stick to a schedule...but maybe he
does have a pattern.
jpnChrName: ハン、決まったルーチンって 感じでもなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、決まったルーチンって
感じでもなさそうだが。

engChrName: We might also find people there who have seen the café more recently.
engSearchText:
We might also find people there who have seen the
café more recently.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、移動カフェを 目撃した方がいる可能性はあります。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、移動カフェを
目撃した方がいる可能性はあります。

engChrName: This is our most probable lead, so I recommend we take a look.
engSearchText:
This is our most probable lead, so I recommend we
take a look.
jpnChrName: 他に当てがない以上、調べる価値はあるかと。
jpnSearchText: 他に当てがない以上、調べる価値はあるかと。

engChrName: Sounds good. Let's head on over to that hotel where we saw him yesterday, and then we can go from there.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. Let's head on over to that hotel where
we saw him yesterday, and then we can go from there.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、次は昨日と同じ場所…… ホテルの前あたりに行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ、次は昨日と同じ場所……
ホテルの前あたりに行ってみるか。

engChrName: Thanks for the help, man.
engSearchText: Thanks for the help, man.
jpnChrName: おっさんも助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: おっさんも助かったぜ。

engChrName: No problem! Not sure what you're tracking him down for, but best of luck regardless!
engSearchText:
No problem! Not sure what you're tracking him down
for, but best of luck regardless!
jpnChrName: おう、何だかよく知らんが見つかると良いな！
jpnSearchText: おう、何だかよく知らんが見つかると良いな！

engChrName: Th-They're inside the building! Chief, whatever do we do?
engSearchText:
Th-They're inside the building! Chief, whatever do
we do?
jpnChrName: は、入ってきちゃいました……！ 技術長、どうしましょう～～？
jpnSearchText:
は、入ってきちゃいました……！
技術長、どうしましょう～～？

engChrName: Bastards... Fight 'em back! Pick up anything that'd put a dent in 'em! Pipes, wrenches, just find something!
engSearchText:
Bastards... Fight 'em back! Pick up anything that'd
put a dent in 'em! Pipes, wrenches, just
find something!
jpnChrName: クソ……お前ら、 鉄パイプでもレンチでもいいから寄越せ！
jpnSearchText:
クソ……お前ら、
鉄パイプでもレンチでもいいから寄越せ！

engChrName: We'll show 'em why you don't pick a bone with engineers!
engSearchText:
We'll show 'em why you don't pick a bone
with engineers!
jpnChrName: 工房技師の意地を見せてやるぞ！
jpnSearchText: 工房技師の意地を見せてやるぞ！

engChrName: Y-You can't be serious! We don't stand a chance!
engSearchText: Y-You can't be serious! We don't stand a chance!
jpnChrName: む、無茶ですよ親方～！
jpnSearchText: む、無茶ですよ親方～！

engChrName: The man's right! Leave the fightin' to us!
engSearchText: The man's right! Leave the fightin' to us!
jpnChrName: その通りだ── 荒事はこっちに任せときな！
jpnSearchText:
その通りだ──
荒事はこっちに任せときな！

engChrName: Chief...and Essy?! Why are you here, too?!
engSearchText: Chief...and Essy?! Why are you here, too?!
jpnChrName: ジスカール技術長 って、エレ姉まで！？
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール技術長
って、エレ姉まで！？

engChrName: Quatre! Oh, I'm so glad you're all saaafe!
engSearchText: Quatre! Oh, I'm so glad you're all saaafe!
jpnChrName: カトル君、 皆さんも無事だったんですね～！
jpnSearchText:
カトル君、
皆さんも無事だったんですね～！

engChrName: Boy, am I glad to see you guys!
engSearchText: Boy, am I glad to see you guys!
jpnChrName: 来てくれたか……！
jpnSearchText: 来てくれたか……！

engChrName: We'll take down the archaisms!
engSearchText: We'll take down the archaisms!
jpnChrName: この場はわたしたちに 任せてください！
jpnSearchText:
この場はわたしたちに
任せてください！

engChrName: Initiating combat!
engSearchText: Initiating combat!
jpnChrName: 殲滅します……！
jpnSearchText: 殲滅します……！

engChrName: Is anybody hurt?
engSearchText: Is anybody hurt?
jpnChrName: お怪我はありませんか？
jpnSearchText: お怪我はありませんか？

engChrName: Oh, nooo, we're all okay.
engSearchText: Oh, nooo, we're all okay.
jpnChrName: ええ、なんとか皆大丈夫だよ～。
jpnSearchText: ええ、なんとか皆大丈夫だよ～。

engChrName: Whew... We really owe ya one.
engSearchText: Whew... We really owe ya one.
jpnChrName: ふう……助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ふう……助かったぜ。

engChrName: There's a ton of uber-expensive testing equipment here. We'd have had hell to pay if they'd broken any of it.
engSearchText:
There's a ton of uber-expensive testing
equipment here. We'd have had hell to pay if they'd
broken any of it.
jpnChrName: ここには重要なテスト機器も置いてるから、 壊されでもしたら大変だったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ここには重要なテスト機器も置いてるから、
壊されでもしたら大変だったからな。

engChrName: How's it looking outside?
engSearchText: How's it looking outside?
jpnChrName: 外の状況はどうなってる？
jpnSearchText: 外の状況はどうなってる？

engChrName: Same as here: cloudy with a chance of robots.
engSearchText: Same as here: cloudy with a chance of robots.
jpnChrName: どこも似たようなもんだ。
jpnSearchText: どこも似たようなもんだ。

engChrName: The police and Bracer Guild are undoubtedly sending reinforcements. They should have most areas under control soon enough.
engSearchText:
The police and Bracer Guild are undoubtedly sending
reinforcements. They should have most areas under
control soon enough.
jpnChrName: じきに遊撃士や警察の増援が来て 混乱は収束していくと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
じきに遊撃士や警察の増援が来て
混乱は収束していくと思いますが……

engChrName: The problem is communication: they're jamming the entire city. We can't get the word out anywhere...
engSearchText:
The problem is communication: they're jamming the
entire city. We can't get the word out anywhere...
jpnChrName: 例の通信障害がネックですね…… 上手く状況が伝わりません。
jpnSearchText:
例の通信障害がネックですね……
上手く状況が伝わりません。

engChrName: Then I've got just the thing.
engSearchText: Then I've got just the thing.
jpnChrName: だったらちょうどいい。
jpnSearchText: だったらちょうどいい。

engChrName: We got this emergency line here, and it's completely off the grid. We run it through our own system.
engSearchText:
We got this emergency line here, and it's completely
off the grid. We run it through our own system.
jpnChrName: うちには緊急回線が用意されてる。 ネットの調子に影響されないヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
うちには緊急回線が用意されてる。
ネットの調子に影響されないヤツだ。

engChrName: That should let us call in help, and then we can start pushing these bastards back!
engSearchText:
That should let us call in help, and then we can start
pushing these bastards back!
jpnChrName: そいつで各所と連絡を取れば、 少しは状況も良くなるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そいつで各所と連絡を取れば、
少しは状況も良くなるだろう。

engChrName: I'll give you a hand, too!
engSearchText: I'll give you a hand, too!
jpnChrName: わたしも手伝います～。
jpnSearchText: わたしも手伝います～。

engChrName: I probably can't dispel it entirely, but I should be able to counter the interference enough to get some messages out.
engSearchText:
I probably can't dispel it entirely, but I should be able
to counter the interference enough to get some
messages out.
jpnChrName: 対症療法しかできないけど、ネットの 障害の方を少し軽減できると思うから～。
jpnSearchText:
対症療法しかできないけど、ネットの
障害の方を少し軽減できると思うから～。

engChrName: I mean...maybe, but I'd really rather you get yourself to safety.
engSearchText:
I mean...maybe, but I'd really rather you get yourself
to safety.
jpnChrName: でもエレ姉たちは早く避難した方が……
jpnSearchText: でもエレ姉たちは早く避難した方が……

engChrName: She's safe here, don't worry. Our front door's a goddamn bulwark.
engSearchText:
She's safe here, don't worry. Our front door's a
goddamn bulwark.
jpnChrName: この工房の扉は頑丈だ。
jpnSearchText: この工房の扉は頑丈だ。

engChrName: We'll lower it and hunker down if we need to. That'll buy us all the time we could want.
engSearchText:
We'll lower it and hunker down if we need to.
That'll buy us all the time we could want.
jpnChrName: いざって時は閉めて立て籠もればいい。 簡単には破られんさ。
jpnSearchText:
いざって時は閉めて立て籠もればいい。
簡単には破られんさ。

engChrName: If you insist... Just please be careful.
engSearchText: If you insist... Just please be careful.
jpnChrName: 分かりました……どうかご無事で。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました……どうかご無事で。

engChrName: We're headed for the observatory—that's what they seem to be after.
engSearchText:
We're headed for the observatory—that's what they
seem to be after.
jpnChrName: 僕たちはこれから 敵が狙っている天文台に向かいます。
jpnSearchText:
僕たちはこれから
敵が狙っている天文台に向かいます。

engChrName: The professor cared deeply for the place... I won't let them ruin it!
engSearchText:
The professor cared deeply for the place... I won't let
them ruin it!
jpnChrName: 博士の大切な場所…… 絶対に守ってみせますから！
jpnSearchText:
博士の大切な場所……
絶対に守ってみせますから！

engChrName: Made up your mind, huh? I can see it on your face— there's no way I'm talking you outta that.
engSearchText:
Made up your mind, huh? I can see it on your face—
there's no way I'm talking you outta that.
jpnChrName: カトル…… 止めても無駄みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
カトル……
止めても無駄みたいだな。

engChrName: Just be careful. You guys take care of him, all right?
engSearchText: Just be careful. You guys take care of him, all right?
jpnChrName: くれぐれも気を付けていけ。 お前さんたちも頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
くれぐれも気を付けていけ。
お前さんたちも頼んだぞ！

engChrName: We leave Quatre and the observatory in your hands!
engSearchText: We leave Quatre and the observatory in your hands!
jpnChrName: ……カトル君と天文台のこと、 お願いします～。
jpnSearchText:
……カトル君と天文台のこと、
お願いします～。

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せとけ。

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Wh-Where did all of these things COME from?! Someone, help!
engSearchText:
Wh-Where did all of these things COME from?!
Someone, help!
jpnChrName: い、一体何なのこの機械の怪物は……！？ だ、誰かお助けを……
jpnSearchText:
い、一体何なのこの機械の怪物は……！？
だ、誰かお助けを……

engChrName: We're so close to the church, too...!
engSearchText: We're so close to the church, too...!
jpnChrName: 教会まであと少しなのに……
jpnSearchText: 教会まであと少しなのに……

engChrName: What are monsters doing here, of all places...?! How many of them are there?!
engSearchText:
What are monsters doing here, of all places...?!
How many of them are there?!
jpnChrName: こんな所にまで…… 一体どれだけいるんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
こんな所にまで……
一体どれだけいるんだ！？

engChrName: Those people need help over there!
engSearchText: Those people need help over there!
jpnChrName: 逃げ遅れた人が……
jpnSearchText: 逃げ遅れた人が……

engChrName: It's Heidi and Barnaby!
engSearchText: It's Heidi and Barnaby!
jpnChrName: あれは、ハイジさんにバーナビーさん！？
jpnSearchText: あれは、ハイジさんにバーナビーさん！？

engChrName: Quatre?! I-Is that you?
engSearchText: Quatre?! I-Is that you?
jpnChrName: か、カトル君……！？
jpnSearchText: か、カトル君……！？

engChrName: We'll distract them! Please, get yourselves to safety while we cover you!
engSearchText:
We'll distract them! Please, get yourselves to safety
while we cover you!
jpnChrName: 僕達が引き付けます、 その間に避難してください！
jpnSearchText:
僕達が引き付けます、
その間に避難してください！

engChrName: Get her out of here, bud!
engSearchText: Get her out of here, bud!
jpnChrName: そっちの兄ちゃん、婆さんを連れていってやれ！
jpnSearchText: そっちの兄ちゃん、婆さんを連れていってやれ！

engChrName: A-All right. Come on, quick!
engSearchText: A-All right. Come on, quick!
jpnChrName: わ、わかった…… ほらお婆さん、ついて来て下さい！
jpnSearchText:
わ、わかった……
ほらお婆さん、ついて来て下さい！

engChrName: Good, it looks like they made it to the church.
engSearchText: Good, it looks like they made it to the church.
jpnChrName: 二人共、礼拝堂まで逃げられたみたいです。
jpnSearchText: 二人共、礼拝堂まで逃げられたみたいです。

engChrName: That's a relief. But that means there are still people outside caught in the crossfire...
engSearchText:
That's a relief. But that means there are still people
outside caught in the crossfire...
jpnChrName: それにしても……やっぱり逃げ遅れた人が……
jpnSearchText: それにしても……やっぱり逃げ遅れた人が……

engChrName: They're going after the kids and elderly, too... Chickenshit rust buckets.
engSearchText:
They're going after the kids and elderly, too...
Chickenshit rust buckets.
jpnChrName: ったく、婆さんまで追い回すとは 胸糞悪ィ鉄屑共だな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、婆さんまで追い回すとは
胸糞悪ィ鉄屑共だな。

engChrName: It was bad enough inside Giscard's building. Anybody outside is up shit creek without a paddle here.
engSearchText:
It was bad enough inside Giscard's building. Anybody
outside is up shit creek without a paddle here.
jpnChrName: ジスカール工房でさえ襲われちまったんだ、 屋外にいる人間も助ける他無いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール工房でさえ襲われちまったんだ、
屋外にいる人間も助ける他無いだろう。

engChrName: If we find anybody else out there, we'll help 'em to the church or the inn, whichever's closer.
engSearchText:
If we find anybody else out there, we'll help 'em to
the church or the inn, whichever's closer.
jpnChrName: 見つけた場合は教会や宿酒場に誘導するぞ。
jpnSearchText: 見つけた場合は教会や宿酒場に誘導するぞ。

engChrName: That should be safer than the workshop, at least—no heavy equipment for the archaisms to target there.
engSearchText:
That should be safer than the workshop, at least—no
heavy equipment for the archaisms to target there.
jpnChrName: ジスカール工房と違って連中が狙うような品もねぇ、 多少は安全なはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール工房と違って連中が狙うような品もねぇ、
多少は安全なはずだ。

engChrName: I doubt those two are the only ones we'll find.
engSearchText: I doubt those two are the only ones we'll find.
jpnChrName: この分だと他にも逃げ遅れた 連中がいるかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
この分だと他にも逃げ遅れた
連中がいるかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Gang, keep an eye out for anyone else who needs help.
engSearchText:
Gang, keep an eye out for anyone else who
needs help.
jpnChrName: 流石に放っておく訳にもいかねぇ、 同じような事が無いか警戒して進むぞ！
jpnSearchText:
流石に放っておく訳にもいかねぇ、
同じような事が無いか警戒して進むぞ！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: W-We're cornered...!
engSearchText: W-We're cornered...!
jpnChrName: お、追い込まれたわ……！
jpnSearchText: お、追い込まれたわ……！

engChrName: They're coming from the institute, too...?!
engSearchText: They're coming from the institute, too...?!
jpnChrName: まさか大学方面からも来るなんて……！
jpnSearchText: まさか大学方面からも来るなんて……！

engChrName: This isn't looking good...
engSearchText: This isn't looking good...
jpnChrName: いかん、このままじゃあ……
jpnSearchText: いかん、このままじゃあ……

engChrName: If only I'd brought my sword... Damn this! Sasha, I'm going to have to take a risk here.
engSearchText:
If only I'd brought my sword... Damn this! Sasha, I'm
going to have to take a risk here.
jpnChrName: くっ……せめて剣を持ってきていれば…… サーシャ先輩、一か八かで僕が──
jpnSearchText:
くっ……せめて剣を持ってきていれば……
サーシャ先輩、一か八かで僕が──

engChrName: Wait, no! Julian, don't do it! I know you're trained, but—
engSearchText:
Wait, no! Julian, don't do it! I know you're trained,
but—
jpnChrName: だ、駄目よユリアン君！ いくら武芸の心得があったって──
jpnSearchText:
だ、駄目よユリアン君！
いくら武芸の心得があったって──

engChrName: No need for the heroics! We got'cha!
engSearchText: No need for the heroics! We got'cha!
jpnChrName: その必要は無いぜ、間にあったようだな！
jpnSearchText: その必要は無いぜ、間にあったようだな！

engChrName: There are people there! Quick!
engSearchText: There are people there! Quick!
jpnChrName: こちらにも避難してきた人たちが……！
jpnSearchText: こちらにも避難してきた人たちが……！

engChrName: Julian! Sasha! Are you okay?!
engSearchText: Julian! Sasha! Are you okay?!
jpnChrName: ユリアン君にサーシャ先輩、 お怪我は無いですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ユリアン君にサーシャ先輩、
お怪我は無いですか！？

engChrName: A-Agnès! We're fine, but...
engSearchText: A-Agnès! We're fine, but...
jpnChrName: あ、アニエス……！？ ええ、私達は大丈夫だけど……
jpnSearchText:
あ、アニエス……！？
ええ、私達は大丈夫だけど……

engChrName: You're her work colleagues from yesterday!
engSearchText: You're her work colleagues from yesterday!
jpnChrName: 昨日お会いした、 アニエスさんのバイト先の……！
jpnSearchText:
昨日お会いした、
アニエスさんのバイト先の……！

engChrName: Leave these things to us!
engSearchText: Leave these things to us!
jpnChrName: ここは任せてもらうぜ……！
jpnSearchText: ここは任せてもらうぜ……！
