engChrName: Keep those two safe for us while we fend them off!
engSearchText: Keep those two safe for us while we fend them off!
jpnChrName: お二人はそちらの方々を！
jpnSearchText: お二人はそちらの方々を！

engChrName: G-Got it!
engSearchText: G-Got it!
jpnChrName: わ、わかったわ！
jpnSearchText: わ、わかったわ！

engChrName: Be careful!
engSearchText: Be careful!
jpnChrName: 気を付けてくれ……！
jpnSearchText: 気を付けてくれ……！

engChrName: We owe you our lives... Thank you so much.
engSearchText: We owe you our lives... Thank you so much.
jpnChrName: おお……助かった、礼を言わせとくれ。
jpnSearchText: おお……助かった、礼を言わせとくれ。

engChrName: I don't want to even think about what would've happened had you not been there. It was looking awfully dire.
engSearchText:
I don't want to even think about what would've
happened had you not been there. It was looking
awfully dire.
jpnChrName: 一時はどうなるかと思ったけど…… 皆さんが来てくれて助かりました。
jpnSearchText:
一時はどうなるかと思ったけど……
皆さんが来てくれて助かりました。

engChrName: Were you two helping them out?
engSearchText: Were you two helping them out?
jpnChrName: サーシャ先輩やユリアン君は…… そのお二人を助けていたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
サーシャ先輩やユリアン君は……
そのお二人を助けていたんですか？

engChrName: Trying to, at least. We were rounding people up inside the inn, but then we heard screaming from outside, so we went back out again.
engSearchText:
Trying to, at least. We were rounding people up
inside the inn, but then we heard screaming from
outside, so we went back out again.
jpnChrName: うん、一旦は宿酒場に避難していたんだけど、 外から悲鳴が聞こえて避難誘導を手伝っててね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、一旦は宿酒場に避難していたんだけど、
外から悲鳴が聞こえて避難誘導を手伝っててね。

engChrName: We picked up those two...and that was when those monsters jumped us.
engSearchText:
We picked up those two...and that was when those
monsters jumped us.
jpnChrName: この二人を保護した矢先、 大学方面の連絡橋から来た機械達に囲まれたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この二人を保護した矢先、
大学方面の連絡橋から来た機械達に囲まれたんだ。

engChrName: I should have been able to fend them off myself, but I... Damn it, I'm pathetic!
engSearchText:
I should have been able to fend them off myself,
but I... Damn it, I'm pathetic!
jpnChrName: 情けないな、あの程度も退けられずに……
jpnSearchText: 情けないな、あの程度も退けられずに……

engChrName: Don't blame yourself! We wouldn't have made it this far without you.
engSearchText:
Don't blame yourself! We wouldn't have made it
this far without you.
jpnChrName: そんな……お兄さん達のおかげで ここまで無事でいられたのに。
jpnSearchText:
そんな……お兄さん達のおかげで
ここまで無事でいられたのに。

engChrName: I agree. We only made it in time because you held them off.
engSearchText:
I agree. We only made it in time because you held
them off.
jpnChrName: ええ、だからこそ 私達が間に合った面もあると思います。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、だからこそ
私達が間に合った面もあると思います。

engChrName: Either way, now's not the time to think about all that! We've gotta keep doing what we can now.
engSearchText:
Either way, now's not the time to think about all that!
We've gotta keep doing what we can now.
jpnChrName: 反省はあと！　ちなみに、 少し前に私達の方もレンと連絡がついたわ。
jpnSearchText:
反省はあと！　ちなみに、
少し前に私達の方もレンと連絡がついたわ。

engChrName: Oh, we got in touch with Renne, too. We've kept her in the loop and gathered all the students we could here.
engSearchText:
Oh, we got in touch with Renne, too. We've kept her
in the loop and gathered all the students we
could here.
jpnChrName: こっちの街区の学生は全員集めた上で、 向こうに状況を知らせてある。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの街区の学生は全員集めた上で、
向こうに状況を知らせてある。

engChrName: Ah! Yeah, we saw her earlier, too.
engSearchText: Ah! Yeah, we saw her earlier, too.
jpnChrName: ええ、私達も先ほど会いました！
jpnSearchText: ええ、私達も先ほど会いました！

engChrName: New Town is in good hands with her helping there. You two take care of yourselves!
engSearchText:
New Town is in good hands with her helping there.
You two take care of yourselves!
jpnChrName: 多分、新市街の方はお任せして大丈夫かと…… サーシャ先輩も無理なさらないでください！
jpnSearchText:
多分、新市街の方はお任せして大丈夫かと……
サーシャ先輩も無理なさらないでください！

engChrName: We will! We just don't wanna leave anybody behind!
engSearchText: We will! We just don't wanna leave anybody behind!
jpnChrName: わかった、こっちにいる生徒や 町の人たちと避難してるわね。
jpnSearchText:
わかった、こっちにいる生徒や
町の人たちと避難してるわね。

engChrName: We're directing everyone to the inn or the church, right?
engSearchText:
We're directing everyone to the inn or the
church, right?
jpnChrName: それで、宿酒場か教会に 避難誘導するという話でしたね？
jpnSearchText:
それで、宿酒場か教会に
避難誘導するという話でしたね？

engChrName: We were just in that area ourselves.
engSearchText: We were just in that area ourselves.
jpnChrName: 僕達もそっちの方角から来たけど……
jpnSearchText: 僕達もそっちの方角から来たけど……

engChrName: Yeah. Managed to thin out their numbers a lot, too. Those two places should be safe for the time being.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Managed to thin out their numbers a lot, too.
Those two places should be safe for the time being.
jpnChrName: ああ、既にある程度は敵も減らしたし、 今なら囲まれる事無く突き抜けられるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、既にある程度は敵も減らしたし、
今なら囲まれる事無く突き抜けられるだろう。

engChrName: All right. Then let's make our way back ASAP!
engSearchText: All right. Then let's make our way back ASAP!
jpnChrName: 判りました……それなら一刻も早く 戻りましょう！
jpnSearchText:
判りました……それなら一刻も早く
戻りましょう！

engChrName: I'm sure Lyle and Chignon are worried about us both.
engSearchText: I'm sure Lyle and Chignon are worried about us both.
jpnChrName: ライエルやシニョンも不安がっているだろうし……
jpnSearchText: ライエルやシニョンも不安がっているだろうし……

engChrName: Take care, everyone!
engSearchText: Take care, everyone!
jpnChrName: アニエスたちもどうか気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText: アニエスたちもどうか気をつけて……！

engChrName: Thanks again for your help!
engSearchText: Thanks again for your help!
jpnChrName: お兄さん達、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: お兄さん達、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Phew... I'm glad we decided to stop by when we did. I dread to imagine what would've happened otherwise...
engSearchText:
Phew... I'm glad we decided to stop by when we did.
I dread to imagine what would've
happened otherwise...
jpnChrName: ふう、立ち寄って正解だったかな。 助けられて良かった。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、立ち寄って正解だったかな。
助けられて良かった。

engChrName: They mentioned that archaisms are spreading from the institute, though... That concerns me.
engSearchText:
They mentioned that archaisms are spreading from
the institute, though... That concerns me.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、人形兵器は 大学方面から来襲したとの事ですが……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、人形兵器は
大学方面から来襲したとの事ですが……

engChrName: Yeah. By now, the place is probably crawlin' with 'em.
engSearchText: Yeah. By now, the place is probably crawlin' with 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ……大学内も既に人形共に 占拠されていると見て間違いないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……大学内も既に人形共に
占拠されていると見て間違いないだろう。

engChrName: Hell, probably even worse there than it is outside. Whatever Almata wants, it's in the institute.
engSearchText:
Hell, probably even worse there than it is outside.
Whatever Almata wants, it's in the institute.
jpnChrName: むしろ、アルマータ共の本命が大学にあるなら よっぽど危険度は高い可能性もあるな。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、アルマータ共の本命が大学にあるなら
よっぽど危険度は高い可能性もあるな。

engChrName: I really hope everyone's okay... Please be safe, Yang!
engSearchText: I really hope everyone's okay... Please be safe, Yang!
jpnChrName: ヤン兄、大学の皆さん……
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄、大学の皆さん……

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Oh! There he is!
engSearchText: Oh! There he is!
jpnChrName: あ、いました！
jpnSearchText: あ、いました！

engChrName: I'm glad we didn't have to go on a wild goose chase to find you today.
engSearchText:
I'm glad we didn't have to go on a wild goose chase to
find you today.
jpnChrName: ヤン兄……ここだったか。 今日はすぐ見つけられてよかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤン兄……ここだったか。
今日はすぐ見つけられてよかったよ。

engChrName: Ah, if it isn't the spriggan. You look like you have something more to discuss with me.
engSearchText:
Ah, if it isn't the spriggan. You look like you have
something more to discuss with me.
jpnChrName: ふむ、裏解決屋か。 どうやら私に今一度話があるようだな？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、裏解決屋か。
どうやら私に今一度話があるようだな？

engChrName: Damn right, we do.
engSearchText: Damn right, we do.
jpnChrName: ハッ、話が早くて助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、話が早くて助かるぜ。

engChrName: I imagine you're already privy to the situation, so we don't need to bring you up to speed.
engSearchText:
I imagine you're already privy to the situation, so we
don't need to bring you up to speed.
jpnChrName: ……ヤン兄なら状況は 分かっていると思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ヤン兄なら状況は
分かっていると思うけど……

engChrName: Right now, we're trying to get everything under control ourselves before the government intervenes any further.
engSearchText:
Right now, we're trying to get everything under
control ourselves before the government intervenes
any further.
jpnChrName: 政府が本格的に介入する前に 今回のことを何とかしたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
政府が本格的に介入する前に
今回のことを何とかしたいんだ。

engChrName: So that's why we wanted to ask you about—
engSearchText: So that's why we wanted to ask you about—
jpnChrName: だからヤン兄に──
jpnSearchText: だからヤン兄に──

engChrName: Me? What exactly do I have to do with all this?
engSearchText: Me? What exactly do I have to do with all this?
jpnChrName: 私に？
jpnSearchText: 私に？

engChrName: Erm...
engSearchText: Erm...

engChrName: I will admit my curiosity is piqued by the developments here.
engSearchText:
I will admit my curiosity is piqued by the
developments here.
jpnChrName: 今の状況についての関心は否定しない。
jpnSearchText: 今の状況についての関心は否定しない。

engChrName: Marduk is an interesting wrinkle in the story, as are Professor Callaghan's...shall we say, inadvisable efforts.
engSearchText:
Marduk is an interesting wrinkle in the story, as are
Professor Callaghan's...shall we say,
inadvisable efforts.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックは興味深いし、 キャラハン教授の悪足掻きは更に面白い。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックは興味深いし、
キャラハン教授の悪足掻きは更に面白い。

engChrName: I do plan to stay and watch how this all pans out, but as I said yesterday—
engSearchText:
I do plan to stay and watch how this all pans out, but
as I said yesterday—
jpnChrName: 一応最後まで“観察”はするつもりだが、 昨日も言った通り──
jpnSearchText:
一応最後まで“観察”はするつもりだが、
昨日も言った通り──

engChrName: *sigh* Can you at least let me finish before dismissing me?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Can you at least let me finish before
dismissing me?
jpnChrName: ふう……ヤン兄。 話は最後まで聞いてよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ヤン兄。
話は最後まで聞いてよ。

engChrName: I've had to face a lot of hard truths over the past few days.
engSearchText:
I've had to face a lot of hard truths over the past
few days.
jpnChrName: ……嫌というほど思い知ったんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……嫌というほど思い知ったんだ。

engChrName: I've been made to realize just how lacking I am and how much I still have to learn.
engSearchText:
I've been made to realize just how lacking I am and
how much I still have to learn.
jpnChrName: 昨日言われたことも、自分の未熟さも、 足りていなかったものも。
jpnSearchText:
昨日言われたことも、自分の未熟さも、
足りていなかったものも。

engChrName: I know that it's impossible to rectify all of that overnight, but there are still things I want to protect no matter the cost.
engSearchText:
I know that it's impossible to rectify all of that
overnight, but there are still things I want to protect
no matter the cost.
jpnChrName: すぐに成長できるなんて思わない── それでも今、この手で護りたいものがある。
jpnSearchText:
すぐに成長できるなんて思わない──
それでも今、この手で護りたいものがある。

engChrName: All I want is for your feedback on a hypothesis of mine. I won't ask for any more of your help than that.
engSearchText:
All I want is for your feedback on a hypothesis
of mine. I won't ask for any more of your help
than that.
jpnChrName: 手を貸して、なんていうつもりはない── 代わりに僕の仮説にフィードバックが欲しいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
手を貸して、なんていうつもりはない──
代わりに僕の仮説にフィードバックが欲しいんだ。

engChrName: ...Go on.
engSearchText: ...Go on.
jpnChrName: ほう……？
jpnSearchText: ほう……？

engChrName: Professor Callaghan all but lives on the network now.
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan all but lives on the network now.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生は、 “１と０の世界”に行ってしまった。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生は、
“１と０の世界”に行ってしまった。

engChrName: But that goal of his contradicts the actions he took. One thing doesn't add up to me.
engSearchText:
But that goal of his contradicts the actions he took.
One thing doesn't add up to me.
jpnChrName: だけど──先生の目的を考えると どうしても納得がいかないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だけど──先生の目的を考えると
どうしても納得がいかないんだ。

engChrName: Why did he simply let the mafia destroy the Aurora?
engSearchText: Why did he simply let the mafia destroy the Aurora?
jpnChrName: あの時、マフィアにアウローラを 破壊させたことに。
jpnSearchText:
あの時、マフィアにアウローラを
破壊させたことに。

engChrName: That's a good question...
engSearchText: That's a good question...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: ...I agree. That is an obvious contradiction.
engSearchText: ...I agree. That is an obvious contradiction.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。 それこそは明らかな“矛盾”だ。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだな。
それこそは明らかな“矛盾”だ。

engChrName: If they intend to use weapons of mass destruction, they must figure out how to invent and produce them—they simply don't exist yet.
engSearchText:
If they intend to use weapons of mass destruction,
they must figure out how to invent and produce
them—they simply don't exist yet.
jpnChrName: 目的が反応兵器の完成なら、 一番ネックになるのは“手段”だろう。
jpnSearchText:
目的が反応兵器の完成なら、
一番ネックになるのは“手段”だろう。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's AI only solves one part of the problem. Even with functional blueprints, there are no means to produce them.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan's AI only solves one part of the
problem. Even with functional blueprints, there are no
means to produce them.
jpnChrName: 彼がＡＩ化したのはその一環でしかない。
jpnSearchText: 彼がＡＩ化したのはその一環でしかない。

engChrName: The AI is essential in their research efforts—it holds more computational power than any other machine in Basel.
engSearchText:
The AI is essential in their research efforts—it holds
more computational power than any other machine
in Basel.
jpnChrName: バーゼル随一の計算能力を持つ《アウローラ》は 本来、間違いなく必要だったはずだ──
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル随一の計算能力を持つ《アウローラ》は
本来、間違いなく必要だったはずだ──

engChrName: And if they no longer have it, that begs another question...
engSearchText:
And if they no longer have it, that begs
another question...
jpnChrName: ならば、次の課題は見えてくる。
jpnSearchText: ならば、次の課題は見えてくる。

engChrName: How will they produce these nuclear weapons without the means to invent them?
engSearchText:
How will they produce these nuclear weapons
without the means to invent them?
jpnChrName: ──手段が不足している中、 どうやって目的を達成するつもりか……
jpnSearchText:
──手段が不足している中、
どうやって目的を達成するつもりか……

engChrName: An astute observation.
engSearchText: An astute observation.
jpnChrName: 上出来だ。
jpnSearchText: 上出来だ。

engChrName: Can't say no, can you? Something tells me you wanted to help him out all along, in spite of your crotchety old man act.
engSearchText:
Can't say no, can you? Something tells me you
wanted to help him out all along, in spite of your
crotchety old man act.
jpnChrName: ハッ、なんだかんだ言いつつ 助言をくれるなんざお優しいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、なんだかんだ言いつつ
助言をくれるなんざお優しいじゃねえか？

engChrName: I am simply giving him the feedback he requested.
engSearchText: I am simply giving him the feedback he requested.
jpnChrName: 妥当な仮説に対して、 妥当なフィードバックを返したまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
妥当な仮説に対して、
妥当なフィードバックを返したまでだ。

engChrName: It will be up to him to prove his theory—though judging from what I've heard so far, he'll find the answers soon enough.
engSearchText:
It will be up to him to prove his theory—though
judging from what I've heard so far, he'll find the
answers soon enough.
jpnChrName: 答えに辿りつけるかはこれからだろう── その分なら問題はなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
答えに辿りつけるかはこれからだろう──
その分なら問題はなさそうだが。

engChrName: Yang...
engSearchText: Yang...
jpnChrName: ヤン兄……
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄……

engChrName: You are correct: people do not grow and change overnight. But having watched you, I can see how you've matured over the years.
engSearchText:
You are correct: people do not grow and
change overnight. But having watched you, I can see
how you've matured over the years.
jpnChrName: お前の言う通り、人はすぐには成長できない── だがお前は確実に前進している。
jpnSearchText:
お前の言う通り、人はすぐには成長できない──
だがお前は確実に前進している。

engChrName: I look forward to seeing you grow into a well-rounded scientist, just as Professor Hamilton did.
engSearchText:
I look forward to seeing you grow into a well-rounded
scientist, just as Professor Hamilton did.
jpnChrName: その調子で励むといい。 博士の名に恥じぬようにな。
jpnSearchText:
その調子で励むといい。
博士の名に恥じぬようにな。

engChrName: ...Thank you. I will.
engSearchText: ...Thank you. I will.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとう、任せて。
jpnSearchText: ……ありがとう、任せて。

engChrName: He really is like a brother to you, huh?
engSearchText: He really is like a brother to you, huh?
jpnChrName: 兄弟子……カトルさんにとっての お兄ちゃん、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
兄弟子……カトルさんにとっての
お兄ちゃん、ですか。

engChrName: He's more helpful than he wants to admit. Curious where he's goin' after he leaves Basel, but I guess that ain't my business.
engSearchText:
He's more helpful than he wants to admit.
Curious where he's goin' after he leaves Basel, but I
guess that ain't my business.
jpnChrName: ああ、おかげでいい手がかりに辿りつけた。 バーゼルを去るって話は気になるが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、おかげでいい手がかりに辿りつけた。
バーゼルを去るって話は気になるが……

engChrName: I agree...and besides, it's not our place to tell him how to live his life.
engSearchText:
I agree...and besides, it's not our place to tell him how
to live his life.
jpnChrName: ……今は置いておくよ。 ヤン兄にはヤン兄の道があるんだろうから。
jpnSearchText:
……今は置いておくよ。
ヤン兄にはヤン兄の道があるんだろうから。

engChrName: We need to focus on our own work right now.
engSearchText: We need to focus on our own work right now.
jpnChrName: 僕たちは僕たちのやるべき事に集中しよう。
jpnSearchText: 僕たちは僕たちのやるべき事に集中しよう。

engChrName: You're right.
engSearchText: You're right.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうですね。

engChrName: Give it another look! Comb it real thorough this time!
engSearchText:
Give it another look! Comb it real thorough
this time!
jpnChrName: ──もう一度確認してみろ！ 何度でも念入りにな！
jpnSearchText:
──もう一度確認してみろ！
何度でも念入りにな！

engChrName: Y-Yes, chief!
engSearchText: Y-Yes, chief!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ……！

engChrName: Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: 技術長、どうかしたんですか？
jpnSearchText: 技術長、どうかしたんですか？

engChrName: Anything we can help with?
engSearchText: Anything we can help with?
jpnChrName: なんかトラブルなら、 相談は受け付けるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
なんかトラブルなら、
相談は受け付けるぜ？

engChrName: I wish it was that simple, but nope. Ain't nothin' you folks can help with.
engSearchText:
I wish it was that simple, but nope. Ain't nothin' you
folks can help with.
jpnChrName: 相談してどうこうなる もんじゃねえだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
相談してどうこうなる
もんじゃねえだろうが……

engChrName: Guess it wouldn't hurt to fill you in, though...
engSearchText: Guess it wouldn't hurt to fill you in, though...
jpnChrName: 状況が状況だ。 一応、お前らにも共有しとくか。
jpnSearchText:
状況が状況だ。
一応、お前らにも共有しとくか。

engChrName: What?! Parts for that weapon prototype went missing?!
engSearchText:
What?! Parts for that weapon prototype
went missing?!
jpnChrName: あの“新兵器”の部品が行方不明に……！？
jpnSearchText: あの“新兵器”の部品が行方不明に……！？

engChrName: Yup. We found it out when we were looking into Callaghan's disappearance.
engSearchText:
Yup. We found it out when we were looking into
Callaghan's disappearance.
jpnChrName: ウチでもキャラハンの行方を 追ってた矢先に判明してな。
jpnSearchText:
ウチでもキャラハンの行方を
追ってた矢先に判明してな。

engChrName: Most of the parts are still here—it's not like the whole thing up 'n' vanished.
engSearchText:
Most of the parts are still here—it's not like the
whole thing up 'n' vanished.
jpnChrName: と言っても完成品が消えたわけじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: と言っても完成品が消えたわけじゃねえ。

engChrName: But there're little bits and pieces of our inventory missing. Our order sheets don't add up.
engSearchText:
But there're little bits and pieces of our
inventory missing. Our order sheets don't add up.
jpnChrName: 試作機のために発注したパーツ群のリストに 少しずつ食い違いがあった事が分かってな。
jpnSearchText:
試作機のために発注したパーツ群のリストに
少しずつ食い違いがあった事が分かってな。

engChrName: And we haven't been able to find the missing parts anywhere.
engSearchText:
And we haven't been able to find the missing
parts anywhere.
jpnChrName: その差分の所在が現在、 完全に行方不明になっちまっている。
jpnSearchText:
その差分の所在が現在、
完全に行方不明になっちまっている。

engChrName: It's not just a few of 'em, either—we're missing huge chunks of inventory. Too much stuff to count.
engSearchText:
It's not just a few of 'em, either—we're missing huge
chunks of inventory. Too much stuff to count.
jpnChrName: 全部でどれくらい消えちまったかも 追いきれねえくらいでな。
jpnSearchText:
全部でどれくらい消えちまったかも
追いきれねえくらいでな。

engChrName: Well, that's a bit alarming.
engSearchText: Well, that's a bit alarming.
jpnChrName: おいおい……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……

engChrName: You're talking about that weapon you showed us earlier, right?
engSearchText:
You're talking about that weapon you showed us
earlier, right?
jpnChrName: 先日見かけたあの兵器の部品が……
jpnSearchText: 先日見かけたあの兵器の部品が……

engChrName: Yeah, that definitely ain't good—and you're right, I dunno how we could help with that.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that definitely ain't good—and you're right, I
dunno how we could help with that.
jpnChrName: そいつは確かにコトだな。 俺たちにどうこうできる話でもねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
そいつは確かにコトだな。
俺たちにどうこうできる話でもねぇ……

engChrName: Smells like an inside job to me. No way the world-famous Giscard Workshop just loses track of inventory like that.
engSearchText:
Smells like an inside job to me. No way the
world-famous Giscard Workshop just loses track of
inventory like that.
jpnChrName: だが天下のジスカール工房にしては、 いくらなんでもあり得ないミスだな。
jpnSearchText:
だが天下のジスカール工房にしては、
いくらなんでもあり得ないミスだな。

engChrName: Damn straight. A lot of us here know about the weapon, but it's still a highly confidential project.
engSearchText:
Damn straight. A lot of us here know about the
weapon, but it's still a highly confidential project.
jpnChrName: ああ──半ば公表しているとはいえ 公式発表前の新兵器の試作機だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──半ば公表しているとはいえ
公式発表前の新兵器の試作機だ。

engChrName: We've taken extra steps to make sure nothing gets out.
engSearchText:
We've taken extra steps to make sure nothing
gets out.
jpnChrName: 万が一にもこういう事がねぇように 細心の注意を払っちゃいたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
万が一にもこういう事がねぇように
細心の注意を払っちゃいたんだが。

engChrName: And of all the times, this had to happen right after I went and mouthed off at Tausend. Shameful, I tell ya.
engSearchText:
And of all the times, this had to happen right after I
went and mouthed off at Tausend. Shameful, I
tell ya.
jpnChrName: タウゼントにゲキを飛ばした先にこれとは、 不甲斐ねぇったらありゃしねえが。
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントにゲキを飛ばした先にこれとは、
不甲斐ねぇったらありゃしねえが。

engChrName: You order parts online, don't you? I remember you showing me how that system worked.
engSearchText:
You order parts online, don't you? I remember you
showing me how that system worked.
jpnChrName: ……たしか、ジスカール工房の部品発注は 導力ネットを使った最新システムでしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
……たしか、ジスカール工房の部品発注は
導力ネットを使った最新システムでしたよね？

engChrName: Do you think this inventory shortfall might be related to the network problems the city's been having?
engSearchText:
Do you think this inventory shortfall might be related
to the network problems the city's been having?
jpnChrName: もしかすると今回の導力ネットのトラブルにも 関係しているんじゃ……？
jpnSearchText:
もしかすると今回の導力ネットのトラブルにも
関係しているんじゃ……？

engChrName: Our youngsters suggested the same thing. It's not entirely off the table, no.
engSearchText:
Our youngsters suggested the same thing. It's not
entirely off the table, no.
jpnChrName: ああ……うちの若いのもその見解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……うちの若いのもその見解だ。

engChrName: I just like to think we were being more careful than that. How could we not be, given everything going on?
engSearchText:
I just like to think we were being more careful
than that. How could we not be, given everything
going on?
jpnChrName: 今回起きていることを考えると 色々と想像しちまうが……
jpnSearchText:
今回起きていることを考えると
色々と想像しちまうが……

engChrName: That's understandable, yeah... I find it hard to believe it was just an accident, with how careful everyone's been. This feels premeditated.
engSearchText:
That's understandable, yeah... I find it hard to believe
it was just an accident, with how careful
everyone's been. This feels premeditated.
jpnChrName: ……何か意図のようなものを感じますね。
jpnSearchText: ……何か意図のようなものを感じますね。

engChrName: Yeah. With all the weird shit goin' on, it's hard to chalk anything up to coincidence right now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. With all the weird shit goin' on, it's hard to
chalk anything up to coincidence right now.
jpnChrName: ああ……色々と信じられないような事が 起きている今は特にな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……色々と信じられないような事が
起きている今は特にな。

engChrName: There's just so much going on... We'll keep an eye out for any leads about your parts, though.
engSearchText:
There's just so much going on... We'll keep an eye
out for any leads about your parts, though.
jpnChrName: 何がなんだか分かりませんけど…… 一応、気を付けた方がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
何がなんだか分かりませんけど……
一応、気を付けた方がよさそうですね。

engChrName: Thanks... Man, I'm sorry, folks. You've got enough on your plate without us and our stupid supply hiccups.
engSearchText:
Thanks... Man, I'm sorry, folks. You've got enough
on your plate without us and our stupid
supply hiccups.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、バーゼル全体が大変だって時に ややこしい問題を起こしちまって。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、バーゼル全体が大変だって時に
ややこしい問題を起こしちまって。

engChrName: We're still trying to find Callaghan, but we haven't got any good leads yet.
engSearchText:
We're still trying to find Callaghan, but we haven't
got any good leads yet.
jpnChrName: こっちでもキャラハンの行方は探ってるが まだ手がかりらしい手がかりは見つかっちゃいなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
こっちでもキャラハンの行方は探ってるが
まだ手がかりらしい手がかりは見つかっちゃいなくてな。

engChrName: Our best guess is that he's somewhere off the beaten path. Mighta holed himself up somewhere on purpose, even.
engSearchText:
Our best guess is that he's somewhere off the
beaten path. Mighta holed himself up somewhere on
purpose, even.
jpnChrName: 普段人目につかねえ、打ち捨てられたような 場所なんかがクサいと思ってるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
普段人目につかねえ、打ち捨てられたような
場所なんかがクサいと思ってるんだが……

engChrName: That does sound like a good guess.
engSearchText: That does sound like a good guess.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、 可能性としては有り得そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、
可能性としては有り得そうですね。

engChrName: Well, if you learn anything, let us know.
engSearchText: Well, if you learn anything, let us know.
jpnChrName: 何か分かったらこっちにも知らせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 何か分かったらこっちにも知らせてくれ。

engChrName: You couldn't have timed your arrival better.
engSearchText: You couldn't have timed your arrival better.
jpnChrName: あら、貴方たち、ちょうど良かったわ。
jpnSearchText: あら、貴方たち、ちょうど良かったわ。

engChrName: Renne! We weren't expecting to find you here.
engSearchText: Renne! We weren't expecting to find you here.
jpnChrName: レン先輩、ここにいたんですか。
jpnSearchText: レン先輩、ここにいたんですか。

engChrName: You want somethin' from us?
engSearchText: You want somethin' from us?
jpnChrName: なんだ、俺たちに用か？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、俺たちに用か？

engChrName: The opposite—I have something for you. A little piece of intel.
engSearchText:
The opposite—I have something for you. A little
piece of intel.
jpnChrName: 少し、共有したい情報があってね。
jpnSearchText: 少し、共有したい情報があってね。

engChrName: *sigh* Do you HAVE to go blabbing to them about it?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Do you HAVE to go blabbing to them
about it?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、別に裏解決屋とまで 共有しなくてもいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、別に裏解決屋とまで
共有しなくてもいいんだが。

engChrName: Hey, don't spoil her fun, killjoy. Ladies don't like a hardass.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't spoil her fun, killjoy. Ladies don't like
a hardass.
jpnChrName: ハッ、みみっちいこと言ってんじゃねえよ。 そんなんじゃモテねぇぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、みみっちいこと言ってんじゃねえよ。
そんなんじゃモテねぇぜ？

engChrName: Excuse me?!
engSearchText: Excuse me?!
jpnChrName: な、なにぃ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なにぃ！？

engChrName: *sigh* All right, boys, simmer down. Now's not the time for mouthing off.
engSearchText:
*sigh* All right, boys, simmer down. Now's not the
time for mouthing off.
jpnChrName: もう、話が進まないから………
jpnSearchText: もう、話が進まないから………

engChrName: So, what's this info about?
engSearchText: So, what's this info about?
jpnChrName: その情報ってのは？
jpnSearchText: その情報ってのは？

engChrName: To the surprise of no one, Almata was behind the explosion in Anchorville.
engSearchText:
To the surprise of no one, Almata was behind the
explosion in Anchorville.
jpnChrName: アンカーヴィルでの爆発事件── やっぱりアルマータのせいみたい。
jpnSearchText:
アンカーヴィルでの爆発事件──
やっぱりアルマータのせいみたい。

engChrName: It sounds like it's a mess out there right now, after word got out that Almata had corporate help.
engSearchText:
It sounds like it's a mess out there right now, after
word got out that Almata had corporate help.
jpnChrName: 取引のあった企業にも手伝わせたのが分かって 現場は混乱が極まっているみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
取引のあった企業にも手伝わせたのが分かって
現場は混乱が極まっているみたいね。

engChrName: Yeah. A lot of high-ranking bracers are stuck there right now trying to sort everything out.
engSearchText:
Yeah. A lot of high-ranking bracers are stuck there
right now trying to sort everything out.
jpnChrName: だからジンさんとエレインさんたち含め、 複数の高位遊撃士が対処に追われててな。
jpnSearchText:
だからジンさんとエレインさんたち含め、
複数の高位遊撃士が対処に追われててな。

engChrName: Honestly, I'd really rather be out there right now, but we're tied up here.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'd really rather be out there right now, but
we're tied up here.
jpnChrName: 俺も応援に駆け付けたいんだが……
jpnSearchText: 俺も応援に駆け付けたいんだが……

engChrName: Yeah. After yesterday, we're not leaving anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Yeah. After yesterday, we're not leaving
anytime soon.
jpnChrName: 昨日の事件もある── バーゼルのことも放っては置けないわ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の事件もある──
バーゼルのことも放っては置けないわ。

engChrName: Indeed. I'm still positive that the attack in Anchorville was just a diversion. Basel has to be their main target.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I'm still positive that the attack in
Anchorville was just a diversion. Basel has to be their
main target.
jpnChrName: その通りよ、あくまで“本命”は こっちだという推測は変わらないわ。
jpnSearchText:
その通りよ、あくまで“本命”は
こっちだという推測は変わらないわ。

engChrName: In fact, we know a little more about the agents who unleashed the archaisms in the city yesterday.
engSearchText:
In fact, we know a little more about the agents who
unleashed the archaisms in the city yesterday.
jpnChrName: 昨日、市内に人形兵器を放ったのも アルマータの“幹部”だったみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
昨日、市内に人形兵器を放ったのも
アルマータの“幹部”だったみたいでね。

engChrName: I strongly believe it was the same duo you met in Langport.
engSearchText:
I strongly believe it was the same duo you met
in Langport.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちが煌都で戦ったという２人で 間違いないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちが煌都で戦ったという２人で
間違いないでしょう。

engChrName: Them again?!
engSearchText: Them again?!
jpnChrName: ！　あいつらが……！
jpnSearchText: ！　あいつらが……！

engChrName: Viola and Alexandre... They caused a ton of trouble back in Langport, too.
engSearchText:
Viola and Alexandre... They caused a ton of trouble
back in Langport, too.
jpnChrName: ヴィオーラにアレクサンドルでしたか…… 煌都でも市内に魔獣や人形兵器を放っていましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ヴィオーラにアレクサンドルでしたか……
煌都でも市内に魔獣や人形兵器を放っていましたが。

engChrName: That's certainly not good...
engSearchText: That's certainly not good...
jpnChrName: そ、そんな人たちが……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな人たちが……

engChrName: That said, we shouldn't have to worry about them here now that Marduk is in town.
engSearchText:
That said, we shouldn't have to worry about them
here now that Marduk is in town.
jpnChrName: と言っても、マルドゥックの部隊が守っている以上、 市内が再び襲われる可能性は低いでしょうけど。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても、マルドゥックの部隊が守っている以上、
市内が再び襲われる可能性は低いでしょうけど。

engChrName: How many men have they got? We talking just one area or the whole city?
engSearchText:
How many men have they got? We talking just one
area or the whole city?
jpnChrName: ……ぶっちゃけどんくらいのもんなんだ、 そのマルドゥックの警備部隊ってのは？
jpnSearchText:
……ぶっちゃけどんくらいのもんなんだ、
そのマルドゥックの警備部隊ってのは？

engChrName: They have enough people on the ground to rival a large jaeger corps—and with vastly better equipment.
engSearchText:
They have enough people on the ground to rival a
large jaeger corps—and with vastly better equipment.
jpnChrName: 練度なら高位猟兵団に匹敵、 装備に関しては完全に上回るでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
練度なら高位猟兵団に匹敵、
装備に関しては完全に上回るでしょうね。

engChrName: Their chief of security in particular, he's a real force of nature.
engSearchText:
Their chief of security in particular, he's a real force
of nature.
jpnChrName: 特にあの警備主任は凄まじいらしくて……
jpnSearchText: 特にあの警備主任は凄まじいらしくて……

engChrName: Of course, I imagine you all know that pretty well already.
engSearchText:
Of course, I imagine you all know that pretty
well already.
jpnChrName: その辺りは裏解決屋さんと そこの妹さんの方が詳しいかしら。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りは裏解決屋さんと
そこの妹さんの方が詳しいかしら。

engChrName: Kasim...
engSearchText: Kasim...
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん……

engChrName: Yup. Gramps here described him as one of the strongest jaegers to walk the earth.
engSearchText:
Yup. Gramps here described him as one of the
strongest jaegers to walk the earth.
jpnChrName: ハン……オッサンが言うには “史上最強の一人”だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……オッサンが言うには
“史上最強の一人”だったか。

engChrName: It's funny. Guy's got this baby face—he doesn't even look thirty—but he gives off this vibe like he could kick your ass into next week.
engSearchText:
It's funny. Guy's got this baby face—he doesn't even
look thirty—but he gives off this vibe like he could
kick your ass into next week.
jpnChrName: まだ３０手前には見えたが たしかにあの圧力は……
jpnSearchText:
まだ３０手前には見えたが
たしかにあの圧力は……

engChrName: At any rate, the city's in good hands with him patrollin' around.
engSearchText:
At any rate, the city's in good hands with him
patrollin' around.
jpnChrName: ま、とにかく市内の警備は 任せて問題ないってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、とにかく市内の警備は
任せて問題ないってことだ。

engChrName: We still gotta figure out what Almata's plotting next, though.
engSearchText:
We still gotta figure out what Almata's plotting
next, though.
jpnChrName: それよりアルマータの方が どう出るかが気になる。
jpnSearchText:
それよりアルマータの方が
どう出るかが気になる。

engChrName: Speaking of, you confirmed those two you encountered yesterday were connected to the Gardens, correct?
engSearchText:
Speaking of, you confirmed those two you
encountered yesterday were connected to the
Gardens, correct?
jpnChrName: そう言えば、昨日貴方たちが遭遇した二人、 《庭園》の関係者って確定したそうね？
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば、昨日貴方たちが遭遇した二人、
《庭園》の関係者って確定したそうね？

engChrName: Yeah. Said they were overseers.
engSearchText: Yeah. Said they were overseers.
jpnChrName: ああ、二人とも自分から “管理人”ってのを名乗ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、二人とも自分から
“管理人”ってのを名乗ってな。

engChrName: That checks out—they've got four units, and an overseer in charge of each one.
engSearchText:
That checks out—they've got four units, and an
overseer in charge of each one.
jpnChrName: ４つの“庭”を司る管理人── 今までの情報と合わせても間違いなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
４つの“庭”を司る管理人──
今までの情報と合わせても間違いなさそうだ。

engChrName: The two of them seemed to be connected to Almata differently, though.
engSearchText:
The two of them seemed to be connected to Almata
differently, though.
jpnChrName: ですがそれぞれ微妙に 立場が違うような印象でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ですがそれぞれ微妙に
立場が違うような印象でしたね。

engChrName: Melchior is both an overseer and a high-ranking executive in Almata.
engSearchText:
Melchior is both an overseer and a high-ranking
executive in Almata.
jpnChrName: メルキオルという人はアルマータの 幹部の一人のはずですが──
jpnSearchText:
メルキオルという人はアルマータの
幹部の一人のはずですが──

engChrName: But his cohort said that she was only a contractor.
engSearchText: But his cohort said that she was only a contractor.
jpnChrName: 人形使いの女性は単に“契約”で 協力しているだけという口ぶりでした。
jpnSearchText:
人形使いの女性は単に“契約”で
協力しているだけという口ぶりでした。

engChrName: Talk about complicated... I wonder what the story there is?
engSearchText:
Talk about complicated... I wonder what the story
there is?
jpnChrName: ややこしいな…… 一体どうなってるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ややこしいな……
一体どうなってるんだ？

engChrName: We're not much the wiser than you guys there, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
We're not much the wiser than you guys
there, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: さあな、あいつらが一体 どういう繋がりかは分からねえが……
jpnSearchText:
さあな、あいつらが一体
どういう繋がりかは分からねえが……

engChrName: What we do know is that the most monstrous mafia and most vile assassins to ever live have joined hands—and that ain't good.
engSearchText:
What we do know is that the most monstrous mafia
and most vile assassins to ever live have joined
hands—and that ain't good.
jpnChrName: 最悪のマフィアと最悪の暗殺者どもが 手を組んじまっているのは確実だろう。
jpnSearchText:
最悪のマフィアと最悪の暗殺者どもが
手を組んじまっているのは確実だろう。

engChrName: Indeed. After we have Basel taken care of, we'll need to devise a strategy for dealing with them.
engSearchText:
Indeed. After we have Basel taken care of, we'll need
to devise a strategy for dealing with them.
jpnChrName: そうね、対策は必要そうだけど…… 今はとにかくバーゼルのことね。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、対策は必要そうだけど……
今はとにかくバーゼルのことね。

engChrName: Have you managed to learn anything more about what Almata's up to here?
engSearchText:
Have you managed to learn anything more about
what Almata's up to here?
jpnChrName: 貴方たちの方は何か進展があったかしら？
jpnSearchText: 貴方たちの方は何か進展があったかしら？

engChrName: Unfortunately not...
engSearchText: Unfortunately not...
jpnChrName: 残念ながらこれといったものは……
jpnSearchText: 残念ながらこれといったものは……

engChrName: If anything, we were hoping you might have a lead on where Professor Callaghan might be.
engSearchText:
If anything, we were hoping you might have a lead on
where Professor Callaghan might be.
jpnChrName: むしろＡＩ化したキャラハン教授の居場所について 先輩に何か手掛かりがないかと……
jpnSearchText:
むしろＡＩ化したキャラハン教授の居場所について
先輩に何か手掛かりがないかと……

engChrName: I wish I did, but I'm not too familiar with the geography of this area.
engSearchText:
I wish I did, but I'm not too familiar with the
geography of this area.
jpnChrName: この辺の地理に詳しくないから 手掛かりになりそうなものはないわね……
jpnSearchText:
この辺の地理に詳しくないから
手掛かりになりそうなものはないわね……

engChrName: I tried to see if I could find anything on the net, but they covered their tracks, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
I tried to see if I could find anything on the net, but
they covered their tracks, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: 一応導力ネットの方も探ってみたけど、 さすがに尻尾は見せていないわ。
jpnSearchText:
一応導力ネットの方も探ってみたけど、
さすがに尻尾は見せていないわ。

engChrName: Sorry for coming up empty handed.
engSearchText: Sorry for coming up empty handed.
jpnChrName: 期待に応えられそうになくてごめんなさいね。
jpnSearchText: 期待に応えられそうになくてごめんなさいね。

engChrName: Don't worry about it. It really wasn't going to be that easy.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. It really wasn't going to be
that easy.
jpnChrName: いえ、やはりそう都合よくはありませんね。
jpnSearchText: いえ、やはりそう都合よくはありませんね。

engChrName: Aside from that, my only other advice is to keep the septium veins in mind. They're more relevant than you might think.
engSearchText:
Aside from that, my only other advice is to keep the
septium veins in mind. They're more relevant than
you might think.
jpnChrName: 強いて言うなら、七耀脈の流れにも 注意した方がいいと念のため言っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
強いて言うなら、七耀脈の流れにも
注意した方がいいと念のため言っておくわ。

engChrName: The septium veins...?
engSearchText: The septium veins...?
jpnChrName: 七耀脈……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 七耀脈……ですか？

engChrName: I recall Risette mentioning those recently, actually.
engSearchText: I recall Risette mentioning those recently, actually.
jpnChrName: リゼットさんの話にも出ていましたね。
jpnSearchText: リゼットさんの話にも出ていましたね。

engChrName: They do have a tendency to affect the orbal network, in particular.
engSearchText:
They do have a tendency to affect the orbal network,
in particular.
jpnChrName: 特に注目すべきなのは 導力ネットとの関係ね。
jpnSearchText:
特に注目すべきなのは
導力ネットとの関係ね。

engChrName: At first glance, they appear unrelated. We had no way to prove they were at all related...
engSearchText:
At first glance, they appear unrelated. We had no way
to prove they were at all related...
jpnChrName: 現代技術の結晶である導力ネットとは 縁遠いもののように思われるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
現代技術の結晶である導力ネットとは
縁遠いもののように思われるけれど……

engChrName: ...until a certain phenomenon in Crossbell demonstrated that the two CAN affect each other under the right conditions.
engSearchText:
...until a certain phenomenon in Crossbell
demonstrated that the two CAN affect each other
under the right conditions.
jpnChrName: 特殊な条件下で互いに影響し合うことは 一年半前の事件でも確認されているわ。
jpnSearchText:
特殊な条件下で互いに影響し合うことは
一年半前の事件でも確認されているわ。

engChrName: This incident here is eerily reminiscent of what happened a year and a half ago. It's just my hunch, though.
engSearchText:
This incident here is eerily reminiscent of what
happened a year and a half ago. It's just my
hunch, though.
jpnChrName: 今回の事件との共通点も多い──もしかすると 何らかの形で関わっているかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
今回の事件との共通点も多い──もしかすると
何らかの形で関わっているかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Well, that does make a lot of sense.
engSearchText: Well, that does make a lot of sense.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そんな着眼点があるのか……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そんな着眼点があるのか……

engChrName: Yeah. Thanks for the pointer.
engSearchText: Yeah. Thanks for the pointer.
jpnChrName: 参考にさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 参考にさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Well, we're gonna get back to trackin' down Callaghan. What are you three up to?
engSearchText:
Well, we're gonna get back to trackin'
down Callaghan. What are you three up to?
jpnChrName: 俺たちはこのままキャラハンを追うつもりだが、 アンタらはどうする？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちはこのままキャラハンを追うつもりだが、
アンタらはどうする？

engChrName: We'll be doing the rounds to keep the city under control. We can't just leave it all to Marduk.
engSearchText:
We'll be doing the rounds to keep the city
under control. We can't just leave it all to Marduk.
jpnChrName: 私たちは市内の警備に参加するつもりよ。 マルドゥックにだけ任せるわけにはいかないから。
jpnSearchText:
私たちは市内の警備に参加するつもりよ。
マルドゥックにだけ任せるわけにはいかないから。

engChrName: Yeah. They're good, don't get me wrong, but they're even shadier than you guys are. I don't trust 'em.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They're good, don't get me wrong, but they're
even shadier than you guys are. I don't trust 'em.
jpnChrName: いくら実力が保証されても、 彼はお前たち以上に胡散臭いからな。
jpnSearchText:
いくら実力が保証されても、
彼はお前たち以上に胡散臭いからな。

engChrName: I'll be helping out, too, until there's some other development that demands my attention.
engSearchText:
I'll be helping out, too, until there's some other
development that demands my attention.
jpnChrName: 何か進展があるまで 私は引き続きこっちを手伝うわ。
jpnSearchText:
何か進展があるまで
私は引き続きこっちを手伝うわ。

engChrName: I need to keep an eye on all the other students as well.
engSearchText: I need to keep an eye on all the other students as well.
jpnChrName: 視察研修の方にも気を配らないと。
jpnSearchText: 視察研修の方にも気を配らないと。

engChrName: We're all waiting here for you, Agnès—Odette and Albert, too. Don't forget that, okay?
engSearchText:
We're all waiting here for you, Agnès—Odette and
Albert, too. Don't forget that, okay?
jpnChrName: アニエス、オデットやアルベール君たちが 待っていることを忘れちゃダメよ？
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、オデットやアルベール君たちが
待っていることを忘れちゃダメよ？

engChrName: I won't. Please be careful, Renne.
engSearchText: I won't. Please be careful, Renne.
jpnChrName: ──はい。 先輩も、どうかお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
──はい。
先輩も、どうかお気をつけて。

engChrName: The aerotrams aren't moving!
engSearchText: The aerotrams aren't moving!
jpnChrName: エアロトラムは止まっています……！
jpnSearchText: エアロトラムは止まっています……！

engChrName: Well, great. To the bridge, then! Haul ass!
engSearchText: Well, great. To the bridge, then! Haul ass!
jpnChrName: めんどくせぇが、橋の方から渡るぞ！
jpnSearchText: めんどくせぇが、橋の方から渡るぞ！

engChrName: Where would you like to go?
engSearchText: Where would you like to go?
jpnChrName: エアロトラムを使って どちらに向かいますか？
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムを使って
どちらに向かいますか？

engChrName: Authentication Rank error.
engSearchText: Authentication Rank error.
jpnChrName: 認証ランクエラー、残念ですがご利用できません。
jpnSearchText: 認証ランクエラー、残念ですがご利用できません。

engChrName: Joy.
engSearchText: Joy.
jpnChrName: ちっ、やっぱりだめか。
jpnSearchText: ちっ、やっぱりだめか。

engChrName: It's locked.
engSearchText: It's locked.
jpnChrName: 施錠されていますね。
jpnSearchText: 施錠されていますね。

engChrName: Yeah. Guess we'll have to come back another time.
engSearchText: Yeah. Guess we'll have to come back another time.
jpnChrName: ああ、またの機会に訪ねてみるか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、またの機会に訪ねてみるか。

engChrName: Head to the Institute of Science?
engSearchText: Head to the Institute of Science?
jpnChrName: 理科大学方面に向かいますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>理科大学方面に向かいますか？

engChrName: Your card would let you ride to the institute yourself if you wanted to. That said...
engSearchText:
Your card would let you ride to the institute yourself
if you wanted to. That said...
jpnChrName: 今のカードランクなら ここから大学に行けるけど……
jpnSearchText:
今のカードランクなら
ここから大学に行けるけど……

engChrName: I wanna try riding the aerotram!
engSearchText: I wanna try riding the aerotram!
jpnChrName: せっかくなら エアロトラムで行ってみたいです！
jpnSearchText:
せっかくなら
エアロトラムで行ってみたいです！

engChrName: I agree with Ms. Al-Fayed. It does sound like fun.
engSearchText: I agree with Ms. Al-Fayed. It does sound like fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 私も興味があります。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
私も興味があります。

engChrName: Authentication Rank error.
engSearchText: Authentication Rank error.
jpnChrName: 認証ランクエラー、残念ですがご利用できません。
jpnSearchText: 認証ランクエラー、残念ですがご利用できません。

engChrName: Bah. We ain't allowed.
engSearchText: Bah. We ain't allowed.
jpnChrName: ちっ、やっぱり通れないか。
jpnSearchText: ちっ、やっぱり通れないか。

engChrName: Our card rank just isn't high enough...
engSearchText: Our card rank just isn't high enough...
jpnChrName: カードのランクが足りませんね……
jpnSearchText: カードのランクが足りませんね……

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: Huh. This one's real serious soundin'.
engSearchText: Huh. This one's real serious soundin'.
jpnChrName: 教授のパワハラの告発か…… 深刻そうな文面だな。
jpnSearchText:
教授のパワハラの告発か……
深刻そうな文面だな。

engChrName: Yeah...and I understand why they don't want to go to the guild or the police about it.
engSearchText:
Yeah...and I understand why they don't want to go to
the guild or the police about it.
jpnChrName: そうですね、ギルドにも警察にも 相談できないようですし……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、ギルドにも警察にも
相談できないようですし……

engChrName: I really hope we can help them while we're here.
engSearchText: I really hope we can help them while we're here.
jpnChrName: 出来る事なら、私達がバーゼルにいる内に 力になってあげたいです。
jpnSearchText:
出来る事なら、私達がバーゼルにいる内に
力になってあげたいです。

engChrName: We might learn more about what's going on in the institute while we're working on it, too. That'd be two birds with one stone!
engSearchText:
We might learn more about what's going on in the
institute while we're working on it, too. That'd be two
birds with one stone!
jpnChrName: それに、大学の中の事情も掴めそうですし 一石二鳥かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
それに、大学の中の事情も掴めそうですし
一石二鳥かもしれませんね。

engChrName: Makes sense. Sounds harmless to me, but what's your take?
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Sounds harmless to me, but what's
your take?
jpnChrName: まあな…… やって損は無さそうだがどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
まあな……
やって損は無さそうだがどうすんだ？

engChrName: Feri brought up a good point. We can get some info on the institute while we work this case.
engSearchText:
Feri brought up a good point. We can get some info
on the institute while we work this case.
jpnChrName: ああ、こいつは引き受けておこう。 お前の言う通り情報収集の一環として役に立ちそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、こいつは引き受けておこう。
お前の言う通り情報収集の一環として役に立ちそうだ。

engChrName: Pretty vague, though. They didn't give their name OR the professor they're accusin'.
engSearchText:
Pretty vague, though. They didn't give their name
OR the professor they're accusin'.
jpnChrName: しかし……差出人が匿名な上に、 相手の教授の名前も書かれてねえとはな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……差出人が匿名な上に、
相手の教授の名前も書かれてねえとはな。

engChrName: Really goin' outta their way to make our job difficult.
engSearchText: Really goin' outta their way to make our job difficult.
jpnChrName: 加害者と被害者をゼロから調査しろって事か？ 随分と回りくどいやり方だな。
jpnSearchText:
加害者と被害者をゼロから調査しろって事か？
随分と回りくどいやり方だな。

engChrName: Naming names in this case may result in the professor or other parties threatening the whistleblower.
engSearchText:
Naming names in this case may result in the professor
or other parties threatening the whistleblower.
jpnChrName: 可能性としては……この依頼内容を 第三者に見られる可能性を危惧していたとか。
jpnSearchText:
可能性としては……この依頼内容を
第三者に見られる可能性を危惧していたとか。

engChrName: I believe our client just prefers to err on the side of caution.
engSearchText:
I believe our client just prefers to err on the side
of caution.
jpnChrName: それほどまでに徹底した 相手なのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
それほどまでに徹底した
相手なのかもしれません。

engChrName: Yeah, that tracks.
engSearchText: Yeah, that tracks.
jpnChrName: へぇ、確かに可能性の一つとしては ありえそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、確かに可能性の一つとしては
ありえそうだな。

engChrName: Fair enough. Risette, can you handle recording our convos?
engSearchText:
Fair enough. Risette, can you handle recording
our convos?
jpnChrName: それじゃ早速聞き込みを始めるぞ。 ボイスレコーダーはリゼットに頼めるか？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ早速聞き込みを始めるぞ。
ボイスレコーダーはリゼットに頼めるか？

engChrName: Certainly.
engSearchText: Certainly.
jpnChrName: はい、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: はい、かしこまりました。

engChrName: We gotta be careful who we talk to about this, though. Client doesn't want word of this gettin' out.
engSearchText:
We gotta be careful who we talk to about
this, though. Client doesn't want word of this
gettin' out.
jpnChrName: 声をかける相手は依頼主の指定通り、 慎重に選んだ方が良いかもな。
jpnSearchText:
声をかける相手は依頼主の指定通り、
慎重に選んだ方が良いかもな。

engChrName: Let's start with people unrelated to the institute—that way, we don't accidentally hit a nerve.
engSearchText:
Let's start with people unrelated to the institute—that
way, we don't accidentally hit a nerve.
jpnChrName: 一旦は大学関係者への聞き込みは避けて、 大まかに知ってそうなヤツに話を聞くか。
jpnSearchText:
一旦は大学関係者への聞き込みは避けて、
大まかに知ってそうなヤツに話を聞くか。

engChrName: That makes sense to me. I imagine there will be plenty of those here in the Artisanal District.
engSearchText:
That makes sense to me. I imagine there will be
plenty of those here in the Artisanal District.
jpnChrName: それならきっと、 この職人街にも何人かいるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
それならきっと、
この職人街にも何人かいるはずです。

engChrName: Let's get started!
engSearchText: Let's get started!
jpnChrName: 早速話をしに行ってみましょう！
jpnSearchText: 早速話をしに行ってみましょう！

engChrName: Quest School of Hard Knocks started!
engSearchText: Quest School of Hard Knocks started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【パワハラ教授の告発】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>パワハラ教授の告発<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: A professor abusing their assistants? Hmm...
engSearchText: A professor abusing their assistants? Hmm...
jpnChrName: 教授によるパワハラねえ……
jpnSearchText: 教授によるパワハラねえ……

engChrName: Well, I'm not sure why you're asking me specifically about it, to be honest.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not sure why you're asking me specifically
about it, to be honest.
jpnChrName: そういう話なら俺よりも 詳しい人がいるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
そういう話なら俺よりも
詳しい人がいるんじゃないか？

engChrName: I just work in Verne's procurement division. I don't attend the institute or work with them directly at all.
engSearchText:
I just work in Verne's procurement division. I don't
attend the institute or work with them directly at all.
jpnChrName: 俺はヴェルヌの調達部門のスタッフで 大学の人間じゃないぞ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はヴェルヌの調達部門のスタッフで
大学の人間じゃないぞ。

engChrName: We know, and that's exactly the angle we want. Word travels, y'know?
engSearchText:
We know, and that's exactly the angle we want.
Word travels, y'know?
jpnChrName: ああ、そんなアンタだからこそ 話を聞かせて欲しいと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そんなアンタだからこそ
話を聞かせて欲しいと思ってな。

engChrName: I get that... I haven't really heard anything about it, though. Sorry.
engSearchText:
I get that... I haven't really heard anything about
it, though. Sorry.
jpnChrName: ううん……悪いけど、特に心当たりは無いな。
jpnSearchText: ううん……悪いけど、特に心当たりは無いな。

engChrName: Verne and the institute are very closely linked, though, and that does create conflicts of interest sometimes.
engSearchText:
Verne and the institute are very closely linked,
though, and that does create conflicts of
interest sometimes.
jpnChrName: だが、理科大学はヴェルヌ社と 産学協同の体制だろ？
jpnSearchText:
だが、理科大学はヴェルヌ社と
産学協同の体制だろ？

engChrName: I may not have heard about it, but it IS believable. It's very possible the two sides are stressing each other out.
engSearchText:
I may not have heard about it, but it IS believable.
It's very possible the two sides are stressing each
other out.
jpnChrName: そこで衝突があったりして、教授達に ストレスが溜まるのは想像がつくよ。
jpnSearchText:
そこで衝突があったりして、教授達に
ストレスが溜まるのは想像がつくよ。

engChrName: Could you tell us a bit more about how Verne and the institute work together?
engSearchText:
Could you tell us a bit more about how Verne and the
institute work together?
jpnChrName: むむ……“さんがくきょうどう” というのは何なんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
むむ……“さんがくきょうどう”
というのは何なんでしょうか？

engChrName: The Verne Company awards grants to the Institute of Science to research and develop new products on their behalf.
engSearchText:
The Verne Company awards grants to the Institute of
Science to research and develop new products on
their behalf.
jpnChrName: 企業が新製品開発のために研究費用を出資…… 大学がその研究を請け負う体制のことですね。
jpnSearchText:
企業が新製品開発のために研究費用を出資……
大学がその研究を請け負う体制のことですね。

engChrName: That allows the Verne Company to curate their products with research from the institute's experts.
engSearchText:
That allows the Verne Company to curate their
products with research from the institute's experts.
jpnChrName: それによって、学術的な観点から練られた 精巧な製品を売り出す事が出来るのです。
jpnSearchText:
それによって、学術的な観点から練られた
精巧な製品を売り出す事が出来るのです。

engChrName: Oh, wow! That's really neat.
engSearchText: Oh, wow! That's really neat.
jpnChrName: へぇ～、勉強になりますっ。
jpnSearchText: へぇ～、勉強になりますっ。

engChrName: If I recall, Verne can trace its roots back to the old Artisans' Guild, and to the institute itself.
engSearchText:
If I recall, Verne can trace its roots back to the old
Artisans' Guild, and to the institute itself.
jpnChrName: でもヴェルヌ社は、バーゼルの旧職人組合と、 理科大学が母体となってる企業ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
でもヴェルヌ社は、バーゼルの旧職人組合と、
理科大学が母体となってる企業ですよね。

engChrName: I always figured they worked well together because of that.
engSearchText:
I always figured they worked well together because
of that.
jpnChrName: それだけに、連携が取れているのかと 思ってましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
それだけに、連携が取れているのかと
思ってましたけど……

engChrName: They did... Past tense. They had good relations while their senior advisor was still there.
engSearchText:
They did... Past tense. They had good relations while
their senior advisor was still there.
jpnChrName: まあなぁ……でもそれは 最高顧問が不在になる前の話さ。
jpnSearchText:
まあなぁ……でもそれは
最高顧問が不在になる前の話さ。

engChrName: Alas, she left Basel some time ago. Now Verne and the institute hardly collaborate at all—it's every project for itself.
engSearchText:
Alas, she left Basel some time ago. Now Verne and
the institute hardly collaborate at all—it's every
project for itself.
jpnChrName: 今じゃヴェルヌ社と大学で お互いに好き勝手やってるって噂だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
今じゃヴェルヌ社と大学で
お互いに好き勝手やってるって噂だぜ。

engChrName: Maybe the asshat in charge scared her off?
engSearchText: Maybe the asshat in charge scared her off?
jpnChrName: ハッ、まあＣＥＯのあの態度を見れば それも納得だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、まあＣＥＯのあの態度を見れば
それも納得だな。

engChrName: Thanks for the info. That helps a lot.
engSearchText: Thanks for the info. That helps a lot.
jpnChrName: 色々と参考になったぜ。 情報提供ありがとな。
jpnSearchText:
色々と参考になったぜ。
情報提供ありがとな。

engChrName: Hmm... Doesn't ring a bell, sorry. My son is studying at the institute, and he's never told me about anything like that.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Doesn't ring a bell, sorry. My son is studying
at the institute, and he's never told me about anything
like that.
jpnChrName: いやぁ……ウチの息子が理科大学に通ってるが そういう話は聞いた事がねえな。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ……ウチの息子が理科大学に通ってるが
そういう話は聞いた事がねえな。

engChrName: That doesn't prove it one way or the other, of course, I just haven't heard about it.
engSearchText:
That doesn't prove it one way or the other, of course,
I just haven't heard about it.
jpnChrName: まあ俺に言ってこないだけで、 実際にはパワハラがあるのかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ俺に言ってこないだけで、
実際にはパワハラがあるのかもしれねえが。

engChrName: Did he tell you about any other stuff? Anything helps.
engSearchText: Did he tell you about any other stuff? Anything helps.
jpnChrName: それでも何か知ってる事はねえか？ この際何でもいいからよ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも何か知ってる事はねえか？
この際何でもいいからよ。

engChrName: Hmm... Well...sometimes I do hear about people in the same lab butting heads over funding.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Well...sometimes I do hear about people in
the same lab butting heads over funding.
jpnChrName: そういや……研究室の仲間同士で 研究成果や研究費を巡って揉める事はあるそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや……研究室の仲間同士で
研究成果や研究費を巡って揉める事はあるそうだな。

engChrName: I heard these grumblings about two professors going at it, even. Seems like a pretty stressful place.
engSearchText:
I heard these grumblings about two professors going
at it, even. Seems like a pretty stressful place.
jpnChrName: 近頃は教授同士でも火花を散らしてるとか何とか……
jpnSearchText: 近頃は教授同士でも火花を散らしてるとか何とか……

engChrName: With all the greed and infighting over projects, it sounds like it's got everybody at each other's throats.
engSearchText:
With all the greed and infighting over projects, it
sounds like it's got everybody at each other's throats.
jpnChrName: 妬みやら嫉みやらで、 大学ってのは人間関係も大変らしいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
妬みやら嫉みやらで、
大学ってのは人間関係も大変らしいぞ。

engChrName: That makes sense, yeah... That might be what started the harassment.
engSearchText:
That makes sense, yeah... That might be what started
the harassment.
jpnChrName: なるほど……そういう問題とパワハラが 繋がっている可能性もありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……そういう問題とパワハラが
繋がっている可能性もありそうです。

engChrName: Do you know which professors specifically?
engSearchText: Do you know which professors specifically?
jpnChrName: ちなみにそれは、 誰の事なのか分かりますか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにそれは、
誰の事なのか分かりますか？

engChrName: I really can't remember, sorry. I feel like there was at least one of Professor Hamilton's students involved, but that's all I got.
engSearchText:
I really can't remember, sorry. I feel like there was at
least one of Professor Hamilton's students involved,
but that's all I got.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、うろ覚えなんだがな…… ハミルトン門下がどうのって聞いた気がするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、うろ覚えなんだがな……
ハミルトン門下がどうのって聞いた気がするぜ。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: ハミルトン門下ですか……
jpnSearchText: ハミルトン門下ですか……

engChrName: I wonder if this professor was jealous of someone else, or someone envied them instead.
engSearchText:
I wonder if this professor was jealous of someone else,
or someone envied them instead.
jpnChrName: 妬んでいる側なのか、妬まれている側なのかは 分かりませんが……
jpnSearchText:
妬んでいる側なのか、妬まれている側なのかは
分かりませんが……

engChrName: Well, thanks for the info, all the same.
engSearchText: Well, thanks for the info, all the same.
jpnChrName: ああ、情報提供ありがとな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、情報提供ありがとな。

engChrName: That wasn't fair! You cheated! You didn't outdrive me at all!
engSearchText:
That wasn't fair! You cheated! You didn't outdrive me
at all!
jpnChrName: ディックったらずるいよ……！ ディックだけの力じゃなかったでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
ディックったらずるいよ……！
ディックだけの力じゃなかったでしょ！

engChrName: H-Hey, a win's a win! You're such a sore loser!
engSearchText: H-Hey, a win's a win! You're such a sore loser!
jpnChrName: そ、それでも勝ちは勝ちだろ！
jpnSearchText: そ、それでも勝ちは勝ちだろ！

engChrName: You ALWAYS win against me! I deserve to win, too!
engSearchText: You ALWAYS win against me! I deserve to win, too!
jpnChrName: だいたいな、いつもミーリアが 勝ってるんだから偶にはいいじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
だいたいな、いつもミーリアが
勝ってるんだから偶にはいいじゃねえか！

engChrName: E-Easy, easy. I'm sorry for butting in like that.
engSearchText: E-Easy, easy. I'm sorry for butting in like that.
jpnChrName: ふ、二人とも喧嘩は止めるんだ、 勝手に手を出した俺が悪かったから……！
jpnSearchText:
ふ、二人とも喧嘩は止めるんだ、
勝手に手を出した俺が悪かったから……！

engChrName: Maybe next time we can give Millia a little boost to balance it out, okay?
engSearchText:
Maybe next time we can give Millia a little boost to
balance it out, okay?
jpnChrName: なあ、それなら次は俺がミーリアちゃんに 手を貸すっていうのはどうかな？
jpnSearchText:
なあ、それなら次は俺がミーリアちゃんに
手を貸すっていうのはどうかな？

engChrName: But that wouldn't be fair either! I just wanna beat him fair and square, okay?!
engSearchText:
But that wouldn't be fair either! I just wanna beat him
fair and square, okay?!
jpnChrName: あのね、私は正々堂々勝負したいの。 そもそもフェアじゃない勝負は認めないから！
jpnSearchText:
あのね、私は正々堂々勝負したいの。
そもそもフェアじゃない勝負は認めないから！

engChrName: Hey, don't take it out on him for helping! Why can't you just suck it up?!
engSearchText:
Hey, don't take it out on him for helping! Why can't
you just suck it up?!
jpnChrName: 協力してくれた兄ちゃんに突っかかるなよな！ 負け惜しみなんて格好悪いぜ！？
jpnSearchText:
協力してくれた兄ちゃんに突っかかるなよな！
負け惜しみなんて格好悪いぜ！？

engChrName: Ugh... This is just great...
engSearchText: Ugh... This is just great...
jpnChrName: うぐっ……弱ったな…………
jpnSearchText: うぐっ……弱ったな…………

engChrName: Huh... Didn't expect to find one of Elaine's coworkers in an argument with some kids.
engSearchText:
Huh... Didn't expect to find one of Elaine's
coworkers in an argument with some kids.
jpnChrName: 揉めてる声がすると思えば…… さっきのエレインの後輩遊撃士じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
揉めてる声がすると思えば……
さっきのエレインの後輩遊撃士じゃねえか。

engChrName: He looks like he could use a hand, too...
engSearchText: He looks like he could use a hand, too...
jpnChrName: なんだか手を焼いているみたいですけど、 大丈夫でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
なんだか手を焼いているみたいですけど、
大丈夫でしょうか……？

engChrName: Hey. Fancy runnin' into you here.
engSearchText: Hey. Fancy runnin' into you here.
jpnChrName: よう、また会ったな。
jpnSearchText: よう、また会ったな。

engChrName: What happened to the hot shit bracer I bumped into earlier? Can't break up an argument between a couple kids?
engSearchText:
What happened to the hot shit bracer I bumped
into earlier? Can't break up an argument between a
couple kids?
jpnChrName: さっきまでは格好ついてたってのに 早速テンパってやがるみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
さっきまでは格好ついてたってのに
早速テンパってやがるみてえだな？

engChrName: You?!
engSearchText: You?!
jpnChrName: お前達は……！
jpnSearchText: お前達は……！

engChrName: Goddess, of all the people... If you just wanna laugh at me, you can do that later. I'm on official business, so get lost!
engSearchText:
Goddess, of all the people... If you just wanna laugh
at me, you can do that later. I'm on official business,
so get lost!
jpnChrName: よりによってこんな所を見られるとは…… 嫌味を言いに来たなら帰ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
よりによってこんな所を見られるとは……
嫌味を言いに来たなら帰ってくれ。

engChrName: No, not at all! I apologize if we're interrupting you.
engSearchText: No, not at all! I apologize if we're interrupting you.
jpnChrName: すみません、 余計なお世話だという事は分かっています。
jpnSearchText:
すみません、
余計なお世話だという事は分かっています。

engChrName: It's just that you looked like you were in need of help.
engSearchText: It's just that you looked like you were in need of help.
jpnChrName: でも、アルヴィスさんが お困りのように見えたので……
jpnSearchText:
でも、アルヴィスさんが
お困りのように見えたので……

engChrName: So, what are you two arguing about? We heard a bit of the conversation, but could you fill us in?
engSearchText:
So, what are you two arguing about? We heard a bit
of the conversation, but could you fill us in?
jpnChrName: 話し声でなんとなく事情は分かりましたけど、 そこの２人はどうして喧嘩してるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
話し声でなんとなく事情は分かりましたけど、
そこの２人はどうして喧嘩してるんですか？

engChrName: We race each other with RC cars a lot.
engSearchText: We race each other with RC cars a lot.
jpnChrName: オレ達、よくラジコンで勝負してるんだ。
jpnSearchText: オレ達、よくラジコンで勝負してるんだ。

engChrName: But Millia's way too good a racer, so she usually wins. She really whooped me today, so I was down in the dumps...
engSearchText:
But Millia's way too good a racer, so she usually wins.
She really whooped me today, so I was down in
the dumps...
jpnChrName: でもミーリアがやたらと強くってさ…… 今日もオレの完敗で落ち込んでたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
でもミーリアがやたらと強くってさ……
今日もオレの完敗で落ち込んでたんだけど。

engChrName: ...but then this really cool bracer came over and offered to help!
engSearchText:
...but then this really cool bracer came over and
offered to help!
jpnChrName: そこで、遊撃士の兄ちゃんが オレに助太刀してくれたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
そこで、遊撃士の兄ちゃんが
オレに助太刀してくれたんだよ。

engChrName: Well, aren't you a model bracer, huh? The kids love you.
engSearchText:
Well, aren't you a model bracer, huh? The kids
love you.
jpnChrName: へぇ、遊撃士サマは子供にも優しい訳だ。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、遊撃士サマは子供にも優しい訳だ。

engChrName: I headed back to the guild after I ran into you guys, but then I came across these two after I started my rounds.
engSearchText:
I headed back to the guild after I ran into you guys,
but then I came across these two after I started
my rounds.
jpnChrName: ……あの後、一旦ギルドに戻ったんだが。 巡回に出た所でこの子達を見つけてな。
jpnSearchText:
……あの後、一旦ギルドに戻ったんだが。
巡回に出た所でこの子達を見つけてな。

engChrName: The boy's car is a Leno Land Carrier, just like the one we use at the guild.
engSearchText:
The boy's car is a Leno Land Carrier, just like the one
we use at the guild.
jpnChrName: この子が使ってるラジコンが ギルドで使ってる車と同じレノのＬＣ（ランドキャリア）だったから……
jpnSearchText:
この子が使ってるラジコンが
ギルドで使ってる車と同じレノのＬＣ（ランドキャリア）だったから……

engChrName: I, uh... I can't deny it got me a little curious. One thing led to another and I kinda lent him a hand.
engSearchText:
I, uh... I can't deny it got me a little curious.
One thing led to another and I kinda lent him
a hand.
jpnChrName: その……少し興味が湧いてしまってな。 負けてるみたいだったから手を貸したんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
その……少し興味が湧いてしまってな。
負けてるみたいだったから手を貸したんだよ。

engChrName: Huh. Didn't know they made RC versions of those. I dig it—even the li'l tykes can wheel these around.
engSearchText:
Huh. Didn't know they made RC versions of those.
I dig it—even the li'l tykes can wheel these around.
jpnChrName: へぇ、レノのＬＣのラジコンも出てるのか。 それで遊ぶとは中々ツウな子供だな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、レノのＬＣのラジコンも出てるのか。
それで遊ぶとは中々ツウな子供だな。

engChrName: Wait, wait, wait, hold on a second. Is that a Nightbreaker?!
engSearchText:
Wait, wait, wait, hold on a second. Is that
a Nightbreaker?!
jpnChrName: って──もう一台は インゲルトのＰＵトラックじゃねえか！？
jpnSearchText:
って──もう一台は
インゲルトのＰＵトラックじゃねえか！？

engChrName: Oh, now you mention it, yeah! It looks exactly like your car, just a different color.
engSearchText:
Oh, now you mention it, yeah! It looks exactly like
your car, just a different color.
jpnChrName: あっ、色は違いますが 確かにヴァンさんと同じ車ですね……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、色は違いますが
確かにヴァンさんと同じ車ですね……！

engChrName: They make radio-controlled versions of those, too?
engSearchText: They make radio-controlled versions of those, too?
jpnChrName: こちらもラジコンになっていたんですか。
jpnSearchText: こちらもラジコンになっていたんですか。

engChrName: Yup, they do! I'm a big fan of this model.
engSearchText: Yup, they do! I'm a big fan of this model.
jpnChrName: うん、私の自慢の愛車なの。
jpnSearchText: うん、私の自慢の愛車なの。

engChrName: Hey, you know what's up! When it comes to power, you can't beat an Ingert!
engSearchText:
Hey, you know what's up! When it comes to power,
you can't beat an Ingert!
jpnChrName: へっ、若いのに分かってるじゃねえか。 やっぱりインゲルトは最高だよなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
へっ、若いのに分かってるじゃねえか。
やっぱりインゲルトは最高だよなぁ！

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Totally agree with you!
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Totally agree with you!
jpnChrName: お兄さん分かってるね！ そう、インゲルトは最高だよね！
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん分かってるね！
そう、インゲルトは最高だよね！

engChrName: (...Umm, what am I watching?)
engSearchText: (...Umm, what am I watching?)
jpnChrName: （な、何だろうこのノリは……）
jpnSearchText: （な、何だろうこのノリは……）

engChrName: So, yeah. Today was just different.
engSearchText: So, yeah. Today was just different.
jpnChrName: でさ、問題なのはここからなんだ。
jpnSearchText: でさ、問題なのはここからなんだ。

engChrName: I followed the advice the bracer gave me, and I won! I actually won! I beat her for the first time in forever!
engSearchText:
I followed the advice the bracer gave me, and I won!
I actually won! I beat her for the first time in forever!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の兄ちゃんのアドバイスを聞きながら 勝負したら久しぶりにミーリアに勝てたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の兄ちゃんのアドバイスを聞きながら
勝負したら久しぶりにミーリアに勝てたんだよ。

engChrName: But Millia's being a real sore loser about it. I beat her fair and square!
engSearchText:
But Millia's being a real sore loser about it. I beat her
fair and square!
jpnChrName: でもミーリアが納得してくれなくてさ……
jpnSearchText: でもミーリアが納得してくれなくてさ……

engChrName: You DIDN'T beat me fair and square! You had a coach! I've always beaten you all by myself!
engSearchText:
You DIDN'T beat me fair and square! You had
a coach! I've always beaten you all by myself!
jpnChrName: だって、これまで何度も対戦して来たんだよ？ それで何度も私が勝った。
jpnSearchText:
だって、これまで何度も対戦して来たんだよ？
それで何度も私が勝った。

engChrName: But now I'm supposed to accept I lost because you got an adult to help you? How is that fair?!
engSearchText:
But now I'm supposed to accept I lost because you
got an adult to help you? How is that fair?!
jpnChrName: それなのに、フェアじゃない勝負での 負けを計算に入れられるなんて納得いかないの！
jpnSearchText:
それなのに、フェアじゃない勝負での
負けを計算に入れられるなんて納得いかないの！

engChrName: Oh, come on! It sucks losing all the time! Just lemme have this!
engSearchText:
Oh, come on! It sucks losing all the time! Just lemme
have this!
jpnChrName: 負けてばっかのオレに たまにはいい思いをさせてくれてもいいだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
負けてばっかのオレに
たまにはいい思いをさせてくれてもいいだろ！？

engChrName: Uh-uh! Beat me by yourself first!
engSearchText: Uh-uh! Beat me by yourself first!
jpnChrName: いい訳ないでしょ！
jpnSearchText: いい訳ないでしょ！

engChrName: If you're happy to CHEAT, then go race in the CHEATERS' club! You can win all you want there!
engSearchText:
If you're happy to CHEAT, then go race in the
CHEATERS' club! You can win all you want there!
jpnChrName: ディックも遊撃士のお兄さんも、 それでも車を愛してるって言えるの！？
jpnSearchText:
ディックも遊撃士のお兄さんも、
それでも車を愛してるって言えるの！？

engChrName: H-Hey! You wanna say that again?!
engSearchText: H-Hey! You wanna say that again?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだとぉ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだとぉ！？

engChrName: Look, I... I'm sorry. I realize in retrospect that I shouldn't have gotten involved.
engSearchText:
Look, I... I'm sorry. I realize in retrospect that I
shouldn't have gotten involved.
jpnChrName: わ、悪い事をしたと思ってるよ本当に。
jpnSearchText: わ、悪い事をしたと思ってるよ本当に。

engChrName: So, erm... Yeah. This is how it's been for the last minute or so.
engSearchText:
So, erm... Yeah. This is how it's been for the last
minute or so.
jpnChrName: とまあ、ずっとこの調子なんだ……
jpnSearchText: とまあ、ずっとこの調子なんだ……

engChrName: Ah... Yeah, that's a bit of a conundrum, isn't it?
engSearchText: Ah... Yeah, that's a bit of a conundrum, isn't it?
jpnChrName: あはは……一筋縄では いかなさそうな問題ですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……一筋縄では
いかなさそうな問題ですね。

engChrName: I got an idea, actually.
engSearchText: I got an idea, actually.
jpnChrName: なに、それなら簡単に解決する方法があるだろ。
jpnSearchText: なに、それなら簡単に解決する方法があるだろ。

engChrName: How do you feel about pairin' up with me, young lady?
engSearchText:
How do you feel about pairin' up with me,
young lady?
jpnChrName: なあお嬢ちゃん、俺と組んでみないか？
jpnSearchText: なあお嬢ちゃん、俺と組んでみないか？

engChrName: Alvis takes the boy and then we've got a perfectly fair two on two rematch.
engSearchText:
Alvis takes the boy and then we've got a perfectly fair
two on two rematch.
jpnChrName: 二対二で正々堂々とラジコン勝負を やり直すんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
二対二で正々堂々とラジコン勝負を
やり直すんだよ。

engChrName: Oooh! That sounds like a great idea!
engSearchText: Oooh! That sounds like a great idea!
jpnChrName: おお～！　すげーな兄ちゃん！ 名案じゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
おお～！　すげーな兄ちゃん！
名案じゃねえか！

engChrName: Yeah! That works for me. With an adult on my side, too, it'll actually be fair!
engSearchText:
Yeah! That works for me. With an adult on my side,
too, it'll actually be fair!
jpnChrName: それなら正々堂々戦えそうだね……！
jpnSearchText: それなら正々堂々戦えそうだね……！

engChrName: Excellent idea, Mr. Arkride. This should help them race each other more fairly.
engSearchText:
Excellent idea, Mr. Arkride. This should help them
race each other more fairly.
jpnChrName: なるほど、流石ですヴァン様。 わだかまりを解消するにはそれが一番かと。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、流石ですヴァン様。
わだかまりを解消するにはそれが一番かと。

engChrName: ...Okay, yeah, that's actually a good idea. Guess a broken clock's right twice a day.
engSearchText:
...Okay, yeah, that's actually a good idea. Guess a
broken clock's right twice a day.
jpnChrName: 悔しいが、確かに悪くない提案だな。
jpnSearchText: 悔しいが、確かに悪くない提案だな。

engChrName: I see right through you, though. You don't just do things out of the kindness of your heart.
engSearchText:
I see right through you, though. You don't just do
things out of the kindness of your heart.
jpnChrName: とはいえ──裏解決屋がなんの裏もなしに 手を貸すとも思えないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ──裏解決屋がなんの裏もなしに
手を貸すとも思えないんだが。

engChrName: You've got an ulterior motive, don't you?
engSearchText: You've got an ulterior motive, don't you?
jpnChrName: どういう魂胆なんだ？
jpnSearchText: どういう魂胆なんだ？

engChrName: ...Uhh, no. My intentions are as crystal clear as that pickup's paint job.
engSearchText:
...Uhh, no. My intentions are as crystal clear as that
pickup's paint job.
jpnChrName: なに、今回ばかりは裏も表もねえよ。
jpnSearchText: なに、今回ばかりは裏も表もねえよ。

engChrName: I just don't like seein' my favorite truck lose a rigged race. That's all there is to it, man: justice.
engSearchText:
I just don't like seein' my favorite truck lose a
rigged race. That's all there is to it, man: justice.
jpnChrName: 俺の愛車が負けたままじゃ引き下がれねえ。 ──ただそれだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺の愛車が負けたままじゃ引き下がれねえ。
──ただそれだけだ。

engChrName: You know, that toes a fine line between genuine swagger and just...idiocy.
engSearchText:
You know, that toes a fine line between genuine
swagger and just...idiocy.
jpnChrName: 何というか…… 格好いいような、格好悪いような……
jpnSearchText:
何というか……
格好いいような、格好悪いような……

engChrName: Yeah, he does that.
engSearchText: Yeah, he does that.
jpnChrName: また出やがったよ、この車好きが。
jpnSearchText: また出やがったよ、この車好きが。

engChrName: Well, that works for me. I guess if I sorta squint, I can see your point.
engSearchText:
Well, that works for me. I guess if I sorta squint, I can
see your point.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら…… まあ俺も気持ちは分からなくもないが。
jpnSearchText:
そういう事なら……
まあ俺も気持ちは分からなくもないが。

engChrName: So, how do you two feel about it? Does that sound good?
engSearchText:
So, how do you two feel about it? Does that
sound good?
jpnChrName: 二人はどうしたい？ 俺はそれに従うぞ。
jpnSearchText:
二人はどうしたい？
俺はそれに従うぞ。

engChrName: Sign me up! I wanna show him who's boss!
engSearchText: Sign me up! I wanna show him who's boss!
jpnChrName: やるわ……ううん、やらせて！
jpnSearchText: やるわ……ううん、やらせて！

engChrName: It'll be me and him versus the two of you!
engSearchText: It'll be me and him versus the two of you!
jpnChrName: ディックと遊撃士のお兄さん── 私とこのお兄さん達で勝負よ！
jpnSearchText:
ディックと遊撃士のお兄さん──
私とこのお兄さん達で勝負よ！

engChrName: Me, too! Last time wasn't just a fluke, watch!
engSearchText: Me, too! Last time wasn't just a fluke, watch!
jpnChrName: オレも賛成だぜ。 楽しくなりそうだ！
jpnSearchText:
オレも賛成だぜ。
楽しくなりそうだ！

engChrName: All right! We've got ourselves a match!
engSearchText: All right! We've got ourselves a match!
jpnChrName: 分かった── それじゃあ皆でラジコン勝負だ！
jpnSearchText:
分かった──
それじゃあ皆でラジコン勝負だ！

engChrName: I won't lose this time!
engSearchText: I won't lose this time!
jpnChrName: 次こそは絶対負けないんだから！
jpnSearchText: 次こそは絶対負けないんだから！

engChrName: Uh-huh? Prove it!
engSearchText: Uh-huh? Prove it!
jpnChrName: それはこっちのセリフだぜ！
jpnSearchText: それはこっちのセリフだぜ！

engChrName: That's a relief. The kids are calmed down, now that we've figured out a resolution to all this.
engSearchText:
That's a relief. The kids are calmed down, now that
we've figured out a resolution to all this.
jpnChrName: このまま順調にいけば 丸く収まりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
このまま順調にいけば
丸く収まりそうだな。

engChrName: But now I'm indebted to a spriggan, of all people... Urrgh! Don't let this go to your head, you hear?!
engSearchText:
But now I'm indebted to a spriggan, of all people...
Urrgh! Don't let this go to your head, you hear?!
jpnChrName: だがお前達に貸しを作ってしまう事になる訳か。 くっ……だからっていい気になるんじゃないぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
だがお前達に貸しを作ってしまう事になる訳か。
くっ……だからっていい気になるんじゃないぞ！？

engChrName: Pfft. This doesn't even register on my balance sheet.
engSearchText: Pfft. This doesn't even register on my balance sheet.
jpnChrName: この程度の事で 恩着せがましい事は言わねえっつの。
jpnSearchText:
この程度の事で
恩着せがましい事は言わねえっつの。

engChrName: Just don't hold back, you hear? I'm not goin' easy on you.
engSearchText:
Just don't hold back, you hear? I'm not goin' easy
on you.
jpnChrName: だが、遊びつってもぬるい事はしてくれるなよ？
jpnSearchText: だが、遊びつってもぬるい事はしてくれるなよ？

engChrName: This is about more than just you and me, or those two kids—it's Leno vs. Ingert! And us Ingert fans, we don't take a loss lyin' down!
engSearchText:
This is about more than just you and me, or those two
kids—it's Leno vs. Ingert! And us Ingert fans, we
don't take a loss lyin' down!
jpnChrName: コイツはいわば、レノとインゲルトの勝負だ── オレも本気で行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツはいわば、レノとインゲルトの勝負だ──
オレも本気で行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I... Yeesh. You're way more into this than I am...
engSearchText: I... Yeesh. You're way more into this than I am...
jpnChrName: お、おお……俺はそこまで レノが好きって訳じゃないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
お、おお……俺はそこまで
レノが好きって訳じゃないんだが。

engChrName: But hey, you've got a point. This is a chance to settle our differences for good and all. So y'know what? Bring it!
engSearchText:
But hey, you've got a point. This is a chance to settle
our differences for good and all. So y'know what?
Bring it!
jpnChrName: だが、間接的とはいえ《裏解決屋》と 白黒つけられるのなら望む所だ！
jpnSearchText:
だが、間接的とはいえ《裏解決屋》と
白黒つけられるのなら望む所だ！

engChrName: Wow, everyone's really pumped for this!
engSearchText: Wow, everyone's really pumped for this!
jpnChrName: なんだか盛り上がって来ちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText: なんだか盛り上がって来ちゃいましたね。

engChrName: Heehee. Van can't help himself when it comes to cars, as we're all aware.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Van can't help himself when it comes to
cars, as we're all aware.
jpnChrName: ふふ、車の事となれば仕方ないですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、車の事となれば仕方ないですね。

engChrName: (It would be nice if this helped him get along better with Alvis, too...)
engSearchText:
(It would be nice if this helped him get along better
with Alvis, too...)
jpnChrName: （それに、これを機にアルヴィスさんと   少しは和解出来そうですし……）
jpnSearchText:
（それに、これを機にアルヴィスさんと
少しは和解出来そうですし……）

engChrName: We should start by finding a suitable race course.
engSearchText: We should start by finding a suitable race course.
jpnChrName: さて……そういう事でしたらまずは レースコースを決める必要がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
さて……そういう事でしたらまずは
レースコースを決める必要がありますね。

engChrName: What did you use for your match earlier?
engSearchText: What did you use for your match earlier?
jpnChrName: ちなみに先ほどの勝負では どこでレースを行ったのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに先ほどの勝負では
どこでレースを行ったのでしょうか。

engChrName: It was right here, just a really straight and narrow sprint. I do think we should go somewhere else—we need a proper circuit for this.
engSearchText:
It was right here, just a really straight and
narrow sprint. I do think we should go somewhere
else—we need a proper circuit for this.
jpnChrName: この場所で短い勝負をしたんだが…… 直線だと面白くないし場所を変えるか？
jpnSearchText:
この場所で短い勝負をしたんだが……
直線だと面白くないし場所を変えるか？

engChrName: Yeah! Something nice and open!
engSearchText: Yeah! Something nice and open!
jpnChrName: ああ、どうせならアツい勝負が出来る もっと広い場所がいいよな！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、どうせならアツい勝負が出来る
もっと広い場所がいいよな！

engChrName: Hmm... I want that, too, but I dunno where.
engSearchText: Hmm... I want that, too, but I dunno where.
jpnChrName: それはそうだけど……
jpnSearchText: それはそうだけど……

engChrName: There aren't many open spaces where we won't be getting in anyone's way.
engSearchText:
There aren't many open spaces where we won't be
getting in anyone's way.
jpnChrName: 人の邪魔にならない場所っていうと 場所が限られて来るんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
人の邪魔にならない場所っていうと
場所が限られて来るんだよね。

engChrName: I might have an idea, actually.
engSearchText: I might have an idea, actually.
jpnChrName: あっ……そういう事なら僕に考えがあるよ。
jpnSearchText: あっ……そういう事なら僕に考えがあるよ。

engChrName: I know a venue that might be willing to host us. I'm not 100% sure, but it's worth asking.
engSearchText:
I know a venue that might be willing to host us.
I'm not 100% sure, but it's worth asking.
jpnChrName: 聞いてみないと 使えるかどうか分からないけど……
jpnSearchText:
聞いてみないと
使えるかどうか分からないけど……

engChrName: Follow me, everyone. I'll see if I can get permission.
engSearchText: Follow me, everyone. I'll see if I can get permission.
jpnChrName: 掛け合ってみるので、付いて来てもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText: 掛け合ってみるので、付いて来てもらえませんか？

engChrName: Yeah! Something nice and open!
engSearchText: Yeah! Something nice and open!
jpnChrName: ああ、どうせならアツい勝負が出来る もっと広い場所がいいよな！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、どうせならアツい勝負が出来る
もっと広い場所がいいよな！

engChrName: Hmm... I want that, too, but I dunno where.
engSearchText: Hmm... I want that, too, but I dunno where.
jpnChrName: それはそうだけど……
jpnSearchText: それはそうだけど……

engChrName: There aren't many open spaces where we won't be getting in anyone's way.
engSearchText:
There aren't many open spaces where we won't be
getting in anyone's way.
jpnChrName: 人の邪魔にならない場所っていうと 場所が限られて来るんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
人の邪魔にならない場所っていうと
場所が限られて来るんだよね。

engChrName: I might have an idea, actually.
engSearchText: I might have an idea, actually.
jpnChrName: あっ……そういう事なら僕に考えがあるよ。
jpnSearchText: あっ……そういう事なら僕に考えがあるよ。

engChrName: I know a venue that might be willing to host us. I'm not 100% sure, but it's worth asking.
engSearchText:
I know a venue that might be willing to host us.
I'm not 100% sure, but it's worth asking.
jpnChrName: 聞いてみないと 使えるかどうか分からないけど……
jpnSearchText:
聞いてみないと
使えるかどうか分からないけど……

engChrName: Follow me, everyone. I'll see if I can get permission.
engSearchText: Follow me, everyone. I'll see if I can get permission.
jpnChrName: 掛け合ってみるので、付いて来てもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText: 掛け合ってみるので、付いて来てもらえませんか？

engChrName: Sure. I'm in.
engSearchText: Sure. I'm in.
jpnChrName: ああ、どこだか知らねえがついて行くぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、どこだか知らねえがついて行くぜ。

engChrName: Great. To New Town, then—that's where this venue is.
engSearchText:
Great. To New Town, then—that's where this
venue is.
jpnChrName: ええ、それじゃあ新市街の方に向かいましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それじゃあ新市街の方に向かいましょう。

engChrName: That works for me, but can we come back to this a bit later? We got some other stuff to take care of first.
engSearchText:
That works for me, but can we come back to this a
bit later? We got some other stuff to take care of first.
jpnChrName: それは構わねえんだが、 ちょいと待ってもらえるか？
jpnSearchText:
それは構わねえんだが、
ちょいと待ってもらえるか？

engChrName: All right.
engSearchText: All right.
jpnChrName: ええ、そういう事なら。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そういう事なら。

engChrName: Quest RC Car Showdown started!
engSearchText: Quest RC Car Showdown started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【白熱のラジコンカー対決】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>白熱のラジコンカー対決<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Hmm. So this way leads down a mine, does it?
engSearchText: Hmm. So this way leads down a mine, does it?
jpnChrName: へぇ、この奥は採掘場になってるんだ……
jpnSearchText: へぇ、この奥は採掘場になってるんだ……

engChrName: That would make an excellent backdrop for a game, but...nah, it's probably too dangerous down there.
engSearchText:
That would make an excellent backdrop for a game,
but...nah, it's probably too dangerous down there.
jpnChrName: 採掘場を舞台にした謎解きも楽しそうだけど、 流石に危険だよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
採掘場を舞台にした謎解きも楽しそうだけど、
流石に危険だよなぁ……

engChrName: Hey there. Arkride Solutions—you had a request for us?
engSearchText:
Hey there. Arkride Solutions—you had a request
for us?
jpnChrName: おい、依頼を見て来た 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
おい、依頼を見て来た
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: Well! I didn't expect you to help me out again. Thank you!
engSearchText:
Well! I didn't expect you to help me out again.
Thank you!
jpnChrName: おっ、来てくれたんだね！ また参加してくれて嬉しいよ！
jpnSearchText:
おっ、来てくれたんだね！
また参加してくれて嬉しいよ！

engChrName: Figured we'd at least hear you out.
engSearchText: Figured we'd at least hear you out.
jpnChrName: ま、とりあえず話だけは聞こうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText: ま、とりあえず話だけは聞こうと思ってな。

engChrName: What's got you all the way out in Basel, anyhow?
engSearchText: What's got you all the way out in Basel, anyhow?
jpnChrName: しかし、どうして首都にいたアンタが バーゼルにいるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、どうして首都にいたアンタが
バーゼルにいるんだ？

engChrName: 'Specially all the way out here in the dark. You ain't up to somethin' shady, are you?
engSearchText:
'Specially all the way out here in the dark. You ain't
up to somethin' shady, are you?
jpnChrName: それも夜のトンネルとか、 無駄に怪しすぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それも夜のトンネルとか、
無駄に怪しすぎんだろ。

engChrName: Oh, haha. I'm just scouting locations for my new game. It has a mystery theme, so it only makes sense for it to be dark and secretive.
engSearchText:
Oh, haha. I'm just scouting locations for my
new game. It has a mystery theme, so it only makes
sense for it to be dark and secretive.
jpnChrName: はは、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として
バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリなんだよ。

engChrName: Let's get down to business, then, if that's all right with you.
engSearchText:
Let's get down to business, then, if that's all right
with you.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速、今回のゲームについて 説明させてもらってもいいかな？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ早速、今回のゲームについて
説明させてもらってもいいかな？

engChrName: Oho. You're the famous spriggan, are you?
