engSearchText: Oho. You're the famous spriggan, are you?
jpnChrName: おっ、という事は君たちが 噂の裏解決屋かい？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、という事は君たちが
噂の裏解決屋かい？

engChrName: I'm really glad you're able to help me out this time! Sucks that it didn't work out earlier, but oh, well.
engSearchText:
I'm really glad you're able to help me out this time!
Sucks that it didn't work out earlier, but oh, well.
jpnChrName: 実は前にも皆に依頼を出してたんだけど…… 今回は参加してくれるみたいで嬉しいよ！
jpnSearchText:
実は前にも皆に依頼を出してたんだけど……
今回は参加してくれるみたいで嬉しいよ！

engChrName: Sorry we couldn't help you out last time.
engSearchText: Sorry we couldn't help you out last time.
jpnChrName: そいつは悪かったな……
jpnSearchText: そいつは悪かったな……

engChrName: So what're you doin' out here in the dead of night, anyway? Bit shady, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
So what're you doin' out here in the dead of
night, anyway? Bit shady, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、夜のトンネルで何してるんだよ。 無駄に怪しすぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、夜のトンネルで何してるんだよ。
無駄に怪しすぎんだろ。

engChrName: Oh, haha. I'm just scouting locations for my new game. It has a mystery theme, so it only makes sense for it to be dark and secretive.
engSearchText:
Oh, haha. I'm just scouting locations for my
new game. It has a mystery theme, so it only makes
sense for it to be dark and secretive.
jpnChrName: はは、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として
バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリなんだよ。

engChrName: Let's get down to business, then, if that's all right with you.
engSearchText:
Let's get down to business, then, if that's all right
with you.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速、今回のゲームについて 説明させてもらってもいいかな？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ早速、今回のゲームについて
説明させてもらってもいいかな？

engChrName: Hmm? What're you up to there? Random-ass place to be hangin' around.
engSearchText:
Hmm? What're you up to there? Random-ass place
to be hangin' around.
jpnChrName: ん……？　なんかあからさまに 不審なやつがいるな。
jpnSearchText:
ん……？　なんかあからさまに
不審なやつがいるな。

engChrName: Oh, you came! Thank you so much for helping me out again.
engSearchText:
Oh, you came! Thank you so much for helping me
out again.
jpnChrName: って、来てくれたんだね！ また参加してくれて嬉しいよ！
jpnSearchText:
って、来てくれたんだね！
また参加してくれて嬉しいよ！

engChrName: How do you mean?
engSearchText: How do you mean?
jpnChrName: 参加、といいますと？
jpnSearchText: 参加、といいますと？

engChrName: Oh, you're the puzzle game guy, aren't you?
engSearchText: Oh, you're the puzzle game guy, aren't you?
jpnChrName: アンタは確か、謎解きゲーム屋の パーシーとか言ったか。
jpnSearchText:
アンタは確か、謎解きゲーム屋の
パーシーとか言ったか。

engChrName: What're you doin' out here in Basel this late at night?
engSearchText: What're you doin' out here in Basel this late at night?
jpnChrName: 首都にいたアンタが、 こんな所でこんな時間に何してるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
首都にいたアンタが、
こんな所でこんな時間に何してるんだ？

engChrName: Uh... My request? Are you not here for it, then?
engSearchText: Uh... My request? Are you not here for it, then?
jpnChrName: あれ？　もしかして僕が出した依頼を見て 来てくれた訳じゃないのかい？
jpnSearchText:
あれ？　もしかして僕が出した依頼を見て
来てくれた訳じゃないのかい？

engChrName: You had a... Oh. Sorry, I never even noticed it. That's on me for not checkin' properly.
engSearchText:
You had a... Oh. Sorry, I never even noticed it.
That's on me for not checkin' properly.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつは気付かなかった。 確認不足で悪いな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そいつは気付かなかった。
確認不足で悪いな。

engChrName: Don't worry about it, haha.
engSearchText: Don't worry about it, haha.
jpnChrName: はは、気にしなくていいよ。
jpnSearchText: はは、気にしなくていいよ。

engChrName: I'm working on a new mystery game right now, and I thought a nice, dark setting like this would be perfect for it.
engSearchText:
I'm working on a new mystery game right now, and I
thought a nice, dark setting like this would be perfect
for it.
jpnChrName: 実は、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリでね。
jpnSearchText:
実は、新しい謎解きゲームの舞台として
バーゼルの薄暗い所が雰囲気にピッタリでね。

engChrName: I'm recruiting testers right now, actually. I put a request out to you in the hopes you'd be able to help out again.
engSearchText:
I'm recruiting testers right now, actually. I put a
request out to you in the hopes you'd be able to help
out again.
jpnChrName: 丁度今テスターを募集してる所で、 裏解決屋にも依頼を出してたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
丁度今テスターを募集してる所で、
裏解決屋にも依頼を出してたんだ。

engChrName: I'd really appreciate it if you could lend me a hand. If you'd like, I can explain it to you and we can go from there?
engSearchText:
I'd really appreciate it if you could lend me a hand.
If you'd like, I can explain it to you and we can go
from there?
jpnChrName: また参加してもらえたら助かるし、 まずは話だけでも聞いてくれないかな？
jpnSearchText:
また参加してもらえたら助かるし、
まずは話だけでも聞いてくれないかな？

engChrName: Works for me.
engSearchText: Works for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういう事なら構わないぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういう事なら構わないぜ。

engChrName: Oh...? Wait, you wouldn't happen to be the spriggan, would you?
engSearchText:
Oh...? Wait, you wouldn't happen to be the spriggan,
would you?
jpnChrName: って、あれっ、君たちは……？ もしかして裏解決屋の人達かい？
jpnSearchText:
って、あれっ、君たちは……？
もしかして裏解決屋の人達かい？

engChrName: You're aware of his work?
engSearchText: You're aware of his work?
jpnChrName: おや、裏解決屋をご存知なのですね。
jpnSearchText: おや、裏解決屋をご存知なのですね。

engChrName: Of course I am—I remember hearing about it a lot over in the capital. I even tried to enlist his help at some point.
engSearchText:
Of course I am—I remember hearing about it a lot
over in the capital. I even tried to enlist his help at
some point.
jpnChrName: 勿論さ、首都で噂になってたから 前に依頼を出させてもらった事もあったよ。
jpnSearchText:
勿論さ、首都で噂になってたから
前に依頼を出させてもらった事もあったよ。

engChrName: Never did get to meet him, though. I can only assume my request got buried.
engSearchText:
Never did get to meet him, though. I can only assume
my request got buried.
jpnChrName: 結局、見てもらえなかったのか 会う事は出来なかったけどね……
jpnSearchText:
結局、見てもらえなかったのか
会う事は出来なかったけどね……

engChrName: Sorry about that. I'm the spriggan you're lookin' for, I just must've forgotten about it way back when.
engSearchText:
Sorry about that. I'm the spriggan you're lookin' for, I
just must've forgotten about it way back when.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつは悪かったな。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そいつは悪かったな。

engChrName: Oh, wow. This is perfect, then! I heard that you were in Basel, so decided to try my luck again, and it's a good thing I did!
engSearchText:
Oh, wow. This is perfect, then! I heard that you were
in Basel, so decided to try my luck again, and it's a
good thing I did!
jpnChrName: でも、バーゼルでも噂を聞いたものだから 改めて依頼を出させてもらったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、バーゼルでも噂を聞いたものだから
改めて依頼を出させてもらったんだ。

engChrName: You see, I'm making a little AR game here, and I'm looking for people to help test it...
engSearchText:
You see, I'm making a little AR game here, and I'm
looking for people to help test it...
jpnChrName: 実は謎解きゲームのテスターを 募集してるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
実は謎解きゲームのテスターを
募集してるんだけど……

engChrName: How about I explain it to you, and then if you're interested, you can lend me a hand with it?
engSearchText:
How about I explain it to you, and then if you're
interested, you can lend me a hand with it?
jpnChrName: 試しに話だけでも聞いてくれないかな？
jpnSearchText: 試しに話だけでも聞いてくれないかな？

engChrName: Works for me.
engSearchText: Works for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういう事なら構わないぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういう事なら構わないぜ。

engChrName: I worked with a really bright friend of mine on this concept, so if I can iron out the kinks, I'm sure it'll be a hit!
engSearchText:
I worked with a really bright friend of mine on this
concept, so if I can iron out the kinks, I'm sure it'll be
a hit!
jpnChrName: 今回の謎解きゲームには 強力な助っ人が力を貸してくれていてね。
jpnSearchText:
今回の謎解きゲームには
強力な助っ人が力を貸してくれていてね。

engChrName: You'll solve a series of puzzles, all while using these special gimmicks that fit Basel hand in glove.
engSearchText:
You'll solve a series of puzzles, all while using these
special gimmicks that fit Basel hand in glove.
jpnChrName: この工学都市にピッタリな演出と共に 謎を解いてもらう事になるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この工学都市にピッタリな演出と共に
謎を解いてもらう事になるんだ。

engChrName: Oh? What kind of gimmicks?
engSearchText: Oh? What kind of gimmicks?
jpnChrName: バーゼルにピッタリな演出……？ うーん、想像がつきませんね。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルにピッタリな演出……？
うーん、想像がつきませんね。

engChrName: Yeah? What kinda gimmicks are we talking?
engSearchText: Yeah? What kinda gimmicks are we talking?
jpnChrName: バーゼルにピッタリな演出……？ 分からねえが面白そうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルにピッタリな演出……？
分からねえが面白そうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Well, it would spoil the fun if I just told you. Here, have this leaflet.
engSearchText:
Well, it would spoil the fun if I just told you.
Here, have this leaflet.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうだろう？ それじゃあパンフレットも渡しておくよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうだろう？
それじゃあパンフレットも渡しておくよ。

engChrName: Lessee here...
engSearchText: Lessee here...
jpnChrName: どれどれ？
jpnSearchText: どれどれ？

engChrName: Urgent Message From HQ: Catch the rogue hacker on the loose in Basel! HQ will track the target's movements and relay them to you ASAP.
engSearchText:
Urgent Message From HQ:
Catch the rogue hacker on the loose in Basel!
HQ will track the target's movements and relay them to you ASAP.
jpnChrName: 司令部より伝令 バーゼルに現れた凄腕ハッカーを捕まえろ！ ターゲットの動向は君の端末に随時連絡を入れる。
jpnSearchText:
司令部より伝令
バーゼルに現れた凄腕ハッカーを捕まえろ！
ターゲットの動向は君の端末に随時連絡を入れる。

engChrName: All transmissions will be sent in code to avoid leaking information. Decode the messages and apprehend the hacker!
engSearchText:
All transmissions will be sent in code to avoid
leaking information. Decode the messages and
apprehend the hacker!
jpnChrName: 第三勢力への情報漏洩のため、 伝令の内容は暗号化して伝えさせてもらう。 暗号を解読してハッカーの下へたどり着け！
jpnSearchText:
第三勢力への情報漏洩のため、
伝令の内容は暗号化して伝えさせてもらう。
暗号を解読してハッカーの下へたどり着け！

engChrName: Secret agents, huh...? All right, I'll bite.
engSearchText: Secret agents, huh...? All right, I'll bite.
jpnChrName: なるほどな、俺達はさしずめ 密命を帯びたエージェントって訳か。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな、俺達はさしずめ
密命を帯びたエージェントって訳か。

engChrName: And decoding our messages forms the puzzle aspect of the game.
engSearchText:
And decoding our messages forms the puzzle aspect
of the game.
jpnChrName: この暗号を解くという点が 謎解きゲームの要素に当たる訳ですね。
jpnSearchText:
この暗号を解くという点が
謎解きゲームの要素に当たる訳ですね。

engChrName: Exactly! Sounds fun, right? I think we really knocked it outta the park with this one!
engSearchText:
Exactly! Sounds fun, right? I think we really knocked
it outta the park with this one!
jpnChrName: ああ、とっても面白そうだろ！？ いやぁ我ながらこれは傑作だと思うね！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、とっても面白そうだろ！？
いやぁ我ながらこれは傑作だと思うね！

engChrName: So, what do you think? Interested in giving it a shot?
engSearchText: So, what do you think? Interested in giving it a shot?
jpnChrName: どうかな、君たちも早速このゲームの テストに参加してもらえるかな？
jpnSearchText:
どうかな、君たちも早速このゲームの
テストに参加してもらえるかな？

engChrName: What do you say? Feel like catching a hacker on the run?
engSearchText:
What do you say? Feel like catching a hacker on
the run?
jpnChrName: 『バーゼルに現れた凄腕ハッカーを捕まえろ！』 ──どうかな、とっても面白そうだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
『バーゼルに現れた凄腕ハッカーを捕まえろ！』
──どうかな、とっても面白そうだろ！？

engChrName: I'd really love it if you could take part in this test run. C'mon, you know you wanna!
engSearchText:
I'd really love it if you could take part in this test run.
C'mon, you know you wanna!
jpnChrName: 君たちにもこのゲームのテストに 参加してもらえたら嬉しいんだけど、どうかな？
jpnSearchText:
君たちにもこのゲームのテストに
参加してもらえたら嬉しいんだけど、どうかな？

engChrName: We're interested, but we don't have the time right now. Got some other stuff to take care of, sorry.
engSearchText:
We're interested, but we don't have the time
right now. Got some other stuff to take care of, sorry.
jpnChrName: 興味がない訳じゃねえが…… 今は間が悪くてな。
jpnSearchText:
興味がない訳じゃねえが……
今は間が悪くてな。

engChrName: Aww... I understand that, though.
engSearchText: Aww... I understand that, though.
jpnChrName: そっか……それじゃあ仕方ないね。
jpnSearchText: そっか……それじゃあ仕方ないね。

engChrName: If you get the time, you know where to find me!
engSearchText: If you get the time, you know where to find me!
jpnChrName: 僕はここで待ってるから、 手が空いたらまた声をかけてよ！
jpnSearchText:
僕はここで待ってるから、
手が空いたらまた声をかけてよ！

engChrName: Sure, we got our other work taken care of. Why not?
engSearchText: Sure, we got our other work taken care of. Why not?
jpnChrName: ああ、今なら余裕もある事だしな。 試しに参加させてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今なら余裕もある事だしな。
試しに参加させてもらうとするか。

engChrName: Awesome! I was hoping you'd be up for it.
engSearchText: Awesome! I was hoping you'd be up for it.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、その言葉を待ってたよ！
jpnSearchText: ありがとう、その言葉を待ってたよ！

engChrName: Lemme put your names down under the tester group real quick...
engSearchText:
Lemme put your names down under the tester group
real quick...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速、 君たちを参加者として登録させてもらうね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ早速、
君たちを参加者として登録させてもらうね。

engChrName: There's another tester working through the game right now, so see if you can solve the puzzle before they do!
engSearchText:
There's another tester working through the game
right now, so see if you can solve the puzzle before
they do!
jpnChrName: もう１人の参加者に先を越されないよう 頑張ってみてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
もう１人の参加者に先を越されないよう
頑張ってみてくれ！

engChrName: I see. I didn't realize we weren't the only testers at the moment.
engSearchText:
I see. I didn't realize we weren't the only testers at
the moment.
jpnChrName: あら、わたくし達の他にも テストの参加者がいたのですね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、わたくし達の他にも
テストの参加者がいたのですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm sending applications all over the place. My other tester started just a few minutes ago.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm sending applications all over the place.
My other tester started just a few minutes ago.
jpnChrName: ああ、別口でも参加者を募ってたからね。 君たちが来る数分前に参加してくれたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、別口でも参加者を募ってたからね。
君たちが来る数分前に参加してくれたよ。

engChrName: I've got a special reward for whoever beats the game first, so good luck!
engSearchText:
I've got a special reward for whoever beats the game
first, so good luck!
jpnChrName: 一番最初にクリアしてくれた方には お礼も弾むから楽しみにしててくれ！
jpnSearchText:
一番最初にクリアしてくれた方には
お礼も弾むから楽しみにしててくれ！

engChrName: Well, now we gotta win!
engSearchText: Well, now we gotta win!
jpnChrName: むっ、競争となると負けていられませんね。
jpnSearchText: むっ、競争となると負けていられませんね。

engChrName: Heh. The hunt is on now, isn't it?
engSearchText: Heh. The hunt is on now, isn't it?
jpnChrName: へぇ、そういう事なら チンタラしてらんねえな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、そういう事なら
チンタラしてらんねえな。

engChrName: Well, good luck! I'll be watching from the sidelines to make sure everything's running smoothly.
engSearchText:
Well, good luck! I'll be watching from the sidelines to
make sure everything's running smoothly.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それじゃあ後は頑張ってね！ 僕は裏方に回らせてもらうとするよ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それじゃあ後は頑張ってね！
僕は裏方に回らせてもらうとするよ！

engChrName: And there he goes...
engSearchText: And there he goes...
jpnChrName: 行っちまったな……
jpnSearchText: 行っちまったな……

engChrName: So now what? We don't even have our first message yet.
engSearchText:
So now what? We don't even have our first
message yet.
jpnChrName: 結局、指令は貰ってねえが 俺達はどうすりゃいいんだ？
jpnSearchText:
結局、指令は貰ってねえが
俺達はどうすりゃいいんだ？

engChrName: This is true...
engSearchText: This is true...
jpnChrName: そうですね……
jpnSearchText: そうですね……

engChrName: He did say that 'HQ' would send us messages, but, uhh...how?
engSearchText:
He did say that 'HQ' would send us messages, but,
uhh...how?
jpnChrName: 端末に連絡が来るとか言ってたが、 まさかな……
jpnSearchText:
端末に連絡が来るとか言ってたが、
まさかな……

engChrName: HQ to spriggan. We've found traces of the hacker in the Artisanal District. Investigate the sooted triad.
engSearchText:
HQ to spriggan. We've found traces of the hacker in
the Artisanal District. Investigate the sooted triad.
jpnChrName: 司令部より裏解決屋へ 職人街にてハッカーの痕跡発見。 『ススまみれの三つ子』を調べよ。
jpnSearchText:
司令部より裏解決屋へ
職人街にてハッカーの痕跡発見。
『ススまみれの三つ子』を調べよ。

engChrName: Whoa, I don't recognize this address at all. I think it really IS him.
engSearchText:
Whoa, I don't recognize this address at all. I think it
really IS him.
jpnChrName: うおっ、マジで連絡が来やがった。 知らねえアドレスからの導力メールか。
jpnSearchText:
うおっ、マジで連絡が来やがった。
知らねえアドレスからの導力メールか。

engChrName: This first riddle should be easy to solve—I imagine it's like a warmup.
engSearchText:
This first riddle should be easy to solve—I imagine
it's like a warmup.
jpnChrName: 職人街で『ススまみれの三つ子』ですか。 これなら簡単に特定できそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
職人街で『ススまみれの三つ子』ですか。
これなら簡単に特定できそうですね。

engChrName: Makes sense. Let's get crackin', then.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Let's get crackin', then.
jpnChrName: だな……兎にも角にも、 まずは謎解きを進めてみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
だな……兎にも角にも、
まずは謎解きを進めてみるとするか。

engChrName: Well, if there ever were a 'sooted triad,' this'd be it.
engSearchText: Well, if there ever were a 'sooted triad,' this'd be it.
jpnChrName: さてと……ここが指令にあった 『ススまみれの三つ子』だよな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……ここが指令にあった
『ススまみれの三つ子』だよな。

engChrName: Not the easiest first riddle in the world, there're chimneys everywhere around here.
engSearchText:
Not the easiest first riddle in the world, there're
chimneys everywhere around here.
jpnChrName: 煙突がある建物が多すぎて 結構悩まされたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
煙突がある建物が多すぎて
結構悩まされたぜ。

engChrName: Indeed. It does make sense for a district this industrious.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It does make sense for a district
this industrious.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 職人街なだけあるという事でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
職人街なだけあるという事でしょうか。

engChrName: And it looks like we're not the first to make it this far, either.
engSearchText:
And it looks like we're not the first to make it this
far, either.
jpnChrName: それにしても…… どうやら先客がいらっしゃるようですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……
どうやら先客がいらっしゃるようですね。

engChrName: Tch. I walked around this damn place for ages and it was right here this whole time?
engSearchText:
Tch. I walked around this damn place for ages and it
was right here this whole time?
jpnChrName: チッ……散々迷わせたあげく、 こんな場所が正解なのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……散々迷わせたあげく、
こんな場所が正解なのかよ。

engChrName: Maybe he's the other tester we heard about?
engSearchText: Maybe he's the other tester we heard about?
jpnChrName: あの人ってもしかして…… もう１人の参加者でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あの人ってもしかして……
もう１人の参加者でしょうか？

engChrName: Oh? Looks like it threw the other tester for a loop.
engSearchText: Oh? Looks like it threw the other tester for a loop.
jpnChrName: ふうん？　アイツがもしかして もう１人の参加者ってやつか？
jpnSearchText:
ふうん？　アイツがもしかして
もう１人の参加者ってやつか？

engChrName: And here's the next set of instructions. It's almost like he's watchin' us.
engSearchText:
And here's the next set of instructions. It's almost like
he's watchin' us.
jpnChrName: おっと……早速連絡して来やがったか。 誰か俺達を監視でもしてるってのか？
jpnSearchText:
おっと……早速連絡して来やがったか。
誰か俺達を監視でもしてるってのか？

engChrName: Normally I would assume the same, but I imagine at least one of us would have noticed them if they were tracking us by hand.
engSearchText:
Normally I would assume the same, but I imagine at
least one of us would have noticed them if they were
tracking us by hand.
jpnChrName: それなら皆様やわたくしが 気付きそうなものですから……
jpnSearchText:
それなら皆様やわたくしが
気付きそうなものですから……

engChrName: I think we're receiving these messages automatically based on our Xipha location data.
engSearchText:
I think we're receiving these messages automatically
based on our Xipha location data.
jpnChrName: ザイファの位置情報を自動検知して メールを送っているのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファの位置情報を自動検知して
メールを送っているのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I didn't know you could do that...
engSearchText: I didn't know you could do that...
jpnChrName: パーシーさん、そんな高度な事まで 出来る人だったんですね……
jpnSearchText:
パーシーさん、そんな高度な事まで
出来る人だったんですね……

engChrName: Or is this something his helper worked on, maybe? That'd make sense.
engSearchText:
Or is this something his helper worked on, maybe?
That'd make sense.
jpnChrName: というか、今回の助っ人さんが 導力ネットの扱いに長けてるんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
というか、今回の助っ人さんが
導力ネットの扱いに長けてるんでしょうか。

engChrName: That might be giving him too much credit, no offense to him.
engSearchText:
That might be giving him too much credit, no offense
to him.
jpnChrName: アイツがそこまで腕の立つヤツだとは 思えねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
アイツがそこまで腕の立つヤツだとは
思えねえけどな。

engChrName: No, I think this is the work of his helper. Must be a network expert.
engSearchText:
No, I think this is the work of his helper. Must be a
network expert.
jpnChrName: いや……今回の助っ人っつうヤツが 導力ネットの扱いに長けてんのか。
jpnSearchText:
いや……今回の助っ人っつうヤツが
導力ネットの扱いに長けてんのか。

engChrName: Got a lot to think about once this is done...but that can wait. Let's look at this next message real quick.
engSearchText:
Got a lot to think about once this is done...but that
can wait. Let's look at this next message real quick.
jpnChrName: 色々と気になるが…… とりあえずメールを確認してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
色々と気になるが……
とりあえずメールを確認してみるか。

engChrName: HQ to spriggan. The hacker's long gone from this area, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
HQ to spriggan. The hacker's long gone from this
area, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: 司令部より裏解決屋へ 残念だが、ハッカーはもうこの場所にはいないようだ。
jpnSearchText:
司令部より裏解決屋へ
残念だが、ハッカーはもうこの場所にはいないようだ。

engChrName: We've picked up another trail elsewhere in the Artisanal District, though. Investigate the BATs' roost.
engSearchText:
We've picked up another trail elsewhere in the
Artisanal District, though. Investigate the
BATs' roost.
jpnChrName: だが同じく職人街にて新たな痕跡を発見── 『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』を調べよ。
jpnSearchText:
だが同じく職人街にて新たな痕跡を発見──
『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』を調べよ。

engChrName: Yeah, go fig. Of course there's more to it than that.
engSearchText: Yeah, go fig. Of course there's more to it than that.
jpnChrName: まあそう簡単にハッカーとやらは 見つからねえよな。
jpnSearchText:
まあそう簡単にハッカーとやらは
見つからねえよな。

engChrName: And talk about cryptic. The hell's a BAT, all caps?
engSearchText: And talk about cryptic. The hell's a BAT, all caps?
jpnChrName: しかし『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』か…… こいつはピンと来ねえな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』か……
こいつはピンと来ねえな。

engChrName: Ordinarily, I would assume the mammal...
engSearchText: Ordinarily, I would assume the mammal...
jpnChrName: Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ── 蝙蝠の事を指しているのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ──
蝙蝠の事を指しているのでしょうか。

engChrName: ...but given how it's written, I imagine it's alluding to something else.
engSearchText:
...but given how it's written, I imagine it's alluding to
something else.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、それだけなら全てを 大文字にする理由はありませんし。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、それだけなら全てを
大文字にする理由はありませんし。

engChrName: And at any rate, we didn't encounter any bats in the mine, if memory serves.
engSearchText:
And at any rate, we didn't encounter any bats in the
mine, if memory serves.
jpnChrName: レアメタル採掘道では 蝙蝠型の魔獣は見受けられませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
レアメタル採掘道では
蝙蝠型の魔獣は見受けられませんでした。

engChrName: Hmm... I feel like I've seen these letters somewhere else in the city.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I feel like I've seen these letters somewhere
else in the city.
jpnChrName: うーん……『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』という文字は 街のどこかで見かけた気がするんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん……『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』という文字は
街のどこかで見かけた気がするんですけど……

engChrName: *sigh* I just don't remember where.
engSearchText: *sigh* I just don't remember where.
jpnChrName: それがどこだったかは思い出せませんね。 ふぅ……難しいです。
jpnSearchText:
それがどこだったかは思い出せませんね。
ふぅ……難しいです。

engChrName: Hmm... Those letters do ring a bell. Where have I seen them before...?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Those letters do ring a bell. Where have I
seen them before...?
jpnChrName: 『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』っつう文字は街のどこかで 見かけた気もすんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』っつう文字は街のどこかで
見かけた気もすんだけどな。

engChrName: ...Bah. I got nothing.
engSearchText: ...Bah. I got nothing.
jpnChrName: それが一体どこだったか…… チッ、簡単にはいかねえな。
jpnSearchText:
それが一体どこだったか……
チッ、簡単にはいかねえな。

engChrName: The 'roost' part makes me think there's some place they all come back to—or that they're normally out and about.
engSearchText:
The 'roost' part makes me think there's some place
they all come back to—or that they're normally out
and about.
jpnChrName: 『休む場所』っつう部分も重要かもしれねえな。 逆を言えば普段は“休んでいない”っつう事だろ。
jpnSearchText:
『休む場所』っつう部分も重要かもしれねえな。
逆を言えば普段は“休んでいない”っつう事だろ。

engChrName: Keep your eyes peeled for anything that fits that description. This one sounds more specific.
engSearchText:
Keep your eyes peeled for anything that fits
that description. This one sounds more specific.
jpnChrName: それらしいモンがないか、 周囲を注意深く観察してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それらしいモンがないか、
周囲を注意深く観察してみるぞ。

engChrName: Well, this is the aerotram station...
engSearchText: Well, this is the aerotram station...
jpnChrName: エアロトラムの駅か……
jpnSearchText: エアロトラムの駅か……

engChrName: ...and I think we've struck gold here.
engSearchText: ...and I think we've struck gold here.
jpnChrName: おっ、トラムの文字をよく見ると…… こいつはアタリかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、トラムの文字をよく見ると……
こいつはアタリかもしれねえな。

engChrName: Ah, right! That does make sense.
engSearchText: Ah, right! That does make sense.
jpnChrName: トラムの文字ですか？
jpnSearchText: トラムの文字ですか？

engChrName: BAT is an acronym for the Basel Aerotram.
engSearchText: BAT is an acronym for the Basel Aerotram.
jpnChrName: 『ＢａｓｅｌＡｅｒｏＴｒａｍ』── まあ、頭文字を取れば『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』ですね。
jpnSearchText:
『ＢａｓｅｌＡｅｒｏＴｒａｍ』──
まあ、頭文字を取れば『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔ』ですね。

engChrName: Ohh, now I get it! They all stop to 'roost' here!
engSearchText: Ohh, now I get it! They all stop to 'roost' here!
jpnChrName: わぁ～なるほど！　停留所だから 『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』という事ですか！
jpnSearchText:
わぁ～なるほど！　停留所だから
『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』という事ですか！

engChrName: All right, yeah. Makes sense that this is the roost— they all stop here.
engSearchText:
All right, yeah. Makes sense that this is the roost—
they all stop here.
jpnChrName: ハン……停留所だから 『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』っつう事かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……停留所だから
『Ｂ・Ａ・Ｔが休む場所』っつう事かよ。

engChrName: And boom, there's the next message.
engSearchText: And boom, there's the next message.
jpnChrName: おっと……早速次のメールが来たか。
jpnSearchText: おっと……早速次のメールが来たか。

engChrName: HQ to spriggan. The hacker has made their way toward New Town. Board the tram and pursue them.
engSearchText:
HQ to spriggan. The hacker has made their way
toward New Town. Board the tram and pursue them.
jpnChrName: 司令部より裏解決屋へ ハッカーは既に新市街に移動したようだ。 トラムに乗って追いかけろ。
jpnSearchText:
司令部より裏解決屋へ
ハッカーは既に新市街に移動したようだ。
トラムに乗って追いかけろ。

engChrName: Straightforward enough, this one.
engSearchText: Straightforward enough, this one.
jpnChrName: 次はトラムに乗る必要があるようですね。
jpnSearchText: 次はトラムに乗る必要があるようですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's hop on.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's hop on.
jpnChrName: 丁度いい。 こいつに乗って行ってみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
丁度いい。
こいつに乗って行ってみるとするか。

engChrName: This does offer an exceptional view, especially at night.
engSearchText:
This does offer an exceptional view, especially
at night.
jpnChrName: ふふ、トラムから眺める 夜のバーゼルの景色もまた綺麗ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、トラムから眺める
夜のバーゼルの景色もまた綺麗ですね。

engChrName: Oh? I see a familiar face took the tram just before we did.
engSearchText:
Oh? I see a familiar face took the tram just before
we did.
jpnChrName: と……あら。 前方のトラムに乗客がいらっしゃるようです。
jpnSearchText:
と……あら。
前方のトラムに乗客がいらっしゃるようです。

engChrName: Lessee here...
engSearchText: Lessee here...
jpnChrName: どれどれ？
jpnSearchText: どれどれ？

engChrName: Well, if it ain't the Aramis kid we bumped into earlier.
engSearchText:
Well, if it ain't the Aramis kid we bumped
into earlier.
jpnChrName: おっ、アイツは煙突の所にいた アラミスの学生じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、アイツは煙突の所にいた
アラミスの学生じゃねえか。

engChrName: He's been one step ahead of us the whole time.
engSearchText: He's been one step ahead of us the whole time.
jpnChrName: あの人の方がわたし達より 一足先に謎を解いてるって事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あの人の方がわたし達より
一足先に謎を解いてるって事でしょうか？

engChrName: I feel like I'm too slow...
engSearchText: I feel like I'm too slow...
jpnChrName: むむっ、なんだか悔しいです……
jpnSearchText: むむっ、なんだか悔しいです……

engChrName: He's been a step ahead the whole way, from the looks of it.
engSearchText:
He's been a step ahead the whole way, from the looks
of it.
jpnChrName: アイツが俺達よりも一足先に 謎を解いてるっつう事か？
jpnSearchText:
アイツが俺達よりも一足先に
謎を解いてるっつう事か？

engChrName: Well, I'm not about to let some snot-nosed runt like him outwit me. Let's get moving.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not about to let some snot-nosed runt like
him outwit me. Let's get moving.
jpnChrName: チッ、あんなヒョロいヤツに 負けてらんねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、あんなヒョロいヤツに
負けてらんねえだろ。

engChrName: Man, I remember when I was all held up about beatin' people to the punch like that. Youth, huh?
engSearchText:
Man, I remember when I was all held up about
beatin' people to the punch like that. Youth, huh?
jpnChrName: 若いヤツはいいねえ、 張り合う元気があってよ。
jpnSearchText:
若いヤツはいいねえ、
張り合う元気があってよ。

engChrName: Well, wait, you're still young, aren't you?
engSearchText: Well, wait, you're still young, aren't you?
jpnChrName: そんな事言って、 ヴァンさんも若い方じゃないですか……
jpnSearchText:
そんな事言って、
ヴァンさんも若い方じゃないですか……

engChrName: I'd think of a zing, but you make fun of yourself well enough as is.
engSearchText:
I'd think of a zing, but you make fun of yourself well
enough as is.
jpnChrName: 冗談抜きで言ってる事がオッサンじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 冗談抜きで言ってる事がオッサンじゃねえか。

engChrName: Haha.
engSearchText: Haha.
jpnChrName: ふふ……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Quatre! What's got you looking so serious?
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Quatre! What's got you looking
so serious?
jpnChrName: おや、カトルじゃないか。 深刻そうな顔をしてどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
おや、カトルじゃないか。
深刻そうな顔をしてどうしたんだ？

engChrName: I had a quick question for you, if you don't mind.
engSearchText: I had a quick question for you, if you don't mind.
jpnChrName: オイゲンさん…… 少し聞きたい事があるんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
オイゲンさん……
少し聞きたい事があるんですけど。

engChrName: Have you had a woman from the institute come by looking for metal alloys?
engSearchText:
Have you had a woman from the institute come by
looking for metal alloys?
jpnChrName: 今朝、女性の研究員がレアメタル合金を買いに 工房に来たりしてませんか？
jpnSearchText:
今朝、女性の研究員がレアメタル合金を買いに
工房に来たりしてませんか？

engChrName: Huh. It's like you saw it happen—we had someone like that come by just a bit ago.
engSearchText:
Huh. It's like you saw it happen—we had someone
like that come by just a bit ago.
jpnChrName: よく知ってるね。 確かに少し前に買いに来たよ。
jpnSearchText:
よく知ってるね。
確かに少し前に買いに来たよ。

engChrName: She had a valid card, so I went ahead and sold her the alloys she wanted.
engSearchText:
She had a valid card, so I went ahead and sold her the
alloys she wanted.
jpnChrName: 認証カードを持ってたから 普通に売ってしまったけど……
jpnSearchText:
認証カードを持ってたから
普通に売ってしまったけど……

engChrName: Should I not have...?
engSearchText: Should I not have...?
jpnChrName: もしかして、何かマズかったかい……？
jpnSearchText: もしかして、何かマズかったかい……？

engChrName: Nah, don't sweat it. We just needed to talk with her about somethin'.
engSearchText:
Nah, don't sweat it. We just needed to talk with her
about somethin'.
jpnChrName: いや、ちょいとその研究員に用があってな。 アンタが気にする事じゃないさ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ちょいとその研究員に用があってな。
アンタが気にする事じゃないさ。

engChrName: I see. Well, I guess that's fair.
engSearchText: I see. Well, I guess that's fair.
jpnChrName: そうか？　それならいいんだが……
jpnSearchText: そうか？　それならいいんだが……

engChrName: Oh, now you mention it, actually...
engSearchText: Oh, now you mention it, actually...
jpnChrName: っと、そういえば。
jpnSearchText: っと、そういえば。

engChrName: She said something about heading off to Liberl after she was done with her business here in Basel.
engSearchText:
She said something about heading off to Liberl after
she was done with her business here in Basel.
jpnChrName: 必要な買い物は終わったから、 次はリベール方面に行くとか言っていたような。
jpnSearchText:
必要な買い物は終わったから、
次はリベール方面に行くとか言っていたような。

engChrName: If I had to guess, she probably made for Auge Canyon.
engSearchText:
If I had to guess, she probably made for
Auge Canyon.
jpnChrName: おそらくオージュ峡谷の方に 向かったと思うんだが……
jpnSearchText:
おそらくオージュ峡谷の方に
向かったと思うんだが……

engChrName: Thing is, she was driving some sporty ETWS make, so you probably couldn't catch her if you tried.
engSearchText:
Thing is, she was driving some sporty ETWS make,
so you probably couldn't catch her if you tried.
jpnChrName: 彼女、エトワスのスポーツカーに乗ってたからね。 今からだと流石に追い付けないんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女、エトワスのスポーツカーに乗ってたからね。
今からだと流石に追い付けないんじゃないかな。

engChrName: Well, that gives us a good idea of where she is, at any rate. Thank you.
engSearchText:
Well, that gives us a good idea of where she is, at
any rate. Thank you.
jpnChrName: オージュ峡谷か……分かりました。 教えてくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
オージュ峡谷か……分かりました。
教えてくれてありがとう。

engChrName: Should we head over to the canyon, then?
engSearchText: Should we head over to the canyon, then?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、 次の目的地はオージュ峡谷でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、
次の目的地はオージュ峡谷でしょうか？

engChrName: I mean, it's not like we can catch her if we do. You heard the man.
engSearchText:
I mean, it's not like we can catch her if we do.
You heard the man.
jpnChrName: 車を出しても追い付けるか分からねえがな。
jpnSearchText: 車を出しても追い付けるか分からねえがな。

engChrName: Nope. Northeast is where we're headin'.
engSearchText: Nope. Northeast is where we're headin'.
jpnChrName: いや──ここは首都方面の国道に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: いや──ここは首都方面の国道に向かうぞ。

engChrName: ...Why? That's the complete opposite direction.
engSearchText: ...Why? That's the complete opposite direction.
jpnChrName: えっ……どうして？ まるっきり逆方向じゃないですか。
jpnSearchText:
えっ……どうして？
まるっきり逆方向じゃないですか。

engChrName: Think about it. We're dealing with somebody who's makin' off with classified info and tryin' to shake the cops off her tail.
engSearchText:
Think about it. We're dealing with somebody who's
makin' off with classified info and tryin' to shake the
cops off her tail.
jpnChrName: 考えてもみろ、機密資料を盗み出して バーゼルを立ち去ろうって時に……
jpnSearchText:
考えてもみろ、機密資料を盗み出して
バーゼルを立ち去ろうって時に……

engChrName: So why would she just tell some rando where she's goin'? She ain't gonna leave a trail like that.
engSearchText:
So why would she just tell some rando where
she's goin'? She ain't gonna leave a trail like that.
jpnChrName: わざわざ自分の行き先を 工房のオッサンに教えるヤツがあるか？
jpnSearchText:
わざわざ自分の行き先を
工房のオッサンに教えるヤツがあるか？

engChrName: That does make sense... But then, why did she tell Eugen she was going to Liberl?
engSearchText:
That does make sense... But then, why did she tell
Eugen she was going to Liberl?
jpnChrName: まあ、それは確かに…… それじゃ何で余計な事を言ったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それは確かに……
それじゃ何で余計な事を言ったんでしょう？

engChrName: To deceive him, I suspect. She may very well have known she's being followed.
engSearchText:
To deceive him, I suspect. She may very well have
known she's being followed.
jpnChrName: ──追跡者を警戒した彼女が あえて誤情報を流しているのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
──追跡者を警戒した彼女が
あえて誤情報を流しているのかもしれません。

engChrName: Having stolen top-secret intel, she's likely trying to throw the authorities off her trail.
engSearchText:
Having stolen top-secret intel, she's likely trying to
throw the authorities off her trail.
jpnChrName: 国家機密に等しい資料を盗んでいるのですから、 用心深く事を運んでいるのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
国家機密に等しい資料を盗んでいるのですから、
用心深く事を運んでいるのでしょう。

engChrName: That does make sense... It's exactly what a criminal would do.
engSearchText:
That does make sense... It's exactly what a criminal
would do.
jpnChrName: なるほど、まさに“裏”の世界の考え方ですね。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、まさに“裏”の世界の考え方ですね。

engChrName: I agree with Van, then. Let's head for the highway toward Edith.
engSearchText:
I agree with Van, then. Let's head for the highway
toward Edith.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、それなら国道に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました、それなら国道に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Yeah. Once we're back in New Town, we can hop in my car and hunt 'em down.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Once we're back in New Town, we can hop in
my car and hunt 'em down.
jpnChrName: ああ、新市街から車を出す。 急いで向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、新市街から車を出す。
急いで向かうぞ。

engChrName: Van's car can be taken from the road under the motor pavilion.
engSearchText:
Van's car can be taken from the road
under the motor pavilion.
jpnChrName: 新市街のモーターパビリオン下の 車道に向かうと車を出す事が出来ます。
jpnSearchText:
新市街のモーターパビリオン下の
車道に向かうと車を出す事が出来ます。

engChrName: You wanna know if I've seen a suspicious freight truck? Bit of an odd thing to ask.
engSearchText:
You wanna know if I've seen a suspicious
freight truck? Bit of an odd thing to ask.
jpnChrName: 怪しい運搬車だぁ～？ なんだか知らねえが、ずいぶん唐突だな。
jpnSearchText:
怪しい運搬車だぁ～？
なんだか知らねえが、ずいぶん唐突だな。

engChrName: Er, well, yes, it is. Sorry for just dumping that on—
engSearchText: Er, well, yes, it is. Sorry for just dumping that on—
jpnChrName: そ、そうですよね。 すみません、いきなり変な質問を──
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですよね。
すみません、いきなり変な質問を──

engChrName: Nah, I'm just givin' you guff. I did actually see something like that last night.
engSearchText:
Nah, I'm just givin' you guff. I did actually see
something like that last night.
jpnChrName: ──と言いたいところだが、 昨日の夜に見たぜ、変な運搬車。
jpnSearchText:
──と言いたいところだが、
昨日の夜に見たぜ、変な運搬車。

engChrName: You did?!
engSearchText: You did?!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ！？

engChrName: So, what was suspicious about it?
engSearchText: So, what was suspicious about it?
jpnChrName: ど、どういう車だったんですか？
jpnSearchText: ど、どういう車だったんですか？

engChrName: Well, deliveries last night were all way behind schedule because of all the craziness in the city.
engSearchText:
Well, deliveries last night were all way behind
schedule because of all the craziness in the city.
jpnChrName: ああ、昨夜は例の騒ぎのせいで 配達が大幅に遅れちまっててさ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、昨夜は例の騒ぎのせいで
配達が大幅に遅れちまっててさ……

engChrName: We eventually got everything sorted out...even with that big ol' eye in the sky watching us all.
engSearchText:
We eventually got everything sorted out...even with
that big ol' eye in the sky watching us all.
jpnChrName: あんな飛行艦が浮いてる状況だったが なんとか昨日中に配達を終わらせたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あんな飛行艦が浮いてる状況だったが
なんとか昨日中に配達を終わらせたんだ。

engChrName: So I finally wrap up my work, it's late at night, and I'm tired as hell. I start driving back toward my home on the edge of town.
engSearchText:
So I finally wrap up my work, it's late at night, and
I'm tired as hell. I start driving back toward my home
on the edge of town.
jpnChrName: ……さすがに疲れ果てて街外れの 自宅に戻る帰り道だったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
……さすがに疲れ果てて街外れの
自宅に戻る帰り道だったんだが……

engChrName: I'm waiting at one of the lights, and then I see this giant Red Star truck pull up next to me.
engSearchText:
I'm waiting at one of the lights, and then I see this
giant Red Star truck pull up next to me.
jpnChrName: 信号待ちをしてる途中、レッドスターの 大型運搬車と隣り合わせになったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
信号待ちをしてる途中、レッドスターの
大型運搬車と隣り合わせになったんだ。

engChrName: It had a really weird color scheme to it—never seen a Red Star painted like that. Had to be from outta town, I figured.
engSearchText:
It had a really weird color scheme to it—never seen a
Red Star painted like that. Had to be from outta
town, I figured.
jpnChrName: 見たことのねぇ塗装だったから 多分市外から来たんだとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
見たことのねぇ塗装だったから
多分市外から来たんだとは思うが……

engChrName: But I figured, hey, he's a tired ol' dog like me, driving at ass o'clock. I'll give him a wave! I look out my window and... And, uh...
engSearchText:
But I figured, hey, he's a tired ol' dog like me, driving
at ass o'clock. I'll give him a wave! I look out my
window and... And, uh...
jpnChrName: 向こうさんも似たようなモンと思って お疲れさんと会釈しようとしたら───
jpnSearchText:
向こうさんも似たようなモンと思って
お疲れさんと会釈しようとしたら───

engChrName: ...Nah, forget it. When I say it out loud, it sounds ridiculous. I must've just been seeing things.
engSearchText:
...Nah, forget it. When I say it out loud, it
sounds ridiculous. I must've just been seeing things.
jpnChrName: ………いや、流石に疲れてたんだよな。 悪い、忘れてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
………いや、流石に疲れてたんだよな。
悪い、忘れてくれや。

engChrName: Hey, c'mon, don't leave us hanging.
engSearchText: Hey, c'mon, don't leave us hanging.
jpnChrName: オイオイ、そりゃねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、そりゃねぇだろ。

engChrName: You might not have been seeing things after all. Won't you tell us, please?
engSearchText:
You might not have been seeing things after all.
Won't you tell us, please?
jpnChrName: その、気のせいとかでも結構ですので 話を聞かせていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
その、気のせいとかでも結構ですので
話を聞かせていただけませんか？

engChrName: *sigh* All right, all right. Just don't laugh at me, okay?
engSearchText: *sigh* All right, all right. Just don't laugh at me, okay?
jpnChrName: ふう……それじゃあ話すけど 下らんヨタ話みたいなモンだからな？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……それじゃあ話すけど
下らんヨタ話みたいなモンだからな？

engChrName: I looked out the window, and...there was no one behind the wheel. Just, nothing.
engSearchText:
I looked out the window, and...there was no one
behind the wheel. Just, nothing.
jpnChrName: …………居なかったんだよ、誰も。
jpnSearchText: …………居なかったんだよ、誰も。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: What do you mean...?
engSearchText: What do you mean...?
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: Just nobody in the driver's seat at all?
engSearchText: Just nobody in the driver's seat at all?
jpnChrName: ……つまり運転席に 誰も乗ってなかったのか。
jpnSearchText:
……つまり運転席に
誰も乗ってなかったのか。

engChrName: I'm as puzzled as you are. Before I could really process it, the light turned green and the truck rolled on away.
engSearchText:
I'm as puzzled as you are. Before I could really process
it, the light turned green and the truck rolled
on away.
jpnChrName: ああ──ポカンとしてるうちに運搬車は 信号が青になって先に行っちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ポカンとしてるうちに運搬車は
信号が青になって先に行っちまってな。

engChrName: I had to put my eyes back on the road after that. I never saw that truck again—it only really dawned on me when I got home.
engSearchText:
I had to put my eyes back on the road after that. I
never saw that truck again—it only really dawned on
me when I got home.
jpnChrName: 慌ててこっちも発進したが 結局そのまま見失っちまったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
慌ててこっちも発進したが
結局そのまま見失っちまったんだ。

engChrName: Maybe the driver was just on the short side? Their truck was definitely taller than mine, too. Maybe I just couldn't see 'em.
engSearchText:
Maybe the driver was just on the short side?
Their truck was definitely taller than mine, too.
Maybe I just couldn't see 'em.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、向こうの方が車高も高いし、 身をかがめてただけかもしれねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、向こうの方が車高も高いし、
身をかがめてただけかもしれねぇが。

engChrName: Either that or, again, I was tired as all get out. I might've just been seeing things.
engSearchText:
Either that or, again, I was tired as all get out.
I might've just been seeing things.
jpnChrName: もしくは単に俺が疲れてたせいで 見間違えたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
もしくは単に俺が疲れてたせいで
見間違えたんだろう。

engChrName: Haha. So yeah, that's how it seemed to me at the time, but honestly, it was probably nothing.
engSearchText:
Haha. So yeah, that's how it seemed to me at the
time, but honestly, it was probably nothing.
jpnChrName: はは、だから言っただろ？ 下らんヨタ話みたいなモンだって。
jpnSearchText:
はは、だから言っただろ？
下らんヨタ話みたいなモンだって。

engChrName: Moral of the story here is that everybody needs their sleep. You can't go burnin' the midnight oil just because you can, y'know?
engSearchText:
Moral of the story here is that everybody needs
their sleep. You can't go burnin' the midnight oil just
because you can, y'know?
jpnChrName: お前さんたちも若いからって あんま遅くまで無理するんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちも若いからって
あんま遅くまで無理するんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Lesson learned, yeah... We'll take care of ourselves.
engSearchText: Lesson learned, yeah... We'll take care of ourselves.
jpnChrName: あはは…… はい、分かりました。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
はい、分かりました。

engChrName: Take it easy yourself, yeah? That sounds like the kinda thing a single good night's sleep won't fix.
engSearchText:
Take it easy yourself, yeah? That sounds like the
kinda thing a single good night's sleep won't fix.
jpnChrName: ま、昨日の今日だし、 あんまり無理はしないでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、昨日の今日だし、
あんまり無理はしないでくれよ。

engChrName: Oh, for sure. The city's sealed off until tonight, so I'm gonna try and take it slow while we've got nothing to do.
engSearchText:
Oh, for sure. The city's sealed off until tonight, so I'm
gonna try and take it slow while we've got nothing
to do.
jpnChrName: ああ、夕方まで封鎖が続くらしいし、 休み休みのんびりやらせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、夕方まで封鎖が続くらしいし、
休み休みのんびりやらせてもらうさ。
